I think it’s understandable why I’d want my audience to grow. 
Seems like the app is either glitching and misrepresenting the number of followers I have (which is just as bad), automatically deleting old followers as new followers subscribe, OR all the depopers in the universe are conspiring to follow and unfollow me so precisely that I always stay at 157 followers. 

Please help.

title: Moneyyyy
review: I am a buyer and seller on Depop and love the concept of an online buy, sell, trade store. My only issue in selling is the Depop takes a way a percentage in your sale AND PayPal does as well. When i recently sold something I noticed that and sometimes the shipping I had to pay for costed more than the money I received for the item which led me to changing my shipping to Depop shipping. I just wish Depop would either change their payment method or have an option for the seller to use the money they earn as credit in the app and they can receive full credit for it.
developerResponse:
{'id': 10126723, 'body': "Hey there! Thanks for the review and sharing your concerns about our fee. To give some context, our fee allows us to keep Depop running safely and efficiently. It contributes towards the cost of running the app, creating new features that you’ll love and improving the user experience for our Community.

To understand a bit more, read up here: https://depophelp.zendesk.com/hc/en-gb/articles/360001791127-What-about-fees-

We're also working on improving our payments options so stayed tuned!

Team Depop", 'modified': '2019-08-12T11:49:54Z'}

title: Great app!
review: This is a simple, efficient app and I would recommend but, I wish there was a way to report users that tag words that have nothing to do with the item that they’re  selling, it’s very annoying. I also wish there was an easier way to lower the price for a specific user. For example, if I’m selling multiple shirts for $20 and someone messages me asking if $15 is ok, I wish there was a way to just give it to them privately for $15 instead of changing the price for everyone.

title: going downhill
review: I’ve used this app for over 3 years now to make a quick buck, but now I’m lucky if anybody buys anything from me. It was my go-to bc you get the money instantly. Now they’ve changed the algorithm and it’s HORRIBLE. Your items get zero exposure. I used to get tons of likes and messages on trendy items from buyers but now I’m lucky to get any at all. I’ve sold about 15 items in a few days on Poshmark where as I’ve sold one item in a month on Depop. Not to mention the shipping rates are bizarre AF. Why don’t u guys just do like Poshmark and charge the same rate for everything? It’s like you’re trying to drive sellers away.

title: too glitchy to use
review: I love this app for shopping but recently it's become sooooo glitchy. The first problem I had was when looking at pictures I would get a blank screen and I couldn't view the item anymore. Now I cant like items or save anything or swipe on pictures because the screen wont work. I keep seeing items i want to save or like but i cant because of the glitching. I tried refreshing the app and deleting and redownloading to see if it would work but nothing has. This needs to be fixed asap. How can I shop if I cant even view items.
developerResponse:
{'id': 18831661, 'body': "Hey Ely,

We can imagine how frustrating this is and we’re currently working to resolve this issue. Please get in touch by going to 'Settings - Need help - Technical issues - I've still got an issue' and send us a report leaving your username and details regarding your listings. 
 
We’ll take it from here,
Team Depop
", 'modified': '2020-11-01T20:50:11Z'}

title: Terrible Selling Experience
review: Very difficult to synchronize paypal and Depop for first time sellers. There is no easily reachable help line and when making complaints, they are not responded to without video proof of an issue within the app??? Please set up a clear and accessible phone line or email service to streamline the first time selling experience. I’ve never had issues buying on the app, but my first sale made me anxious and stressed, and I did not manage to resolve the issues faced within the app or with PayPal’s helpline.
developerResponse:
{'id': 17653352, 'body': 'Hey. Thanks for sharing your feedback. PayPal is our payment provider, which ensures that buying and selling are protected in-app. Good news though, you now have access to Depop payments available in settings - preferences which allows you to buy and sell without paypal. 

Thanks
Team Depop
', 'modified': '2020-09-02T15:34:21Z'}

title: NEW PAYMENT METHOD
review:
I love depop I honestly was making good money selling but now I can’t sign into my PayPal so I can’t connect my paypal to my depop account I tried contacting customer service but did not hear anything back! All I want is for depop to change their payment method for me I’m losing so much buyers and money I could’ve been making! I love selling but I can’t and I haven’t heard anything back from depop if someone can get back to me that’ll be great.
They said they’ll be changing it soon but it’s been months they should really work on fixing the apps flaws.
developerResponse: {'id': 16194594, 'body': 'Hey. Thanks for your review. Depop now accept payments outside of PayPal! Please visit this link for more information regarding Depop payments. https://depophelp.zendesk.com/hc/en-gb/articles/360036976194-What-is-Depop-Payments-\n\nTeam Depop', 'modified': '2020-06-24T12:43:50Z'}

title: ⚠️PROCEED WITH CAUTION⚠️
review: I have used this app to buy many people’s used items or items they have in their closet and don’t wear, and it’s been nothing but good results. However, whenever you go to buy something that someone is having manufactured (aka they are making the clothes as a business) it is a huge hit or miss. I recommend only buying things that are not manufactured, because I have seen people pay full prices for clothes and get something that is comparable to Wish quality.
developerResponse: {'id': 12709600, 'body': "Hey. We have a tonne of great independent brands on-app, a number of which are focused on quality and sustainability. So it's worth checking out some of our recommended sellers, we're sure you'll find something you like.\n\nTeam Depop", 'modified': '2020-01-03T14:51:56Z'}

title: For you tab
review:
I love this app especially when it came with the for you tab and offered you clothes and shoes based off of things u liked or saved; that was tbh the only thing I actually went onto when I went on Depop for a while. Until they took it away... idk why they did that but if they can bring it back that would be amazing!!!! 

Update: it did come back but for some reason it’s gone once again?!?! Even though you show the tab in the preview of the app?!?!
developerResponse: {'id': 7654397, 'body': 'Hi there, we hear you.  This feature is still here. We just had a slight glitch but this is currently being worked on as we speak.\n\nLove, Depop', 'modified': '2019-03-10T13:03:44Z'}

title: Good but...
review: Developers updating the app needs to work better since there’s always issues like failed multiple times while uploaded a video, error messages stating they’ve sent the issue but never do I receive a follow up, but other than that, it’s been one of my favorite platforms. There are some signs of popularity and favoritism on the app once you see it around, so don’t always expect to get too much “fame” if your name isn’t too out there. I use my app on my iPhone 10 max!

title: Great overall, but has a major bug
review: The app is great to sell my stuff on, but there’s a bug that I’ve encountered ever since I installed it. I don’t know if it’s the server I’m on, but most of the time when I open the app I get an error message and nothing loads. I have to open and close the app several times to get it to load up properly, which is really annoying when I’m trying to communicate with a buyer. That’s my only problem though, everything else works great for me.
developerResponse:
{'id': 15777780, 'body': "Hey, we can imagine how frustrating this is. Please get in touch by going to 'Settings - Need help - Technical issues - I've still got an issue' and send us a report.
 
We’ll take it from here,
Team Depop
", 'modified': '2020-06-04T13:36:53Z'}

title: LOVE DEPOP but a few minor problems.
review: One of the biggest things I see as a problem is the amount of pictures Depop allows to put. You can only put FOUR pictures of your item, likes seriously? Ive seen so many people have to make collages to show all their pictures, so Depop PLEASE expand the amount of pictures we can post. Literally NOBODY uses the video feature so I would say to get rid of it. Other than that, it's a good app but there is a few scammers! Remember to always make transactions with PayPal!!

title: support is a joke
review: i’ve emailed “support” asking why my account was wrongfully suspended and all i keep getting in response is the same copy and paste emails telling me i infringed on terms of service and i’m not allowed to make a new account but why am i not being told what i did wrong? i haven’t done anything differently in the last three years of me selling on this app for MY JOB, if i did break any rules then truly i’d like to know exactly what i did. it’s ridiculous you have no support number i could call and actually try to get some answers but this email system is getting me absolutely nowhere. please please please fix this issue so i can return to selling my work.

title: Favorite App - Need Improvement
review: i spend a lot of time on this app just looking for things i might want to purchase. It’s often that i go through my likes to unlike things thatve been sold or i’ve changed my mind on. but after a specific point of scrolling through my likes it stops loading and won’t let me continue. i’ve logged in and out deleted and redownloaded the app but nothing has worked, this app would easily be 5 stars for me if that issue didn’t exist.

title: Sellers should be able to reorder their listings!
review: Depop is a decent app for sellers. the 10% rate is kind of high, but there’s nothing we can do about that. The one thing that I truly ask from developers is to implement a way for us to change the order of our listings! As sellers, we should be able to choose which items we want customers to see first. Having to edit ALL of our listings just to reorder them is very tedious and unnecessary process. Please take this into consideration, as doing so would facilitate both sellers’ and buyers’ experiences and improve sales!
developerResponse: {'id': 9142265, 'body': "Hi Anna, thank you for the feedback. You'll be happy to hear that we offer this feature via our website. Just go to the Depop site and you're able to re-arrange all of your listing the way you want it to look.\n\nLove, Depop", 'modified': '2019-06-13T06:45:48Z'}

title: Great for buying...but
review: This app is wonderful for buying clothes! HOWEVER selling is a little different. When you set a price for an item they don’t calculate and tell you how much you’re earning after the Depop fee and shipping and PayPal fee. ALSO I’m new to PayPal so on top of them holding my funds for 21 days I was unaware there was a PayPal fee and it took even more money out! There are so many competitive apps exactly the same that I feel are doing it better with the timing of payments received and you know exactly how much money you’ll be receiving unlike with Depop’s multiple fees.

title: Favorite App - Need Improvement
review: i spend a lot of time on this app just looking for things i might want to purchase. It’s often that i go through my likes to unlike things thatve been sold or i’ve changed my mind on. but after a specific point of scrolling through my likes it stops loading and won’t let me continue. i’ve logged in and out deleted and redownloaded the app but nothing has worked, this app would easily be 5 stars for me if that issue didn’t exist.

title: Love depop
review:
This app is amazing 
Has helped me take care of my daughter bc I’m a single mom working whatever outlet I can at home to make money and this is so easy and fun. I post my old clothes online and people from all over want them! I get cash they get their item and everyone is happy! The customers are sweet, I’ve been featured on the explore page 3 times and I don’t even have a humongous following. It’s really wonderful. So thankful my friend told me about this app!!!

title: Depop review
review: I’ve been using Depop for a while now and I absolutely love it!! I noticed people have complained about not being on the explore page and i just wanted to say that even small accounts can get on it. I’ve been on it twice already but i do understand that depop shows a lot of the same accounts with multiple items on the explore page it’s kind of not fair to others but overall satisfied with the app.
developerResponse: {'id': 3159473, 'body': 'Thanks for leaving this review! Our Editorial team is growing and improving so that we can provide more exposure to all of our sellers selling great items. Stay tuned on this front! Team Depop', 'modified': '2018-04-17T10:46:00Z'}

title: How do I put my address?
review: When I’m listing a item on my phone it tells me to confirm my address and when I do that and I click the región option and i choose a region, when I do that it just kicks me out before I could even finish filling out the information, I tried to find a video on how to fix this but I can’t, please can you help me with this issue. Other than that I love this app and I’m excited to start using it!
developerResponse: {'id': 17910316, 'body': "Hey, we can imagine how frustrating this is and we’re currently working to resolve this issue. Please get in touch by going to 'Settings - Need help - Technical issues - I've still got an issue' and send us a report leaving your username and details regarding your listings. We’ll take it from here, Team Depop", 'modified': '2020-09-16T11:36:16Z'}

title: I would give it none
review: There’s honestly so much cool stuff on depop but so many scumbags as well. Depop does not help at all by enabling them to not require a tracking number and on top of that unless they use the shipping label by depop you cannot review which is ridiculous. Ive gotten my money taken multiple times by people who never ship the item and although they give you your money back it doesnt help no one will ever know this person will not send the item because you can’t even leave a review!!! And if u do get your item it’ll be whenever And u wont know because they did not use the label. I will no longer use depop until they fix this and maybe not even then.

title: No customer service
review: The idea of this app is great but when it comes down to it it's like dealing with children. Once an item is purchased and paid for, the buyer is at the sellers mercy. I had 3 separate transactions all at once to give this app a shot. Once I paid for the items, I had to hound all three buyers separately to actually ship the items I paid for. I made my purchases SIX days ago and only one item has arrived. The item that arrived was not as described with an obvious stain on it. The seller asked me "what was he supposed to do about it". Want me to pay for shipping and fees to return a stained item. If you're used to and customer service or not interested in babysitting, DONT USE THIS APP. 👎🏻

title: Good but needs some QOL improvements
review: So I like to browse this and other resale apps, and while depop is good, the other apps have some fantastic features that this one lacks. Like, setting default sort order to be always by newly listed items. Expanded subcategories like swim and sportswear. But the most egregious is the lack of being notified when an item drops in price. Everyone else? instant notification. Depop? you gotta visit all the liked/saved items regularly unless you want to miss out on something that was just out of your price range.

title: trash
review:
used it a couple of times and it went well, sellers are nice. however the app itself is a joke. i deleted the app because it kept asking me to verify who i am over and over. i decided to redownload today. i changed my password, but it didn’t accept the new login with this password and now i’m unable to login for 24 HOURS. not worth it, everything on here is just “y2k” and fake clothes that people think it worth more than 50$.
UPDATE 
when i logged in, all of my account was cleared. all of my likes, what i sold, bought, my profile picture. ridiculous. deleted my account because i’m so upset about losing one i had 5 star ratings on.
developerResponse:
{'id': 19696417, 'body': 'Hey, we’re sorry to hear this and we can imagine how frustrating this must be. Could you please submit a support request via this link http://bit.ly/depoplockedout
 Please remember to include your:
- Username
- Email address
- Phone number
- Phone operating system, example iOS 13
 
Let’s get this sorted,
Team Depop', 'modified': '2020-12-11T11:44:49Z'}

title: Loved Depop before they ruined the search algorithm...
review: I’ve been selling on Depop for over 7 months. I’ve had a good amount of success and managed to make a lot of customers very happy. The last update absolutely destroyed the search function and now the majority sellers are seeing sales plummet and customers are heading to other online marketplaces because they can’t find what they want using the search function. I’ve been a huge fan of Depop, but the way they have handled the outcry from sellers and buyers alike has been horrendous. Please fix your algorithm, Depop. It’s affecting sellers, buyers and I can only assume it’s also affecting the amount of fee money Depop makes on every sale.

title: Not working
review:
Would give it a five star but it’s been working not so great was at first bought a couple items but now it’s giving problems contacted depop and told them they fixed one problem and now there’s another idk if it’s just me or everyone is going through this but hopefully they fix this cuz over all this app is great but now I can’t buy anything

Works great now thank you guys for fixing my problem!

title: ugly layout now
review: before the new update depop looked like instagram and i was so easy to use and scroll through clothing but now they changed the layout to show only 2 photos side by side. this makes it so much longer to scroll through brands and items and it’s ugly af. super upset about this update and makes me not want to use the app. i’m also a seller on there and one of my items was removed for NO reason i reached out to depop and they told me not to repost it or they’ll delete my account... i really want to sell it on depop but looks like i have to list it on poshmark or something else. so annoying

title: Use Mercari or Poshmark
review: The customer service on this app is terrible. They will flag you for whatever reason they decide on a whim and will never tell you what rule you’ve broken or even let you try to justify why they decide to do whatever they want. Sellers on the app are always getting away with selling fake product yet they will flag you, innocent, for completely private DMs and try to blackmail you over it. It’s a clique of high school and college kids who don’t know a single thing about running a proper business and just want to take your money and scam you. Do not download this app and do not trust these people, just get a better shopping app with a better reputation.

title: Used to get featured a lot
review: I am one of the people who used to get featured a lot which felt great bc I put a lot of effort into my shop. I sold a lot of unique things on here but business has been very slow. Idk what I’m doing wrong but it’s been hard to land a good sale lately. I do love the new look. I just wish we had the old feature when you could see what was selling and when. It’s like you’re trying to hide your algorithm.

title: Pretty much a good app
review: Depop is really convenient for me. I love online shopping and it’s easy to contact sellers if you have any questions or anything in that nature. For me, Depop lets me browse swiftly w/o any hassles. Only problem is my feed isn’t giving me my personal sizes. For example, let’s say I wear a size L but my personal feed is giving me size smalls. I don’t know if the seller set the item up that way but it’s really annoying to find a cool pair of shoes but can’t purchase them because they’re not your size. please fix this :(

title: Doesn't treat long term users fair
review:
I've been using the app for years. However, they constantly showcase/feature the same seller items everyday.   I have a shop filled with very nice items which doesn't matter if no body gets to see them😞 
Extraordinary fashions boutique. Since they didn’t showcase my items please stop by. I recently sold a very nice Gucci on another selling site. However the bag  was listed on Depop and never showcased.
developerResponse:
{'id': 9725488, 'body': "Hey there! We do try to shake things up and feature different Sellers on a regular basis. 

Here's some tips on how to featured on the Explore Page: https://depophelp.zendesk.com/hc/en-gb/articles/360001792207-How-do-I-get-featured-on-the-Explore-page-

Happy selling,
Team Depop", 'modified': '2019-07-18T10:55:01Z'}

title: Love it but got some ideas
review: I love this app so much there’s some things on the app that make me want to buy it and that makes me movie the app because they always have what your looking for but I think should be added is dark mode. A lot of people like having there phone on dark mode and some people like there phone to be on light mode i think you guys have your app a dark mode option so people can have there app on dark mode or on light other then that I love this app so much.

title: Tons of bugs
review: Been using this app for over a year and recently it’s become almost unusable with all the bugs. I’m mostly a seller on here and whenever I try to list an item the keyboard glitches and it takes me about 30 minutes to list one item. Also has a problem with sending messages. I’ve missed out on many sales as depop does not notify me when someone messages me until 30 minutes later. Also when I send messages they disappear and the other person does not receive them. I love selling on this app but the bugs make it super difficult.
developerResponse:
{'id': 17287596, 'body': "Hey, we can imagine how frustrating this is and we’re currently working to resolve this issue. Please get in touch by going to 'Settings - Need help - Technical issues - I've still got an issue' and send us a report leaving your username and details regarding your listings. 
 
We’ll take it from here,
Team Depop
", 'modified': '2020-08-14T15:25:18Z'}

title: Love it but there are some issues
review: I love depop. I have tried selling my clothing on other apps but I find this audience fits best. I like how easy it is too. However, when it comes to shopping it’s quite annoying. I am a plus size girl and there isn’t as much clothes available. So when sold listings aren’t filtered out, it makes it even harder to shop. I think that would make the app so much easier to use for shopping and make items easier to find and increase sales.

title: mobil interface issue
review:
Hello!

I love depop but have to browse on my laptop for this reason: the top 1/6 of my screen isn't working and I can't get me phone fixed now that my city is on lockdown. I enabled the setting where I can swipe from the bottom of my phone so I can access the top part, but this isn't compatible with depop's app. It prevents me from swiping and thus I can't access my profile settings or the search bar. I would really love for this bug to be fixed.

Thank you :)

title: Could use a lot of improvement but
review: Its an ok app. I’ve used the app for a few years now, selling and purchasing. I think depop has a problem where there’s more people selling stuff than buying. A lot of my old items still haven’t sold despite being up for years. I would like them to add more categories for items. And for sellers to be able to make announcement or sale posts without having to use the usual “listing an item” format. I appreciate depop’s no fee for listing items and I hope that doesn’t change.
developerResponse: {'id': 6507206, 'body': 'We love our users and we hear you. This is some great tips for us and we will make sure to pass this down to the team.\n\nHappy Holidays. Kisses.', 'modified': '2018-12-22T02:55:17Z'}

title: Horrible Experience
review: Decent selling app but when it comes to dealing with a seller that refuses to send an item and refuses to cancel and refund payment Depop has horrible policy’s and customer service they wouldn’t do anything for a full 7 days even though I had proof that the seller said they would not be giving me a refund and would not be sending the item I had already paid for. Then they give the seller an extra 48 hours ad tell me to deal with it through PayPal, just horrible service. At least the other selling and buying apps handle there own business and have decent customer service. Terrible app I DO NOT RECOMMEND it for buying items at all.
developerResponse: {'id': 7510566, 'body': "Hi Prestra, sorry to hear you're having a bad experience. Please do know that you have buyer's protection when buying an item through the app. We always do leave a space of 7 days for a seller to send the item, however, if you send proof to the support team they can try to reach out to the seller earlier and advise you on how to open a dispute via PayPal to start the refund process.\n\nLove, Depop", 'modified': '2019-02-28T11:59:17Z'}

title: I LOVE DEPOP
review: okay so i personally have only bought 2 thing on depop but like that more than your average joe, YA FEEL? anyways. both sellers i have bought from are super nice and tell the truth about what they are selling you i bought pants and i was like they are probably hyping the product up but NO THESE PANTS ARE REALLY FLATTERING! i just bought an eye palette and the seller said it had never been used and it really has never been used. i love this app and i hope u find the love for it as much i FRICKING LOVE THIS APP.

title: Streetware? Fashion?
review: As a person who has - successfully - sold books on your platform for years, I’m super bummed that you keep pushing non-clothing sellers out of your market. We are making you money through our sales, so you should want to support us, too! People should know that you can buy more than just clothing on your app. And you should be happy to promote that. I really enjoy your platform and I hope you come to this realization soon and go back to featuring all types of sellers. Thank you!
developerResponse: {'id': 5941512, 'body': "We do love our fashion but it's not only what our hearts desire. We appreciate your feedback and do agree that our platform is for all the diveristy and loves of life. We will pass this on to our team and make sure your feedback gets heard.\n\nLove, Depop", 'modified': '2018-11-14T11:32:10Z'}

title: Customer service problem
review: I joined depop last summer and the app was easy to work on and I never had any trouble. Recently though my page was suspended (I have not done anything in my opinion for this) so I emailed depop to see if I could find out why and get it fixed. I’ve sent TWO emails and still no response, it’s been 3 days. I have a few people who purchased from me recently and need to know if they get their package plus I bought from someone so I want to ensure it gets to me. I need my page back to finish my transaction or at least need some kind of answer. Good app, awful customer service.

title: Great app, not a day job
review: Love using this app causally to buy items and sell clothes I don’t wear anymore. Not sure it’s worth the amount of time it would take to really make money off of it but it’s a great app to use for fun. Discover page can get kinda boring and redundant, it would be nice to see smaller pages get featured, but I usually search for specific items instead of using the discover page. Overall a really awesome app for anyone who likes finding second hand clothing and accessories.
developerResponse: {'id': 3224646, 'body': 'Hey Kathryn, thank you very much for your feedback! Team Depop', 'modified': '2018-04-23T11:18:05Z'}

title: App keeps crashing.
review: I was in the middle of a deal and the app launched me out with no warning. There’s nowhere to report it and when I log in (which takes me 5 tries by the way. It won’t let me log in using WiFi I have to use my data.) I can’t see my messages or even my tracking numbers or sold/purchased list. It says in red “load more” and won’t load. I’ve deleted and reinstalled the app 8 times, and restarted my phone 3 times and it continues to glitch. I am incredibly frustrated and upset with Depop. I’ve been using it about a week and everything was going smoothly until now and I’m incredibly frustrated with what’s happening.
developerResponse: {'id': 16718463, 'body': "Hey! The good news is we've fixed this bug, if you update to the latest version it should be resolved now. Team Depop", 'modified': '2020-07-18T20:18:56Z'}

title: Notifications won’t disappear
review: I love depop, but everytime I get a notification I open the app to see it & then close the app again-  the red notification bubble on the app doesn’t go away. I have to click through the app and refresh multiple things (even if that wasn’t what the notification was about) and keep checking before somehow it finally disappears. it makes no sense why I would need to refresh my feed/new followers/liked items if my notification was about someone sending me a message?
developerResponse:
{'id': 16192746, 'body': "Hey, we can imagine how frustrating this is. Please get in touch by going to 'Settings - Need help - Technical issues - I've still got an issue' and send us a report.
 
We’ll take it from here,
Team Depop
", 'modified': '2020-06-24T11:35:07Z'}

title: Great App but Needs Some Improvement
review:
I have been using Depop for a while and I really enjoy it! It’s very easy to use and I highly recommend getting it if you want to look for great vintage items. 

I gave it only four stars instead of five because I wish depop had a better way to contact customer service... like a phone number. Also, I can’t seem to have the ability to change my shipping address after purchasing an item. I’m so stuck! Someone please help me.
developerResponse:
{'id': 10180570, 'body': "Hey! Our Community Support teams work round the clock to keep our Community safe and in-the-know. We now have a live chat option, too. Try that if you're looking for a speedy response! 
Next time you purchase an item, you'll have the option to change your shipping address. Once you've done this once, it'll change automatically for future use. Alternatively, head into your settings and you'll be able to do it there.

Hope this helps!
Team Depop", 'modified': '2019-08-15T08:34:29Z'}

title: They steal your money
review: I have no respect for this app. You are selling your own item and the fact that they take half of what you earned is pathetic. That is your item that you are selling so tell me why you have to share half the money off your item that you are selling. They took 15 bucks from me that was way too much you do not own that item so tell me why you are that much from me. For example you play Fortnite on mobile they are not taking your money from using the app. This app is robbing your money no respect. You are helping them gain money for not doing anything how about you sell your own items do not take money from MY OWN ITEM THAT I HAD SOLD

title: Finding Items
review: The most inconvenient feature of the app is the fact that I can’t sort items that I’m looking for by price. The whole point of thrifting is to find good items for the cheapest price and it’d save me (and my friends who feel the same way) a boatload if time and energy if we could just find cheap items from our favorite brands by sorting them by price when we search, that would make the app flawless - aside from some occasional glitches.
developerResponse: {'id': 8771856, 'body': 'Hi there, thank you for your feedback. We can totally understand this. I will make sure your feedback is passed down to our team.\n\nLove, Depop', 'modified': '2019-05-21T07:40:02Z'}

title: Love It
review:
For someone who loves thrifting but can’t find anything at her local store, Depop is perfect. You just have to know how to navigate and find things on it. There is an explore page but its feature only super popular shops in my opinion wit the occasional item that is recommended
To you. I’m loving the new search feature it is very practical for someone like me who wears unisex clothing.  You can search for an item in men’s and womens sizes at the same time.

title: Notifications
review: The notifications are super glitchy. If I receive a message and open it, when I close the app it still shows an unread message. I’ve also purchased a few items where I haven’t been able to rate the buyer. I guess because they chose not to do shipping via the app( which I do as well), that it shows it hasn’t been shipped. I purchased an item almost a year ago, received a refund, and still haven’t been able to rate. When I reached out to depop they basically just said to wait. Super frustrating!

title: Best selling application
review:
So far then best platform I’ve used to sell
Items , only complaints I have is all the fees they deduct from every sell , it seem like way too much especially when I choose to use their shipping labels. The upside has been the people I’ve dealt with , everyone has been so nice and understanding. I will continue to use Depop & only hope I find a way to avoid all these fees I’m being charged . Way to much
developerResponse:
{'id': 16514273, 'body': "Hey, thanks for the review. Our 10% fee allows us to keep Depop running smoothly. It contributes towards the cost of running the app, creating new features and improving our Community’s experience. 
 
See our article about fees by going to 'Settings - Need help' and typing in ‘What about fees’.
Team Depop
", 'modified': '2020-07-09T15:18:58Z'}

title: Great Just one issue
review: Depop is an incredible app where you can find amazing varieties of clothing for everyone! My only complaint is when shopping, clothing that has already been sold pops up on my feed, this is very inconvenient and wastes my time when I get my hopes up for something only to read the fine print that it has been sold. Maybe in the future they could update the app so that when things get sold they are taken off your feed :)

title: Great app for purchasing but horrible for selling.
review: I honestly love this app for the retro fits and style but when I tried to sell in the app PayPal and depop seemed to squabble on the wearabouts of my money. I provided them all the receipts and transaction ID and shipping ID and still have yet to pay a single cent. So in total I lost about $500-$600 in total but hey I’m glad there’s a bunch of people out there that got shipped free stuff cause I followed all PayPal’s procedures and even depops and tried all their solutions and still didn’t receive my payment and even contacted both sides and they repeatedly told me to ask the other for assistance on the matter. Funny how one app can make you feel robbed🤷🏾‍♂️.
developerResponse:
{'id': 18037904, 'body': 'Hey

Thanks for getting in touch. This message is to let you know that we’ve received your report and will respond as soon as possible!

Most questions can be answered on our Help Centre, so make sure you check that out here https://depophelp.zendesk.com/hc/en-gb, whilst we work hard to get back to you.

Speak soon,

Team Depop', 'modified': '2020-09-23T03:01:53Z'}

title: Can’t open the app
review: Yesterday the app was fine and I could open it on my phone but today, every time I click on the app icon, it exits me out of the app so that I cannot use it. I don’t have an old phone and I just updated Depop so I’m not sure what the problem is. This issue also occurred when a family member of mine downloaded the app today on the same model phone (iPhone 11). I tried restarting my phone but something seems to be wrong with the app itself.
developerResponse: {'id': 16571546, 'body': "Hey! The good news is we've fixed this bug, if you update to the latest version it should be resolved now. Team Depop", 'modified': '2020-07-12T22:57:13Z'}

title: Thank you for spreading awareness!
review: I’ve used Depop to sell items and purchase clothing for the past few years and I just read their update for the current epidemic we’re going thru and read all their suggestions and I am so pleased to see they actually care! They care about your safety and the safety of others and I really hope they treat their employees just the same! Thank you for spreading awareness, we’ll get thru this!

title: nice but...
review:
i like depop, except the brandy melville cult (those people are ridiculous and go against depop’s vision: selling clothes for a cheap, affordable price; these girls are selling clothes that retail for 12$ for >100$ and are extremely rude). the brandy cult people make depop toxic and ruin people’s experience on the app. so if they could be banned or something that would be nice. 

i also think this app needs to work on more protection for the buyers, like hold the funds until the purchase is completed to prevent scams (like how mercari holds the money until the seller and buyer have rated each other). i think that doing this will make people be a bit more comfortable with shopping on depop and not have to worry about not receiving an item. 

another thing is the support, i think depop support is lagging a bit. i recommend having a support chat or something, emails take a long time for a response. 

i also forgot about dropshippers, i don’t like how they charge so much money for the price they pay for and they don’t even use their own photos. it’s unfair to people on depop trying to get cheap items. 

overall, depop is an amazing app with a bright future ahead. it just needs improvement, like any other app.

depop, you have a bright future, i can see it.

title: It’s missing something
review: I like the app overall. But it’s missing something and it’s hard to put a finger on what it’s missing. I don’t like how I can’t delete a post after I’ve posted it. That’s odd! I like that payment comes up front. But I’m still fairly new on it so those are my major drawbacks. And possibly add a translation interface in the messages. I did notice all my messages but the most recent One have vanished. That is odd. Those are my takeaways thus far.

title: Algorithm is killing me
review: I love this app but the algorithm for the “made for you” section is the worst. Why have me put in my preferred shoe size if I’m just going to get recommended completely random sizes? It goes from 4 to 11 to 7.5 but has no clue I’m actually a size 13 despite asking me that. Along with the fact im only getting recommended items from European sellers which also makes no sense considering I put US dollars as my preferred. I wouldn’t be that mad if it was just like every few, but it’s every single item exempt from like 6. It really stinks cuz I love the app, but these just prevent me from enjoying it anymore.

title: Service
review:
Giving me the run around. 

I shipped a customers package late, they filed a complaint. I get blocked out of Depop till I refund or Ship. Since I’m not allowed to access Depop I can’t see Purchase details. They give me date and amount, I’m able to see it in PayPal. I proceed to refund and they keep giving me the run around. Telling me that’s not the right transaction. Despite not having sold anything else on Depop the day they provided. Been talking to them for over a week on something I already fixed, that there insistent i haven’t. They won’t provided any other details on what transaction there looking for. Basically telling me I’m doomed to never use the app again.
developerResponse: {'id': 10722512, 'body': "Hey Riley, I can imagine your frustration. Our Support Team tend to know what they're talking about, however if you feel this is unfair, drop us a line at support@depop.com with some more supporting evidence and we'll investigate further for you.\n\nTeam Depop", 'modified': '2019-09-17T09:46:04Z'}

title: Best!
review: Out of all the other shopping apps I’ve had Depop tops them all. I’ve made more sells than ever before and I sell pretty quickly too. Prefer this wayy more than Poshmark or Mercari. Haven’t received any lowball offers from customers as with Poshmark that’s all I would receive! Be aware this app caters more to the young and hip buyers/sellers so that bland high end clothing might not sell as well, also I love that vintage and handmade styles are all the rage here! 💖💖💖
developerResponse: {'id': 17299068, 'body': 'We’re glad you love Depop as much as we do.\n\nTeam Depop', 'modified': '2020-08-15T21:45:07Z'}

title: Good Product Selection, Bad Customer Service / Algorithm
review:
I am a seller on depop. The products and sellers on this app are imo the best out of all reseller apps. Another positive is that i have never had a problem with payments.

Negatives: The fees are too high for their poor customer service. If you’re gonna take 10%, make sure to respond to people in a timely manner. Making us wait over a week for a response is absurd. 

Finally, it is really annoying that my “for you” curated items are all from the UK. I live in the USA and only purchase items from my country due to shipping time. Please allow me to filter USA only options.

Update: took away another star because of the new algorithm that is nuking everyone’s sales. Also, you have to remember to turn off the “free shipping”button with EVERY new listing, which obviously I didn’t remember and had to pay for shipping on an order.

title: Love but frustrating
review: I use depop frequently by browsing, buying and selling. I adore depop but one thing that needs to be fixed is how it takes you back to the very top of the search if you are looking at an item on the app and on a computer. When you click on an item you want to take a better look at and then have to continually scroll all the way back down the search to where you were, it gets frustrating.
developerResponse: {'id': 15444043, 'body': "Hey! The good news is we've fixed this bug, if you update to the latest version it should be resolved now.\n\nTeam Depop", 'modified': '2020-05-20T11:29:50Z'}

title: Love! But needs an update!
review:
In the past I’ve never had glitches and this app has always functioned well, but for the past few days I’ve been having the same
glitch. When I’m scrolling through a search, I click on an item, but when I click out of it, it takes me back to the top of the results. It’s extremely annoying and tiresome. I have been using the app significantly less because of it. Please fix the bugs Thank you!
developerResponse:
{'id': 15396309, 'body': "Hey, sorry to hear about this! The good news is we've got a fix for this bug on the way. 
 
Stay tuned, 
Team Depop
 
", 'modified': '2020-05-18T15:42:01Z'}

title: minimal opportunities for low quality
review: It’s kind of hard for people who doing this to make money they don’t have because everything a dress up game now.. everybody not on here to model and finess people out of money they already got by buying something cheap and selling it for more. there is people on here like me seeking what they don’t want to sell by default of being laid off and it’s gotten harder bring on here because people support fame not who actually need it. other than that I appreciate this platform for helping me sell my clothes

title: Overall Great App
review: I’ve been using depop for awhile and have found lots of great items and really expanded my comfort zone in terms of my wardrobe. Some items can be overpriced but overall I’ve had great success with the app. The only thing is that the function of the app is less than ideal. It’s very slow when loading posts and notifications, and I have to restart the app in order to get rid of event pop ups on my screen. But besides that, I am very happy with the app.
developerResponse: {'id': 9961382, 'body': "Hey there! Thanks for the rave review this super helpful feedback. We love hearing from our users about what we can do to improve Depop for everyone. I'll be passing this one along to our Product Team.\n\nTeam Depop", 'modified': '2019-08-01T15:35:31Z'}

title: Nice so far
review: I’ve had this app for a little over a month now, and it’s going well. I mainly buy, and most of the sellers have been very nice. I like the feature that you can organize what you like, it’s pretty helpful. But, I really wish there was a way to send listings you think a friend would like to them. You know how you can send a post to a friend on Instagram? Can we get something like that here? Other than that, I’m going to continue to use the app and enjoying it.

title: Private likes option
review: Love this app so much! But would be great if there was an option to make your likes private, if you like someones item that user will see it in their notifications and your name will show up as liked on the product itself but when users click on your profile all your likes will not be shown if this option of privacy is chosen.

title: It doesn’t let me log in
review: I really like the app and I had made an account on it. Unfortunately I don’t remember my password and every time I would input my email so they can let me reset it it would let me. It said  “could not reset password for that user”. I really want to buy things but I can’t get back into my account :( I tried making a new account but I had already used my phone number in my previous account. Is there any way I can get my account back? I really like the app and wish to buy from it.
developerResponse:
{'id': 12550723, 'body': "Hey, we’re sorry to hear this and we can imagine how frustrating this must be. Could you please email us at support@depop.com with the subject line saying 'Login Issues'. Please remember to include your:
 
- Username
- Email address
- Phone number
- Phone operating system, example iOS 13
 
Let’s get this sorted,
Team Depop", 'modified': '2019-12-23T16:19:16Z'}

title: Great Idea, Horrible Execution.
review: Great fashion marketplace to find niche and affordable items, especially for vintage and thrifting. However, the app functionality lags. Many crashes, disconnects, and payment options are not consistent. For example, even when selecting to pay with a debit card, you are redirected to a page where you are prompted to pay with paypal only. I’ve a complained a number of times and nothing has changed. They need to work on the app itself, before someone executes on their idea better than them.
developerResponse:
{'id': 10662994, 'body': "Hey

For crashes and bugs, we're always on hand. Just drop us a line at support@depop.com. For payments, the redirection to PayPal will be suggesting you checkout as a guest, which mirrors a regular card purchase. Good news, we're looking into alternative payments.

Stay tuned,
Team Depop", 'modified': '2019-09-13T08:47:48Z'}

title: Great Content - Always Crashing
review: This app is amazing for the fashion selection and ease of payment, selling and shipping. The community is also very welcoming. Now, usually I don’t whine about an app crashing. But this one crashes on a regular basis. I will be searching and wandering through this app and in about 5-10 minutes - it crashes. I know that this may be my phone, but it’s so frustrating. I’ve tried restarting my phone, reinstalling the app, etc. Every single update to the app still has the frustrating crashing glitch.

title: Great interface
review: I abhor the fees. I sometimes feel like just hitting up my local buffalo exchange or platos closet skip the shipping and just dive in straight to the retail therapy session. One thing you will find premium brands for a lot less than a consignment store or boutique, but you still will find resellers, scoundrels, poops and scallywags. If you’re a casual online thrifter or even a hardcore thrifter and want to find a specific brand but don’t want to pay retail or perhaps you’ll pay the same but still be able to have that piece you were seeking

title: Uploading photos was a pain, now it’s impossible
review: Before the update, I would wait ages for “all photos” to load to be able to access the album where the photos I imported from my camera would be found. It would take so long to load, probably upwards of 3 min just to load all my albums.  This made uploading photos such a time consuming process. However, now after the update, the option to open other albums doesn’t even show up! This is such a pain for photos you don’t take directly on your phone. Depop please fix this bug!
developerResponse:
{'id': 19074814, 'body': 'Hey there,

Thank you for being so patient whilst we fixed this.
The great news is, our Tech team have now resolved the issue and the fix will be released in our next update!

Team Depop', 'modified': '2020-11-12T21:33:00Z'}

title: Love! But there is one issue
review: I absolutely love Depop as so many users sell so many unique pieces. However something that is really frustrating is that when I’m scrolled all the way down and I click on a post and then swipe out I have to scroll back all the way back down to where I was because it sends me back to the top page of my search. Is there any way to stop this from occurring?
developerResponse:
{'id': 15396269, 'body': "Hey, sorry to hear about this! The good news is we've got a fix for this bug on the way. 
 
Stay tuned, 
Team Depop
", 'modified': '2020-05-18T15:40:00Z'}

title: Grid view search
review: I’ve always been patient with depop and the changes over the years (shipping costs, popularizing sellers, etc.) but this grid view search is really frustrating. There are so many items on depop and I tend to shop like a thrift store. Not always looking for something very specific. The 2x2 grid view is wildly annoying. There should be an option to choose 3x3 or 2x2. Furthermore, this view really makes it harder for smaller sellers to get their items viewed. Unfortunately, I don’t have the time to shop this way and won’t be until it’s adjusted.

title: Won’t let me log into my account
review: So I was logged out of my acc just now and when I went to sign in (I sign in with Facebook) I keep getting unknown error after trying to log in. The rare times I CAN get into my account it won’t show me my past sales or messages from customers. The page is blank but you can click “load more” and when I do that once nothing happens, I click it multiple times and it logs me back out of my acc. This is my only income please fix this. Also, sometimes I don’t get the shipping label in my email once an item is sold, please fix that too.
developerResponse: {'id': 16719256, 'body': "Hey! The good news is we've fixed this bug, if you update to the latest version it should be resolved now. Team Depop", 'modified': '2020-07-18T22:07:04Z'}

title: not letting me in
review: i downloaded depop (which i have before) but when i log in with facebook, it asks me to put in my phone number. i had no problem entering it but then it just sends me back to the startup screen: “Continue with Facebook. Sign Up. Login.”  i can’t even get in! i’ve tried creating a new account but my phone is already registered with an account. (you know, the one i can’t get into.)
developerResponse: {'id': 7057080, 'body': 'Hi there, please pop over a report via our in-app support Settings - Need Help? - Technical Issues and then we can get this sorted together. Keep us posted <3.\n\nLove, Depop', 'modified': '2019-01-29T06:14:25Z'}

title: App has issues
review: Depop is kind of like the instagram of selling apps, it’s all about the clout and followers which I don’t really appreciate. The app only displays the same items on the “explore page” for days even after they have been sold. And lastly, I have verified my PayPal and even sold an item using my PayPal account, BUT when I make new sales, I am unable to download the shipping label. It says I have not verified my account. I contacted Depop with the issue and they don’t reply in a timely manner and I feel so guilty not having shipped my orders yet.
developerResponse:
{'id': 15249531, 'body': "Hey, our support response times are currently slightly longer due to the current global situation, but we'll be in touch ASAP.
 
We're here for you,
Team Depop
", 'modified': '2020-05-11T19:34:45Z'}

title: Great app but could use a few improvements!
review: I’m very satisfied with Depop so far! It’s simple to add listings and I like that you can include 5 hashtags. That being said, I’m unable to add a brand that isn’t in their list of options. Also the Depop shipping options could be more affordable. 0.5-2 pounds for shipping is a large range and at $9 it makes it more difficult to sell items that are beyond 0.5 pounds. If a few tweaks are made, I think it will be a fantastic marketplace for sellers and buyers!
developerResponse:
{'id': 11121241, 'body': "Hey. Thanks for the feedback. We love hearing about what we can do to improve Depop for our Community.

If you get in touch with Support in app, we'll be more than happy to include any suggested brands.

Have a read through out US Shipping Guide to understand more on the breakdown and what options you have: https://depophelp.zendesk.com/hc/en-gb/articles/360001790787-Shipping-guide-US

We're here to help,
Team Depop", 'modified': '2019-10-08T09:09:57Z'}

title: Has potential...
review:
I love Depop, but there are many issues that need to be addressed:
1.) You should be able to provide more than four photos, some items need more to properly show the item.

2.) You should be able to have full size photos not be limited to only square.

3.) There should be a unisex option for clothing, not all clothing is gendered and it’s very limiting, very disappointing 

4.) Dropshipping is a major unaddressed issue that needs to be stopped. For those that don’t know “dropshipping is a retail fulfillment method where a store doesn't keep the products it sells in stock. Instead, when a store sells a product, it purchases the item from a third party and has it shipped directly to the customer. As a result, the merchant never sees or handles the product.”

Other than that it is a wonderful app that helps support sustainable fashion and connect with others💕
developerResponse:
{'id': 10586977, 'body': "Hey there! Thanks for this super helpful feedback. We love hearing from our users about what we can do to improve Depop for everyone. I'll be passing these along to the Team.

On Drop Shipping, we're investigating our options on a company wide level to measure the impact towards our community and to ensure that in future the Depop app highlights the type of items you want to see.

We will do our best to give you the answers and policy you deserve. Read this article for further information on our current policy: https://depophelp.zendesk.com/hc/en-gb/articles/360026573794-What-is-drop-shipping-and-is-it-allowed-on-Depop-

Stay tuned for future developments,
Team Depop", 'modified': '2019-09-09T10:03:08Z'}

title: Offer a report function on posts
review: So many people spam their posts with popular keywords like brandy melville and it’s getting really annoying. Buyers aren’t able to find items that they’re looking for because of all the posts spamming the tags, and sellers who actually have those items aren’t able to connect with those buyers. Let us report posts for spamming tags!!!!!!!!!!!!!

title: Issues with sellers actually shipping purchased items
review: I know this doesn’t stand for 90% of users of the app, but I have been scammed at least 3 times in a row purchasing items from the site. There should defiantly be some kind of faster refund system if the seller doesn’t ship item within 10 days or so. I know this is just a basic assumption, and I’m sure it’s way more complicated than that, but it just gets really annoying having to wait 60days to get my money back from PayPal claims from dealing with  incompetent sellers I unfortuently keep finding myself working with.
developerResponse: {'id': 6084143, 'body': "Hi there, this is awful to hear. Can you let us know your username? We want to reach out to the support team and have a look at your situation. We don't want you to go through this alone so we're here for you!\n\nLove, Depop", 'modified': '2018-11-24T11:33:38Z'}

title: Whats good with my items??
review: So depop has this tendency to just take down all of my items and ive been slashed with warnings sayin that my items fall under the prohibited items. Their customer support always ignores my twitter dms and i just get some automated bs when i email them. I do my fair share of reporting accounts that also sell used cosmetics and use a bajillion tags (because if i cant do it why cant they) but ive realized that reporting items isnt the issue. It’s their automated bot that checks through our little posts n whatnot. I have over 100 reviews but im so scared my account is gonna get banned one day.

title: Use to Love
review: This app was great but beware the customer support is horrible it leaves room for scammers. I sold an item to a buyer who started a dispute after she received the item. The depop policy is to send you a notification to your email not to your depop mail box so my first email got lost and I never responded. Today , four days later, I see the second email saying they ruled in the buyers favor. I sent them proof of postage and delivery the day which was before the dispute was started. Depop responded to bad it can’t be reversed you should of responded sooner.....to the lost email......They need to protect the sellers and buyers and when they find a scammer don’t rule in their favor out of laziness!

title: Great for buying and selling, some features are kinda buggy
review: I love this app, I buy and sell a ton on it but my only problem is with the filters and my liked items. The filters sometimes take multiple times to apply after I set them, and if I unlike a sold item, it totally messes up the thumbnail for my collections and makes my likes not work really well. I’m also not a fan of the persistent notification bubble after I check my notifs.
developerResponse:
{'id': 16730598, 'body': "Hey, we can imagine how frustrating this is. Please get in touch by going to 'Settings - Need help - Technical issues - I've still got an issue' and send us a report.
 
We’ll take it from here,
Team Depop
", 'modified': '2020-07-19T20:25:42Z'}

title: Nothing but Love For Depop ❤️
review: I wish I started on this amazing app a long time ago. It’s only been a month since I started shopping on Depop and it’s been nothing but great experiences! All the lovely vintage skirts and dresses I had such a hard time finding everywhere else were all on Depop and at very reasonable prices. Can’t wait to start selling my own collection. And to Depop you guys are super amazing, thank you so much for giving us this gem ❤️❤️❤️❤️
developerResponse: {'id': 7329899, 'body': "Hey Ndongo, what beautiful words to our ears. We think you're very amazing as well and can't wait to see what you bring to the platform. Get creative, get freaky, do your thing.\n\nLove, Depop", 'modified': '2019-02-17T13:36:44Z'}

title: We need more diversity when it comes to featuring sellers. Stop featuring the same ones !!!
review:
Depop Buyer and Seller : 
This update has to go ! It does NOT increase sales for smaller sellers. I see the same aesthetic and sellers all the time on the explore page and it’s getting annoying. There’s a lack of diversity. All it does is increase sellers who are featured in the explore page ! It’s evident Depop doesn’t care about sellers and opportunities for them. It is corrupt and biased to top verified sellers. Not even that but some that are classified as top sellers aren’t getting featured, making them to lose sales !! It’s been brought up so many times from various Depop users and gets discarded!?!
developerResponse:
{'id': 14488755, 'body': 'Hey. We get it, this can be super frustrating. Rest assured, we’re always looking for ways to discover exciting new users. 

Have a read through our article ‘Suggested Sellers’ by going to ‘Settings - Need help’, for some tips on how to become a Suggested Seller.

Keep exploring,
Team Depop
', 'modified': '2020-04-06T12:26:34Z'}

title: For you section gone?
review: I honestly love this app. Great for just finding out the things you like, and buying too. The best part was the fact that its algorithm would base off your likes and give a whole section tailored to your interests. But I went on today, and it was simply gone. There was only the "Things We Love" section, which of course had good clothes, but many people were already interested/had liked it, and it left a less personal feeling to the things I'm being suggested. Hopefully this gets fixed, because it is arguably the best feature of the app.
developerResponse:
{'id': 10862819, 'body': "Hey Jasmine. Thanks for sharing the love.

Pro tip, you've got to like and save items for our algorithm to gather data and curate things for you. Once you've done a little bit of that, the 'Made For You' section will reappear.

Keep exploring,
Team Depop", 'modified': '2019-09-24T10:28:10Z'}

title: Great app but needs fixes
review:
Lately, every time my customers buy my items, the status of them never automatically changes to “sold” so I have to manually mark them as “sold” all the time. It’s really weird and annoying. Also, my customers haven’t been getting my message notifications and sometimes neither do I. My notifications are always on yet I only get them once in a while. 
Please fix this problem ASAP. Thank you so much!
developerResponse: {'id': 8111705, 'body': 'We totally hear you and send some love your way for this great feedback. I will make sure to pass this on to the team for you. \n\nKisses, Depop', 'modified': '2019-04-08T12:23:20Z'}

title: Poor
review: This application has a very clunky GUI (graphical user interface) that makes selling for the first time difficult. I ended up paying twice for shipping (once through the app and once through PayPal). I also got scammed by the person I was selling an item to, as they started a PayPal dispute with me over the item I sent them, and shaming me into refunding them (they claimed the shoes I sent them were a completely different color as advertised, but there was no way to dispute this myself because there is no option to send photos). Depop also makes the process of deleting your own account or wiping your own data difficult.
developerResponse: {'id': 7341565, 'body': 'Hi there, sorry to hear about your experience. Have you been in touch with our support team about the shipping situation? They can have a further look into this and refund you should this be the case. The support team can also give you more information as a seller on how to deal with items that may or may not be as advertised. \n\nLove, Depop', 'modified': '2019-02-18T09:09:42Z'}

title: Fun and inspiring
review: I love using Depop. When I'm not purchasing, or selling...I use it as style inspiration from my favorite shops. I notice a few minor technical issues ...sometimes when I delete an item I see notices on the portion where people can leave reviews. Or sometimes I'll see a DM notification with no new DMs. My shop is small compared to a lot of other sellers, but I still get featured every now again, so thank you Depop!
developerResponse: {'id': 3052162, 'body': 'Hey C. Marty, thanks for this review! Have you tried reaching out to our support team (support@depop.com) about these issues to see how we can help? Thanks, Team Depop', 'modified': '2018-04-06T14:16:03Z'}

title: Updated
review: Hi Depop, this is exactly what happened. I received an email about it that went to my spam so I didn’t see it. It was actually still frustrating because PayPal wouldn’t allow me to be verified; the site for that kept going to an error message after I put in my bank information. After the fifth time and I complained about it to their community help page, it verified me. So, I would say it is more of a PayPal problem then Depop. Thank you for your succinct reply

title: depop scammed me
review: So I’m new to depop and I did not know how the shipping worked. I had my shipping set to depop shipping and someone but two pieces of clothing. I did nit know what depop shipping was so I assumed they just called it that and you just go to the post office and ship it so I went to the post office and payed the money to ship it through the post office then a few days later some of the money that was pending in my PayPal account from the payment was taken from me because of the depop shipping. I emailed them 3 times with screenshots and proof and they are still yet to respond to me after 3+ months. Very unprofessional and not appropriate for an app as big as depop to be doing this.

title: Remove your items for NO reason
review: They will remove my items. They also take things I like out of my likes so I can’t find them. Their service is AWFUL. They aren’t helpful at all. They will just say “sorry, we are working on fixing the problem, email us” something along those lines. They say that they monitor 24/7 but there are a TON of scammers on this app. You can’t send more pictures or videos in dms and the limited amount of pictures you can post is four! Depop needs to get their stuff together. There are far better selling apps out there. Do NOT waste your time on Depop. Along with others, I am very unsatisfied.

title: App will not let me create account
review:
There is No support system in place for outside help. I have an issue with my account where it will not allow me to create it or change my password to my supposed already created account. Then when I tried to look up an email or some sort of contact. The only support is available on the account after you login. So for someone who can’t log in to their account this is a huge problem. The only other support there is, is their social media. Which I tried to reach out to no avail.

Until a better support system is in place for this app I can’t and won’t use it.
developerResponse: {'id': 9141966, 'body': "Hi there, we do have a support email you can get in touch. We're sorry to hear this isn't as visible - I will make sure to pass this on to the team. Do send us some love via support@depop.com and they'll help you out with this.\n\nLove, Depop", 'modified': '2019-06-13T06:24:56Z'}

title: Love the Idea, App Needs Work
review: Just bought a couple wonderful things on depop on my computer, figured I'd get the app too and look around more. The app gives a lot of false error messages, such as, "This function could not be completed" when I can clearly see it was completed. It also takes countless taps to get a "like" on an item to stick. I can't change my notification settings because the menu keeps closing as soon as I open it. When the app is more functional I will gladly rate 4 or 5 stars.
developerResponse: {'id': 8619763, 'body': 'Hi there, thank you for the feedback. Should you have an error issues popping up, please pop over a report via our in-app support Settings - Need Help? - Technical Issues and then we can get this sorted together. Keep us posted ❤️\n\nLove, Depop', 'modified': '2019-05-11T11:54:37Z'}

title: Scammed out of my money
review: I bought something 13 days ago and have not received a response since the day I purchased the item. the support page is telling me to make a dispute with paypal but i didn’t purchase with paypal, so how does that even work? I made a paypal page and it doesn’t show me my purchase due to me not using it at that time. please help me handle this. I sent a report but have not received and email back. I think this app has great potential, and i don’t want this experience to ruin its image for me. It would be greatly appreciated if I could get some assistance. thanks.
developerResponse: {'id': 7330343, 'body': 'Hey Emma, any transactions made via our app is covered whether is by guest, PayPal or via card. You just have to make sure to get in touch with PayPal via phone and let thme know the transacrion ID, the date of the transaction and your PayPal. If you need more advise please make sure to contact the support team and they are able to help you further with this.\n\nLove, Depop', 'modified': '2019-02-17T14:12:31Z'}

title: Depop, Oh Depop
review: I’ve been using this app for a year and I’ve sold quite a bit. Yet, some items just never sell. I think that sellers with higher followers get MUCH more recognition and for that I believe the app is designed with the same algorithm as instagram which is a bummer for small sellers. PayPal and Depop both take a pretty intense taxes for items you sell, so in the end the cost to ship is always dipping into the money you actually receive. Overall Depop is experimental and really cool for people wanting to make a few extra bucks!

i love how all the listings now default to “Seller pays for shipping” without telling u:))) this resulted in me receiving a couple of *negative* payment (literally     “-x amount had been sent to ur Paypal..huh?) when i made a sale before I caught it, yet Depop conducted it like it was a normal & legit transaction (??) luckily the buyers were understanding when I canceled & refunded them but omg why is there not a safeguard for this? also what the point of restricting hashtags when there’s still millions of “tagged for exposure” items in the description  that just slip through the filter?

title: DEPOP HELPED ME GET SCAMMED
review: Thanks to Depop not only was I scammed out of an item I sold by a lying customer, but I was also scammed out of my money and this person successfully got my account taken down by Depop with no notification from the app and without hearing my side... I sent a girl a BRAND NEW item that she claimed was defective (it wasn’t) and she sent multiple claims that mad multiple inconsistencies (first she said the item isn’t as described, then she said she never got the item). Now I’m banned and Depop support keeps spamming me with emails asking to follow up on this false claim. I don’t recommend this app to anybody because as a seller you won’t be protected

title: LOVE IT!
review: if you’re looking for an app to buy and sell second hand clothes, this one’s for you! depop and the creators are amazing people with great work ethics. almost everyone on the app is very true to what they say, and won’t scam you because they’re just GENUINELY kind. there are a few people that are just in it for the money, but they’re easy to spot tbh. this is a fantastic way to support sellers from home and in an ethical manner.
developerResponse: {'id': 16268037, 'body': "We're glad you love Depop as much as we do.\n\nTeam Depop", 'modified': '2020-06-28T22:55:52Z'}

title: App constantly crashes
review: I’m a big fan of Depop and have purchased multiple items. However, I have never had a good app experience. I never exit the app by myself — it always crashes on me within five minutes (no joke, every single time), and I can always tell that it’s gonna happen when things start to load slower or my screen freezes. Even after the app update, I have experienced the same problem, even deleting and reinstalling the app hasn’t helped, but nothing has worked. Please fix this so daily app crashes isn’t a new norm.
developerResponse:
{'id': 16938275, 'body': "Hey, we can imagine how frustrating this is. Please get in touch by going to 'Settings - Need help - Technical issues - I've still got an issue' and send us a report.
 
We’ll take it from here,
Team Depop
", 'modified': '2020-07-28T21:41:22Z'}

title: The worst app
review: I sell and buy things on Depop but every. Single. Time. I use it , it glitches. Either I can’t post a new listing, it doesn’t let me edit a listing or my everything BUT my messages load. I have restarted my phone, deleted and redone loaded the app. I have the newest version, my connection to internet is secure and 100% not the issue because it’s ONLY Depop that acts up. I don’t know what else to do and it’s incredibly frustrating. HOW can the entire app work and the one thing is always not working? Ridiculous. Would definitely not recommend. I think I’ll just stick to selling and buying on another platform.
developerResponse: {'id': 16718849, 'body': "Hey! The good news is we've fixed this bug, if you update to the latest version it should be resolved now. Team Depop", 'modified': '2020-07-18T20:53:44Z'}

title: Super Easy
review: I would have to say overall it is an awesome app where you can look for trendy and really fun clothing the only thing that I would have to say is that when you start selling your own stuff it takes a while for people to notice you so yeah, and also I wish it wasn’t just PayPal that you can use for payment. Again it is pretty cool and you can find some neat stuff on there!
developerResponse:
{'id': 10887569, 'body': "Hey. Thanks for the great feedback.

For getting visibility, we've created a dedicated Seller Handbook to help our Users shoot, style and sell. 
Check it out here: https://sellers.depop.com/SellerHandbook_UK_18.12.18-1.pdf

PayPal is our payment provider, which ensures that buying and selling are protected in-app. Good news though, we’re currently looking at alternative payment methods. 

Read more on PayPal here: https://depophelp.zendesk.com/hc/en-gb/articles/360001772668-Why-do-I-need-PayPal-

Stay tuned,
Team Depop", 'modified': '2019-09-25T12:21:20Z'}

title: Keeps deleting bad reviews and gave away my private info
review:
I’ve posted about three reviews in the past few months and depop has been deleting them. I have no choice to report them to the BBB for suppressing our voices and reviews. Depop continues to ignore the racism and homophobia on this app which is disgraceful especially during the month of June.
Over the past few weeks of being in this app, depop has given my private information out to others and I have been contacted outside of Depop by people trying to scam me and asking me for items I have listed. This is horrible and terrifying. Lord only knows if anyone has my address aswell.

title: My account got suspended
review: I been having  issue with my Depopaccount. I was suspend from my account for a week and I tried to login today because today is a week now. I tried everything like deleting my account and resetting my password. I even use my phone and computer to reset my password .When I reset my password it will say something about “could not reset password for that user. Please help me I’m really trying to my page back .I really like Depop and still want continue using it. Will I get my account back from being suspend from it? I have been emailing you and l haven’t gotten answer to my problem.

title: Technical difficulties
review: I love this app to search for clothes I like! However, recently I’ve noticed the app is not working that well. Almost every time I try to use depop it says “user error” and nothing loads or works. I have to continually close out of the app and go back onto it in hopes that it will eventually work. Sometimes I even have to log out or delete it. I still love the app but there have been quite a few technical difficulties lately.
developerResponse:
{'id': 15249446, 'body': "Hey, we can imagine how frustrating this is. Please get in touch by going to 'Settings - Need help - Technical issues - I've still got an issue' and send us a report.

We’ll take it from here,
Team Depop
", 'modified': '2020-05-11T19:29:45Z'}

title: Love love love
review:
I don’t do reviews very often but I had to for this app. Depop is super easy to use & I have found so many awesome gems! I prefer Depop over every other online resale shop or app (like Poshmark or Thread Up) 
The layout and design is a lot like instagram, so I think thats why it is easy to use. I have never had a problem with the app, it has always been secure, fast & up to date. I really recommend downloading Depop (:
developerResponse: {'id': 4361709, 'body': 'Thanks for taking the time to review us! We really appreciate it. Team Depop', 'modified': '2018-07-23T17:23:02Z'}

review: I’ve been using depop for a while now and i love it but recently it has been quite aggravating. i cant get onto depop for anything. when i click on the app, it freezes and goes back to my home page. i’ve tried turning my phone on and off, deleting and reinstalling the app, clicking on and off the app multiple times, etc. and nothing works. however, i have an older phone (iphone 6) and i’m wondering if that is the problem. otherwise i am clueless and just want to be back on depop!!

title: Only one problem
review: I love Depop you get to see and sell so many cool and unique stuff. But the only problem I have is when your looking at the « Things We Love » page it gets annoying when you see something you might like but then you see it says sold, all I recommend  is once something is sold you take it off the page, other then that it’s a amazing app.

title: WORST marketplace app / horrible customer service
review:
I was a loyal depop user for over a year. No other marketplace (eBay, etsy, grailed, heroine) has as many scammers as depop. I was honest and made all sales through the app as the guidelines told me too. People tried to make off of app sales with me and I never did however depop banned ME forever for this. I explained that I had never done any transactions without them and I was simply getting bombarded by people trying to scam me. They did not care and banned me forever from depop.

Horrible service that showed nothing but inaccuracy, poor security, naivety, and disrespect for loyal customers / sellers. Sell your things somewhere else.

title: Unusable
review: I’ve updated the app, restated my phone, and deleted and re-downloaded the app, but there are still so many bugs that the app is pointless at this point. Majority of posts disappear when clicked on, all like/message/save buttons disappear when posts are clicked on, photos of posts that do show up are not able to be swiped through and sometimes disappear when I try to. I’ve always preferred the design of the Depop app and the abundance of creatives on it in comparison to competing apps, but these bugs are making it completely unusable.

title: Perfect if you are a white supremacist
review:
There are many accounts selling racist anti black and POC items. If you’re looking for your All Lives Matter or confederate flags, definitely the place for you. If you are offended and complain you are immediately suspended from the app.
The developer contacted me to assure me that they are very strict about what is sold on their site. Which means they stand behind what they sell. Open this app. Search “confederate“ 
Confederate flag is one of the most recognized symbols of racism and white supremacy today. 
I wish i could give this app zero stars. Apple. Where are you? You are giving platform to this

title: Glitches
review: There is always some sort of glitch issue when I try to use it. Either it won’t let me post an item or the app crashes every couple of minutes or when I click an item, it makes me restart on my search list. Plus, I think it should let you scroll through items like Instagram to make it easier. And I don’t like how if you add a video, that’s what people see when they are looking at items.
