The first picture should be what they see so it’s easier for me to make the picture most people see, a better image
developerResponse:
{'id': 17676442, 'body': "Hey, we can imagine how frustrating this is and we’re currently working to resolve this issue. Please get in touch by going to 'Settings - Need help - Technical issues - I've still got an issue' and send us a report leaving your username and details regarding your listings. 
 
We’ll take it from here,
Team Depop
", 'modified': '2020-09-03T15:58:10Z'}

title: Great App:)
review: I have been using depop for awhile now. with depop, you can go to the sellers page and look at their reviews to see if they are a trusted seller. shipping comes in a good few days or so. it is great how you can find literally everything on depop! i found jeans originally $60 and bought em for $15! i have not tried to sell anything yet on depop but i hope to do so in the future! highly recommend this app!

title: depop’s customer support
review:
i love selling clothes on this app, but their customer support is awful. it’s really hard to contact anyone when you have an issue about something. depop has a depop page JUST for people to ask questions, but it’s inactive and no one is running the account. it’s also hard to find emails and numbers to contact a real person instead of an automated message, and it takes a while for a resolution. 

also depop take away a large fee from everything you sell
developerResponse:
{'id': 15703562, 'body': "Hey, our support response times are currently slightly longer due to the current pandemic, but we'll be in touch ASAP.
 
We're here for you,
Team Depop
", 'modified': '2020-06-01T14:27:56Z'}

title: great app!
review: I love Depop! It’s a great app for me to sell items and find some unique things as well! However I do not like that when you receive your earnings paypal also takes anthem percent aside from the fees. I also would rather just get the fees and such be deducted from our earnings already rather than giving us the whole amount then subtracting (in my experience I get paid but then my card gets charged the fee). Overall I still like using Depop.
developerResponse: {'id': 8257964, 'body': "Hi Nene, thank you for sending us some love. We hear you. We're currently looking on how we can improve our payment systems for our community. Keep a sexy eye out.\n\nLove, Depop", 'modified': '2019-04-17T09:43:45Z'}

title: A headache
review:
There’s too much inconvenience placed on the purchaser if the vendor makes a mistake. 

I bought an item that never showed up, and then when I attempted to file a claim through PayPal, the charge didn’t even display. 

It took a decent amount of time to even try to contact depop because their support email is impossible to find. When I finally got a hold of them, I was told that the PayPal charge issue is a common problem, and can be resolved by contacting PayPal and attempting to resurrect the charge through there. In my opinion, this being a “common problem” places way too much inconvenience on the victim of a scam. Depop can do better.
developerResponse:
{'id': 10886805, 'body': "Hey, we’re sorry to hear your experience hasn't gone to plan. We offer Buyer Protection for all items purchased in-app using the BUY button. 

Follow these steps so we can put this right:
https://depophelp.zendesk.com/hc/en-gb/articles/360001772448-I-haven-t-received-my-item

We're here to help you,
Team Depop ", 'modified': '2019-09-25T11:39:23Z'}

title: Refreshing doesn’t exist
review: I love what depop offers and what I can do to sell in this app, but I HATE that my explore page can often times be filled with clothes and items I DO NOT desire and do not want to buy. And there’s no refreshing. No refresh button to see some new options. I just have to search deeply throughout the app because the homepage isn’t worth my time when it’s fixated on things I’ve already seen and didn’t care for. Please fix this!
developerResponse: {'id': 4405935, 'body': "Hey there! We're really focusing on our Explore page this year: exposing more users on the page; toying with item themes and generally posting more content onto it. Whilst we don't have plans currently for a refresh button, we do hope that a combination of these improvements will lead to a noticeable difference for you. Team Depop", 'modified': '2018-07-26T10:02:42Z'}

title: Spammers- Hard to find what you’re looking for.
review:
I really like this app. But it’s hard to find what I want because people put a long list of words “for exposure” that have nothing to do with the item. I’ll be looking for shoes and up comes DOZENS of listings for clothes. Or even a brand, I’ll type in a brand and up comes all kinds of stuff that couldn’t even pass for the brand I typed in.
I know I’m missing out on finding items I would actually buy because things will be so saturated with other crap.
developerResponse: {'id': 8172276, 'body': "Hey there! Thank you for your feedback. We are aware that some of our users may be using tags that may not fit a listing and we're working hard on improving this. Please do report any item you see like this and we will open up an investigation straight away.\n\nLove, Depop", 'modified': '2019-04-11T13:14:43Z'}

title: Just some suggestions
review: I love Depop!! I’m on it all the time looking for new clothes, a thing I would love to see in a new update would be the option to turn on post notifications for people to see whenever their favorite seller posts a new item up for sale though :) it’d be helpful instead of having to go on the app every few hours and check to see if they posted

title: Love the App but recent glitch
review: I’ve been using the app for awhile and I love it! Recently though, when I search and select an item then go back to the search page, it goes back to the top of the page. Hopefully that makes sense. It’s been happening the last few days and I keep losing my place. I’m assuming it’s just a glitch and wanted to let the developers know. Thanks!!
developerResponse:
{'id': 15395840, 'body': "Hey, sorry to hear about this! The good news is we've got a fix for this bug on the way. 
 
Stay tuned, 
Team Depop
", 'modified': '2020-05-18T15:15:25Z'}

title: List view
review: I really enjoy using Depop. Haven't sold anything yet but I've bought a couple items. One of the only issues I have is that it can be difficult to view the items in people's stores and in my likes. I really dislike how I can only view things in grid view and have to click on each individual item. There should be an option to view stores and such in grid view or list view (like on instagram)
developerResponse: {'id': 2744913, 'body': "Hey Cici! Thank you for the feedback, we'll be sure to raise this comment of yours with our Product team. Thanks, Team Depop", 'modified': '2018-03-05T10:48:43Z'}

title: Great app with occasional bugs
review: I’ve never sold anything in Depop, but I buy frequently on the app, and all of my experiences have been great. I’m a broke college student with a part time minimum wage job, so it’s perfect for updating my wardrobe without breaking the bank. The only issues I’ve had are occasional crashes and a bug that shows a badge notification when there are no notifications within the app. Other than that, everything is great!

title: Most annoying bugs ever
review: Almost every time I go to post something on my page it says it failed to post. I always check I’m on WiFi, I close all my tabs, make sure the file isn’t too big, and even save it to drafts and try to post it from there. Every single time, I have to delete and re-download the app, and then log in to my account again and again. This has not happened to just me, but other Depop users as well, which means it’s not something on my end.
developerResponse:
{'id': 18175145, 'body': "Hey, we can imagine how frustrating this is and we’re currently working to resolve this issue. Please get in touch by going to 'Settings - Need help - Technical issues - I've still got an issue' and send us a report leaving your username and details regarding your listings. 
 
We’ll take it from here,
Team Depop
", 'modified': '2020-09-29T13:10:11Z'}

title: consider new payment
review: I love this app, but i’m having a lot of trouble with paypal. for some reason theres always a problem with trying to print the shipping labels because apparently my account isn’t “verified” but when I try to work it out paypal shows that there is nothing wrong with my account. paypal always seems to be a problem. I suggest you consider new payment options for depop users because this is beyond annoying.
developerResponse:
{'id': 15777861, 'body': "Hey, sorry about this.
 
If you can follow this link and submit a request if you're still struggling that would be great. https://depophelp.zendesk.com/hc/en-gb/articles/360046290994-I-can-t-access-my-shipping-label-USPS-MyHermes-
 
Team Depop

", 'modified': '2020-06-04T13:41:19Z'}

title: No notifications
review: I love this app and used to love it more when the notifications worked properly. Now I don’t get any notifications whatsoever so sometimes I don’t reply to a potential buyer in a timely manner thus losing a sale because I’m sure they dont receive notifications either. This is the only issue with this app. If it can be fixed like it used to be that’d be great.
developerResponse: {'id': 6976438, 'body': "Hi there, we understand how frustrating this can be if you want to make a sale! We're on top of this and will make sure to have a deeper look on how to fix this for our users. In the meantime, please do make usre you have the latest update of the app. \n\nLove, Depop", 'modified': '2019-01-23T12:31:42Z'}

title: Need to protect buyers
review: Sellers should not be allowed to set their own time frames for shipping their items. If you are taking people’s money there should be a set time to ship the item you’ve paid for, otherwise people will just take your money and take advantage of you. You should not have to sit around and try and contact the seller and beg and plead for them to send your item you paid for at a reasonable time. As a buyer, I will no longer be using this app. Buyer protection is everything or else you will get a bunch of willynilly sellers just looking to cash in. Mercari makes their sellers ship in 3 days! 3 days! What have you got depop?
developerResponse: {'id': 13308935, 'body': "Hey. We hear you, this can be frustrating. As individuals, we can't control how long sellers take to ship, but we do have guidelines in place. We'd recommend reaching out with an estimate prior to purchasing.\n\nTeam Depop", 'modified': '2020-02-05T12:27:21Z'}

title: Depop is great!
review: But why the four stars, you ask? Depop is by far the best buying and selling app I have ever used. You can get anything from clothes to makeup and purchasing is beyond easy! As a seller though, I get my fair share of rude individuals, too many spam accounts asking to buy my items, etc. As a platform for creativity and affordable fashion I hope that Depop can do their best to remove these spam accounts and people who do not use the app in a positive manner.
developerResponse: {'id': 7057001, 'body': 'Hi there, we love you feedback and thank you for taking the time to do this. We hear you and understand how frustrating the spam accounts can be. We work hard to try to ocmbar these. If you do find any, please do reports these to us and we will make sure to get rid of these pronto.\n\nKisses, Depop', 'modified': '2019-01-29T06:10:16Z'}

title: Amazing, forward thinking, caring, also slow
review: Depop is an amazing company because I put them behind a huge vintage boom, they also show a companion and willingness to help this seller become the “top” of the line. I really don’t have many Criticisms for this app other than the UI can be a bit buggy and their are a large amount of spam accounts if you decide to become a seller.

title: Worst buying and selling app ever!
review: Some Clothing are highly over priced that you can find them for a more affordable price on other selling apps! Scammers all over the app who just want to sell you something from their closet and dont care about returns or anything after the money is transferred to them! And if you want to make a return YOU WILL HAVE NO CHANCE TO GET A FULL REFUND since the app would keep their percentage and not refund you no matter what! I got scammed on rush shipping twice and even paypal didn’t help me with it i had to call my bank! Do not purchase from them they have absolutely 0 customer service and dont care about consumers.
developerResponse: {'id': 6078234, 'body': "Hey Nassim! We will always refund the fee! Just send a quick email to support@depop.com with the transactions details, proof you refunded the buyer and we'll pop it right back over. As long as you pay inside Depop I promise a scam is not possible - if you went privately, you may end up having some missing money.\nLet us know if you need more help, here for you.\nTeam Depop", 'modified': '2018-11-23T16:48:01Z'}

title: Love the app, buuut
review: I friggin love this app!! but yeah it's a lot of room for improvement. Mainly like the explore page. Seems like the same popular accounts get on it. I seen my stuff up there one time and that when I started out. The first 2 items. Afterwards nothing else ever showed. I just think it should be equal opportunity for every one to be seen because every one works hard to bring quality content to all its followers and/or customers

title: Greatest App In The Market
review: Wish y’all could feature more professional Shops on yalls explore page - I understand being diverse but as a customer we want the best of the best and when you feature someone you expect that’s a top seller but instead now you have a bunch of small shops that aren’t so professional and people are being scammed or taken advantage of. Would like to see more professionalism in yalls explore page. At least shops with a good reputation

title: More search functions please!
review: I like a lot about this app, and find its user base is more oriented towards my budget and aesthetic tastes than other resale apps. However, a few things about its functionality could be improved— especially searching for sizes/categories etc. I always have to sift through a lot of unrelated things or items that match my search but aren’t revealed to be the wrong size until I click the listing.
developerResponse: {'id': 4950875, 'body': 'Thank you so much for the feedback. We definitely understand the sentiment of a more focused search fucntion for our users. Will pass this through to our team. Love, Depop.', 'modified': '2018-09-05T14:30:22Z'}

title: Super unhappy and also super happy...
review:
I’ve purchased from many sellers on depop and have had many great experiences. All of the clothes and items I’ve received have been dope and everyone is super friendly 
BUT
After seeing how amazing of a platform depop creates for people to buy and sell second hand items, and as I’m not a fan of fast fashion, I became super inspired to sell a few items myself...
So I did.
I sold a pair of yeezys through this app which I trusted, and thought was pretty secure, but have not received my money and the whole process was sketchy for a first time seller. 
I’ve contacted PayPal and had a lengthy conversation with them, to no solution, and they ultimately told me to contact Depop, in which I did, and have not heard back.
I’ve lost a great deal of money through this app, and although it’s a super great app in a lot of ways, I’m extremely unhappy with there system and especially unhappy with the help I have not received and I’ve lost hundreds of dollars.
developerResponse:
{'id': 18359337, 'body': "Hey Sara,

We’re sorry to hear your experience hasn't gone to plan. We offer Buyer Protection for all items purchased in-app using the ‘BUY’ button. 

Read more in-app about what to do next by going to ‘Settings - Need help’ and typing in ‘Buyer Protection’.

We're here to help you,
Team Depop 
", 'modified': '2020-10-08T22:27:55Z'}

title: This app is always experiencing issues
review: Love the app, if it would work consistently.  Unfortunately, it logs you out frequently, 70% of the time cannot refresh data on the screen, and has issues connecting with the server. When you want to update things in your profile or search for things, and the app can’t update what needs to render on screen... it makes the experience very inconvenient and unreliable to use for selling. Hoping you guys can use this feedback to fix these issues, because otherwise, the app is great.

title: so frustrating!!
review: There was 26$ in my account from selling items on Depop within one day i went from 26$ to 10$ and now i have 3$ left in my paypal account. You guys have been taking big chunks put of my money  & when i look up why you guys are taking so much it always says something about ten percent. I have 76$ on hold & you guys probably won’t do anything but take 60$ of that! WAY TOO much money is being taken from my account. I have not spent a single penny, i am very frustrated & i want to know why so much is being taken. I plan to quit selling through you guys because i’m literally not making anything!
developerResponse:
{'id': 15577558, 'body': "Hey, thanks for the review. Our 10% fee allows us to keep Depop running smoothly. It contributes towards the cost of running the app, creating new features and improving our Community’s experience. 

See our article about fees by going to 'Settings - Need help' and typing in ‘What about fees’.
Team Depop
", 'modified': '2020-05-26T16:01:04Z'}

title: Disappointed
review: I like the idea of this app, but I have found a lot of the sellers to be unprofessional. I have had multiple sellers say they lost the items I bought. I have also had sellers never ship an item. I wish I would have known that if you pay with PayPal there is a lengthy process to get your money back when a seller is in the wrong. I wish there was more buyer protection. Sadly I will stop using this app and switch to others that protect seller more like Poshmark. Overall just still really upset that I have had poor transactions and had to wait two months to get a refund

title: Depop cannot authenticate items correctly
review: I have had two different bags be removed for being “counterfeit” when both of them were purchased BY ME years ago. I don’t want to use an app or have others be harmed by a company that is supposed to protect people from spending hundreds of dollars on a fake big name designer brand when they can’t even tell the difference which are real or fake! Makes me not want to use the service at all. If you’re in the market to buy an expensive second hand item beware! You might be better suited purchasing from somewhere who can actually protect you against fakes.
developerResponse: {'id': 8027524, 'body': 'Hi there, sorry to hear about this. Can you let us know your username? We can try to reach out to our moderators and investigate this further.\n\nLove, Depop', 'modified': '2019-04-02T15:40:46Z'}

title: Love it! Some recommendations
review: This app does everything it says it will, and it does it well. I mostly buy and my only recommendations would be to have a mode where the pictures on someone’s account or on the home page could be scrolled through, all in single file, like on Instagram. Also like on Instagram, I think a swipe back feature would be really useful. Just some things to make browsing easier. Love this app!
developerResponse: {'id': 4515593, 'body': "Hey there; thanks for your review and the insight into what you'd like to see in the app moving forwards. Team Depop", 'modified': '2018-08-03T15:55:41Z'}

title: Great app
review: I think depop is truly a great app for shopping for clothes that fit your style. Where I’m from, there aren’t many clothing stores, so I have been using depop a lot. Not only can you find clothes you’ve never even heard of before, but you can also support the small clothing businesses selling them. My closet will soon be filled with clothes that I have gotten from depop. This is a very nice app.
developerResponse: {'id': 16212733, 'body': 'We love to see it.\n\nTeam Depop', 'modified': '2020-06-25T09:26:14Z'}

title: Overpriced with flawed feedback
review: The sellers will review you as a buyer so if you don’t give them 5 stars, even for good reason, they will likely lower your rating as well. Also, most sellers, especially the featured and popular sellers, are selling $5 goodwill items often at a 700% markup (not an exaggeration). I have always bought thrift and vintage clothing (which drew me to this app), grew up in the 90s and wore the “y2k” trends in real time, and am seeing people who are new are getting absolutely duped. I know it’s cute, but if you’re paying $25-30 for a simple striped shirt, even if it’s 90s, you’re getting played.
developerResponse: {'id': 3458211, 'body': "Hey there - thanks for the feedback regarding our review system. We'll be sure to bring this up with the relevant teams here in the office. Team Depop", 'modified': '2018-05-14T11:07:08Z'}

title: You gotta work for it
review: Unless you have a good camera and you're constantly uploading things or reposting items it might take you awhile to sell anything.. aside from that they usually only feature the same people because only those people have "quality photos" keep getting feautured, which I think is unfair because not everyone wants to explore what you like or think "looks good". Aside from that I'm having an alright experience it could be better though 🤷🏻‍♀️

title: Hi!
review: Love y’all! Just writing here because I was unable to find a link to just offer general user feedback: the style edit/dna is not as good as your old system. I have seen the same items after multiple dayyys of refreshing. It used to be a lot better and vastly more versatile !! Other wise great and I appreciate ya! Just wanted to offer some user thoughts 🤗 also maybe a visible link so users can share experiences and feedback with you direct in app??
developerResponse: {'id': 19444888, 'body': "Hey. Thanks for the feedback. We love hearing about what we can do to improve Depop for our Community. When you succeed, we succeed. We'll be passing this along to our Product Team.\n\nTeam Depop", 'modified': '2020-11-30T17:56:28Z'}

title: Item tags
review:
When we block a user, their items should be hidden from the search feature. This will allow for people to avoid sellers that abuse tagging irrelevant keywords for every single one of their items. It is super frustrating to search for specific items.

Also, there is a new bug that says that there is a new item for a keyword previously searched but nothing new shows up.
developerResponse:
{'id': 17419275, 'body': "Hey, we can imagine how frustrating this is and we’re currently working to resolve this issue. Please get in touch by going to 'Settings - Need help - Technical issues - I've still got an issue' and send us a report leaving your username and details regarding your listings. 
 
We’ll take it from here,
Team Depop
", 'modified': '2020-08-21T12:36:18Z'}

title: Bad update
review: After the new update the thumbnails when searching for pictures are too big. There’s thousands of items sometimes and now I can only view 6 at a time. I wish they’d fix it so you could choose the thumbnail size because it’s really annoying when trying to get through a whole bunch of posts. Also, about 20% is taken out from sellers because of Depop fees AND PayPal fees :( And please let us change our usernames and bring back the for you page!!
developerResponse:
{'id': 17002642, 'body': 'Hey. You can totally change your username.
Check out our article ‘Can I change my username?’ by going to ‘Settings - Need help’ and typing it in.
Team Depop
', 'modified': '2020-07-31T11:16:41Z'}

title: Worth a try
review: I think with every business you get what you put in. I have made a few sales on here. Grateful for the platform to sell and trade. I definitely think if you are considering it, Depop is worth a try. Also remember with free there will be limitations so don’t expect a I don’t have to do anything type of service. I can say it provides what you need to get the job done. I like it.
developerResponse: {'id': 5642283, 'body': "We're grateful to have you onboard with us.\n\nLove, Depop", 'modified': '2018-10-24T09:48:15Z'}

title: I love it but needs improving
review:
I love this app, I buy & sell on here all the time. 
It has a lot of great features. 
My problem is, I sold something expensive, and the money is on hold through PayPal, it was already confirmed through Depop that the buyer received their item but my money is still on hold. So they have the good without paying for it. I’ve tried contacting the buyer, PayPal & Depop and the only thing I’m being told is the buyer has to confirm it through PayPal.

title: used to be great
review: the app itself used to be great, and I still dig the whole idea of it. But how depop is the same overrated and overpriced sellers, and that is all you see. Igirl and friends defeat the whole purpose of this app, which is supposed to provide sustainable and affordable clothing. Not to mention everything on it is “Rare Brandy 😍” selling for horrifying prices. Overall ok app, awful sellers. Not to mention drop-shippers, which defeats the whole point of this app. Just go thrifting locally this isn’t worth your money if you aren’t a middle-upper middle class girl who has never taken a finance class.
developerResponse: {'id': 15248650, 'body': "Hey, dropshipping is prohibited on Depop, so if you can report any users you suspect we'd really appreciate it.\n\nTeam Depop", 'modified': '2020-05-11T18:39:17Z'}

title: Drop shipping
review:
Supports and encourages recycling and refurbished clothing, but allows a platform for drop shippers to sell? Please don’t take the easy way out to make money. Instead work on other interfaces that can help sellers sell:

1) Allow videos to be moved to the back of the listed item, so the seller can show the pictures before the video.

2) maybe inpatient a offer button to to help the transaction a bit smoother. You’ll end up having a bunch of people using that “offer” button and probably end up getting more sales = fee money

3) adding a % discount for bundles, just like how you implement “free shipping for bundles” so it’s easy for people just to purchase without asking and waiting for the seller to create a “bundle post”.

There’s so many other ideas that can be considered/implemented it just takes brain power. Don’t take the easy route and allow drop shippers to make you money, it ain’t depop’s ethic to do so. I know you guys can do better!

title: HUGE depop fan! Only missing one thing..
review: I absolutely love depop. I am on this app every single day, at least twice a day. Sellers have very unique items and all have very good deals almost every time. I'm head over heels for this app and I'm glad I gave it a chance! 💕 ONLY ONE THING TO ADD— If we could save a search so we can get notified when someone adds something new in that tag! It would make it a 11/10 app. 💫

title: Horrible run by children for children.
review: This is the most unfair , scamming place to sell anything as a seller and buyer I left as quickly as I came. People that sell will abuse you and tell you your impatient because they can’t run a small tiny business from home and will act like your a hassle . They will ghost you, steal your money, and sadly depop doesn’t care enough they just want money ! So any concern you have goes right out the window! They send automated message that don’t address your needs!! Stick with the WELL known platforms guys!! If you care about people and yourself do the right thing. Do not support them in any way.
developerResponse: {'id': 5294681, 'body': 'This is not the way we want our users to feel. Can you let us know your username? We can try to reach out to the support team and see how we can try to help you with the reports you have send to us. \n\nLove, Depop', 'modified': '2018-09-30T10:03:40Z'}

title: Nice app
review: It’s fairly good app that makes unique clothing accessible to people if a thrift or consignment shop isn’t nearby, but some people do tend to over charge with the items considering they are /used/ and have been owned before. Other than that the app doesn’t load past a certain number of likes when I go to check the clothing I’ve liked in the past which is a bug that recently developed. The app is pretty good otherwise.
developerResponse: {'id': 3459739, 'body': 'Hey there, thanks for the review! With regards to the issue with likes, could you please reach out to our support team (support@depop.com) for them to investigate? Many thanks, Team Depop', 'modified': '2018-05-14T13:03:15Z'}

title: Genderless???
review: I love Depop and have been using it for quite a while. My only issues have been the lack of a genderless (not unisex, as that implied gender=sex when it doesn’t) option and brand not being in every category. Gender nonconforming/nonbinary people need these options, also clothes don’t have gender!!! Brands are hard to find when they are only given for certain categories. If these were fixed I would be a lot happier than I am now.
developerResponse: {'id': 3340307, 'body': "Hey there - thank you for this feedback, we'll bring this up with our product teams ASAP. Thanks again! Team Depop", 'modified': '2018-05-03T09:24:34Z'}

title: Hassle and Lost Money
review: I have been using this app for about 4 months, and at first it was really fun and simple. Then, I made my first sale. The pre-made shipping labels through USPS don’t work, and had to pay even more money for shipping once I took it to the post office. I checked my bank account and something charging me $10 from Depop, labeled as “advertising” showed up, and I know/didn’t do anything with that. With the shipping, mysterious money charge, the depop 10% fee, and the pay pal 4% fee, I was not making any money, and it just became a hassle. I’m done with depop and losing money.
developerResponse: {'id': 3159859, 'body': 'Hey there! When you charge for shipping, we initially take this fee from you and it is then returned to you. If you have any confusion about this, our Support team (support@depop.com) will be able to provide a specific breakdown for your particular item. We hope this helps. Team Depop', 'modified': '2018-04-17T11:31:10Z'}

title: Review
review:
I really like this app. I haven’t had problems with nothing recently. The layout of the app is simply and easy to understand. 
However the only problem I have is when I look at an item and go back. It takes me back to the top of the page and I have to keep scrolling back to where I was. This has been really annoying recently
developerResponse: {'id': 15444140, 'body': "Hey! The good news is we've fixed this bug, if you update to the latest version it should be resolved now.\n\nTeam Depop ", 'modified': '2020-05-20T11:34:26Z'}

title: Outdated search results
review: Within this recent update, my search results have become awful. I search for something and items that were listed WEEKS ago appear first. I accidentally bought from an inactive buyer because of this!! Not only are my search results all old and random, my personal listings seem to be dying. No one is seeing anything that I’m selling. Depop is my income and this new update has made it impossible to get exposure unless you’re a featured creator or a drop shipper. Unfortunately, it looks like I’m going to have to start shopping and selling somewhere else. This app is unusable 💔
developerResponse:
{'id': 18832117, 'body': "Hey 27DragonLover,

Thanks for the feedback. We love hearing about what we can do to improve Depop for our Community. When you succeed, we succeed. We'll be passing this along to our Product Team.

Team Depop
", 'modified': '2020-11-01T22:10:38Z'}

title: GLITCHES
review: as much as I love this app selling-wise and platform-wise, depop please get your logistics together!! this app has SO MANY glitches! i’m constantly forced out of the app, the app freezes with every click when trying to list items!! I don’t think it should take more than 2-3 minutes to post a listing if my description has already been written out. I literally sit here for 10 minutes trying to post ONE ITEM bc the app freezes for 2 minutes each time I click anything

title: Depop is truly the best shopping & selling app
review:
I love that on Depop you can customize whatever you’re interested in and show them on your page. It’s just so beautiful. And I’ve also been selling on Depop for several months, and everything’s been really good. 
I believe Depop still have a lot of potential to go. Hope to see it becomes one of the largest selling/buying platform one day!
developerResponse: {'id': 13397097, 'body': 'We love this, keep killing it.\n\nTeam Depop', 'modified': '2020-02-10T12:15:55Z'}

title: More pictures please
review: No complaints. Fees are fair unlike some other selling apps that are a bit more greedy. They seem to forget if we are making money, then they are making money. The higher the fees, the less we can sell. Depop’s percentage is perfect.  I just wish we could post more pictures of items. Four isn’t near enough.
developerResponse: {'id': 13308963, 'body': "Hey. Thanks for your review, we try to keep fees fair for our users. We'll also be passing your photo suggestion onto the relevant teams.\n\nTeam Depop", 'modified': '2020-02-05T12:29:26Z'}

title: I’m obsessed!!
review:
I love this app, you can find such original and unique pieces here unlike similar apps.
There’s not just clothes on this app- there are other accessories and miscellaneous things like jewelry and stickers to posters and pins!
My only revision would be to have a feature to save your size preference, so you don’t have to go through and choose your size every time you do a search.
developerResponse: {'id': 4840988, 'body': "Thanks for leaving us a review Hailey! We're constantly lookig to refine our search function and we think the size preference idea is a strong one. Whilst we don't have concrete plans to implement this yet, it's on our 'to-do' list. Thanks again! Team Depop", 'modified': '2018-08-28T10:40:38Z'}

title: great but it’s really hard to get recognized
review: i’ve been using depop for about 2 and half years and it’s great but it’s so hard to build a following and actually make money off of it. I consistently see the same users being featured on the explore page rather than new, upcoming sellers. I’d love to spend more time on depop but i’m not even sure if it’s worth all the time spent on it.
developerResponse:
{'id': 14488415, 'body': 'Hey. We get it, this can be super frustrating. Rest assured, we’re always looking for ways to discover exciting new users. 

Have a read through our article ‘Suggested Sellers’ by going to ‘Settings - Need help’, for some tips on how to become a Suggested Seller.

Keep exploring,
Team Depop
', 'modified': '2020-04-06T12:15:43Z'}

title: Good but not great..
review: i love shopping on here but theres just so many issues with this app. Its constantly glitching and there is no phone number or customer service, unless you want to spend a week emailing back and forth with someone🙄 it just gets annoying.. Plus there are a lot of scammers on the app so you have to be very careful.. Ive sold a lot of stuff on here so it has helped me financially, i just wish there wasnt so many glitches and scammers on here.
developerResponse: {'id': 3052934, 'body': "Hey there! With regards to scammers, we work hard to remove these from the app day in, day out. We work closely with our community to catch any 'bad users' so please do let us know if you've come across any still present. As to the glitches you're experiencing, please be sure to contact support (support@depop.com) to see how we can help. Thank you for this honest review! Team Depop", 'modified': '2018-04-06T15:28:05Z'}

title: Decent app
review: The app is decent. Selling is a bit slow for me but was really fast at one point when one of my clothes were featured on the explore page, this happened one time. Its really hard to grow as a seller because depop only features the already famous people on the explore page and its not rare to see multiple posts from the same depop famous account on the explore page. Overall a good app but they should really feature other accounts on their explore page.

title: The Reviews are Right
review:
So I see that their was an update to the site recently.  Many complaints about it here. BUT I gave it a try anyway. 

The problem is I can’t finish creating an account because I can’t connect to PayPal. Paypal is the ONLY option of a financial clearinghouse you get - and the keyboard doesn’t pop up on that page. So I can’t type anything in. But that wasn’t my first problem in this 4-account setup. See, if the app doesn’t think your password is strong enough then it won’t let you use it. So if you have a go-to pw system for remembering your passwords, it probably won’t work here.
developerResponse:
{'id': 18359052, 'body': 'Hey there,

Thanks for sharing your feedback. PayPal is our payment provider, which ensures that buying and selling are protected in-app. Good news though, you now have access to Depop payments available in settings - preferences which allows you to buy and sell without paypal. 

Thanks
Team Depop
', 'modified': '2020-10-08T21:58:55Z'}

title: Getting worse
review: The app is okay, it keeps getting worse though. There are countless memes on reddit about how the updates are things that no one wants, items that note to buy out of app on the explore page, making it harder to list for sellers, and the explore page is slowly becoming obviously irrelevant and little to no effort put in. I’ve sold around 150 on here and loved it in the beginning. But I feel if it stays on this road I’ll just move to a new platform. Best of luck to the rest of the hard working sellers that get unnoticed.

title: Please change this
review: Love this app but this recent update lacks with the fact when your searching for items you keep scrolling and once you find a item you look at the pictures then backout and it resets you all the way from the beginning then you have to scroll all the way down again its a hassle just leave it how you had it before where it didnt do that.
developerResponse:
{'id': 15395614, 'body': 'Hey. Could you please try resetting your password from a laptop or PC. This provides a more secure connection, and should do the trick. Remember, you can use either your username or linked email address to login. Just make sure you’ve typed it correctly with no spaces. 

Let’s get you back on the app,
Team Depop
', 'modified': '2020-05-18T15:05:42Z'}

title: Stop making crappy updates!!!
review: I love depop but i swear this most recent update has been extremely annoying. It feels like theyre coming out with an update at least once every month and a half and most of the time they’re for the worse. Ive been using depop for years and if they keep making their updates crappy, I’ll use something else.

title: Solid app with potential
review:
Things I see: great UI, pretty design, mostly good recommendation system
Things I want to see: a way to dislike something that only applies to your account and just slightly tweaks your recommendations, a way to only see recommendations in your size, and a system less influenced by brand and more by overall style which I understand might be impossible with the thousands of items on depop but it’d help.

title: Hashtags are a mess!
review: I absolutely love this app but the hashtags are such a nightmare. So many sellers tag their items in hashtags that have nothing to do with what they’re trying to sell. It is the most annoying thing about this app. More irrelevant items show up than what you’re actually looking for and it’s getting out of hand! It would be great if the blocking system actually made it so you could not see the shops that are doing this, or do something to actually help with the problem.
developerResponse: {'id': 9142167, 'body': "Hi there, thank you for the feedback. We totally agree that this can be very frustrating so our team is making sure to crack down on this. Don't worry - we got you.\n\nLove, Depop", 'modified': '2019-06-13T06:39:37Z'}

title: Frequent page freezes
review: Love this app but when you start getting a decent way down a search page, the app frequently freezes every few seconds as if to catch up and takes a minute to let me doing anything on my screen again. It's just pretty annoying. It's probably bc of image resolutions or something and could probably be fixed by lowering resolutions just a bit.

title: Changing screens
review: Just to make it easier to navigate, like Instagram, it would be much better in my opinion if when you were switching or going back a page, that you wouldn’t have to place your thumb all the way at the edge of the screen to get it to work. If you just swiped left or right, regardless of the location of your thumb, it would still take you to your desired page. Thank you !
developerResponse: {'id': 3269187, 'body': 'Hey Ange268 - thank you for this feedback, much appreciated! Team Depop', 'modified': '2018-04-26T10:47:38Z'}

title: Thank You Depop!!
review:
We love depop🙌✨and the platform it allows for so many resellers the ability to connect with such diverse shoppers across the globe and it’s really a fun experience every time. It’s fast and easy to maneuver and would recommend to all my friends looking to shop or simply clear out their closet with the touch of a button.
Last but not least thanks to the creators and great minds of Depop!!

title: Can’t ship anything
review: I had my first sale and was really excited until depop wanted me to connect my paypal account to it. It was such a long process and I followed all the steps closely in order for me to print my shipping label to ship my item but depop and paypal wouldn’t let me. I followed all the steps and asked for friends for help but it’s been more than a week since I’ve been trying view my shipping label but this process is just so frustrating. I tried to contact customer support but I have not gotten a response. I don’t think I would want to sell on depop ever again, poshmark was way easier than this.
developerResponse:
{'id': 15394814, 'body': "Hey, sorry to hear about this.

Can you check this link and get in touch with us if none of them apply?

https://depophelp.zendesk.com/hc/en-gb/articles/360012212794-Shipping-label-US-Specific-

We're here for you,
Team Depop", 'modified': '2020-05-18T14:28:32Z'}

title: 10% tax
review: I have wanted to sell on depop for a long time so when I finally did I was so excited to start getting sales. But with the tax depop takes I end of getting less money on stuff that costs more! I heard that it was 5% when I signed up so either someone misinformed me or it was recently raised but the tax makes me want to switch apps it’s so frustrating. The only thing stopping me is I know depop is much more popular with people my age than other apps. But I don’t want to have to overcharge people to make money, in addition every payment I get over $10 is pending until 1-3 days after the package arrives!
developerResponse:
{'id': 15300652, 'body': "Hey, thanks for the review. Our 10% fee allows us to keep Depop running smoothly. It contributes towards the cost of running the app, creating new features and improving our Community’s experience. 

See our article about fees by going to 'Settings - Need help' and typing in ‘What about fees’.
Team Depop
", 'modified': '2020-05-13T16:50:16Z'}

title: DO NOT SELL ON THIS APP
review: I’ve had my account deleted while in the middle of 100+ sales, this has costed me to lose over $1,000 during a time where I’m unemployed (as well as most of the US) and this is my only source of income. I’ve spoken to numerous other shop owners who have also had their account deleted, and there’s no way to appeal or communicate with depop, once they delete your account that’s it forever. Meanwhile, there are multiple accounts scamming people including me of more than $200 that depop continues to support and even put on their explore page. Sad pathetic excuse for an app. People are extremely mean as well.

title: READ BEFORE YOU BUY SOMETHING
review: My one experience on Depop was awful. I had ordered items for myself for Christmas from seven different sellers. They were ALL gorgeous and unique and I was so excited to receive them, but upon looking at my receipts, my address was wrong on all of them. Depop sellers have to use company printed labels so I had to pay more to try and change it, but my address still could not be changed in the app. Support was no help and I ended up having to contact all the sellers and give in depth explanations to return the items and get not even 100% of my money back. I wasted time and money. Terrible.
developerResponse:
{'id': 12423841, 'body': "Hey there. I can just imagine how frustrating this is. We definitely recommend checking to ensure your own address is correct before ordering anything.

In this instance, your shipping address is linked to your PayPal address, so if you head into PayPal and update that then re-purchase the items you should be good to go.

Next step you're in a sticky situation, head in app to 'Settings - Need help'. 

We're here to help,
Team Depop", 'modified': '2019-12-16T14:46:30Z'}

title: An amazing platform
review: I’ve been both a seller and buyer on Depop for long enough to say that this is a really amazing & safe platform. Transactions are so easy on both ends. Only thing I wish they would add are posting features, like to be able to list out sales or shop policies without putting it under the same category as an item. Love the app overall!
developerResponse: {'id': 5794384, 'body': "Thank you for the feedback. Hope you're an actual Corgi sending us some love and that you're fave thing to do is to shop on Depop.\n\nLove, Depop", 'modified': '2018-11-04T12:34:05Z'}

title: I love it but..
review: I really really love this app and I think the staff behind Depop is amazing and really on top of things. I just wish that when I click to purchase items it wouldn’t say “error try again later”. I heard that this was a glitch with PayPal but it is just irritating a little bit. But aside from that this app is the best app I’ve ever gotten. I love how it is a lot of teens who sell, so it isn’t some old fart thrift store app, it’s young and fresh. Really great!

title: Community
review: To me, this is one of the most innovative apps. Specifically for fashionistas, this creates a social media based platform to buy and sell clothing. So user friendly and intuitive, Depop makes clothing resale easier that it has ever been. 9/10 people i buy from or sell to have been accommodating and kind, creating a place where I feel fully comfortable to express myself.
developerResponse: {'id': 5540302, 'body': "We honestly couldn't have even phrase this better ourselves. We adore that you have been able to feel empowered to be yourself, is basically our aim to have everyone grow the way they want to be.  Thank you for being part of our community.\n\nLove, Depop", 'modified': '2018-10-17T10:37:17Z'}

title: Fun, practical, usable app!
review: As someone who loves to shop vintage/thrift- this app allows for a wide variety of styles; the shop owners and people I’ve encountered are professional, friendly, and efficient! The direct contact you have with the shop owners is also great for questions you might have. Overall a great experience! I would definitely recommend to anyone in any thrifting community!
developerResponse: {'id': 4753533, 'body': "Thanks for this lovely review; we're glad to read we're ticking all the boxes for you! Team Depop", 'modified': '2018-08-21T14:39:47Z'}

title: My DNA needs improvement
review: I love depop! It makes it so fun and easy to buy and sell clothes! I wish my DNA wasn’t full of people from the UK that do not sell to the US considering I only like items i know I am able to buy! Or it is full INACTIVE SELLARS! I see these cute clothes and I go to look and it’s either one of those or 150 for a sweater I wish it would also conform to the prices of stuff I like!! ❤️🥳

title: Will Give a Better Review once CHANGES ARE MADE.
review: I’ve heard sooo much ab this app, and it sounds amazing! i go through the process taking pictures of everything that i can sell, and BAM, it asks for a paypal. I don’t have a paypal, because i’m underage for it. So basically i can even use the app. what the actual heck? never heard of having to have paypal in order to use an app like that. You might wanna ask Poshmark,Mercari, Letgo, and Vinted for some advice on how to do so! None of my friends have paypal either, so you just lost some users:(
developerResponse: {'id': 2887763, 'body': "Hey there - If you're under 18 you can sign up for an account by using a parent or guardians PayPal account details, provided you've received permission to do so first. We hope this helps as it would be great to have you on-board. Thanks! Team Depop", 'modified': '2018-03-21T11:50:45Z'}

title: Bad bad bad!!
review:
Mirembe Tendaji
20 Jan, 03:05 GMT 

So your seller sold me a sweater last Thursday and said she would ship it out first thing Monday well Monday has gone and it’s now Friday I messaged her for tracking and she said she sent it out in that it is USPS FAULT. Come to find out she she NEVER sent it according to pay pal and today is the only activity they show. Since then she deleted the post so that I CAN NOT LEAVE FEEDBACK on her scandalous transaction she lied and is not a good seller so the people she thinks she is going to get a bad rating from she deletes the post. Another girl just did not give tracking and had many refunded disputes and you let them continue to sell BAD!!!

title: A little irritated
review:
I don't sell on Depop, I only purchase items so I am speaking from a purchasing perspective only.

The "My Likes" section never shows all of my likes, I don't know where a lot of them go! It's so frustrating.
Also, Depop never shows all of the items available that contain my key words. Like I really have to hunt and browse to find new items that match the brand I'm searching because many don't automatically show up in my search results.
Depop needs to fix this, otherwise I will stop using the app. Not worth the hassle!

title: Old Depop was better
review: I used to love depop but the recent updates that changed the entire look and layout of the app, it's not user friendly anymore. Also I can't mark items as shipped even when I have tracking number available, my buyers are complaining they can't leave feedback :( I have experienced the same issue as a buyer on one item as well so I can understand their frustration. There's too many confusing features to the app, the complication is enough to have me start looking into other similar apps.

title: Suggested Improvements
review:
WE NEED a re-list button. I legit sold a item twice because I couldn't update the item without putting a count on it. Now I'm in debt! 

Refunds!!! 

When you click on the notification, you can't edit the item until you go back to your profile.

The icon should show all notifications not only 1. (let me explain better) If you receive multiple notifications, the icon only shows the number 1.

Set shipping preference. (I hate clicking my address and opinions on every listing.)

Able to select multiple items when making a listing instead of having to individually select each photo. 

New Listings tab or filter. I feel like it's difficult to sell my items because I'm never featured on the feed. 

It would be lovely if I didn't get notifications when I comment on my item lol

Ability to Rearrange photos on the app!!! 

Thanks Depop!

title: it’s alright!
review: When I first signed up I realized that to look at items, you HAD to make an account. I didn’t want to make an account for some reason I just downloaded the app to buy clothes until I wanted to make an account. So overall I made an account and the app would definitely be a 5 star rating if there was an option to not make an account before you can look at items.

title: App needs work
review: I’ve been using depop for a while now, and even sold an item already and plan to buy a few from other sellers. My main problem is that the app as a whole barely works for me most of the time. When I click on profiles or try to save items to a collection, they don’t load and give me server errors. It’s not my wifi or my device that’s the problem. Otherwise it’s a fine app. But it’s very annoying that I can’t freely navigate.

title: Great app, just a few things I’d change
review: I want to start by saying that depop has done a good job adding new features, but a feature I’d like to see is the “insights” feature from instagram, to see how many active followers you have, or what time of day is best for you to post items. I’d also like to see a “sold” listings tab in the search menu. It’d be super helpful for finding out how popular a certain item is.

title: quit automatically turning on free shipping.
review:
literally what the title says. I ended up having to pay the shipping cost out of pocket because depop automatically sets the free shipping option to “on” and i was in too much of a rush to notice (and obviously the buyer won’t say anything!) literally this is my ONLY complaint. just stop turning it on automatically.

normally i love depop but come on, not a lot of people want to pay for shipping out of pocket since we already lose so much of the item price to depop fees.

title: Has been rendered unusable due to spamming tags
review: Its impossible to navigate this app now. It’s not worth the time looking for cool stuff because it’s filled with junk. Every individual tags each piece with as many popular words they can think of, and each piece appears in every search for that word. Even when they have nothing to do with it. I could be looking for black jeans and i am gonna see 300 gray highschool tshirts before i even see something the right color because apparently a green windbreaker is: goth punk emo cottagecore boho and sexy. Something needs to be done about it

title: Cool
review: This app helped me get rent, food, and necessities by being able to sell. Love the format and how community like it is. Wish that there was a bit more filtering bc I find I frequently get explicit offers and questions however, that’s not the apps fault. Sometimes it can lag but it’s honestly really awesome. My family/ friends don’t understand it but they think it’s pretty cool. Thanks y’all :)

title: It’s decent, could be better
review: I started selling on depop to make some extra money and maybe even start my own vintage clothing shop. Their technical support is horrible and they seem to not really care about the seller. I’ve messaged them quite a few times for tech issues and other things, but their response is always lackluster and honestly unhelpful. I just wish they could offer sellers better incentives and improved customer service because I’m ready to sell on another platform. For the amount of money they’ve made off me in fees, it’s pretty disgraceful. Use at your own risk.

title: Always logs me out and glitches
review: I love this app because I’m able to sell my old clothes and get money. However, for some reason it always logs me out and when I try to log back in I can’t even open the app again. This has happened several times. I’m currently trying to log into my account and the screen pops up “The operation could not be completed. Please try again later”. I don’t know if this is just an issue I’m having but FIX THIS!! It’s so annoying.
developerResponse: {'id': 16718169, 'body': "Hey! The good news is we've fixed this bug, if you update to the latest version it should be resolved now. Team Depop", 'modified': '2020-07-18T19:54:52Z'}

title: Depop keeps money
review: Depop selling on Depop has become unreliable. Using the new Depop payments is truly unpredictable. The date for the payment to reach your bank can sometimes be 3 to 4 days always for this less than $10 which is ridiculous as well as in accurate dates... on Depop I have a date that says the 23rd, a notification that said yesterday the 22nd, and a email that says the 24th. I think my confusion is warranted. I also have never had a reply for from Depop support unless I leave a comment. So I will definitely stop using Depop once all my items are sold... selling is just too unpredictable.
developerResponse:
{'id': 15472159, 'body': "Hey, our support response times are currently slightly longer due to the current pandemic, but we'll be in touch ASAP.
 
We're here for you,
Team Depop
", 'modified': '2020-05-21T15:21:38Z'}

title: Please ban drop shippers
review:
I like depop. I like the format and how user friendly it is. I admire the sellers who sell unique vintage and thrifted items. 
However, Depop has a problem with drop shipping! A lot of these drop shippers are liars and scammers. They buy overpriced items from Aliexpress and not only that they don’t use originally photos and take too long to ship out products! They don’t care about quality of their items. 

I have made a couple bucks on here and I appreciate that Depop only takes a 10% commission fee but they need to get rid of these drop shippers!
developerResponse: {'id': 13396760, 'body': "Hey. After investigating drop-shipping on a company wide level, we recently decided to update our policy. As of March 1st 2020, we won't allow drop-shipping on-app. We want to keep Depop a creative space with quality products, and highlighting items that best match this is important to us.\n\nTeam Depop", 'modified': '2020-02-10T12:01:38Z'}

title: Amazing app but missing something!
review: This app is amazing! I can find all type of clothes i want, my style, my size, etc. I just think it’s missing something, it should have a Shopping cart because it’s very annoying that we have to purchase everything separately, we have to buy thing by thing which gets pretty annoying! Please add a shopping cart 💘💘
developerResponse: {'id': 3800136, 'body': "Hey Rodrigo! Thanks for your review. This is definitely something we'd like to implement in the future, and though we don't have a launch date for you just yet please be aware that we hope to deliver on this in the future. Thanks again! Team Depop", 'modified': '2018-06-11T14:52:27Z'}

title: takes too much of sellers money
review: i love this app i’ve been using it for about two years now and the only shocking thing they havent changed is the percentage of money they take from sellers. starting off depop, 10% was understandable because it was a new app/business that needed to make a profit somehow, but now that there are so many sellers on depop and it’s been around for quite a while now, theres no reason to take 10%. i think now they can survive taking less since theres so many more sellers than when they just started off. 10% is a lot of money and it adds up quickly. it feels like so much of my money is being taken out of my clothes and my work. less money should be taken from the people that have pretty much made depop to be what it is now and gotten them where they are.
developerResponse: {'id': 7716713, 'body': "Hi there, amazing to hear you've been with us for two years. We love our community. As we grow bigger, our community and expenses also become part of this - while we love to lower the fees - this is added to bringing more support, engineers and all around work for the platform.\n\nLove, Depop", 'modified': '2019-03-13T17:45:15Z'}

title: cool 👌🏼
review: Overall depop is a pretty interesting app to use, I mean the basic buy and sell used items. The only gripe I have with the app is the fact that the discover page is probably the same individuals over and over again. Also it doesn’t update very often, so good luck finding anything interesting unless you’re going on a deep depop search. It would be nice if it had content that accommodated to your interests.
developerResponse: {'id': 3052511, 'body': "Hey there! Our Explore page is curated in-house by members of the team, but we're really looking to enhance this part of the app over the coming months - we hope you'll notice the difference! Thanks, Team Depop", 'modified': '2018-04-06T14:38:27Z'}

title: EASY. SAFE. FUN. COOL.
review: I have already gotten on the featured page twice! I think you are doing a great job at featuring random famous and non famous sellers! I only have like 1000 followers. I have been using this app less than two months.. and I already have sold many items! It's easy. Safe. Cool. I love depop! It's the perfect way to get some extra cash in your pocket and find amazing, cheap items you love!

title: Popularity contest
review:
Exactly what others are saying. Same people over and over again on the explore page. How is anybody else going to be discovered if the same people keep getting featured. The whole point is to be diverse for everyone to have a chance on selling. Unless Depop themselves features you, there is no other way to really get gain attention to your products. Which then means no sales. 

Also it’s continuously telling me I have a message but there’s never any message.

title: App always freezes and doesn’t work properly
review: I recently sold some items and depop never manually marked it as sold like they usually do. I had to mark every item as sold myself. I’ve also been having some problems inputting the quantity because whenever I put 1 it goes back to 0 and won’t let me post my posting.

title: Becoming increasingly unusable
review: I’ll tap on items and it’ll redirect me to a blank white page instead of the item listing. Some listings I’ll be able to view, but it won’t allow me to like or save the item or even scroll through the images. The app is borderline unusable as a buyer. Even as a seller, the shipping on a listing will randomly change from “Buyer pays” to “Seller pays” and I’ll lose anywhere between $5-15 on a sale. Furthermore, the constant giveaways, promotions, trades, drama posts, and ISO lists clog up searches. I’d stick to more reliable resale apps.
developerResponse:
{'id': 18550253, 'body': "Hey there,

Thanks for the feedback. We love hearing about what we can do to improve Depop for our Community. When you succeed, we succeed. We'll be passing this along to our Product Team.

Team Depop
", 'modified': '2020-10-18T21:40:43Z'}

title: Needs Improvements
review: This is seriously a pretty slow app with many bugs. There’s so many glitches when pressing buttons and it takes forever to load. Also PLEASE just include the prices on the pictures so we don’t have to click and exit when it’s too expensive, etc. I know depop does this so we spend more time on it, but it’s really frustrating and makes me not go on it as much. Also depop needs to set up authentication on products like Mercari does. There’s so many sellers who scheme on this app just to get a buck.

title: i love it but i have a suggestion!
review:
i LOVE depop. i recently downloaded it last week and i’ve already sold quite a few things and have gained a small following. the only thing i wish it had was a dark mode...
🥺 but honestly i have nothing to complain about. it’s such a good app. but it woulddd be really nice if you could offer a dark mode hehehe

title: Hard to get help
review: Depop is a good app. Gets the job done. Not my favorite by any means and by far not the most user friendly of the buy and sell apps. For example, I have an item for sale that I want to delete but I cannot find where or how to do that. Should be an easy task. I’ve gone to the help section on the app with no luck in finding an answer and there isn’t a way to email anyone for support. If someone who can help from the app is reading this, please let me know!

title: New update not great
review: Love this app honestly, but I hate not being able to see the prices when I search for items anymore. It’s not a big issue I just think it poses a problem for people who might want to look for items in a certain price range but still wanna look at everything. I get that you can narrow down the search but if I’m looking for tops between $0-45 and the top I’m looking for is $46, I’d happily pay the extra dollar but I’d be missing out due to the filter so for me personally I hate putting price filters.
developerResponse:
{'id': 18380888, 'body': "Hey there,

Thanks for the feedback. We love hearing about what we can do to improve Depop for our Community. When you succeed, we succeed. We'll be passing this along to our Product Team.

Team Depop
", 'modified': '2020-10-09T15:11:43Z'}

title: Great app
review: The app is really good!! Amazing selection of things, great prices, and a super cool system overall. I have 2 complaints though. 1) i wish it would tell you how much shipping is prior to going to check out (like eBay does) and 2) while the app is great, I have completely deleted it from my phone because of the ghost notifications. There is always a red little notification. No matter what I do. I hate that. So while the app is good, I won’t be using It anymore for this reason.

title: Good seller protection
review: When I started, I didn’t realize my paypal wasn’t verified. I shipped two items, only for the transactions to bounce back. One of the buyers stopped responding to my request for resending of payment, but depop support helped me. They were quick to respond to me, and helped me get my money back easily, which saved me $250. It’s a good community, and most people on here are respectful.
developerResponse: {'id': 16192612, 'body': "We couldn't agree more.\n\nTeam Depop", 'modified': '2020-06-24T11:30:35Z'}

title: Fix Bugs
review: The app has overall been an enjoyable experience to me, and I’ve been using it since they first launched. But they are so slow to fix bugs and glitches! My app keeps crashing and now it’s completely logged me out and won’t let me log back in bc “the operation can’t be completed”. I just wanted to go into my receipts to check some tracking info and the website is also now displaying a 404 error and telling me to check the app instead. How do I do that when the app won’t even let me log in???
developerResponse: {'id': 1085492, 'body': "Hey, thanks for the review and feedback. Currently when you have been left feedback, you need to go into the receipt and tap on the stars to view the review in full. This should then clear down the notification. Try that out and if it doesn't work feel free to get in touch with us at productfeedback@depop.com. Thanks for flagging this! We will look at ways to improve the experience in this scenario. Many thanks, Team Depop", 'modified': '2017-08-23T12:18:56Z'}

title: gr8 for anybody who LOVES to shop!
review:
depop is a great find, especially for those who enjoy name brand items at a low price. don’t get me wrong, some things are still expensive but you get what you pay. all my
clothing items that i have bought are amazing! i love that you can negotiate prices and pm the person directly! amazing app, just wish i had more money to spend!!

title: I love depop! (GLITCH I NOTICED)
review:
I’ve been using depop for a few years as both a buyer and seller and it’s my favorite one of these kind of apps. I would definitely recommend it!

There is however a new glitch that causes the search page to go back up to the top every time you come back to it from viewing an item. This is making it impossible to browse. Can you fix this?
developerResponse:
{'id': 15394864, 'body': "Hey, sorry to hear about this! The good news is we've got a fix for this bug on the way. 

Stay tuned, 
Team Depop
", 'modified': '2020-05-18T14:30:25Z'}

title: Great marketplace but still not safe from scammers
review:
I’ve gotten lots of good deals but half the time the sellers catfish the condition of the items . Gotten ripped off 3 times in total and only one was resolved . One seller just straight up never sent the item and his PayPal refund was declined so I got screwed out of 50 bucks and neither PayPal or Depop can do anything about it.
Has the potential to be great if it had stricter guidelines but I’m quite disappointed and have been reluctant to purchase anything ever since.
developerResponse:
{'id': 11973694, 'body': "Hey, we’re sorry to hear your experience hasn't gone to plan. We offer Buyer Protection for all items purchased in-app using the ‘BUY’ button. 

Read more in-app about what to do by going to ‘Settings - Need help’ and typing in ‘Buyer Protection’.

We're here to help you,
Team Depop ", 'modified': '2019-11-21T11:07:48Z'}

title: Bunch of idiots running this app
review: User friendly? Sure. More geared to the trendy vintage type clothing, and if you don’t model it in some cool way you won’t sell it. But you better hope you never need to contact customer support for anything....I’ve decided to shut my account down because it was a waste of my time with the type of clothing I sell. These idiots don’t know their butthole from a hole in the ground. It has taken 7 emails and they STILL haven’t done it- keep asking random questions that I’ve already answered. I’ve deleted all my listings and deleted the app. Problem solved? We will see.
developerResponse: {'id': 11796833, 'body': "Hey. We'll always ask a few questions pre account cancellation. These are only for security reasons and are designed to keep you, our Community, safe. If you don't hear back, just drop us a line. However, we reply to all incoming messages, so it's worth checking your junk box.\n\nTeam Depop", 'modified': '2019-11-12T10:32:03Z'}

title: Good app, annoying interphase
review: I like this app, biggest pet peeve being that it crashes and lags wayyyy too often. Often in the middle of me looking at items. It’s very much a deterrent to even shopping here because sometimes it’s hard to find the same item again. A smoother interface is a must as well as better filtering. There are items tagged as something that they aren’t... it clogs up the actual screen with all the actual products you’d be searching for.
developerResponse: {'id': 9004034, 'body': 'Hi there, thank you for the feedback. Can you please pop over a report via our in-app support Settings - Need Help? - Technical Issues and then we can get this sorted together. Keep us posted ❤️\n\nLove, Depop', 'modified': '2019-06-04T10:06:02Z'}

title: Great and Addictive
review: Really easy to navigate layout, similarly to Instagram. Nothing busy that crowds your experience. Good search system and fast. Easy to communicate with others. Very community based, unlike Poshmark. Accounts are fairly controlled so there aren’t many bots. It can be addictive. Great shipping and pricing system. Really easy to post items, sort out orders, and purchases. Amazing layout.
developerResponse: {'id': 5500770, 'body': "You're amazing. What a lovely review to read on a gloomy Monday morning. We are all about community and glad that you're a part of this now <3\nTeam Depop", 'modified': '2018-10-15T09:20:36Z'}

title: Needs more effort
review: Overall, it’s an interesting selling app that I’ve enjoyed. BUT I feel like I’m always seeing the same people on the explore page & sometimes the pics aren’t even original (or relevant to actually selling something) :/ the Depop team should take a little more time & put some effort in featuring different people’s items besides the same 15-20 people. It’ll create more enjoyable experience & cohesive community!

title: Scammers
review:
I’ve used the app for more than a year now. The app functions well. Shipping is easy. It is also very easy for scammers to get away with your money. 1st time I lost $40 was due to the customer filing a claim a MONTH LATER AFTER receiving the item that they did not purchase the item. I had proof that they did and a conversation proving it. 2nd, I made a $55 purchase. Two days later the seller had deleted their account and didn’t answer to emails I sent. 

It’s easy for scammers to scam you out of $$.
developerResponse:
{'id': 5197607, 'body': "Hey there, that's definitely not some great experiences. Have you been in touch with the support team about this? For your first issue, we would reach out to the buyer even if this is months ago, we will then try to figure this out together. Don't you worry, we got you!

As for your second issue, the support team would give you instructions on how to get a refund back. 

Let me know and we will figure this out together.

Love, Depop", 'modified': '2018-09-24T11:03:27Z'}

title: Horrible glitches
review: For the last 5 days, this app has been notifying me that I have messages when I really don't and every time I go into my messages I see a bunch of messages that I deleted along time ago there but then they disappear sometimes and come back. So weird. Also, when I try to delete these 2 certain messages I have, the app always logs me off. So many glitches since the update. Hate it. If this isn't fixed soon then I'm going to stop using it. I only have a couple of things left to sell then I'm out!

title: Thanks!
review: I’ve used your app to sell clothing for a few years now and it’s always been easy to use and trouble-free. Today, when I logged in, you had a Black Lives Matter welcome screen that said you were donating money to the NAACP and other organizations for racial justice which made me love you that much more! Thanks for stepping up and speaking out! Just wanted to share my love.
developerResponse: {'id': 15777933, 'body': "We're glad we're able to make a positive contribution during this time.\n\nTeam Depop", 'modified': '2020-06-04T13:45:06Z'}

title: The New Algorithm is AWFUL for Sellers
review: I went from being able to sell my inventory within a month to sitting on the on-trend summer clothing I intended to sell way into October. The new algorithm favors spam tagged and drop shippers, while it leaves small shops in the dust since our listings are not seen. I’ve had my items taken down for unknown, non-rule violating reasons and I have not been given an explanation as to why my items had been taken down. It’s unfair that rules are not evenly applied to all sellers, especially since leniency is awarded to large accounts with multiple violations and not to small accounts.

title: Sustainability???
review: Depops great for me, i make sales like everyday. I think my prices and half of depops prices are great. BUT depop really has to stop these fast fashion resellers. im SICK of seeing people post "available sizes" and "2 weeks to a month shipping time"for  items that u can find on other cheap fast fashion websites. Knowing that 100% these people are reselling it all for 3 or 4 times as much. Depop, ur brand is known as an online thrift store basically where we shop sustainabley. Stop this from happening or i cant support.
developerResponse:
{'id': 17325729, 'body': "Hi, our community spoke and we listened. In an effort to keep Depop a creative marketplace with quality products we have decided to update our policy on drop shipped items. As of March 1st 2020, we won't allow drop-shipping on-app.

If you can report any accounts that you believe are dropshipping, we’d really appreciate it!
Team Depop
", 'modified': '2020-08-17T11:40:30Z'}

title: No buyer protection through this app
review:
Don’t EVER buy designer items through this app. I got a “coach” bag. Seller assured me it’s genuine, and when the package arrived it was obvious that it’s not authentic, item looked nothing like the pics. Tried to contact support team they told me “rest assured we got you “covered” “ and basically sent me to ask for my money through PayPal. And PayPal asked to contact the seller, who appeared to be in Singapore instead of USA so the cost of shipping back would be almost the same as the item itself. 
No other selling app I used would ever refuse to help me, as a buyer except for this one. So be aware of that!
developerResponse:
{'id': 17285017, 'body': "Hey, we’re sorry to hear your experience hasn't gone to plan. We offer Buyer Protection for all items purchased in-app using the ‘BUY’ button. 

Read more in-app about what to do next by going to ‘Settings - Need help’ and typing in ‘Buyer Protection’.

We're here to help you,
Team Depop 
", 'modified': '2020-08-14T12:59:42Z'}

title: Easy to use and you’re always protected.
review:
Great app. 
Been selling and buying for quite a while and it’s very simple. Looks like Instagram but you can buy things on what they call, “shops”. You’re always protected doing business on here since your transaction goes through PayPal. Great app, staff and overall experience you’ll get. Couldn’t recommend this app more.
developerResponse: {'id': 5794259, 'body': "We're the childhood blanket you don't want to be without.\n\nLove, Depop", 'modified': '2018-11-04T12:18:23Z'}

title: Bugs and annoying posts
review: I switched to depop to buy/sell over the past year and I really enjoy the app. Lately I have noticed lots of sellers on the app selling inappropriate merchandise or having complicated selling tactics-bids. There should be consequences for some of these accounts because it messes with the depop community. Also with the latest update when you click on an item it takes you to the top of the page but I’m sure a fix is coming.
developerResponse:
{'id': 15317000, 'body': "Hey, sorry to hear about this! The good news is we've got a fix for this bug on the way. 

Stay tuned, 
Team Depop
", 'modified': '2020-05-14T10:07:31Z'}

title: Made For You Page Improvement
review: There’s a little note for when you tailor the “Made For You” page to your brands and sizes that it’ll “add in some surprises”. I’m fine with that as long as it’s just a couple different brands and pieces that I didn’t expect, but why SIZES? That’s not a surprise, that’s a disappointment. That serves no purpose other than to disappoint me and I wish the MFY page didn’t recommend items that aren’t even my size. Other than that, the rest of the app is great.
developerResponse: {'id': 13537298, 'body': "Hey. Thanks for the feedback. We love hearing about what we can do to improve Depop for our Community. When you succeed, we succeed. We'll be passing this along to our Product Team.\n\nTeam Depop", 'modified': '2020-02-17T14:20:29Z'}

title: Love This App!!
review: I’ve been using this app for a while to sell my used clothes and thrifted clothes that I find. Everything is fine, except for the fact that you have to use PayPal as the payment option. That’s my only complaint, I wish there was a dedicated payment system that wasn’t so dependent on PayPal! Overall a great app though! Highly recommend!!
developerResponse: {'id': 5113374, 'body': 'Hey Jade, thank you for the feedback. We are definitely keeping the payment system issue in mind as we want our community to have the best experience with us.\n\nLove, Depop', 'modified': '2018-09-19T08:03:14Z'}

title: Disappointed
review: Depop went from my favorite app to one of my least favorites today. The filtering system is completely terrible now. It doesn’t work. No matter what size filters you put on it or brand filters, no results will be filtered out. That was one of the features about the app I liked most, and now it makes me frustrated. Please respond
developerResponse: {'id': 3800403, 'body': 'Thanks for taking the time to leave us this feedback, we appreciate it! Team Depop', 'modified': '2018-06-11T15:11:32Z'}

title: Great...
review:
I love this app so much, not only have I sold items, but I’ve bought items too.
