As soon as I got the update I was super excited to create videos for my items, but unfortunately this feature isn’t working for me...I’d greatly appreciate it if this is fixed, because I’m really excited to see what people create and show what I can create. 

Thank you!!!
developerResponse: {'id': 3052493, 'body': "Hey there! Could you elaborate on what's happening with your video function? You can do so either by updating this review (please include your Depop @username) or by emailing our support team directly on support@depop.com. Thanks, Team Depop", 'modified': '2018-04-06T14:37:34Z'}

title: Depop looks nice but other apps offer more
review: The setup and aesthetic of this app is very nice but I would be nice to do offers and counter offers from the app like some other apps instead of just messaging each other. Discounts that show on the item would also helpful instead of having to post about it so that if someone wasn’t following you but they looked up and item you had, they would see the discount. Other apps offer more but Depop is aesthetically pleasing.

title: LITTLE PROBLEMS
review: Overall, DEPOP is a great app. I love it ! But, there all small problems that are actually very annoying. One that I’m having major problems with is when I refresh a product (I edit it so it goes to the top of my listings) it doesn’t go to the top, all of my listings get jumbled up.. and for me it’s important to have my listings grouped, I have a clearance section, a tee shirt section, jeans, shorts, etc. And it’s annoying when they mix all up!!
developerResponse: {'id': 3269040, 'body': "Hey there! Whilst we don't have that capability right now, we think this is the kind of thing the chat feature is for - have a chat with our sellers and see if they're willing to negotiate! Team Depop", 'modified': '2018-04-26T10:33:48Z'}

title: DEPOP SCAMS
review: This app has zero protection for its customers besides PayPal and that doesn’t even guarantee your money back, and they constantly allow people to make fake PayPal accounts and scam you out of your money. Please if you are going  to use this app use with caution and be extremely careful when purchasing from users especially if they have zero reviews on their products.

title: Communication is horrible
review: I had a strange message from Depop, regarding a listing that they deleted. Emailed them since I'm not to familiar with the app, I wanted understand why the listing was deleted so I can fix the problem. Mind I've never have any problem with my buyer whatever I've sold I always have a 5 star and let me tell you, I was randomly checking my Depot hrs later,it was gone. They suspended my page. Never replied to my emails regarding my questions. I emailed them again they never respond. I guess at this point I'm being ignored which is extremely rude. Just be aware communication is really horrible.
developerResponse: {'id': 2933297, 'body': "Hey there! Sorry to read that you've been left without an explanation here. Could you please update this review to include your Depop @username so that we can investigate.. and reply! Thanks, Team Depop", 'modified': '2018-03-26T11:13:02Z'}

title: Great but i have some ideas
review: Its a great app but I think the app can benefit from an offer button like poshmark. Also a lot of people leave negative reviews on your item if you don't ship their product asap. In the real world packages may not come for up to a month. But for some reason if their package doesnt come within a week they freak out and leave a negative review. So maybe a disclaimer should be made or something like whether you are leaving a review say not to base it on shipment time.
developerResponse: {'id': 2745591, 'body': "Hey there - thanks for leaving this feedback. Whilst we don't have an offer button right now, we'd encourage you to communicate with potential sellers via the chat function as often you'll find that different prices can be negotiated via this format. With regards to reviews, we've found that good and frequent communication with buyers about the status of a parcel, alongside tracked delivery, can often halt any of the issues you've written about. We hope this'll work for you too! Thanks, Team Depop", 'modified': '2018-03-05T11:57:48Z'}

title: Recent Depop issues
review:
Having several recent problems with this app: 1. When scrolling through my feed, all the photos start at the second or fourth photo of the garment. SO frustrating
2. Clearly the algorithm for the featured page has changed. When starting on Depop my items would be picked about once a month, bringing a lot of new traffic to my page. My aesthetic has stayed the same, and the quality of what I'm selling has increased, so what gives?

title: goooood
review: I absolutely love depop! Just be careful of all the scammers on depop, either than that you should be good! Selling on depop is easy, just not the depop fees, but it’s okay depop does a great job on always improving their app. :) they deserve a little money! Depop is super easy to work with, I’ve been on depop for a good 2-3 months now & ive sold about 22 items :) & purchased a whole lot too! would definitely recommend.
developerResponse:
{'id': 18004684, 'body': 'Hey. Thanks so much for the 5 Star feedback. We love to hear from our community.

We moderate the app 24/7 to ensure scammers are kept away. If you notice anything suspicious, please report the item/user in-app (by clicking the 3 dots (...) top right of their profile/item) so we can investigate.

Team Depop
', 'modified': '2020-09-21T16:21:43Z'}

review:
Messages are once again not deleting - the "update" is horrendous. Black text on bright red? And terrible stretched out font? Not an upgrade guys and when you're given criticism - don't respond with "change is hard to get used to." 

An upgrade would have been actually allowing people to block others so they're no longer following them - having a sold message over items so you don't have to click on an item to see it's sold.

title: I’ve been buying for 2 years and I won’t again
review: I have 83+ transactions on this app and after this year I won’t be using again. It’s way too easy for people to scam you. If you have an issue with a transaction depop takes no responsibility and turns you to PayPal which is dealing with a whole other monster and isn’t always successful. People have been using COVID as an excuse not to send items or refund you! Other apps like Mercari or poshmark takes the initiative to take care of your refund ASAP if something’s not right. Even opening a dispute with PayPal doesn’t always work.

title: Eh
review: Depop takes a big percentage of your profit. I made a $25 + $5 shipping and Depop took $9 from that total profit. I also hate how the shipping is automatically set on “seller pays” because my first two sales, I only made $0.50 profit each! After this recent update, every time I use a hashtag, it tells me that I’m only allowed to tag up to 2 brands only which literally makes no sense because I was able to use hashtags before and I put my item under one brand. Starting to feel like Depop is an overrated app that only got its hype from TikTok aesthetic girls. 🙄
developerResponse:
{'id': 18053408, 'body': " 
Hey, thanks for the review. Our 10% fee allows us to keep Depop running smoothly. It contributes towards the cost of running the app, creating new features and improving our Community’s experience. 
 
See our article about fees by going to 'Settings - Need help' and typing in ‘What about fees’.
Team Depop
", 'modified': '2020-09-23T14:00:10Z'}

title: I don’t know
review: I like Depop but selling items is a true hustle on here. I don’t fell like My items are seen by many. It seems like it takes so long to get one sell. Half of my items are new with tags the others are slightly used. Maybe I don’t have what the ppl want but sometimes I feel like I should pull my items and try a different avenue to sell them.
developerResponse:
{'id': 10124654, 'body': "Hey hey! Sorry to hear you've not had much luck with selling.

Check out our Sellers Handbook for some top tips on getting more visibility over your shop: https://sellers.depop.com/SellerHandbook_UK_18.12.18-1.pdf

Happy selling,
Team Depop", 'modified': '2019-08-12T10:24:54Z'}

title: I can’t log in or create a account
review: This was a good app actually very good for buying and selling clothes but I deleted the app awhile ago and recently re downloaded it and tried I tried to log in it didn’t work so then I tried to log in with Facebook, didn’t work, my number, didn’t work and my email I literally cant use the app and I really wish I could if anyone knows how I could log in or create a new account please let me know!!
developerResponse:
{'id': 17299049, 'body': 'Hey, we’re sorry to hear this and we can imagine how frustrating this must be. Could you please submit a support request via this link http://bit.ly/depoplockedout
 Please remember to include your:
- Username
- Email address
- Phone number
- Phone operating system, example iOS 13
 
Let’s get this sorted,
Team Depop
', 'modified': '2020-08-15T21:42:58Z'}

title: horrible
review: i’ve been selling a lot of stuff for the past few days but today a few of my items were removed for “unrelated hashtags”? i don’t understand why this matters? i included related hashtags in my description jsut to get more exposure. plus basically HALF the sellers on this app do this. it’s frustrating because they also said my account would get suspended if i relisted the items. what is the reason for this? also horrible customer service, never reply and if they do it’s a prewritten automatic reply. do you guys have any real people on the team?
developerResponse:
{'id': 17321767, 'body': " 
Hey there, we’re sorry to hear your experience hasn't gone to plan. In order to keep our Community safe, all decisions made to suspend users and items or remove hashtags are taken after deep investigation and consideration. If you feel this is unfair, just drop us a reply in the original email thread. We’re always happy to take a second look and I promise we are real people. Our support response times are currently slightly longer due to the current pandemic, but we'll always aim to reply ASAP.
 
Team Depop
", 'modified': '2020-08-17T09:19:00Z'}

title: server authentication not found
review: i have an issue where sometimes i log in and it says server authentication not found, and doesn’t let me access anything. i have tried uninstalling and reinstalling, logging out and in again, or force stopping, and it just keeps coming up. If you guys could fix this i would greatly appreciate it because i used to use this app a lot on my old phone but as soon as i got a new one it started doing this.
developerResponse:
{'id': 16195089, 'body': "Hey, we can imagine how frustrating this is. Please get in touch by going to 'Settings - Need help - Technical issues - I've still got an issue' and send us a report.
 
We’ll take it from here,
Team Depop
", 'modified': '2020-06-24T13:03:51Z'}

title: Depop... Pros, and Cons?
review: So, depop right? I’ve had my own experience with selling on the app before, but I’ve had trouble trying to delete my account due to personal information being on it, which I had a hard time because the admins didn’t want it to be deleted before wanting me to answer 21 questions. But on the bright side it shows a lot of various, and good brands to mild to high prices, but good stuff can be found for low prices, overall it’s a very 50/50 experience.

title: Amazing
review: I never right reviews but the pop up ad kept asking me and I finally felt the need to write it. Depop is seriously one of the most amazing apps for selling EVER. Anyone can be successful on this app and I believe it’s helped change many people’s lives including mine. I love Depop from the bottom of my heart. So happy to be apart of this establishment. Great people, great set up, great products all around. ♥️
developerResponse: {'id': 8026846, 'body': 'Love you Emma... thank you for the feedback.\n\nKisses, Depop', 'modified': '2019-04-02T14:57:38Z'}

title: Inactive sellers.
review: Overall really great and super easy to find items, however there a slew of inactive sellers that have abandoned their account without officially stating so. It can be difficult to tell if purchasing from these accounts is possible. Giving these sellers a notice and eventually removing them if they don’t become active again would be very helpful!

title: Depop fee is ridiculous.
review: Let's say you sell something for $80, that's $8 you have to give to depop because of the ridiculous %10 fee. The interface is great, the community is nice and very friendly. The only thing that would make this service much better would be lowering the fee to atleast %5 of the sale. Seeing the final amount of your sale being impacted by a stupid excessive %10 fee kills the joy of having sold the item. This really needs to be fixed.
developerResponse:
{'id': 6451323, 'body': 'Hey Isaac, thanks for  taking the time to give us some feedback. I understand that you may believe that the Depop fee is high and believe me if we didn’t have to charge a fee we wouldn’t!

The 10% fee may seem like a lot for your sale but, when we break this down into what the fee contributes to, it makes a lot more sense. The fee is in place to keep the app up and running, with general up-keep costs and to pay all of our employees, from engineers to us in support. 

Unlike many other selling platforms, at Depop only charge you when you make a sale, this means there are no fees for the length of time your item has been listed for or any initial costs to list the item, so list to your heart’s content because its all free!

Love, Depop', 'modified': '2018-12-19T02:27:49Z'}

title: Yaaaas.
review: Super easy to use! A majority of my items were found and bought very shortly after downloading the app/posting things. I really love being able to print the shipping labels at home, DePop just makes selling things simple and painless. Also, the variety of items that are listed is overwhelming...in a great way lol. Definitely would recommend this app!

title: A Modern Miracle
review: I have heard about buying and selling clothes online before, but I never thought the whole idea was legit. But then, my friend showed me Depop, and I was head over heels! Everything I see is adorable and for such a good price, not to mention good for the environment because it’s just like thrifting. I buy all of my clothes on here now, I never have to look elsewhere again!
developerResponse: {'id': 16235044, 'body': "We couldn't agree more.\n\nTeam Depop", 'modified': '2020-06-26T09:38:32Z'}

title: Needs an update
review: I’m having a lot of trouble using this app. Although it’s a great way to get shoes and I love it, it’s hard to use. I’m tapping the users and it will not send me to the accounts, like it won’t bring me to their page. I try swiping though the pictures and it will not swipe over. It will stay on the first picture even though I know there’s more to look through because of the dots at the bottom. I think it needs to be updated but this happens even when I refresh the app and when I close out of it completely.

title: Great but sometimes glitches
review: I’ve been loving the app!! I love the algorithm and how easy it is to tailor it to your shopping needs. The only thing is that it can sometimes get a little glitchy and it takes a moment to buffer when you click on a post and the whole page will sometimes move halfway off the screen. Maybe it’s just my experience. Other than that I love the app!
developerResponse:
{'id': 17264826, 'body': "Hey, Thanks for taking the time to get in touch! Very happy to hear you're loving the app. Regarding the bugs we can imagine how frustrating this is and we’re currently working to resolve this issue. Please get in touch by going to 'Settings - Need help - Technical issues - I've still got an issue' and send us a report leaving your username and details regarding your listings. 
 
We’ll take it from here,
Team Depop
", 'modified': '2020-08-13T14:31:43Z'}

title: Could be better
review: They should make a feature where a seller could pin a listing to the top.  And have a button on the seller’s page where a buyer could see a seller’s policies.  I always have to press the message button, then click the policies. It would be way easier with a direct button. Other than that, it makes it easy to buy and sell things.

title: Love the App
review: I absolutely love the app. Its just like being in a thift store. I love the idea that you could like your clothes to go back to as well as save others. But I have 2 minor problems. (1) Whenever I go to the people I follow, it won't let me load all of them, only a few. (2) Some of my collections wont let me put a cover on it, its just gray. But overall a great app!
developerResponse: {'id': 13666445, 'body': "Hey. We love this. Depop is a space for you to buy, sell and create. So keep it up. We've also taken note of your album issue and will be passing it onto the relevant teams. Feedback like this helps us keep Depop moving for our Community, so keep your suggestions coming.\n\nTeam Depop", 'modified': '2020-02-24T11:37:26Z'}

title: I really like it but it has an issue
review: Recently, I recommended this app to my boyfriend. He told me that on the search page, if he looks at the details of a picture and then goes back it goes all the way to the top. I hadn’t been having that issue. I jinxed myself and now it’s an issue. Looked at some other reviews and saw there were other similar experiences. I hope this gets fixed soon!!
developerResponse:
{'id': 15395763, 'body': "Hey, sorry to hear about this! The good news is we've got a fix for this bug on the way. 
 
Stay tuned, 
Team Depop
", 'modified': '2020-05-18T15:12:32Z'}

title: Frustrated
review: I like this app a lot however there was hidden fees, every time i sold an item i was charged $6 and i didn't find this out until today which is why i writing this review. i had this app for about 2 months and had a fantastic experience till now, you also have to pay 3.00 every month for no reason. When they take these charges out of your account i got no email or notification this was happening. i'm a high school student so i don't have a large income and i sell very well conditioned clothing which very frustrated me.

title: My entire closet
review: Most of my clothes are thrifted — but I don’t always have the time & energy these days to visit thrift stores in my area when they are open. With Depop I can search on my time for exactly what I want. If you’re patient and willing to dig you will find some gems (like the silk Acne Studios button down I found for $8). Depop is the most-used app on my phone.
developerResponse: {'id': 13015390, 'body': "That's what we're here for. Keep exploring, there's plenty more out there.\n\nTeam Depop", 'modified': '2020-01-20T11:38:17Z'}

title: Can’t Log In
review: I’ve tried several times to log in after the app logged me out after years of having it installed. Typed in an email to recover for a forgotten password, not able to send an email. Tried my handle, nope. I’ve tried every password and can’t get in and can’t make another account because of my cell phone number! This is actually ridiculous! Fix this mess!
developerResponse:
{'id': 13487040, 'body': "Hey. We're sorry to hear you're having trouble logging in, and we understand how frustrating this must be. Could you please try resetting your password from a laptop or PC. This provides a more secure connection, and should do the trick. 

Remember, you can use either your username or linked email address to login. Just make sure you’ve typed it correctly with no spaces. 

Let’s get you back on the app,
Team Depop
", 'modified': '2020-02-14T10:32:55Z'}

title: Menswear vs. Womenswear
review: I love this app a ton- found a lot of cute clothes for cheap and I love being able to thrift from home. I do wish that if I wanted to filter my searches with a specific article of clothing, i.e t-shirts, that I didn’t also have to specify women’s or men’s. Sometimes that can be helpful, but I wish I had the option to look at both. I also wish that sellers had a gender ambiguous option when selling their pieces.
developerResponse: {'id': 11775270, 'body': "Hey. This is a great suggestion, we love it. There are a tonne of gender neutral sellers on app, just try searching 'unisex'. We realise that this isn't the perfect solution, but we'll be passing this along to our Product Team. \n\nTeam Depop", 'modified': '2019-11-11T12:34:15Z'}

title: Scampop
review: Used depop for a while, no one ever tried to buy any of my stuff it’s like a crappy version of eBay.  Anyways they “dropped” some rare shoes this morning and every time I went to purchase it gave me a screen saying to try in a few minutes cause the item was being purchased (depops slow servers couldn’t handle the traffic on the 3 shoes) therefore not allowing me to purchase the shoes?  Not cool I had at least 10 different times where I saw the screen and tried to purchase the shoes!  My friend also was using depop and also got scammed $80 for a belt, luckily he got it back thanks to PayPal

title: Great Platform
review: Lots of places out there to list items for sale, but depop is a well presented app that does very well across the board. There is an algorithm that keeps your personal feed fresh with styles based on what you like, and, the community is diverse and really rad as well. Highly recommended. 📪 I invite you to check out our store if you download 🌋@variusiii ✨😊✌️
developerResponse: {'id': 19220187, 'body': "We're glad you love Depop as much as we do.\n\nTeam Depop", 'modified': '2020-11-19T13:04:28Z'}

title: depop: the easiest way to thrift shop
review: i love depop! there’s such an amazing variety of clothing. you can find just about anything you want, usually for a relatively reasonable price. but it’s not just the clothes that make depop so great. i’d argue that one of the best parts of the app is all of the beautiful people you’re given the opportunity to interact with. for the most part, depop users are wonderful people who treat their customers with fairness and generosity. yet another perk is getting to make some side money from the comfort of your home. just list your items, wait, and enjoy the outcome! overall, i’d say that depop is one of the best “sell-it-yourself” or “thrifting” apps out there. highly recommend!!
developerResponse: {'id': 9142202, 'body': "We couldn't ask for a better review than this one. Spread the love baby.\n\nKisses, Depop", 'modified': '2019-06-13T06:41:37Z'}

title: PayPal isn’t the best method
review: Great app overall, I just really wish I could sell. The only way to sell items is to connect your PayPal account, which some people do not use/can’t use if they’re not old enough (18). Looking forward to when they add an some sort of different payment method. I suggest doing what another selling app does. In-app currency is the best option, because then you have money on the app but can also transfer it into a bank account.
developerResponse: {'id': 12203660, 'body': "Hey Maison. We hear you. We're working on something as we speak, so stay tuned.\n\nTeam Depop", 'modified': '2019-12-04T09:41:01Z'}

title: Depop
review: I enjoy using this app a lot. Very useful for cheap designer clothing and accessories. Great deals. The only bad thing about the app is your phone will constantly have a pop up notification. Even if you’ve checked your notifications in the app multiple times and refresh your notifications. I’ve tried deleting the app and re-downloading it as well and nothing seems to work. I’ve even turned off notifications on my phone for the depop app.

title: Amazingg
review: I rarely ever leave reviews but I truly love this app! You can find so many unique things you wouldn’t find in stores, as well as good quality products for very cheap. I do practically all my online shopping on this app now. Totally worth checking out ✨ Btw I loveeeee the “for you” feature, its so spot on! Finding stuff I never would have otherwise!!
developerResponse: {'id': 5941520, 'body': 'We must have done something right if we got you out of your "no writing reviews" cocoon. We love you.\n\nDepop', 'modified': '2018-11-14T11:33:22Z'}

title: Love Depop!
review: I love using depop to buy and sell. Overall, its been a wonderful experience and helped me make extra cash. I just wish I also had the opportunity to get on the featured page to get more exposure to my items and page. Sometimes theres new people on the feature page, but most of the time it looks like the same sellers.
developerResponse: {'id': 4374204, 'body': "Hey there! We're working hard to ensure the users on the Explore page are a more varied bunch. Do keep an eye out for the pictures they're taking though, as that kind of imagery is what will grab the attention of our in-house curation team. Thanks, Team Depop", 'modified': '2018-07-24T09:40:52Z'}

title: great app but needs improvements
review: I love this app I just wish gave more exposure to more smaller accounts rather than just the ones with a lot of followers. I would love to buy from the smaller accounts! Also wish there was a story option so you can post live pics of what your selling it makes it more interactive.
developerResponse:
{'id': 16937799, 'body': 'Hey. We get it, this can be super frustrating. Rest assured, we’re always looking for ways to discover exciting new users. 

Keep exploring,
Team Depop
', 'modified': '2020-07-28T20:51:45Z'}

title: Still a great app but..
review: This app is great I left another review but what I’m experiencing issue bc when I on the app I like a lot of stuff but I noticed that after I got to like a bunch of things and try to scroll through my likes it won’t load anymore after a while. This is an issue for me bc I’ll try and go back to my likes to buy something but how am I supposed to buy it if I can’t even get to it
developerResponse: {'id': 3800386, 'body': "Hey there! Could you please reach out to our support team (support@depop.com) so they can check out what's happening here? Don't forget to include your Depop @username and any relevant screenshots you may have. Thanks! Team Depop", 'modified': '2018-06-11T15:10:41Z'}

title: NEEDS OPTION FOR DIRECT DEPOSIT
review: I don't use paypal and I won't use this site because of how easy it is to get scammed by a customer cancelling the sale. Until they change their policy & allow direct deposit into your checking account I will not use this app. Plus they take the deductions from your pay pal, not just off the income of the item. It's a dumb way for them to take their commission and makes everything more complicated for the seller. Buying is good though!

title: DO NOT UPDATE APP DEPOP SNEAKY CHARGES
review: Depop has defaulted sellers to FREE SHIPPING on them causing thousands of sellers to be charged for shipping payed by the cost of the item as they defaulted and hid at the bottom to free shipping. Depop DID NOT inform seller about this nor mention in the app upate! This has caused lost fees and charges for shipping taken from sellers and call for an investigation if not class action lawsuit for this dirty sneaky business practice! Depop owes sellers shipping cost and buyers will be charged automatically if they didn't pay since their app update where this new default sets place. Watch out sellers! Check your listings again, forced default hidden at bottom!

title: Terrible customer service and sellers
review: I have been on Depop since it started. My account has been nothing but 5 stars for selling and buying. However recently I have had the worst experience with buying and customer service on this app. I have been ripped off more than once by sellers that have been reported for scamming and yet they still have active accounts dispute their terrible reviews. Trying to contact Depop and get a person besides a automated response is like trying to find a needle in a hay stack. Depop has gone so far down hill I WOULD NOT recommend downloading it.
developerResponse:
{'id': 11445388, 'body': "Hey. We can imagine how frustrating this is. Try heading to 'settings - support - need help - buying - my purchase - I haven't received my item'.
 
Read more on that here: https://depophelp.zendesk.com/hc/en-gb/articles/360001772448-I-haven-t-received-my-item
 
If that doesn't seem to work, please get in touch by going to 'settings - support - need help - technical issues - I've still got an issue' and send a report.
 
We're here to help,
Team Depop", 'modified': '2019-10-24T11:00:32Z'}

title: just no 😀
review: I signed up like months ago to try to log in again and saying my phone number is a mobile phone number and it’s taken also said my account has the wrong password like I even made a Facebook account it doesn’t even work then what will I even do like I’m just trynna look nice also most sellers here are just really... seriously people depend on thrift stores and u take all of that away from them to see your “Y2K thrift shirts” that costs way more then it used to😃 then they post guys let’s help out people in need then stop thrifting stuff people need!
developerResponse:
{'id': 18097418, 'body': 'Hey, we’re sorry to hear this and we can imagine how frustrating this must be. Could you please submit a support request via this link http://bit.ly/depoplockedout
 Please remember to include your:
- Username
- Email address
- Phone number
- Phone operating system, example iOS 13
 
Let’s get this sorted,
Team Depop
', 'modified': '2020-09-25T10:41:38Z'}

title: terrible customer service
review: i sold an item on depop and tried multiple times to try to access the shipping label but depop continued to tell me my paypal account was not verified, even though it already was. i then proceeded to print out a shipping label via usps which cost me $5.70 since depop wouldn’t allow me too. later i contacted paypal and they helped me figure out how to fix the issue and after this, depop automatically charged me $9.50 for their shipping label and fees when i had already printed a shipping label from usps. i tried contacting depops customer service email and all they did was send me an automated message to try to find help from their help center. i looked and there was nothing that could help me here. all in all depop has awful customer service which caused me a lot of stress and the shipping process was very confusing to me. i have used other selling apps and have never had this problem.
developerResponse:
{'id': 17691624, 'body': "Hey, sorry about this.
 
If you can follow this link and submit a request if you're still struggling that would be great. https://depophelp.zendesk.com/hc/en-gb/articles/360046290994-I-can-t-access-my-shipping-label-USPS-MyHermes-
 
Team Depop
", 'modified': '2020-09-04T10:08:38Z'}

title: Draft changes
review: I love this app but I wish they would change it so that you can add multiple things on the draft or it would tell you before you added another one that you already have this item on there. It’s really frustrating to lose a paragraph you just wrote on an item
developerResponse: {'id': 11105856, 'body': "Hey. Thanks for the feedback. We love hearing about what we can do to improve Depop for our Community. When you succeed, we succeed. I'll be passing this along to our Product Team.\n\nTeam Depop", 'modified': '2019-10-07T17:00:02Z'}

title: What’s going on?
review: I have been kicked from my account and can’t contact anyone to fix this? I haven’t sold anything recently and all items have been confirmed shipped to my buyers so I haven’t been reported for anything. I have two items that I recently bought that I was trying to view shipping and then it completely kicked me out. When I try to login it says operation can no be completed. I would appreciate it if someone can get back to me..
developerResponse: {'id': 16718100, 'body': "Hey! The good news is we've fixed this bug, if you update to the latest version it should be resolved now. Team Depop", 'modified': '2020-07-18T19:51:05Z'}

title: DOPE BUY/SELL COMMUNITY
review: I really like all the people I either buy from or sell to, so far, I know others don't have as good of an experience but I honestly really like the app over others like grailed or poshmark because not everything is cluttered with information, Depop is pretty straight forward with searches and filters, I would 100% tell my friends about this app.
developerResponse: {'id': 10490167, 'body': "Yesss, that's what we like to hear. Thanks for sharing the love.\n\nTeam Depop", 'modified': '2019-09-03T09:13:37Z'}

title: Search should be better filtered
review: I just wish when I’m looking for something that the search was more filtered out, because if I’m looking for flip flops I don’t wanna see T-shirts, jeans, buttons, earrings too. It gets in the way of those who are actually selling flip flop. Takes up space. Other than that I like Depop. To me it’s one of a kind for a website.
developerResponse: {'id': 5522424, 'body': 'Thank you for the feedback, we do want to make sure to make our user experience as amazing as possible. Will pass this one on.\n\nLove, Depop', 'modified': '2018-10-16T10:55:47Z'}

title: Great for making extra $$, but needs fixing
review: I have acquired a decent amount of money from selling some of my stuff on this app. It’s super easy to buy and sell on Depop. I’d give it five stars but lately I haven’t been getting any Depop notifications (even though I have notifications on), which has affected my sales. This is really inconvenient and I’m not sure if this is just me or if it’s a common problem, but either way, that’s my only major problem.
developerResponse: {'id': 5824772, 'body': "Hi there, thank you for the feedback. Could you please pop over a report via our in-app support Settings > Need Help? > Technical Issues. We're currently looking more into this and want to get any feedback we can from it.\n\nLove, Depop", 'modified': '2018-11-06T10:14:33Z'}

title: Awesome
review: It’s up to you how awesome this app is. I don’t mind buying clothes that have already been worn and I find really cute and unique things for not too much money. I always negotiate and can get the price down depending on the seller and the sellers are all really nice. If you don’t mind second hand clothes and are looking for some unique things this app if perfect for you.
developerResponse: {'id': 4754298, 'body': "Thank you for the 5 stars! We really agree with your sentiment of 'it's up to you how awesome this app is' :) Team Depop", 'modified': '2018-08-21T15:37:01Z'}

title: Great concept, and the app has gotten better over time
review:
1.) Depop is great and I recommend it to people all the time
2.) Amazing algorithm for suggesting similar items. Not sure how that works but you guys nailed it
3.) Definitely a few bugs (for example I can no longer mark a package as shipped when I use a depop generated shipping label) and for some reason I can’t use the app without wifi
4.) !!!! THIS !!!! the #1 worst part about the app is how tedious it is to update every item in my shop one at a time (and make unnecessary edits to do so) in order to keep my page tidy and my sold items beneath my selling items, as most serious sellers do. Please for the love of god make sold items automatically go to the bottom of the shop

peace and love <3
developerResponse: {'id': 4374769, 'body': "Hey Madison! Thanks for this insightful review - just wanted to acknowledge your feedback and let you know that we'll definitely be bringing your comments up in conversation. Thanks again! Team Depop", 'modified': '2018-07-24T10:00:39Z'}

title: YAY
review: always great finds, original things that this app makes easy to access! wish you guys would add a feature that would notify buyers when a shop is no longer running because sometimes there’s really great finds but they were listed like 52 weeks ago and the seller isn’t even running the shop anymore.
developerResponse: {'id': 3268390, 'body': 'Yay! Thanks for this review - Team Depop', 'modified': '2018-04-26T09:50:47Z'}

title: Great Alternative
review: I’ve been using eBay for a while to try and sell things but often forget about the monthly sellers fee. With Depop it just takes it out automatically which helps big time. Also the messaging and commenting system is good as well. Never experienced anything bad with the app and honestly it’s really easy to use.
developerResponse: {'id': 2746680, 'body': 'Thanks for the review Delilah! Team Depop', 'modified': '2018-03-05T13:37:32Z'}

title: Safe & Easy
review: So I’ve been a seller & a buyer on Depop for 4 months now. It’s very easy to use. The posts to sell your item are nicely set up. Sometimes I wish there were more categories to list my stuff in but that’s no big deal. The only reason I didn’t give it 5 stars is because it crashes a lot when I’m using it too long lol and I have to search to get back to where I was. Love it otherwise !
developerResponse: {'id': 2865175, 'body': "Hey there! Thanks for leaving this review and we're glad to read that you're generally having a fun time. Please make sure you're on the latest version of the app (2.16.2) and let us know if you're still experiencing issues. Thanks! Team Depop", 'modified': '2018-03-19T12:09:07Z'}

title: Depoppp is great
review: Easy to navigate through! Sales are decently easy to make you have to put in some work but money doesn’t come easy always! PayPal will hold your money which I understand just wish they would give you the shipping fee so you can at least have enough to ship the item! Other than that it’s perfect❤️
developerResponse: {'id': 12746157, 'body': "Hey. Thanks for the feedback. We love hearing about what we can do to improve Depop for our Community. When you succeed, we succeed. I'll be passing this along to our Product Team.\n\nTeam Depop", 'modified': '2020-01-06T11:15:55Z'}

title: Where's my mf activity button????
review: Please fix the shipping review issue. Where if someone doesn't use the shipping label then you can't leave a review. Also with this update. So who forgot about the activity button?? I need to see these things. It's my best tool next to ISO. I get to see what my customers like and really BUY. This is certainly important to me. You guys are getting a pretty nice cut and I love how we're all creating jobs. 💕

title: A thing I don’t like..
review: Don’t get me wrong, depop is a good app for shopping but if you are a small business or a seller like me there is a few things that you may want to check. I got my first 2 orders the other day and I just got paid. I spend time and money on my earrings the ones that were in the orders were both about 9$ with shipping. Depop took most of my money as a fee. For both pairs, I got paid 6 bucks. Maybe not o great for a not so busy small business... :/
developerResponse:
{'id': 17910622, 'body': "Hey, thanks for the review. Our 10% fee allows us to keep Depop running smoothly. It contributes towards the cost of running the app, creating new features and improving our Community’s experience. 
 
See our article about fees by going to 'Settings - Need help' and typing in ‘What about fees’.
Team Depop
", 'modified': '2020-09-16T11:59:12Z'}

title: Depop takes all your money don’t use it
review: Don’t use this app. I sold two items for $9 and the seller chose “ship with depop” which took $4.50 off of my earnings. Then depop took off $.90 for absolutely no reason. I don’t have a printer so I can’t print  out the shipping label which means I’ll be in the red and actually losing money off of this sale. It’s no wonder people sell items for such ridiculous prices on this app. If you try to be affordable and emulate a real thrift store you get penalized by the outrages fees. I will be deleting my store and the app after I send out this item.
developerResponse:
{'id': 16267796, 'body': "Hey, thanks for the review. Our 10% fee allows us to keep Depop running smoothly. It contributes towards the cost of running the app, creating new features and improving our Community’s experience. 
 
See our article about fees by going to 'Settings - Need help' and typing in ‘What about fees’.
Team Depop
", 'modified': '2020-06-28T21:54:34Z'}

title: Scam
review: I tried to buy something off of this app and the total came out to $54. The seller ended up needing to send me a refund because of separate issues and she told me that I would lose some money because Depop took some for shipping. I ended up only getting $32 dollars back, meaning the app took over $20 dollars from me for shipping and I see no chance of getting it back. $20 for shipping is ridiculous and seems like a scam. I haven’t always had the best experience on this app and neither have my friends. So I no longer trust them or plan on buying or selling on this app again
developerResponse:
{'id': 16193750, 'body': "Hey, thanks for the review. Our 10% fee allows us to keep Depop running smoothly. It contributes towards the cost of running the app, creating new features and improving our Community’s experience. 
 
See our article about fees by going to 'Settings - Need help' and typing in ‘What about fees’.
Team Depop
", 'modified': '2020-06-24T12:10:34Z'}

title: Love this app but...
review: I adore this app and have bought multiple items on it but lately there have been a few pesky bugs. When you are searching for an item if you click on something a go out of it you are taken to the top of the search page. This makes it VERY annoying to search for items. Hope it can be fixed!
developerResponse:
{'id': 15395783, 'body': "Hey, sorry to hear about this! The good news is we've got a fix for this bug on the way. 
 
Stay tuned, 
Team Depop
", 'modified': '2020-05-18T15:13:29Z'}

title: fees
review: Depop is a great app to sell and buy stuff on and i’ve found a lot of stuff i like, but one thing that has made me mad is that they fee you 10% right off the bat after a sale, but then i get an automatic payment for $20 out of no where and it’s ridiculous. I just recently became a new seller about three days ago and they’ve feed me almost $60 ON TOP of the 10% fee for every sale i made. they’ve pretty much feed me $20 more per sale. it’s ridiculous.
developerResponse:
{'id': 14562149, 'body': "Hey, thanks for the review. Our 10% fee allows us to keep Depop running smoothly. It contributes towards the cost of running the app, creating new features and improving our Community’s experience. 

It sounds like you may have selected shipping labels for the transactions, if you don't need them we'll be happy to refund them.

See our article about fees by going to 'Settings - Need help' and typing in ‘What about fees’.
Team Depop
", 'modified': '2020-04-09T09:11:37Z'}

title: Meh
review: Love reselling vintage goods on here. However, the people who made it are biased AF. People like myself put a lot of time and effort into our shops only to go unnoticed half of the time. I’ve seen a lot of explore page worthy photos but apparently not worthy enough for the creators? 🤔 who knows. Just don’t beat yourself up when you don’t get a chance to be featured. It’s not your shop that’s the problem, it’s the people who made it or whoever the hell is in charge of picking and choosing.
developerResponse:
{'id': 14355982, 'body': 'Hey. We get it, this can be super frustrating. Rest assured, we’re always looking for ways to discover exciting new users. 

Have a read through our article ‘Suggested Sellers’ by going to ‘Settings - Need help’, for some tips on how to become a Suggested Seller.

Keep exploring,
Team Depop
', 'modified': '2020-03-31T08:49:17Z'}

title: Not glitchy after reinstalling
review:
Updated review: thank you for responding to my review with the offer of help. App is much better after reinstalling. To the developers, I have a few thoughts on improving the depop shopping experience: 

1. The ability to follow hashtags or set up alerts for certain keywords. 
2. Have the search page remember the spot you were at if you accidentally swipe backwards to the previous search inquiry. 
3. Broaden the “search by brand” feature. Right now there are very little brands to choose from. Switch it to user entered data to allow for obscure brands to be searchable. 

Thanks!

Original review: App is always quitting on me especially when I’ve scrolled really far into a search and lose my place. Needs more specific search perimeters too.

title: Love Depop But Where Is Recommended Items?
review: I love this app and have made purchases and has great experiences. However, on the discover page they seemed to have gotten rid of the sections with items recommended to you based on things you liked, which my favorite feature. Bring this back and you'd be back to five stars in my book!!! <3
developerResponse: {'id': 7936243, 'body': "Hey Emily, do not fret. This feature is still there. It's based upon a users activities. The more you like, save and so on, the feature can then read what you're digging at the moment and poof! It will appear again.\n\nLove, Depop", 'modified': '2019-03-27T17:33:08Z'}

title: I LOVE DEPOP!
review:
i love depop so much! i’m so addicted to the app, it’s crazy. i’ve bought over 200 items!! the prices are easy to find and the people selling the products are so awesome!! some will even make the price go down on an item. and when i pay, i know it’s safe. and if i have a problem with my payment, depop is there to help! 

recommended for anyone who LOVES to shop!!!!
developerResponse: {'id': 7055797, 'body': 'Olivia!!!! You have the best feedback and we love how crazy addicted you are to us. Sending you some good vibes from all of us at the Depop office.\n\nKisses, Depop', 'modified': '2019-01-29T03:53:55Z'}

title: Love it!!
review: I love depop!! It’s much better than Etsy if you’re a small business without the ability to run a website. There are a few features you can’t get because it’s an app, but that’s to be expected. I just wish that my feed wouldn’t change order every time a purchase is made. It gets so frustrating having to change things around constantly! 😩
developerResponse: {'id': 7177091, 'body': 'Hi there, we love you and thank you for your feedback. We will make sure to send feedback back to our team about this.\n\nLove, Depop', 'modified': '2019-02-06T09:44:26Z'}

title: Amazing
review: I have had depop for a over a year and absolutely love it. From buying to selling its all around class. The thing I wish they did was include shipping so it wouldn’t be so stressful for sellers and customers. What I mean by that, is that Depop already had shipping prices from place to place like Canada to the US instead of trying to Figure out what it costs for shipping.
developerResponse: {'id': 3876603, 'body': "Hey Brad, thanks for this review! When you say you wish we 'included shipping' - can you expand on this a little? We offer shipping labels in the app for our US users but we're keen to understand exactly what you mean here. Thanks! Team Depop", 'modified': '2018-06-18T10:57:06Z'}

title: I love Depop but...
review: I love this app but the only thing I’m hating is when I am shopping or browsing and I click on a seller picture. And I don’t want it so I go back, it starts me from all the way to the top instead of where I was. I don’t like that :/ because then I have to scroll down to where I was. And if I click on another picture or seller and go back. It will bring me back to the top agin. Depop can you please fix this problem? It is very frustrating.
developerResponse:
{'id': 15396257, 'body': "Hey, sorry to hear about this! The good news is we've got a fix for this bug on the way. 
 
Stay tuned, 
Team Depop
", 'modified': '2020-05-18T15:39:24Z'}

title: Scammers paradise
review: Recommended by Finishline. Created a profile, listed 4 items. App policy reads much like eBay, nothing off the app. Had interest within 20 mins, sending cellphone numbers asking me to call or text. Had one even send me a fake PayPal email to make it look like he had sent money for my item. I had a post removed for stating in my description that if you intended to ask me to go off app do not waste my time. Gateway to Instagram, sellers stating they do not sell on app to follow on Instagram for better deals and pricing. Deleted profile after 4 days. Complete waste of time.
developerResponse: {'id': 19487413, 'body': 'Hey. We moderate the app 24/7 to ensure scammers are kept away. If you notice anything suspicious, please report the item/user in-app (by clicking the 3 dots (...) top right of their profile/item) so we can investigate.\n\nTeam Depop', 'modified': '2020-12-02T10:04:51Z'}

title: Depop is fine for buying but not as good for selling
review: Great for buyers, although even with last two updates it crashes every time. As for sellers, depop shipping options are not a good deal. Arrange your own shipping. Plus I never offer the depop bundle deal because when I did that, they charged me shipping for each item separately, so I made like $2 total for a $30 bundle. It’s best to really communicate with buyers each step of the way. Be aware you are charged a depop fee and PayPal fee.

title: Login nightmare
review: For mysterious reasons, I get shut out whenever I try to log into Depop on my laptop. I tried again using a second email address, but no luck there either. I’m only able to order from my phone, which is an inferior method since the screen is so much smaller and it’s harder to see details on items. That’s the reason I buy from the site so infrequently. I can’t find a way to contact an administrator to fix the problem. You need to make it easier to correct problems
developerResponse: {'id': 8045539, 'body': "Hey Deb, that deifnitely sounds like a nightmare. Let's have a look into this. Please pop over a report via our in-app support Settings - Need Help? - Technical Issues and then we can get this sorted together. Keep us posted <3\n\nLove, Depop", 'modified': '2019-04-03T15:06:06Z'}

title: Great until now
review: This app has been amazing! I love everything about it, until recently. I was just looking over my bank statements and I noticed there were 4 payments to “depop LTD” which I had not made. It says it’s under the category “advertising”. I have no idea what this is and I’m not happy with that. It seems as though depop is trying to scam me...?
developerResponse: {'id': 7752487, 'body': 'Hi there, this can be easily cleared up. Payments taken from Depop LTD are the 10% of each sale you have made. Have a look at your sales recently and the amuont taken and this should clear up this issue. If you have any more questions about this, do reach out to the support team and they can get into further details about it.\n\nLove, Depop', 'modified': '2019-03-15T14:05:02Z'}

title: What happened to the “similar items” ??
review: Love this app, a big chunk of my wardrobe pieces were purchased on here. I very much enjoy the great finds for negotiable prices. What happened to the similar items portion? I really liked looking through it, sad that it’s gone again as it seems to get deleted and added back on every few updates

title: Meh
review:
There is an annoying bug they never fix that makes it look you you have a notification all the time and it won’t ever go away even when you open the app and see you have no notifications. 
I personally find the rest of the app kind of slow and rough feeling. I always have glitches with sending messages to people asking questions and it just seems to clunky to be as big as it is.
developerResponse: {'id': 4361718, 'body': "Hey there! Sorry to read about your experience. We'd encourage you to reach out to our support team (support@depop.com) so they can troubleshoot the issues you've written about. Team Depop", 'modified': '2018-07-23T17:24:09Z'}

title: Improvement
review:
The app has come a long way in the three years I have used it. 

Listing, selling, shipping and most importantly getting paid have all been streamlined allowing you to focus more on your customers needs while building your dynasty.

Love the new discount feature and the ability to have collections.

title: glitchy.
review: I have not ever written a review for an app. However, this is unacceptable. I have been a relatively successful seller and have been on the app for around two years. However, liking and following are glitched now and the entire app is buggy for me. the screen turns white when I attempt to edit my own posts. I can not like items, see comments, or click on other users names. I might have to stop selling out of pure frustration. It’s too bad because I loved it while it worked.

title: App vs browser
review: The app is slow to update and is dissimilar to Depop’s browser pages. It’d be nice if the design were more consistent across platforms and offered the same search options and functions. The app also has trouble updating frequently (at least mine does). When I get a notification I check it, but despite trying to refresh the page in the app the notification can remain there for over a week. Refresh doesn’t seem to work. Very frustrating.

title: meh
review: the app is cool, I buy art prints and stickers from small artists here. but there’s a huge problem with scammers and overpricing. you can’t just allow your sellers to sell $3 shirts for $45 plus $8 shipping. that’s ridiculous. also when you’re scrolling through the home page or if you search an item up it shows you items that have already been sold which I think is annoying. you should show items to me that I can’t buy. definitely needs a lot of work

title: Great but so buggy
review: Great sellers on this app but sometimes it is hard to use it since it seems like every time it updates something new breaks. Recently, the app will bring you back to the top of a search if you click on an item and try to go back and connecting your PayPal through preferences is impossible right now since most of the keyboard is off screen.
developerResponse:
{'id': 15396300, 'body': "Hey, sorry to hear about this! The good news is we've got a fix for this bug on the way. 
 
Stay tuned, 
Team Depop
 
", 'modified': '2020-05-18T15:41:42Z'}

title: New payment options needed
review: For this ever changing world, depop is a very progressive selling platform. However, PayPal is inconsistent and you cannot use depop with out a PayPal account. My paypal account has been limited for undisclosed reasons and I’m heartbroken at the loss. Please take on new payment methods some time soon or make your own payment system similar to Poshmark and Mercari.
developerResponse: {'id': 5421815, 'body': 'Thank you for the feedback that you send to us. This is always something we like to keep in mind. We will pass this on to our team.\n\nLove, Depop', 'modified': '2018-10-09T11:22:40Z'}

title: NO HELP
review: I bought an item about over a week ago that had still not been shipped, so I messaged the seller a friendly reminder that I have bought the item to which she ignored. So I decided I would ask Depop for help, I went to settings but the only thing they do is basically take you on a wild goose chase and have you bouncing back and forth from one help section to the next. I emailed Depop and no response. I direct messaged them on Twitter Instagram and on the app its self to which I haven't gotten a response for...all in all they don't help their customers. DONT USE IF YOU CARE ABOUT YOUR TIME AND MONEY.
developerResponse:
{'id': 10722683, 'body': "Hey. Sorry to hear your experience hasn't gone to plan. Please reach out to us by going to 'settings - support - need help - buying - my purchase - I haven't received my item' and select which item.

Read this article for more:  https://depophelp.zendesk.com/hc/en-gb/articles/360001772448-I-haven-t-received-my-item

We'll get this sorted,
Team Depop", 'modified': '2019-09-17T09:51:20Z'}

title: easy to use, start a business!
review: I’m so happy that this platform is available because it genuinely makes my life easier! I work from home and use this app from my PHONE until I can get a laptop.. it’s made life easier for me & there is no confusing parts about it ! Simple and fast way to get your business going.
developerResponse: {'id': 4978276, 'body': "That's great to hear! Hope your little empire is growing beautifully <3", 'modified': '2018-09-07T09:58:18Z'}

title: Terrible
review: I have been selling on this app for about 4 months, I was swing fine until a buyer claimed they did not receive their item.  I had shipped it out and when I saw that they were angry and upset I said I could refund it.  The buyer had taken things up with paypal, and a day later my entire account was deleted and I was told I would not be able to make another account.  I had many items posted up currently, over 100, and all my work is gone.  I also had pending purchases I cannot tend to.  I guess I’ll have to start up on another app.
developerResponse: {'id': 5275629, 'body': "Whoa, this doesn't sound right. We never remove an account unless rules have been persistently broken or if we deem it a risk to the community. \n\nCan you please pop over a report ASAP to support@depop.com mentioning your username and we can certainly look in to this and come up with a solution together. (also as an FYI any transactions will have had a receipt emailed to you, so you can keep these moving!)", 'modified': '2018-09-28T09:30:52Z'}

title: Best sell your clothing app
review: I love this app and its funny to me how addictive it is like social media. I don't have any complaints expect that it does glitch a lot, popping up deleted messages, very slow sometimes, and exists out on its own time to time, but i know the depop team is working on it so im not stressin, i like the aesthetic of the app even though red isnt really my color.

title: Don’t trust this App to protect you
review:
VERY poorly managed, and misleading. Depop’s claim that “All in app purchases are covered by Buyer Protection” means nothing except that if you use PayPal then you can try to get your money back THROUGH PAYPAL.  I’m still waiting to see if PayPal decides to believe I never received the product I bought. 

On top of this. There is NO WAY to leave a bad review of a seller to warn other users! You can only leave a review on an item purchased once it’s been received. Well... I never received my item so...

I’m lucky I learned my lesson pretty cheaply instead of on the expensive handbag I’d been eyeing 🙄

title: Cool...but...
review:
Been selling my stuff on here for a few months now, enjoying it but making bundles can be kinda irritating sometimes, people should be able to cart things.
Also there should be search notifications for keywords. Hate having to search certain things everyday when I’d love to be notified when new things become available
developerResponse: {'id': 2776007, 'body': "Hey Johnny - very valuable feedback for us and we really hope we'll have something in place regarding bundles for users this year. Watch this space! Team Depop", 'modified': '2018-03-08T10:43:05Z'}

title: Good but could use some improvements
review: I order things from depop all the time! I love it but I think the app could use some cleaning up and updating. A cleaner, faster app would definitely attract more buyers and sellers. I also wish there was a feature available to turn notifications on for specific sellers. So if I want to know when they post something, I get a notification. Thatd be great
developerResponse: {'id': 2590536, 'body': "Hey Horsehotty! Thanks for the review: we're always working to make the app faster for our users to give you a more seamless experience and we hope you'll notice these differences in the upcoming months. Thank you also for the feedback around specific-seller notifications. Best, Team Depop", 'modified': '2018-02-15T10:19:37Z'}

title: Good App, Ideas for Improvements
review: Love the app, great for selling and buying. one thing i would ask to add to the interface is the option to move your sold items down on the mobile version of the app. You can go on the website on a computer and move sold items down, and it would be great and easier to add that to mobile users :-)

title: disappointing
review: this app has gotten worse and worse. the sellers are the only good part of depop. the people behind the app itself are lazy and rude. they’ve all together stopped responding to customers/sellers when we have questions. really disappointed, and now anytime i buy from a seller, we do our best to NOT pay within the app to avoid giving depop any money from fees, they obviously don’t care about us so why should we care about them?? i honestly hope they just give up and we all can move to poshmark, who did it first and does it WAY better.
developerResponse: {'id': 19468703, 'body': "Hey, sorry to hear some sellers aren't responding to you, but there's always new items and sellers on Depop.\n\nTeam Depop", 'modified': '2020-12-01T15:27:06Z'}

title: The app been crashing all morning
review: I tried opening the existing app on my phone and it crashes. I deleted it and downloaded again and still. I turned off/on my phone and still. I go to my iPad pro and the app crashes there too. My only choice is to login thru safari. Can you please check this. I need to be notified of sales. I need the app on my phone and ipad
developerResponse: {'id': 16679276, 'body': "Hey! The good news is we've fixed this bug, if you update to the latest version it should be resolved now. Team Depop", 'modified': '2020-07-16T17:03:20Z'}

title: Never recommend this app
review: I would never recommend this app. I did my first purchase and it was a negative experience. The seller sent me an item that was not as described. And instead of the costumer services helping you with the issue, they want you to solve your problem through Paypal even though you didn’t pay with it. And PayPal never gets back to you. So I couldn’t get my refund. The costumer services could’ve just issued a refund or solved the problem. In my opinion, Poshmark and eBay are much safer! And Poshmark’s costumer services are great. I will never use this app!!!!

title: Great community & recycling pre-loved goods.
review: This app is one of my favorite selling apps. Out of all the apps I use, I love the community on Depop and the overall message of not shopping fast fashion, and recycling clothes. If you’re afraid, don’t be. Depop and PayPal are there for you in any situation. 😁 the only complaint I’d have it that the app can be slow and crash sometimes. Otherwise I love! 💕🌈✌️🥰🍒
developerResponse:
{'id': 11105334, 'body': 'Thanks for the rave review. We love hearing about how passionate you are.

Pro tip, if the crashing continues, please try removing cached data by going to ‘Settings - Apps - Depop - Storage - Clear Data’ on your phone. Then, completely delete and re-download the app.

Keep exploring,
Team Depop', 'modified': '2019-10-07T16:42:39Z'}

title: wouldn’t let me pay without paypal?
review: i just got my debit card, and i thought this app would be a great option to sell my old clothes and to buy things second hand. i found the item i was ready to purchase, and it had me choose between my card or paypal. i don’t have a paypal, so it had me pay with my debit card through a paypal guest account. i typed in all my information and then it went to a screen where i sign into paypal. this would be fine except it didn’t give me a chance to make a password, so how would i log in? so i try forgot my password and when it loads it says something like “we can’t confirm this is you”. so of course i try to sign up for paypal to see if it even went through, then it says “there is another account with this email” so it left me stuck in a loop that led me to deleting the app because i tried everything. unfortunate.
developerResponse: {'id': 13156089, 'body': "Hey. You should be able to make a one time account and log in to check out asa guest. This won't require you to input any more details, but will allow you to process the transaction and pay as you would a normal card transaction.\n\nTeam Depop", 'modified': '2020-01-28T09:54:25Z'}

review: Hi ok so this app is amazing. It has so many great pieces of clothing for all styles and I love just scrolling through them and seeing all the new things for sale. The only problem is that the app keeps logging me out and it won’t let me log back in or sign up again. It makes me so mad that I’m not able to look through all the people I follow and their new things. Other than that it’s a great app.
developerResponse:
{'id': 11912157, 'body': 'Hey. It might be because your password isn’t strong enough. When creating a new one, make sure you’re including all of the following:
 
- Capital letters
- Numbers
- Special characters (! . , @)
 
Let us know if that works,
Team Depop', 'modified': '2019-11-18T15:28:37Z'}

title: a couple of things
review:
i use this app a lot. i make a lot of money on selling and it’s great, by far my fav one to use ever. 

but a couple of smallish things from a sellers pov: 

the “ships in x days” thing needs work. i know last year i was on vacation for a couple of weeks and didn’t ship during that time, so now it says “ships in 5 days” which is super off. i ship same/next day unless it’s sunday. if y’all could make it where you gather shipment from an x amount of items/time and average based on that, it’d be better for us all. i think there are potential buyers turned off by the thought i won’t ship it right away. 

a thing that would be super cool is if we had the ability to search for already sold items. if a seller wants to reference something for a price idea or if buyers are curious what a good price to pay would be, have that ability would be awesome. i know ebay and etsy (maybe) has this ability

those two aren’t deal breakers, they’d just make it an even greater app than it already is! thanks :)) 

elgatomontes
developerResponse: {'id': 6299086, 'body': "Hey Stefan, thank you for the great feedback. That's some amazing points you're bringing up from a sellers POV. I will pass this down to our product team for review. Glad to have you with us.\n\nLove, Depop", 'modified': '2018-12-08T14:21:05Z'}

title: This app went downhill fast...
review:
The app was fine before the update. Not not only is it hard to search for items but its harder to sell. I barely get as many likes or sales than i did before. Spammers and drop shippers are usually at the top of the feed and the feed hasnt been refreshing. Not only that but customer service is non existent. If you have a problem then good luck bcz they wont help. Wouldn’t recommend atm.
    If they dont change things soon Depop will lose a lot of business...

title: Glitch after glitch after glitch
review: Ever since the update I can barely be on the app for THREE MINUTES without it either crashing or glitching. It’s very frustrating and makes it more difficult than it already is to buy/sell clothes on the app. “My DNA” was a terrible thing to include and just allows less exposure to the shops you follow and actually WANT to see. Depop is also not responding to any complaints and makes it obvious it doesn’t care about its users.
developerResponse:
{'id': 18528245, 'body': "Hey there,

We can imagine how frustrating this is and we’re currently working to resolve this issue. Please get in touch by going to 'Settings - Need help - Technical issues - I've still got an issue' and send us a report leaving your username and details regarding your listings. 
 
We’ll take it from here,
Team Depop
", 'modified': '2020-10-16T16:08:55Z'}

title: one thing
review: Hi, i love this app and all, but as a buyer, i keep the stuff i want in likes folders, and sometimes, a seller removes a listing, and the cover of that like folder disappears, and i can’t replace the cover image with something else. could you add an option to put a new cover image on my likes when that happens? because the cover image of the folder is now blank and it now feels empty.
developerResponse: {'id': 18327742, 'body': "Hey. Thanks for the feedback. We love hearing about what we can do to improve Depop for our Community. When you succeed, we succeed. We'll be passing this along to our Product Team. Team Depop\n", 'modified': '2020-10-07T13:28:51Z'}

title: I used to really like this app.
review: I’ve had Depop for quite some time now. I really loved its “for you” page that suggested things based on your likes. My most recent update removed that feature and now I have to search for things very directly. Aside form that setback, I have been trying to sell clothes on there for days. My PayPal has been verified, but it still will not let me access my shipping labels and I cannot mail anything out yet. I have sent multiple emails with no help or instructions to follow that I haven’t already tried 10 times.
developerResponse:
{'id': 17002089, 'body': "Hey, sorry about this.
 
If you can follow this link and submit a request if you're still struggling that would be great. https://depophelp.zendesk.com/hc/en-gb/articles/360046290994-I-can-t-access-my-shipping-label-USPS-MyHermes-
 
Team Depop
", 'modified': '2020-07-31T10:50:42Z'}

title: It’s an ok app..
review:
I like how the app looks like and I like the platform. It’s just they kept logging my account out and say “it’s an invalid account” when I sold and item to some buyer and they couldn’t contact me because of that. It happened to me a couple of times already and I hope it can be fixed.

Update: I tried to log back in/update my password by using my laptop and it showed “Could not reset password for that user” :/
developerResponse:
{'id': 15340168, 'body': "Hey, we’re sorry to hear this and we can imagine how frustrating this must be. Could you please email us at support@depop.com with the subject line saying 'Login Issues'. Please remember to include your:
- Username
- Email address
- Phone number
- Phone operating system, example iOS 13
 
Let’s get this sorted,
Team Depop
", 'modified': '2020-05-15T11:48:18Z'}

userName: Yo mama ugly as u know whut
title: ACTIVE SELLER REVIEW!!!
review:
I’ve been using depop for over a year now and I have a Love/Hate relationship with the app. Over time the interface has gotten far better and less buggy (good job development team). Other changes weren’t so good; like the increase of shipping fees and percentage based fee system. If you sell an item for $300 you will loose an unsettling portion of your profits to the middle man. If depop capped the max fee the app would run 30x smoother and everyone would be happy. 

My honest Feedback,

CØMPLY
developerResponse: {'id': 4361702, 'body': "Hey there! Could you let us know what you mean by 'tricky systems'? Thanks, Team Depop", 'modified': '2018-07-23T17:21:57Z'}

review:
I love this app, it’s slick and the layout is simple but effective! The only problem I have with it is when I get a notification the little red “1” seen from the home screen on the app doesn’t go away, no matter how many times I refresh the app or check if I missed anything.
Other than that though I love this app!

title: Not the best
review: I’ve been selling on multiple other platforms for 6 years and do very well. It is impossible to get your items seen on Depop unless you constantly list and relist which is a waste of time. I’ve never had a problem with my photos ( clear photos and on a mannequin) but Depop makes me feel like those are not acceptable. I made a few sales with my first account. My second account I haven’t had any luck so will probably be moving on. It would be nice if we could share items or if they were bumped when we lower the price.

title: It needs work
review:
Tracking should be updated by PayPal or at least let us edit the date. I forget to mark items as shipped sometimes and I tried putting in the correct date but won’t let me. Also the little bell on the left hand corner to show notifications sometimes won’t work to open the notification window on my iPhone 8

Really Depop, now you are forcing us to ship through you? 10% for you plus $7 shipping for something that would usually cost me $2 to ship? Plus I have to pay PayPal fees as well? I’m loosing money now. I’m done

title: Just... no.
review:
I really dislike how some sellers go inactive as soon as you buy something from them.
I had to report one person and while the staff was nice enough to give me a step by step on how to report it to PayPal and whatnot, It’s still upsetting that I got put in such a situation in the first place. Twice.
Now when I want to buy something, I message the seller to make sure that they are active..... Watch out for sellers who go inactive as soon as you buy something.
Double check their reviews and MESSAGE THEM DIRECTLY.

title: Easy to use
review: Super easy to use! But I like merc and posh better because they are cheaper and you can get more for you money on there. And I am really into vintage and brandy and thrift stuff and they have that exact stuff on here. So if you don’t want to spend much on used clothes I wouldn’t recommend. Hope this helps 🥰🦋✨
developerResponse:
{'id': 18576435, 'body': 'Hey Em,

Thank for the 5 star feedback, we love to see it!

Team Depop
', 'modified': '2020-10-19T16:29:17Z'}

title: Notifications are annoying
review: There is just a bug that they haven’t fixed where if there’s a notification on my app and and I go to check it, the notification on the app (the number over the app icon) does not remove. Its really annoying to my Homescreen, it’s not that big of a deal but i was hoping for this to be fixed thanks!

title: Notification feature
review: I use this app all the time and really love it. But one thing it needs is a feature where I can enable notifications for an account. I hate when i open the app and see that my favorite shop has posted clothing 2 hours ago and most of the stuff has already been bought!!! PLEASE add a turn on notifications feature PLEASE

title: I wish I could give less stars.
review: This is the worst shopping and selling app ever! You will barely make money since depop, shipping, and PayPal will take a huge percentage out! And there are no other options to use. People will scam you on depop and say they never bought something then paypal will charge you extra for the purchase not being “authorized”. I have lost way more money than I’ve made. Use Poshmark! Don’t use this app unless you want to lose money! So many people warned me before and I didn’t listen! Don’t use this app!!!
developerResponse:
{'id': 18485260, 'body': "Hey Lyla,

Thanks for the review. Our 10% fee allows us to keep Depop running smoothly. It contributes towards the cost of running the app, creating new features and improving our Community’s experience. 
See our article about fees by going to 'Settings - Need help' and typing in ‘What about fees’.

Team Depop

", 'modified': '2020-10-14T21:22:07Z'}

title: there are bugs
review: depop is a really great app that's easy to use but there are a few bugs that make it hard to function properly. For example, notification badges persist even after you have no notifications. Currently I am unable to mark an item as shipped because the button/option won't appear. I have been unable to leave reviews because the option didn't appear.

title: Good needs small improvement
review: I really enjoy the app, i feel like the layout is really easy to understand. The only thing, is being able to scroll through clothes, instead of having to pick an item the exit out to see others. It’s a small inconvenience but if you’re on the app a lot it would make it a lot better.

title: A perfect app
review: Major props to the team behind this app. I left a review in their app about a week ago with a few things I thought would make the app more user friendly. They replied to my review thanking me for my feedback. When I opened Depop today, my gripes were completely fixed. They really listen to their customers!

title: WONDERFUL
review: This all is wonderful just search up what you want and sometime it’s free shipping you can sell stuff,view stuff,search stuff and buy stuff you can create an account and you can choose your category or sort this app sometime has brand new stuff and used and some stuff are really cheap and good price.🤩😄
developerResponse: {'id': 14083059, 'body': 'We love to hear it.\n\nTeam Depop', 'modified': '2020-03-18T09:59:33Z'}

title: Okay but not worth it
review:
This app is good to sell things but there is wayyy too many downsides to not choose a different app.
1. Paypal holds the money and will literally not release it unless the buyer says okay- or you wait 21 days. Then if the buyer doesn’t like you or whatever the case they don’t wanna go the extra mile to get on a computer and release your money.
2. DEPOP TAKES YOUR MONEY OVER AND OVER FOR NO REASON OUT OF YOUR BANK ACCOUNT.
3. It’s like retry payment, overnight ? My whole account is shut down and it’s literally still taking money it’s ridiculous I didn’t even sell. You guys need money that bad?? No.
4. Anyways I DO NOT RECOMMEND. Too many downfalls there’s plenty of other apps to sell on! That are way better with less problems and money stealers! 
There’s the truth about depop
developerResponse: {'id': 15444128, 'body': "Hey, we're only authorised to ever take the Depop fee and we don't have direct authorisation to take payments directly from your bank, I'd suggest contact PayPal about this.\n\nTeam Depop", 'modified': '2020-05-20T11:33:49Z'}

title: Most obnoxious selling app
review: This app is ridiculous. Not only do you HAVE to connect to PayPal in order to exchange any transaction but there is a ridiculous “verification” process PayPal alone makes you go through. I’ve had 2 sales and I STILL haven’t received my payment even though the buyers both received their package. Both apps’ customer service is AWFUL. Only giving it the second star for the cool products you find. Still, it’s wayyyy too much trouble to sell anything. Go to Poshmark or eBay.
developerResponse:
{'id': 15396264, 'body': "Hey, our support response times are currently slightly longer due to the current pandemic, but we'll be in touch ASAP.
 
We're here for you,
Team Depop

", 'modified': '2020-05-18T15:39:43Z'}

title: I love Depop!!!
review: Such a great way to make side cash and discover new styles! I love thrifting but sometimes it’s hard to find great pieces Depop does the hard work for me when I don’t have time to go through an entire store to look for a specific clothing article/accessory. I personally love Depop it’s addicting and it’s fun! You can share your style and spread it to others :)

title: Bugs everywhere.
review: Absolutely loved this app until two weeks in nothing would load and my account was basically restarted. Nothing loads. Everything is bugged out. And when I can get items to load, I can’t see the pictures due to a big “oops. An error occurred.” Message across it.
developerResponse: {'id': 7654454, 'body': "Hey there, let's have a look into this. Please pop over a report via our in-app support Settings - Need Help? - Technical Issues and then we can get this sorted together. Keep us posted <3\n\nLove, Depop", 'modified': '2019-03-10T13:08:32Z'}

title: Unable to sign in
review: I usually sign in with my Facebook account and for some reason now I’m unable to. It tells me to put in my phone number and for some reason it takes me back to the login page. It doesn’t even let me know if the number is being used on a another account or not. I’ve also deleted and redownloaded it many times, and I have also unliked it and linked it back to my fb account. I have a friend that is selling clothes rn on here and I really wanted to check it out, but because of this problem I am unable to :/
