developerResponse: {'id': 7789122, 'body': "Hi there, let's get you back on track - please pop over a report via our in-app support Settings - Need Help? - Technical Issues and then we can get this sorted together. Keep us posted <3\n\nLove, Depop", 'modified': '2019-03-18T15:42:28Z'}

title: Anyone interested in buying art?
review: I just downloaded this app. It seems easy to list without paying monthly, and I’m really trying to start somewhere as an artist to sell my abstracts. They are done with watercolor markers, and acrylic paint. I’m usually drawing art in the size of 9x12, but I’ve recently started doing acrylic pours on canvas. Find my shop at “ToxicSerenade”.
developerResponse: {'id': 5137120, 'body': 'You know when Matisse said "Creativity takes courage"? That\'s what we love about our users. The courage to be themselves and empower their art. Post some stuff, enjoy the ride and go for it. \n\nLove, Depop', 'modified': '2018-09-20T10:35:11Z'}

title: HUGE SCAM
review:
DONT SELL ON THIS APP !!

this app is a huge scam the app itself takes about 10% of your earnings from each item because they need to make money and shipping but after you already paid for that and item is shipped EVERY single buyer complained about my item demanded an immediate refund and kept the items and were refunded the money out of my pay pal account without even being able to give myself a say about anything... So basically you will be paying people to take your clothes horrible app horrible experience 0 customer service

title: No Seller Accountability
review: I’ve used this app and thought it was great, until I very easily got scammed. I purchased a pair of shoes through the app using my credit card. The seller stopped responding and within the allotted time I contacted Depop through email, because that’s the only way they allow. They said I needed to take it up with PayPal. $185 and a month later still no refund, Depop accountability or seller accountability. Don’t think that if the seller has good reviews they don’t have other profiles with poor reviews either. Just be careful before you make a purchase.
developerResponse: {'id': 6905182, 'body': "Hi there, thank you for your feedback but sorry to hear about your experience. Every transaction made through the app is covered with PayPal and Depop even if it's via guest or Credit card. Can you let us know your username? We can reach out to the support team and see if they have been able to support you with this.\n\nLove, Depop", 'modified': '2019-01-18T15:39:07Z'}

title: Love Depop!
review: I love Depop! So many unique items, and so much opportunity to grow as a seller. The percentage that Depop takes from sales is much lower than other resale apps as well. My only criticism is that I wish it were possible to add items from different shops to a cart and check out all at once, similar to etsy’s checkout process. Overall awesome way to find treasures and make some extra cash!
developerResponse: {'id': 5723944, 'body': 'Much love for you and appreciation for your feedback. We do get how handy it would be to have an overview of items you want. Will be sending this feedback to our team and get them to think hard on this one.\n\nLove, Depop', 'modified': '2018-10-30T10:19:41Z'}

title: Depop is always on it!
review: Depop is always on it! Whenever scammers DM me on Depop asking me to email them outside of the Depop app, I email Depop right away. They usually email me back in only a few hours giving me an update that the scammer has been removed from the platform. I appreciate the quick service and dedication to keep users safe. Thanks, Depop!
developerResponse:
{'id': 17690724, 'body': "Hey, sorry about this.
 
If you can follow this link and submit a request if you're still struggling that would be great. https://depophelp.zendesk.com/hc/en-gb/articles/360046290994-I-can-t-access-my-shipping-label-USPS-MyHermes-
 
Team Depop
", 'modified': '2020-09-04T09:26:48Z'}

title: Very disappointed in how they handled harassment
review: I was the victim of a very dishonest and frankly rude seller. Nonetheless I purchased an item and left a 3 Star review. After reviewing the seller messaged me and attacked me for leaving a “bad” review. I reported him and then not only did depop respond by saying they would not take action against this seller, but they removed my review. I had loved this up until now but that kind of stuff is just messed up and I can no longer support an app that gives special treatment to big sellers over small buyers.

title: Not my size
review: I always put the sizes im looking for but recently when I do it’ll give me other sizes that I didn’t include. For example im a medium in shirts so I would only click M but as I scroll down some shirts are small or large... This just started to happen recently, I ONLY WANT TO BUY THINGS IN MY SIZE, not a size up or down just MY SIZE. can you please fix this bc it’s really frustrating seeing all these items, liking one only to find out its not in my size!!!
developerResponse: {'id': 4690926, 'body': "Hey there! This should now be fixed, so please make sure you're running the latest version of the app. If you're still experiencing the issue, you can report your issue via email (support@depop.com) or live chat: just report a technical issue through the app. Thanks! Team Depop", 'modified': '2018-08-16T15:55:23Z'}

title: Good app, just one thing
review:
Depop is such a good app! It’s like a thrift shop, but online and you can find anything you want. But one thing, just a small thing I don’t like is if you search something up and click on something and click out of it, it goes all the way back up.
Edit: It got fixed! Thank you Depop ❤️
developerResponse: {'id': 15444148, 'body': "Hey! The good news is we've fixed this bug, if you update to the latest version it should be resolved now.\n\nTeam Depop ", 'modified': '2020-05-20T11:34:52Z'}

title: Good
review: Great app- I’ve made quite a lot of money from clothes I’d otherwise have thrown away! One suggestion or new update I’d like to see is blocking certain users and their products from showing up on your page for abuse of tags. Quite irritating seeing things in the wrong category simply for “exposure”.

title: Toxic community
review: I love using depop as a place to sell/buy because I feel like it’s really efficient and easy to use, however I’ve noticed throughout the past year that it has become a really toxic place. People really spread negativity like no other on this app and it has really gotten to me recently. As a consequence of its recent popularity, it’s no longer a place where you can simply sell an item; there is an entire community behind it. And the community that I’ve experienced is not the best.
developerResponse:
{'id': 16718764, 'body': "
Hey. Thanks for the feedback. We love hearing about what we can do to improve Depop for our Community. When you succeed, we succeed. We'll be passing this along to our Product Team.

Team Depop
", 'modified': '2020-07-18T20:45:17Z'}

title: improving?
review: I’ve had Depop for a while now and I’ve never had a problem w the app itself but recently, before and after the more recent update, the application just doesn’t open anymore? Not even a second after somewhat displaying the login, it closes. I thought deleting and redownloading would help but it had the same outcome :/
developerResponse: {'id': 16570741, 'body': "Hey! The good news is we've fixed this bug, if you update to the latest version it should be resolved now. Team Depop", 'modified': '2020-07-12T20:17:37Z'}

title: Can’t sign in.
review: I used to use this app a lot but a little while ago I got signed out and I haven’t been able to sign back in ever since. I keep trying to add my number or email and they say they send me something but they never do. I’d like to use the app again but it seems like that won’t happen. Very lame. 👎🏻
developerResponse:
{'id': 15444357, 'body': "Hey, we’re sorry to hear this and we can imagine how frustrating this must be. Could you please submit a support request via this link https://depophelp.zendesk.com/hc/en-gb/articles/360001904568-I-m-locked-out-of-my-account'. Please remember to include your:
- Username
- Email address
- Phone number
- Phone operating system, example iOS 13
 
Let’s get this sorted,
Team Depop
", 'modified': '2020-05-20T11:43:06Z'}

title: Be careful
review: Depop used to be a great place to find unique and quality items at a fair price, however, with the amount of scammers and drop-shippers on the app you need to be very careful about what you’re buying. For those that don’t know, drop-shipping is when a person buys poorly made knockoff clothes from sites like aliexpress for cheap and sells them at an inflated price and markets them as the real thing. If you know you have a reliable seller, depop is fantastic.
developerResponse:
{'id': 14488543, 'body': "Hey Josie,

In an effort to keep Depop a creative marketplace with quality products we regularly remove items that break our terms of service, if you can flag any users to use that you think are dropshipping we'd really appreciate it.

Stay safe, stay at home, stay you,
Team Depop
", 'modified': '2020-04-06T12:19:56Z'}

title: Best Online Store For Vintage & Unique
review: I love Depop for unique pieces and vintage finds. Buying online is always a gamble, but I’ve been 100% satisfied with all of my purchases so far! You have to really search and scroll to find what you’re looking for, but the hunt is half the fun and occasionally you’ll stumble across awesome finds you weren’t even looking for.

title: Not the app’s fault but it doesn’t help
review:
I bought an item with PayPal guest. Item has not been shipped in a month and no reply from seller. I’vemade a Paypal account since and connected it to depop, but the purchase still won’t transfer to PayPal, and I can’t dispute it to get a refund.

I have tried submitting this through help, and get met with a never ending loading screen when I hit send. Gotta say how irritating this situation is, and I don’t even know what to do.
developerResponse:
{'id': 11169110, 'body': "Hey. We can imagine how frustrating this is. Try heading to 'settings - support - need help - buying - my purchase - I haven't received my item'.
 
Read more on that here: https://depophelp.zendesk.com/hc/en-gb/articles/360001772448-I-haven-t-received-my-item
 
If that doesn't seem to work, please get in touch by going to 'settings - support - need help - technical issues - I've still got an issue' and send a report.
 
We're here to help,
Team Depop
", 'modified': '2019-10-10T11:04:58Z'}

title: Great App!
review: This app is awesome, depop is always working hard to improve both the buyer and seller experience! Most of my time spent on depop is selling, and it is quick and easy to list items. I am very fond of the layout, very similar to Instagram. If you are into selling or buying used/vintage clothes depop is the best website to use hands down.

title: Hidden fees
review: I’ve been selling with Depop for a couple years and have had mostly good experiences. I recently sold a pair of boots for $70, but only $67 was credited to my PayPal account. I transferred the $67 to my bank account and the following day Depop took $17 out of my account. I’m assuming that’s the $10 shipping and their $7 commission. So out of $70, I actually only walked away with $50. Between their shipping and hidden fees, I lost $20 on that sale. I more than likely won’t be selling on Depop again. They don’t offer enough transparency with their fees.

title: Over zealous profile policing
review:
As a seller on Depop, I have had a tough time. I work hard to make my profile my own and to supply the demands of my lovely buyers.

Depop has been removing a lot of my items lately, some for being replicas (which is what the clearly stated in the item description and friendly on the Depop demographic budget) and some for unknown reasons. 

Depop also picks the saaaame shops to highlight on the search page with the same goodwill sweaters from the 80s. Annoying for a hardworking seller that would love a little exposure. 

I do like the shipping option tiers and that the money goes directly to my PayPal and I don’t have to wait. Other than that, Poshmark is the better platform for sellers in my opinion.

Poshmark has a pickier buyer but a bit older with jobs and money to spend. I have also experienced wayyyy less policing of my profile. 
 
Depop needs a new de-pep in its policies.
developerResponse: {'id': 6268922, 'body': 'Hi there, thank you for your feedback. We understand that things can be frustrating but unfortunately we like to keep our platform counterfeit free as it is safer for our users and abide by general brand regulations.\n\nLove, Depop', 'modified': '2018-12-06T09:29:34Z'}

title: Innovative idea but the app itself is buggy
review: The app is very buggy despite constant updates to the app. It constantly shows the purchased icon, even though no one has purchased a listing. It also says purchased after I edit some items once I press save. I’ve had to delete listing multiple times because of this bug. The developers should do some more testing or Depop should consider UAT and regression testing.
developerResponse: {'id': 6141886, 'body': 'Hi there, thank you for your honest feedback. We really do appreciate hearing from from our users as we want to make sure to increase our users experience. Will pass this on to our team.\n\nLove, Depop', 'modified': '2018-11-28T09:43:39Z'}

title: Depop is a pretty cool app
review:
Depop is great! You can make custom pics and post as many things as you want without any seller fees. It’s a great app with tons of creative and like-able people on it, you can make you’re cute own little shop too! I love this app so far although I do have a few helpful suggestions

•make an in app feature to customize photos

•make it to where you can see recently sold items and the history of how certain items have sold so we can see the price people like it at!

•make it to where each shop can have its own customizable back ground!

That’s about all from me, have a great day!!

title: Great app
review:
The app overall is great but here are some suggestions 

1. Being able to send pictures through messages it just makes things easier when people ask for more pictures 

2. The ability to group saves just like likes. Personally I prefer saving over likes because I don’t like spamming people’s notifications if I like more that one thing

3. The ability to turn off if people can see how active you are on depop. Personally I don’t like people see how often I use an app (which is why I turn it off for Instagram) it’s just a privacy thing 

4. Button to make offers I just thought that would be a cool idea since I’ve seen other apps do it
developerResponse:
{'id': 17418891, 'body': "Hey, we can imagine how frustrating this is and we’re currently working to resolve this issue. Please get in touch by going to 'Settings - Need help - Technical issues - I've still got an issue' and send us a report leaving your username and details regarding your listings. 
 
We’ll take it from here,
Team Depop
", 'modified': '2020-08-21T12:10:02Z'}

title: Near imposible to connect buyers and sellers with spam tagging
review: The app itself is intuitive and easy to use. Where it fails is in it algorithms. Spam tagging(especially from jewelry sellers), fills up the search results for near everything I search. Actual relevant items are buried deep in search or just won’t come up. Depop also does not prioritize recent listings. I’ve listed an item and searched for it right after and not been able to find it. Please, fix this depop.
developerResponse: {'id': 19351437, 'body': "Hey. As we speak, we're working on some exciting new updates that will prioritise accurately described items, not those with irrelevant tags. It's something we're constantly developing changes around. Highlighting the items our community want to see is a top priority. \n\nTeam Depop", 'modified': '2020-11-25T17:30:03Z'}

title: Online Thrifting
review: it’s bomb if you know where to look, it’s pretty much thrifted clothes online And obviously I know thrifted clothes are cheaper but it’s good quality clothes and you get to communicate with the seller about anything that may be wrong with the product! You can even haggle prices and try to get the best deal for yourself!

title: update: changed/updated the bug! thank u!!
review:
i can’t see any of my sales/labels/messages!!!!
i also can’t log in. i changed my password and everything is right but it doesn’t let me log in. it says “operation could not be completed” and i even tried deleting and re-downloading the app and NOTHING!!! PLS FIX!!!
developerResponse: {'id': 16719378, 'body': "Hey! The good news is we've fixed this bug, if you update to the latest version it should be resolved now. Team Depop\n", 'modified': '2020-07-18T22:44:25Z'}

title: Great! but bundles are an issue
review: It would be nice if there was a way for sellers to get their bundles to their buyers without it showing up on everyone’s feed. Especially because the items you get to see are limited, it would be better to only see items available to everyone.
developerResponse: {'id': 3052875, 'body': 'Very interesting feedback, thank you! Team Depop', 'modified': '2018-04-06T15:18:03Z'}

title: New Update ?
review: I love this app and I've been using it for a few months now but with the recent update; the app has become annoying. When scrolling down and clicking on an item it used to keep your place when you'd click the back button. Now, you can be halfway through looking over items and it sends you back to the top which makes it harder to find items. It may seem like a small complaint but when a keyword is commonly used it makes it annoying.

title: Problem with Filters
review: I love the concept of this app and the adorable variety of shops on it, but I swear filtering the sizes never works. I click on the option to filter search results to my sizes, but I am constantly getting sizes WAY out of my range. I am an XL and I'm always getting products specifically marked as sizes that are way off, like small. This definitely needs to get fixed.
developerResponse:
{'id': 15249490, 'body': "Hey, we can imagine how frustrating this is. Please get in touch by going to 'Settings - Need help - Technical issues - I've still got an issue' and send us a report.

We’ll take it from here,
Team Depop
", 'modified': '2020-05-11T19:32:23Z'}

title: Horrible just horrible
review: This app is Awful . I tried to purchase an item from someone using my credit card and every time I put in the details it said credit card denied try another card. The one time it works the guy refunds my money claiming there was a problem with his PayPal. At the end of the day, I wasted plenty of of my time trying to buy something when I was never able to get it cause of the apps problems. PayPal shouldn’t be the only way to purchase things. It’s annoying and needs to be fixed ASAP.

title: Missing one thing
review: As a buyer, this app is amazing. However, I have one feature that would make it 1000% better: being able to block certain results from your search results. I’m into specific fashion styles and brands, and it’s very difficult to search for those things with sellers that spam every tag that comes to mind.

title: Dropshipping from China
review: About 80% of the app is sellers dropshipping from China. You can find the exact same items on AliExpress for much cheaper. This is not sustainable fashion and is a scam to Depop users, especially when sellers advertise these items as “handmade with care in China.” Then the other 15% of sellers are spammers that use every tag they can think of to get more exposure, which is annoying as hell when you search for a name brand, only to have your search feed filled with fakes or irrelevant items. Only 5% of sellers are genuinely just selling their closet or thrifted goods.

title: Great App But Some Problems
review:
I love selling and buying on depop but my only (current) problem is that it sometimes takes forever to load. My phone is updated and has a good connection to WiFi plus I’ve deleted and re-downloaded the app so I’m pretty sure the problem’s not from my end.

Also if we could change our usernames that would be great.

title: Depop Rocks.
review: I thrift all the time and buy tons of clothes, so it's so awesome to have a place to sell the ones I don't wear, or can't fit in my closet. Such a fun way to make some money! I think I spend more on Depop than I make on Depop though!! Depop is fantastic and I've never had an issue with a seller than Depop won't handle. Awesome place to buy and sell. 10/10.

Crashing. Still. Very. Consistent. 
Please fix!! In one day of using depop app, the app has crashed 3 times! And it is very concerning because my phone’s screen goes black and I have to dismiss the app then reopen it. Also, can there be some kind of screen saving aspect? When I scroll through a search for a while, then go to home screen, then return to the app, the app goes back to home. I would like to return to where I was browsing...

I’m not sure what taking depop so long to make a decent app.
developerResponse: {'id': 1186385, 'body': "Hey, thanks for the review and feedback. Sorry to hear about the crashes you've been experiencing. Our developers have worked on a fix for our next release v2.3 that has stopped a number of crashes that match what you have described. If you still experience the crashes after v2.3 please get in touch at productfeedback@depop.com with more information. Thanks, Team Depop", 'modified': '2017-09-05T12:53:59Z'}

title: Not being able to log in
review: So I wanted to get in my account as usual and I connected with Facebook so all I have to do is press continue with Facebook button click continue and I would be in my account, but I’m doing that now and it’s literally not working it at all Idk what to do to log in help
developerResponse:
{'id': 18549050, 'body': 'Hey there,

We’re sorry to hear this and we can imagine how frustrating this must be. Could you please submit a support request via this link http://bit.ly/depoplockedout
 Please remember to include your:
- Username
- Email address
- Phone number
- Phone operating system, example iOS 13
 
Let’s get this sorted,
Team Depop
', 'modified': '2020-10-18T18:02:00Z'}

title: Very glitchey
review: I have used this app for a couple years now. I have never experienced loading problems like I do know though. I am unable to view profiles without the “error does not exist” notification popping up and I can barley load my feed. I can only access the app for a couple minutes at a time because it refuses to load anything after awhile. I hope this gets fixed. The app itself is great, but what good does that do if you can’t get into it?

title: I used to love it
review: I made some sales I loved posting and creating my orders, but then randomly Depop logged me out of my account and it says I’m suspended for no reason at all, all i did was try and get into my account. I tried clicking forgot password but it just said error.  I try and make new accounts, but it still continues to do the same thing. I am very frustrated because customer service is not even helping me. I loved this app so much I really hope they see this and help me
developerResponse:
{'id': 19488359, 'body': 'Hey, we’re sorry to hear this and we can imagine how frustrating this must be. Could you please submit a support request via this link http://bit.ly/depoplockedout
 Please remember to include your:
- Username
- Email address
- Phone number
- Phone operating system, example iOS 13
 
Let’s get this sorted,
Team Depop', 'modified': '2020-12-02T10:32:33Z'}

title: perfect
review: it is super easy to use and much better than sites like etsy or ebay because it’s kind of like social media and not complicated whatsoever. i have an earring shop and have just made my first sale, super simple to ship because depop gives you the label and paying for shipping isn’t complicated at all. the only complaint i have is the notification area, it’s just kind of annoying having it where it is instead of like where instagram has it. it barely matters though, totally not a big deal. overall an awesome app and a super easy way to get some cute items or to make quick money.
developerResponse: {'id': 16441558, 'body': "We're glad you love Depop as much as we do.\n\nTeam Depop", 'modified': '2020-07-06T17:56:42Z'}

title: Not user friendly
review: My teen daughter has been using this app for a few weeks and has had difficulty navigating the payments portion, in particular PayPal and printing shipping labels. Apparently you need a PayPal account linked to a bank account—unlike Poshmark—which throws a wrench into a kid’s plans to learn about commerce. Customer support has not been that helpful. Now she’s getting threats from other users about “criminal charges” because her shipments are delayed or she has to refund them. Maybe make this app more teen friendly or for adults only. She’s just a kid! Not cool.
developerResponse:
{'id': 17285110, 'body': 'Hey. Thanks for sharing your feedback. PayPal is our payment provider, which ensures that buying and selling are protected in-app. Good news though, we’re currently looking at alternative payment methods. 

See our article ‘Why do I need PayPal?’ by going to ‘Settings - Need help’ in-app.

With regards to the interactions with other users we moderate the platform 24/7 to ensure our users are safe from abuse. If you can report any accounts that are sending abusive messages we’d really appreciate it!

Thanks,
Team Depop
', 'modified': '2020-08-14T13:05:55Z'}

title: Bugs
review: I have had depop for about a year now and i really like the app but i’m having some difficulties because out of no where i can’t get control of my messages and it only says “Load More” but never shows and when i try to message it says “Oops something went wrong!” and i’ve updated and re-downloaded the app and still nothing
developerResponse:
{'id': 16718835, 'body': "Hey, we can imagine how frustrating this is. Please get in touch by going to 'Settings - Need help - Technical issues - I've still got an issue' and send us a report.
 
We’ll take it from here,
Team Depop
", 'modified': '2020-07-18T20:52:43Z'}

title: Depop is fun and beyond easy.
review:
I’ve used many reselling apps in my time and I have to say that Depop has the most versatile and compassionate members. 
I love using it and seeing what new is posted under my favorite brands.
I have absolutely zero complaints. Paying is easy and browsing is even easier.
Recommend out of ANY reselling app in the market.

title: App keeps crashing
review: I love the app! It’s just that I updated it yesterday and now today it keeps crashing... I’ve tried restarting my phone and that didn’t work and then I deleted the app entirely off my phone then re-download it and that still didn’t work. I hope they fix the bug on this because this is my go to app for shopping on ;-;
developerResponse:
{'id': 15249252, 'body': 'Hey, we had some temporary outage but it should be fixed now, so you get back to Depoping.
 
Keep exploring,
Team Depop
', 'modified': '2020-05-11T19:17:58Z'}

title: Very useful
review: This app is great for finding cute second hand items. Each seller has their own little shop so you’re not buying through like a bigger system, it’s shipped from the seller directly to you. It’s cute and easy to use. I recommend this app if you’re looking for cheap clothes and accessories!
developerResponse: {'id': 5794360, 'body': 'We love looking cute for you guys.\n\nDepop', 'modified': '2018-11-04T12:32:08Z'}

title: Depop oversite
review:
I have submitted a request over 3 times now with no response. I NEED HELP RESETTING MY PASSWORD. The password reset link does not send out an email and there is no way to troubleshoot password recovery. There is no direct contact for Depop no phone or email address which is very frustrating and really elementary. If you are going to have a business/app you should have AT LEAST a contact phone number or email. At this point I couldn't even cancel my account if I wanted to. VERY FRUSTRATING!

...I emailed support email 3 times already in addition to two messages to NY and LA.
developerResponse:
{'id': 9827019, 'body': "Hey there! Sorry to hear your experience hasn't been going to well. If you email us at support@depop.com with your username and email address we can help you reset your password. 

Also remember to use a laptop/desktop computer to reset your password and not your phone.

Let's get you back on the app,
Team Depop", 'modified': '2019-07-24T13:24:17Z'}

title: Recommendation to better protect buyers
review:
If complaints are filed against a seller, either allow us to leave a review (overriding the “package has not been sent” stipulation bc there is proof of purchase in app) 
Or
Make visible the number and/or short summary of legitimate complaints filed against a user (ex. No communication, did not send product, did not send product for months, would not refund me money). 
This will not only inform buyers but deter sellers from bad behavior and being able to get away with what some of them do.
developerResponse: {'id': 7937188, 'body': "We're here! Let's have a look what went wrong with this little mishap. Can you please send us your username? We want to reach out to the support team and see what the issue has been.\n\nLove, Depop", 'modified': '2019-03-27T19:02:07Z'}

title: Favorite app for buying clothes
review: I love this app, I’ve had it for about 2 years and it’s come so far since ! I just feel that it’s missing one thing to make it perfect. I want to be able to turn on post notifications!! I always miss when my favorite sellers post and everything gets sold out so quickly!! Other than that,the app is great! Thank you :)
developerResponse: {'id': 6290060, 'body': 'Nooo,...thank youuu! Love having you with us.\n\nDepop', 'modified': '2018-12-07T14:12:24Z'}

title: Tailored to the sellers
review: I’ve experienced Depop from a seller perspective and rarely buy items. Not for any reason, I just bought the app to sell. I really appreciate the fact that Depop, unlike Poshmark, is more favorable towards the seller. You receive your money as soon as the buyer clicks buy. Whereas On Poshmark, you don’t receive payment until the buyer gets the package and “accepts the item” online.
developerResponse: {'id': 5824852, 'body': 'Thanks for the love Samaria.\n\nDepop', 'modified': '2018-11-06T10:17:41Z'}

title: EXCELLENT app for vintage sellers!
review:
Where to begin...
1.) this app is super easy to navigate/use (as a seller) very user friendly. 
2.) If you have any issues/questions, their team gets back to you very fast with a solution!
3.) Huuuuuuuuge community on depop. It is very easy to navigate/narrow down your search to find the EXACT thing you’re looking for.

title: Fave App
review: I really love this app. You can find such unique things, often at really good prices. The best part is how it’s individuals and not a big company selling the items, so you can contact people more directly (though I do wish the messaging system was better) and usually get nice little notes with your packages. Love love love!
developerResponse: {'id': 4374155, 'body': 'Thank you, we love our community too! Team Depop', 'modified': '2018-07-24T09:39:05Z'}

title: Great, but a few suggestions....
review: Love this app but maybe add a shop low to high option? I love to look at stuff but if there are 500 results I prefer to look by price. Also, maybe make it easier to post ISO’s? I wanted to post one awhile back to look for a specific item but it was so tailored to selling items that it was near impossible. Other than that, love the app!
developerResponse: {'id': 4753722, 'body': "Hey Sydney - thank you for sharing your thoughts with us. We'll be sure to bring this up with the right people here! Thanks - Team Depop", 'modified': '2018-08-21T14:52:16Z'}

title: Love it but I wish...
review: This app has been great for me as a seller. It’s been a great platform for people to discover my brand. The only thing I wish is for you to be able to upload video from your library. Idk if there’s a particular reason this option is disabled but it would be amazing if it wasn’t!!! Thanks Depop!!
developerResponse: {'id': 3339497, 'body': "Hey! Thanks for your feedback on the new video feature. This is going to keep improving throughout the course of the year, and whilst we can't promise we'll include the ability to upload from your library, we'll definitely take this into account. Thanks again! Team Depop", 'modified': '2018-05-03T08:55:46Z'}

title: Location Bug
review: I enjoy this app but recently there have been some bugs and a major one is that I can no longer post listings because it doesn’t allow me to search a location. My location services are on when I use the app and I’ve tried various ways to fix it but none have worked. Kind of disappointed because I can’t post anything anymore. Please fix this issue!
developerResponse: {'id': 3878264, 'body': "Hey there! This was an issue with Apple's location services on Friday that has now been fixed. Thanks, Team Depop", 'modified': '2018-06-18T12:57:35Z'}

title: The app is very aesthetic and well-made
review: I began my Depop experience about a month or two ago and I've already sold about three pieces but it did take a long time and I noticed that on the explorer page a lot of really really big accounts get on there but not smaller ones it's like mine. I enjoy the people and the overall aesthetic of the app, it's a very organized and helpful app!

title: A little annoying
review:
If you are using Depop, you better have a following on Instagram, otherwise, selling your stuff on here is like selling used sneakers in Foot Locker. 

Also, their explore page is annoying. They only display their top 10 favorites, which makes it harder for accounts like me to get any customers, with can cause people to sell else like EBay, where you can sell the item a lot easier.

title: updated
review:
App worked just fine until the recent update. It immediately stopped showing my messages and receipts and then kicked me out of the app. It won’t let me log in now but I can log in on my browser.

Update: app is back in order, it’s a good app and I will continue to use it
developerResponse: {'id': 16719144, 'body': "Hey! The good news is we've fixed this bug, if you update to the latest version it should be resolved now. Team Depop", 'modified': '2020-07-18T21:46:32Z'}

title: “All Photos” drop down Issue
review: Still having this problem after the update. I have to manually scroll through my recent 5,000+ photos just to pick the one I need. The “all photos” drop down tab isn’t responding. It freezes and won’t allowing me to scroll anywhere or show any picture albums that I have. I have to re-click the “All Photos” tab to Unfreeze the screen. I can send you a screenshot video to show you what I’m talking about. Not just talking nonsense. I’m sadly shift sales to poshmark & mercari because of this. 😢

title: Good with small issues
review: The app is good but sometimes it’s hard to find quality sellers that actually match your interests. The for you section also doesn’t really have anything that I like, having very basic choices. I also used to be able to click the filter button and have all of my sizes instantly applied, but now I have to manually select my sizes when filtering for clothes.

title: The best!!
review:
I’ve been on depop for some yrs, but started selling last year,It has been the best selling platform,  If I have any issues I email them, and within 24 hrs or maybe less I get a response AMAZING!! The only thing I’m waiting is to be featured in the explore page 😁 
Otherwise it’s a great APP! y’all want to shop my store it’s GlammCStyle 💖

title: great app!
review: great app, but it’s superrrr glitchy. like if I click the back button too quickly the app will freeze. when I try to leave a review of an item I bought, I automatically get logged out and can’t log back in. I love the app a lot and have gained super cute items from it, but the constant glitching is a little inconvenient when I’m tryna get my shop on😳.
developerResponse: {'id': 16719291, 'body': "Hey! The good news is we've fixed this bug, if you update to the latest version it should be resolved now. Team Depop", 'modified': '2020-07-18T22:18:13Z'}

title: best online thrift store
review: this is by far one of the best online thrift stores, if not one of the best online stores for mobile. the UI is pretty seamless and quick to pick up, the system recognizes what you like and finds an amazing variety, and everything is super intuitive and easy in general. highly recommend.

title: annoying hovering filter button
review: I find it very annoying when the filter button pops in and out from the bottom as I'm scrolling thru a search. I definitely prefer the filter button to be on the right top side of the screen, even if that means I can't access the cart from the list view. Other than that, great app. Thanks!
developerResponse: {'id': 11168847, 'body': "Hey. Thanks for the feedback. We love hearing about what we can do to improve Depop for our Community. When you succeed, we succeed. I'll be passing this along to our Product Team.\n\nTeam Depop", 'modified': '2019-10-10T10:48:15Z'}

title: Stop adding filters
review: I notice people keep adding VSCO filters to their clothing to make it look better but it also changes the colors of the item. Can you make it a rule that they cant modify their photos? I understand upping the saturation to make it match the object but people are actually using Instagram filters lol
developerResponse: {'id': 6976313, 'body': "Hey Jimmy, thank you for taking the time to give us some feedback. We completely understand where you are coming from. I'll make sure to pass this on to the team for you.\n\nLove, Depop", 'modified': '2019-01-23T12:22:51Z'}

title: They banned me
review: I’ve had an account for close to seven months and I’ve had nothing but five stars and supposedly they closed my account for “A counterfeit item” but they had no proof The least they could’ve done is take it down and gave me a warning but they instantly banned me and I think it’s pretty ridiculous since I’ve never done anything wrong. I even emailed them and asked if I could just make a new account and start over and have yet to even get a reply back it’s ridiculous because I buy all my close on this app!!! Smh
developerResponse: {'id': 7216411, 'body': 'Hi Jode, can you let us know your username? We can get in touch with the support team and see how we can help you out with this. Should this be a misunderstanding, please send us proof of authenticity and we will get right on it.\n\nLove, Depop', 'modified': '2019-02-09T04:56:35Z'}

title: Thrifting online
review: This is like upgraded thrifting from the comfort of your home. It’s all high quality stuff. You can message people about how clothes are washed and other important things before making any orders which I love. Over all I think this app was a fantastic idea and I’ll continue to use it for YEARS to come. G’bless
developerResponse: {'id': 5903953, 'body': 'Can we make it into decades? Get comfy on your couch and ride that winter wave while doing some shopping. \n\nLove, Depop', 'modified': '2018-11-12T10:21:54Z'}

title: Zero waste wardrobe heaven
review: If you’re the type of person who doesn’t need brand new items, then Depop is for you. It’s also great way to sell your own items, or re-pop when you’re done! I love the vast amount of sellers, how kind everyone is to each other, and the limitless amount of options.
developerResponse: {'id': 4405868, 'body': "Hey there, thanks for this review! We love that you're using our lingo too (i.e 'repop')! Team Depop", 'modified': '2018-07-26T09:59:59Z'}

title: Filtering
review: The app is usually incredible! I would give it 5-stars almost any day of the week. Almost, due to the fact that some days the filters on the search tab don’t work at all. If I search “shoes” and fliter it to Menswear size 9.5, I still get results in EVERY size, Women’s and Men’s. Same thing goes for the price filtering, no matter what price I input, I get results in every price. This makes it extremely difficult to search for things I like. Please fix this, and it’ll definitely get back to being an amazing app and shopping experience.
developerResponse: {'id': 4690951, 'body': "Hey there! Sorry that you experienced this issue; it should now be fixed. If this isn't the case, please contact our Support team or update this review to let us know. Thanks! Team Depop", 'modified': '2018-08-16T15:57:06Z'}

title: Could be great, if it didn’t annoy
review:
Love almost everything about it. It’s easy to upload, sell, like, message sellers/ purchasers, but why doesn’t it ever recognize you’ve checked messages? I’ve had the same alert going on 4 day, while this is the longest it’s happened, it’s not the first time and since there’s other apps I can use that won’t annoy me, deleting Bepop. 

Hope you work out the kinks because it could be great.
developerResponse: {'id': 4405962, 'body': "Hey Vee - could you reach out to our support team (support@depop.com)? They'll be best placed to help and can hopefully fix this for you. Thanks for bearing with us! Team Depop", 'modified': '2018-07-26T10:04:24Z'}

title: Love
review: I’ve been a seller on Depop for like two or three years and I love this compared to Mercari. Couple bad buyers here and there but it’s not the apps fault. The customer service isn't the best but I hardly needed to use it anyways. Overall like how the seller is in control and not under anyone’s thumb! The community is very friendly and so are most buyers.
developerResponse: {'id': 1148622, 'body': 'Hi, thanks for the review and feedback. If you get in touch with productfeedback@depop.com with more details about the issue, we will do our best to help out. Thanks, Team Depop', 'modified': '2017-08-31T08:55:49Z'}

title: If you don’t have trendy vintage get out
review:
I’ve tried selling on this app twice now, I recently came back after a few years. 
This is a cute app, for cute clothes. 
But over and over again the explore/popular page or whatever all is the same trend vintage thrift shop clothes. All pretty much ugly sweaters and old Mom jeans.
I get it, it’s the style, but the app gives no chance for selling actually cute modern styles from places like American eagle or gap. Maybe it’s just me, but I’m disappointed in this app....

title: love! couple suggestions to make it even better
review: i’d like to be able to add items to my liked collections from the collection itself, like add an “Add to collection…” button so i can select multiple from my previously liked or something. also descriptions for collections would be nice but not pressing. overall love it so much thank you:)

title: I read the last update
review: And it said you could rearrange your shop. Did the update and didn’t find the feature to rearrange shop. Frustrating because I see other shops (the successful ones) with all sold merchandise at the bottom. The app should naturally have sold merch at the bottom. Who wants to scroll through sold and unsold items? If they did in fact add that feature then it should be easier to find. I even googled it and absolutely nothing came up

title: Absolutely no buyer protection
review: Watch out buyers! Unlike Vinted, Merc, and Posh, Depop does transactions straight through paypal instead of having the third party hold the money until the item is safely delivered. I’ve bought so many items from scammers that just post an item and never ship it and Depop doesn’t do anything about it. They leave all the work to paypal. They let sellers take a whole month to ship. Although Posh takes 20% and $7 ship, it honestly holds up to its buyer protection. Depop is the worst selling app ever!!! Use literally anything but Depop!!! Vinted, Merc, Posh, eBay!!! Anything but Depop!!!

title: No tech help response
review: I’ve sold a few things and like the way it’s set up but I’ve lost the feature to edit my items, which makes it difficult. I’ve waited almost two months for a fix or even a response, nothing. I’ve deleted and redownloaded the app twice now. Unfortunately I will have to delete instead of running the risk of someone attempting to buy something I no longer have. There are other platforms I will be exploring.

title: HATE IT!!
review: I literally hate this app so much, everything i’ve bought on here is a scam!!! Every seller tries to get me to pay with PayPal (which i don’t) 🙄 and they are obviously just trying to get me to pay them without them actually sending the item🤬 depop turns a blind eye and will not help you out at all, because the seller doesn’t have to refund you if they don’t want to (scam.) I would give this app 0 stars if i could, because it’s terribly designed, anyone who downloads this app is looking to scam or be scammed. DON’T TRUST ANYONE

title: Great app
review: Great app for starting a business. Great people there but of course like on every selling app watch out for scammers. Other than that really nice people and love the aesthetic of the app great overall would definitely recommend if you are trying to get rid of some things in your closet or even becoming a reseller!
developerResponse: {'id': 19046147, 'body': 'Hey. We moderate the app 24/7 to ensure scammers are kept away. If you notice anything suspicious, please report the item/user in-app (by clicking the 3 dots (...) top right of their profile/item) so we can investigate.\n\nTeam Depop', 'modified': '2020-11-11T15:45:59Z'}

title: Love the app! I’ve become obsessed <3
review: I’ve had this app for a few months now and have only has a few issues but they were resolved :) if you stay away from the people over pricing things and find good prices this app is so useful. I have so many things from depop now and I love it!
developerResponse: {'id': 17299176, 'body': 'Thank you for the great rating and safe rides :).\n\nTeam Depop', 'modified': '2020-08-15T21:57:56Z'}

title: Been great up until now
review: I’ve been a seller on Depop for about 2/3 years. I’ve sold over 100 items and I love doing it. Just yesterday Depop permanently deleted my account for “vulgar and abusive language” which I haven’t ever displayed. This action was extremely upsetting after I’ve poured my heart into creating and running my little shop. I messaged them about it and they said they wouldn’t reconsider at all. This was super sad and I am not happy with Depop’s team for this.
developerResponse:
{'id': 18548431, 'body': "Hey Sophia,

We’re sorry to hear your experience hasn't gone to plan. In order to keep our Community safe, all decisions made to suspend users and items are taken after deep investigation and consideration. If you feel this is unfair, just drop us a reply in the original email thread. We’re always happy to take a second look.
 
Team Depop
", 'modified': '2020-10-18T16:23:44Z'}

title: Perfect but.....
review: Solid app. I’ve given them an unholy amount of money I just got a small critique. Can my sizes be available everywhere throughout the app?? It’s really annoying putting in my sizes everyone I search for items or browse all categories. It used to be there then it got taken away. Plz bring it back and you’ll gain your last start

title: After recent update
review: Love the app and have been using for a few years! After the recent update, the red dot shows up for notifications (likes, adds, etc), but the number indicator doesn’t show up. Just wanted to let you guys know! Thank you and keep up the great work!

title: Keeps crashing
review: Since the update a few hours ago depop keeps crashing anytime it opens. It also keeps saying that my paypal isn’t connected?? But somehow I’m still receiving payments from my sales?? It won’t let me print my shipping labels because my paypal needs to be verified?? But I’ve already shipped and sold stuff before?? It’s very confusing... and my paypal has already been verified. I’ve tried doing this from my laptop and my phone browser. Nothing works.
developerResponse: {'id': 16716508, 'body': "Hey! The good news is we've fixed this bug, if you update to the latest version it should be resolved now. Team Depop\n", 'modified': '2020-07-18T16:12:55Z'}

title: Tracking info
review: Although I like the app overall. It literally should be required by depop for the seller to give the tracking information(to depop). Then depop can email you your tracking information. That way these sellers who DON’T like responding to people who have bought an item won’t get ignored. Rather the question be when can you ship it or can you update me on tracking information. More than likely not using this app anymore because I don’t want to deal with this again.

title: Only uses PayPal?
review: Loved using Depop for both buying and selling but shortly after I started using it my PayPal account was compromised. Really reluctant to put my bank info back on PayPal, but I really love depop; it’s by far the best thrifting app I’ve tried for both buying and selling. Is there a way to buy or sell without PayPal? If not, I suggest incorporating payment into the app itself rather than using a third party. Would feel much more secure not using PayPal.
developerResponse: {'id': 13436791, 'body': "Hey. We're super sorry to hear this. However, we have exciting news for you. We're making some updates here in line with what you're suggesting, so stay tuned. More coming soon.\n\nTeam Depop", 'modified': '2020-02-12T09:46:22Z'}

title: WOWED
review: online it’s really hard to find clothing cause it’s kinda scrambled so i tried the app too see if it was better like emma chamberlain said i spent only 200 dollars for 15 very popular clothing brands which if i bought in store wouldve been 750 dollars i saved over 39 dollars on each item i am just so happy right now :)

title: Disappointing and disorganized
review: Absolutely HATE the new update where you can only add 5 hashtags!!! Makes things much more difficult and HARDER to find, even though they said it was to make things easier? I just don’t understand, kind of ruined the whole app. As a seller and a buyer I’m extremely disappointed, I feel like the app is just kind of getting worse and worse :/ I hardly have any desire to use this app anymore and I’m considering downloading Poshmark or mercari for the first time ever, just to have an easier app to deal with

title: Listen to your Users: BAN drop shopping!
review: I was incredibly excited to be a part of Depop’s message of sustainability, individuality and honesty (or so I thought) until the recent allowance of drop shipping. Sadly this decision will be the death of this app, but it’s not too late to change policy. Vintage and thrift collectors are actively supporting charity shops, making a living for themselves, and making buyers happy with one of a kind pieces. Depop team, listen to your users. The sellers who have built your company to be what it is now; it is so important to remain loyal to us and we will do the same.

title: Multiple Photo Selection
review: Please please please make it possible to select multiple photos at a time when uploading to sell! I love using Depop and have pretty good success, but I find myself getting frustrated every time I have to upload photos due to the unnecessary extra time spent going back to my camera roll four times for every post.

title: Go back to 3 in a row!
review: Why did you guys change the old layout? Everybody hates it, might as well change it asap! It’s impossible to do a brief search for a specific item if you’re only able to view 2 by 2. Plus, the images are blurred & the heart icon is stupid, just make it like Pinterest where you just touch the pic & you get 3 icons: LIKE, PRICE, & VISIT SHOP. This is making my OCD kick in & like everyone is saying it’s making me not buy anything in the end. It’s a never ending scroll, too tiring, too cluttered.
developerResponse:
{'id': 17958006, 'body': "Hey, our support response times are currently slightly longer due to the current pandemic for sure, but we still aim to reply to our users ASAP. 

Thanks for the feedback regarding photos, we love to hear what we can do to improve Depop for our Community. When you succeed, we succeed. We'll be passing this along to our Product Team.
 
Team Depop
", 'modified': '2020-09-18T15:30:52Z'}

title: Good and easy but
review: Very simple to use but I’ve had this Rea curing issue with the app where shows notifications and I check throughly through everything and the same notifications are still showing so I have to check inbox> likes> profile>feed like twice and then the notifications will be gone. I do every update assuming it’ll fix the problem but it’s always the same thing... very tired of dealing with the same thing
developerResponse:
{'id': 18358889, 'body': "Hey there,

To turn on notification settings, go to 'Settings - Preferences - Push notifications' and select your preferences.

Team Depop
", 'modified': '2020-10-08T21:44:37Z'}

title: SELLERS ARE NOT TRUSTWORTHY!!!!!
review: Stick to eBay,Amazon or AliExpress if you want to make secure purchases online. I had to fight with Depop and PayPal just to get my money back! I had 2 sellers who took my money but did not ship my items. I Just finished deleting this app after waiting over a month for a refund. Buyer Protection does not make me feel secure to purchase items via this app. There are no customer service representatives from Depop that will be able to talk to you via phone. The most you get is a BS automated message that seems computer generated.  Stay away !
developerResponse:
{'id': 17495477, 'body': "Hey, we’re sorry to hear your experience hasn't gone to plan. We offer Buyer Protection for all items purchased in-app using the ‘BUY’ button. 

Read more in-app about what to do next by going to ‘Settings - Need help’ and typing in ‘Buyer Protection’.

We're here to help you,
Team Depop 
", 'modified': '2020-08-25T18:09:26Z'}

title: Slow to upload merchandise!
review: I love selling my items on this app but the it crashes EVERYTIME when trying to upload. Takes forever to let me type up a caption and then crashes again before I can post and crashes when I try to use the camera via Depop. The app has been updated several times with no fix. Very frustrating.
developerResponse: {'id': 17356651, 'body': "Hey! The good news is we've fixed this bug, if you update to the latest version it should be resolved now. \nTeam Depop\n", 'modified': '2020-08-18T14:48:12Z'}

title: Great! However, some issues
review: Love using it and the interactivity between the seller and buyers is great. A minor thing that bugs me however is when I am scrolling through feed and click a post, when I go back to the last page it resets my search to the top of the page, making searching very annoying
developerResponse: {'id': 15443365, 'body': "Hey! The good news is we've fixed this bug, if you update to the latest version it should be resolved now.\n\nTeam Depop", 'modified': '2020-05-20T10:54:46Z'}

title: Needs fixing
review: I use this app all the time. It is great and I definitely recommend using this app for buying and selling but the new update needs adjusting. When you are looking through the items if you click on one it takes you all the way back to the top of the list so you have to scroll down again from the start.
developerResponse:
{'id': 15395895, 'body': "Hey, sorry to hear about this! The good news is we've got a fix for this bug on the way. 
 
Stay tuned, 
Team Depop
", 'modified': '2020-05-18T15:18:58Z'}

title: Depop selling difficulties
review:
I mostly like depop but there are a few annoying features as a seller:
-depop fees are so high,
-doing a return/ refund is not very easy and basically has to be arranged outside the app,
-even when you use the tracking number for the label provided by depop, it doesn’t automatically update in the app and your payment can remain on hold/ make it seem like you didn’t ship the item at all.
developerResponse: {'id': 13716271, 'body': "Hey. Thanks for your feedback. Our fee allows us to keep Depop up and running, and gives us the opportunity to introduce the features our Community love. As for returns and tracking, we're currently working on some exciting updates here. Stay tuned, more coming soon.\n\nTeam Depop", 'modified': '2020-02-26T12:21:21Z'}

title: Garbage
review: Compared to the other two apps I’ve been using to buy used designer pieces, this one is total garbage. The search filters are garbage (almost no options), the design is garbage (prices not displayed on the search results until you click through the view the item, also it’s clearly an iPhone app that was never redesigned for an iPad) and most of the sellers on here seem like total amateurs, terrible pics, almost no information about the items, etc. Stick with Poshmark and Grailed, I’m legit about to delete this.

title: has such a large variety of kind sellers :)
review: I have tried so many other thrifting apps and they all never have good clothes but this one is seriously the best. you can just search the brand you want and filter the sizes and get what you want for an affordable price! I told a friend about this and she loves it too!
developerResponse: {'id': 2745676, 'body': 'Hey Claire, thank you for this lovely review and thanks also for referring us to a friend! Team Depop', 'modified': '2018-03-05T12:04:20Z'}

title: Easy to use but hard to start
review: Depop is very easy to use and maneuver compared to other online markets I’ve tried, but it is very hard to get your items noticed on here. I’ve been using it for almost a year now and I’ve only made 10 sales. I just wish more stuff would be shown to people. Other than that there are cute items to be purchased from others as well.
developerResponse:
{'id': 13537918, 'body': "Hey. We get it, this can be frustrating. However, we've created a dedicated Seller Handbook on our Help Centre to help our Users shoot, style and sell. 

Learn more about highlighting your shop by going to ‘Settings - Need help’ and typing in Sellers Handbook.

Keep exploring,
Team Depop", 'modified': '2020-02-17T14:40:09Z'}

title: eh.....
review: i like this app. i have not had one problem with anyone on here but i do find it annoying how bad this app crashes and glitches when you’re on it too much. i was asking this person a question about an item and my app decided to glitch. so i restarted the app and asked again. 6 hours later and the message i first sent, sent right when i logged back in. how annoying. same with the explore page. when i used the filter, it works fine. but every time i look at a profile from the explore page, the filter i created is lost and i have to redo it. if youre an online shopper youd be annoyed every time you have to redo your filter and have to find the last item you were looking at.

title: Buggy on iOS 11
review: I’m using a 6S on iOS 11 and the messages are buggy, I’ll get multiple notifications for the same message. Also, sometimes when I open the app by clicking on a notification it does not open it stays stuck on loading so I’d have to close and reopen.

This app has overall been better than any app I’ve tried so far, it’s also very easy to, but one improvement I would recommend is on the explore page take the clothes off that have already been sold or just mark them as sold
developerResponse: {'id': 16192365, 'body': 'Hey. Thanks for the feedback. We love hearing about what we can do to improve Depop for our Community. When you succeed, we succeed. We’ll be passing this along to our Product Team.  Team Depop', 'modified': '2020-06-24T11:19:03Z'}

title: Depop!!
review: I really do enjoy this app, you can find such beautiful stuff. What I don’t like to see though is people thrifting clothes and reselling for $40 a shirt they showed the bought from the thrift store. I know there is nothing depop can do about that just thought i had to put that out there but its really nice that we can thrift from home especially times like these.
developerResponse: {'id': 16730908, 'body': "We're glad you love Depop as much as we do.\n\nTeam Depop", 'modified': '2020-07-19T20:59:20Z'}

title: Good app but will be better once they continue to make improvements
review: This app is great and as a seller, it’s very straightforward and I’ve had good success. The audience skews much younger than other selling apps. It also looks like they’re making strides to improve the user-face and features of the app periodically. Keep it up Depop!
developerResponse: {'id': 3419499, 'body': "Thanks for the review! Rest assured Depop will keep improving with time, and we hope you'll notice these changes. Team Depop", 'modified': '2018-05-10T09:09:03Z'}

title: Fix the bug!!
review: When I am looking for clothes scrolling through the search page, I will scroll all the way down, click on an item, and then it will take me all the way back to the beginning of the search at the top. Please fix. It makes looking for clothes very irritating. Other than that I adore this app :)
developerResponse:
{'id': 15396299, 'body': "Hey, sorry to hear about this! The good news is we've got a fix for this bug on the way. 
 
Stay tuned, 
Team Depop
 
", 'modified': '2020-05-18T15:41:36Z'}

title: Love it, but there is one complaint
review: Overall I’m really happy with this app. It’s cool to find people who are into the same style I am, I just wish there was a post notification option. I always miss when my fave sellers post something! I’d like to be notified when they post so I don’t miss some great items!
developerResponse: {'id': 6885254, 'body': 'Missing great items is the worst, like missing the last chocolate donut in the office :(. Will make sure to pass this on to the team for you.\n\nLove, Depop', 'modified': '2019-01-17T13:38:52Z'}

title: Enhancement Requests
review: Can you not show sold items in the Things We Love section? No point in seeing an item I can’t buy anymore. Also, can you add option for sellers to tag an item as up for trade/swap or if it’s an information post vs straight sale? I want to be able to filter out and only see things I actually can buy.
developerResponse: {'id': 10699006, 'body': "Hey. Thanks for the feedback. We love hearing about what we can do to improve Depop for our Community. When you succeed, we succeed. I'll be passing this along to our Product Team.\n\nTeam Depop", 'modified': '2019-09-16T09:53:36Z'}

title: Keeps crashing.
review: I love depop, it’s my favorite app to shop on ever and I can find so many cute styles that I can’t find in a mall or on a online store since there’s so many shops. But this recent update has a lagging and crashing problem. After scrolling and looking around for like 10-15 minutes, the pictures will stop loading and once that happens, I can expect it to crash 2-3 seconds later. So annoying and it happens every time I open the app. Please fix it so this can be my favorite app again. Xoxo, a loving customer.
developerResponse: {'id': 8113202, 'body': 'Hi there, please pop over a report via our in-app support Settings - Need Help? - Technical Issues and then we can get this sorted together. Keep us posted <3\n\nLove, Depop', 'modified': '2019-04-08T13:37:11Z'}

title: Addicting.
review: So addicting just scrolling through the explore feed and it works pretty much like insta does but specifically for buying and selling items so it’s very easy to use! I also sell through this app and it’s honestly so smooth and simple to both buy and sell using this app. 👍🏽👍🏽
developerResponse: {'id': 2866191, 'body': 'Thanks for leaving this review! Team Depop', 'modified': '2018-03-19T13:45:12Z'}

title: Plays favorites
review:
I really like the depop app it’s a way to find cool unique things from all over the world.
The only issue I have with depop is that they play favorites to certain sellers on the site. I see a lot of the same big name sellers on the explore page all the time and their shops are promoted more than others which is not fair to the ones just getting started. I hope that they take this into consideration
developerResponse: {'id': 6450942, 'body': "We hear you. Our goal is to make sure everyone that is part of our community gets to shine. It's important to us. Will be passing this on to our team.\n\nLove, Depop", 'modified': '2018-12-19T01:59:24Z'}

title: It’s a great app and easy to use
review:
I’ve just created a depop page about a month ago and I’m already selling my stuff
I’m so excited - just love it 
Hooray DEPOP!
  It’s easy and all the other sellers and buyers are very nice and willing to work a deal with you either way ! The only thing is the package handling- everyone has had damaged boxes once mailed and the File a claim takes to long
developerResponse: {'id': 4691344, 'body': "Hooray to you! Welcome to Depop and we're delighted to read that you're already selling. Thanks, Team Depop", 'modified': '2018-08-16T16:20:07Z'}

title: Good but could use some changes
review: You can usually find pretty good deals for vintage and hard to find stuff, so I would recommend it for that alone. The design is a little counterintuitive at times, and takes a bit of time to get used to, but I’ve made a few purchases through it and the service itself is nice.
developerResponse: {'id': 5471837, 'body': 'Thanks for the feedback.\n\nLove, Depop', 'modified': '2018-10-12T08:59:23Z'}

title: Posts don’t get posted
review:
It’s happened 3x already — I’d take my time to put up a listing by writing a good description, setting up parameters etc. and when I post it, it disappears. It doesn’t even save as a draft, it’s just gone. So I’d have to post it again and hope it actually appears on my feed. It’s annoying and it’s a waste of time. Am I the only one who experienced this?

Everything else is good though. The app is user-friendly, except for that inconvenient flaw.

title: Okay app
review: I don’t have a problem with the app so much as the sellers. I’ve bought from sellers with decent reviews that say they will ship in 1-2 days, but then 2 weeks go by and the products still haven’t been shipped out. It’s very annoying and I wish their was a system in place to fix this. This has happened multiple times.
developerResponse: {'id': 3876504, 'body': "Hey there! Sorry to read you've had this experience. Our advice would be to try and strike up a conversation before the transaction, and to keep us in the loop if 7 days have passed since your transaction date with no update. That way we can also reach out to the seller and take action if required. Thanks, Team Depop", 'modified': '2018-06-18T10:51:23Z'}

title: Nice app
review: One thing I do really wish there was on the app is an option to see what’s already been sold when you search something. Say I searched “Kappa jacket”, because i am trying to sell one, and after I scrolled through all of the options there was a section with what’s already been sold. This would help me as a seller know the ideal price range.
developerResponse: {'id': 3499529, 'body': "Hey there, thank you for this feedback! We'll bring this up with the relevant teams here in the office, so thanks for the idea. Team Depop", 'modified': '2018-05-17T09:51:57Z'}

title: The app won't open/launch??
review: Hey! I love depop and use it quite frequently :) however as of the past day or two, whenever i've tried to open it, the screen turns black and the app crashes? I'm not quite sure what is up with it but it's a little concerning. Hope it gets fixed!

title: Needs improvement
review:
1.Needs a refund/ return button
2. I don’t care if I buy my clothes form a “depop famous” I would prefer to see a mix of people and items on the explore page. The item style is too repetitive and people
3. Depop should have a recently uploaded page at least
I have been using depop for at least a year I’ve sold and bought but the clothes featured are getting repetitive and boring
developerResponse: {'id': 2746311, 'body': "Hey Brenda! Thanks for leaving this feedback. With regards to a refund button, we're aware how how much of a hassle this can be for sellers right now and we're exploring new ways that we might be able to implement such a feature. Stay tuned! Our Explore page is curated in accordance with our internal guidelines, but we're sorry to read that you're not happy with the variety being shown. Finally, a recently uploaded page - would you be able to clarify on this front? The main page on Depop is a list of the most recently posted items that the people you're following have uploaded, but it sounds like you're feedback is around something else? Do let us know! Thanks, Team Depop", 'modified': '2018-03-05T12:59:57Z'}

title: Terrible search ui
review: The apps search function used to be great but with the newest app update they tha fed it to a 2 picture grid and it looks terrible and serves little to no function because you have to click on every single item and it's too tedious.
developerResponse:
{'id': 18386003, 'body': "Hey 47,

Thanks for the feedback. We love hearing about what we can do to improve Depop for our Community. When you succeed, we succeed. We'll be passing this along to our Product Team.

Team Depop

", 'modified': '2020-10-09T21:45:27Z'}

title: Account Deleted
review: They deleted my account and have banned me from ever joining Depop without telling me what I’ve done wrong. They simply keep sending me the link to their terms and policies, however, how am I supposed to know what I did wrong if they don’t tell me specifically. They also won’t give me the chance to explain whatever it is I did wrong. They truly don’t care about their users. When my account was active, they took forever to respond to my emails regarding questions I had. Wouldn’t recommend this app
developerResponse: {'id': 19042888, 'body': "Hey, we’re sorry to hear your experience hasn't gone to plan. In order to keep our Community safe, all decisions made to suspend users and items are taken after deep investigation and consideration. If you feel this is unfair, just drop us a reply in the original email thread. We’re always happy to take a second look.\n \nTeam Depop", 'modified': '2020-11-11T13:05:51Z'}

title: Won’t let me log into my account!!!!
review: I started this Depop and I buy something and it completely Kicks me out of my account and locks me out I’ve done the reset password method but I get no email!! Depop isn’t even responding to me I’m so angry and annoyed. Anyone having these problems should be taken care of IMMEDIATELY !!!!
developerResponse:
{'id': 16719264, 'body': 'Hey, we’re sorry to hear this and we can imagine how frustrating this must be. Could you please submit a support request via this link http://bit.ly/depoplockedout
 Please remember to include your:
- Username
- Email address
- Phone number
', 'modified': '2020-07-18T22:10:09Z'}

title: Like Pinterest- BUT YOU CAN BUY STUFF
review:
I spend hours just scrolling through all the really cool stuff for sale it’s just like pinterest expect if i see something i really like i can buy it!!!

I love this app so so much!  It has such an amazing community of people who are all so nice. I’ve spent way too much money... I’m addicted!!

title: BEST SELLING APP
review:
Best selling app in my opinion. I love the fact that I can sell and receive money through paypal Instead of connecting to a bank account. Makes things a lot safer!⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
Only thing I would have to think would sorta be a downfall is it being slow and trying to get people to see your posts. 
GREAT APP OTHERWISE
developerResponse:
{'id': 9895531, 'body': 'Yesssss! You totally get us 🔥

Have a read through out Sellers Handbook to get some tips on how to get noticed a bit more: https://sellers.depop.com/SellerHandbook_UK_18.12.18-1.pdf

Happy selling,
Team Depop', 'modified': '2019-07-29T10:47:35Z'}

title: bugs
review:
depop glitches whenever i leave the app☹️ and when i go back on it’s frozen. this is not the result of a problem with my phone because everything else works fine
also depop notifications for pms are really inconsistent 😭i rarely ever get one while i’m using my phone ? i have the notifications all switched on in settings and somethings they simply just don’t go off. 
additionally, when i go to filter out some results when searching for a specific item (size, price, etc) i’ve had many experiences when the filter literally just doesn’t work. it just glitches and returns me to the unfiltered page. 
i’ve been using depop a while now and am both a buyer and seller. it’s one of the most major second hand fashion platforms and popular amongst my peers so i use it. but it just gets annoying sometimes. finding clothes is really hard, i don’t know if it’s because of the algorithm or something else. 
on the bright side, the stuff on depop is cute! and their preset shipping costs are decent, especially for tracked shipping. 
anyways, i’m really not sure why depop takes such a big fee if the app is gonna have major bugs like that.
developerResponse:
{'id': 16342518, 'body': "Hey, we can imagine how frustrating this is. Please get in touch by going to 'Settings - Need help - Technical issues - I've still got an issue' and send us a report.
 
We’ll take it from here,
Team Depop
", 'modified': '2020-07-01T16:47:45Z'}

title: My favorite app- except for the new bug :(
review: Recently, there’s been an awful glitch where as I’m scrolling down, once I click on an item and then go back, it takes me to the very top of the page, making it impossible to actually look through my searches. Please fix this soon, this is my favorite shopping app and it’s been super frustrating to use recently.
developerResponse:
{'id': 15395832, 'body': "Hey, sorry to hear about this! The good news is we've got a fix for this bug on the way. 
 
Stay tuned, 
Team Depop
", 'modified': '2020-05-18T15:15:09Z'}

title: Lost packages
review:
I used to love Depop! But recently the sellers send the packages a lot later than expected or I don’t receive the package at all. 

I wish there was a better way to go about getting a refund. The seller will not take responsibility and refund me. And I have to go through a whole thing to dispute the charge. 

This happened with Mercari and they gave me a Mercari credit to use for the inconvenience. 

It would be nice if Depop provided a credit to use when things like this happened rather then the buyer having to message them seller and when the seller doesn’t reply or doesn’t take responsibility, the buyer then has to resort to a chargeback. I hope something changes with this particular issue. That’s all.

title: Review
review: So so great if you’re trying to make extra money!! Shipping method is superrrr easy. One thing I would object is how much money they take from you. They have to take a percentage but i think that percentage is a little much sometimes especially if you’re selling a more expensive item. Overall I would definitely recommend this app!!
developerResponse:
{'id': 14784194, 'body': "Hey, thanks for the review. Our 10% fee allows us to keep Depop running smoothly. It contributes towards the cost of running the app, creating new features and improving our Community’s experience. 

See our article about fees by going to 'Settings - Need help' and typing in ‘What about fees’.
Team Depop
 
", 'modified': '2020-04-20T11:43:20Z'}

title: Hi
review: If you search for something in a category depop should not show you all of the items that have been sold already in that category or it should give you an option to show you the items that aren’t sold it would save so much time and hassle and be way more enjoyable to use and find things
developerResponse: {'id': 11820753, 'body': "Hey. Thanks for the feedback. We love hearing about what we can do to improve Depop for our Community. When you succeed, we succeed. I'll be passing this along to our Product Team.\n\nTeam Depop", 'modified': '2019-11-13T11:22:43Z'}

title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD
review: This app is terrible. I don’t know how many people on this app have been scammed. I have been scammed twice. When you get it someone doesn’t send the product you bought, the customer service is terrible. Also when they said that your purchases are protected through their app, they do nothing. You have to go to Pay Pal and make a dispute yourself. They offer no buyer protection like they say they do. If you want to get scammed then go ahead and get this app. Otherwise literally any other selling app is better.
developerResponse:
{'id': 10533133, 'body': "Hi there! Sorry to hear your experience hasn't gone to plan. We offer Buyer Protection as long as the item was purchased using the BUY button in-app. 

We recommend following these steps to get the best outcome: https://depophelp.zendesk.com/hc/en-gb/articles/360001772448-I-haven-t-received-my-item

We're here to help you,
Team Depop ", 'modified': '2019-09-05T10:50:29Z'}

title: I like depop
review:
Why is this the slowest app on my phone? I can’t even open it now idk why. I even redownloaded and it is just a plain white screen

Also I know you don’t want it to be a website but I wish you at least had the share buttons on the website to post to social media

title: I’m On A New Level
review: DEPOP is like going to a party where all your weirdo amazing friends are going to be there wearing their quirkiest outfit and plans to vogue the night away. I’m obsessed with Depop. It’s community, creativity, amazing deals and inspiration all in one! Thank you for designing this platform and letting people like me show up and do our best! Love y’all!! <333
developerResponse: {'id': 4374212, 'body': "This is one of the best reviews we've read recently - thank you! Team Depop", 'modified': '2018-07-24T09:41:16Z'}

title: Great app, ease of use could be improved
review: Overall great app! One UX element I wish they would change is navigation: the back arrow is small and very high up. As screens get longer, it takes increased effort to reach up to that button. Sounds lazy, but a sore thumb doesn't make me want to keep shopping! I wish you could swipe across screen to go back.

title: Cool app, needs som tweeks!
review: Awesome app, love everything on there, good prices! They need to let you make certain groups to save stuff into. Like be able to make a shirt group so u can add only shirts, a pants group for just pants, etc. They also should let you cancel a payment if it’s still pending. I accidentally bought something and had to call paypal to get it fixed.
developerResponse: {'id': 6507078, 'body': "That's such a great idea. Makes it uch easier to create ideas on how to style.\n\nKisses.", 'modified': '2018-12-22T02:37:58Z'}

title: Great App, Never had any problems.
review: I love using this app, I've never had any problems selling. Granted it does take some time for me to move my pieces but it's always worth it. I love how one can communicate with other users easily through the PM. I just wish items would "recycle" through the searches.
developerResponse: {'id': 1374593, 'body': 'Hey thanks so much for the review. We\'d love to understand more about what you mean by "recycle" through the searches. Perhaps you could drop us an email at productfeedback@depop.com? Cheers, Team Depop', 'modified': '2017-09-27T13:50:08Z'}

title: Some suggestions?
review: Some suggestions that I have is, just like Instagram, sellers can upload more that pictures, so they can let buyers know if there’s any damages to the products or something like that.
