Another suggestion that i might have is leaving a review from a buyer to seller, that would help out the seller get more people to look at his/her stuff.

title: Great source of income
review:
Thanks to depop I’ve been able to
Share and monetize off my love for trendy vintage fashion and second hand gems . I’ve made so much money selling my threads and more importantly haven’t noticed they do a great job protecting sellers and buyers against any major risks as far as scams . Great customer service team and great global reach !

title: I love depop, but please fix the bugs!
review: I absolutely love depop and I have loved depop for years now BUT for the past couple of months my app has major bugs and there are no updates that it needs yet! Things won’t load, I can’t scroll to see more photos, i can’t like items. It is getting ridiculous. Please please fix the bugs.

title: search malfunction
review: as other reviews say, please fix the scrolling bug when you search! I search something and every time I click an item and then go back to search results it brings me back to the top of the search results, even if I had scrolled down before. So annoying, makes it hard for me to look for stuff to buy ... :/ glad I’m not the only one having this issue
developerResponse:
{'id': 15394883, 'body': "Hey, sorry to hear about this! The good news is we've got a fix for this bug on the way. 
 
Stay tuned, 
Team Depop
", 'modified': '2020-05-18T14:31:32Z'}

title: Not user friendly
review: It’s very difficult to get your items seen. Also, it should be easier to offer discounts to people who “like” your items. You should be able to click a button and send all “likers” either a discount or free shipping offer.
developerResponse:
{'id': 12089629, 'body': "Hey. We get it, this can be frustrating. However, we've created a dedicated Seller Handbook on our Help Centre to help our Users shoot, style and sell. 

Learn more about highlighting your shop by going to ‘Settings - Need help’ and typing in Sellers Handbook.

And thanks for the discounts suggestion. I'll be passing that one along.

Keep exploring,
Team Depop", 'modified': '2019-11-27T18:04:42Z'}

title: Horrible customer service
review: The only reason I'm giving two stars is because the majority of the depop community is filled with creative and kind users. With that said, if you ever have an issue, it will not be solved. The customer service "helpers" are rude and seem like they don't care about your issue at all. I love the environment of depop but every time I buy something I can't help but to feel guilty for supporting a company that seems to not care about its individual users.

title: I LOVE DEPOP
review: So I started using Depop for shopping purposes only. Then, I realized that I too, could sell my clothes. Not only have I been able to make some money off of Depop, but I also have been able to express myself through my sale posts. It’s truly such a great community of fashion-lovers and friendly people!!
developerResponse:
{'id': 11687828, 'body': "Yes, Ally, seems like you're absolutely nailing it.

Check out our dedicated Seller Handbook on our Help Centre to help our Users shoot, style and sell: https://sellers.depop.com/SellerHandbook_UK_18.12.18-1.pdf

Keep exploring,
Team Depop", 'modified': '2019-11-06T10:45:23Z'}

title: Love this app!
review: This is a great app to sell and buy clothes on❤️! It’s easy to search, post, buy, communicate with buyers/sellers etc. I would definitely recommend it! I also can tell they try really hard to keep the app safe, any time I have reported an account it was taken care of RIGHT away💗!

title: Great!
review: Overall this app is amazing! I’ve been on Depop since 2016 and have had no problems. I don’t really see any problem to depop tbh. The workers behind Depop answer my questions really fast and that’s so helpful! Only thing that is that they charge 10% fee...which I think is kinda high. But it’s not that bad .?
developerResponse:
{'id': 11169048, 'body': 'Hey, thanks for the review. Our 10% fee allows us to keep Depop running smoothly. It contributes towards the cost of running the app, creating new features and improving our Community’s experience. Read up here for more: 

https://depophelp.zendesk.com/hc/en-gb/articles/360001791127-What-about-fees-

Keep connecting, 
Team Depop', 'modified': '2019-10-10T11:00:46Z'}

title: Love this app!
review: I adore Depop. It’s such a great platform and I really appreciate the lil supplement to my income. PSA: There are a lot of scammers selling knock off items using Instagram model images to sell you a cheaper, lower quality version from China. You’ll get ripped off if you don’t check to see if the seller takes their own photos.

title: my depop: lavendures
review: i love depop so much :) such a safe and great app! would love a new layout . i love how we can now change our usernames but its only a one time thing and we have to contact depop but i did and it went so smoothly and was quick and easy so im happy about that . Would also suggest depop to go dark mode 😊

title: The Best Thrift App
review: So much amazing second hand and handmade clothing, it’s amazing. I’ve never come across a negative person, and all of my transactions have been incredibly fast and safe. I can track my packages and contact the seller I’m buying from, leave them reviews, and I can bundle to save money! I love this app so much!!!!
developerResponse: {'id': 9131902, 'body': 'We love you too and your booty.\n\nLove, Depop', 'modified': '2019-06-12T13:27:00Z'}

title: It’s competitors are better
review: This app is worse Grailed, etsy, or poshmark. Also you can’t make offers or haggle. Poshmark has a much better buyer protection policy. It’s also easier to get refunded when something is wrong. Everything about Depop seems to favor the sellers, which doesn’t make for a good shopping experience. Grailed has a much bigger and better selection. I don’t use Etsy as much, so I can’t make a good comparison. What I will say is that the selection is better.

title: Great app!
review: I have been on depop for about two weeks and I absolutely love it! There are some amazing clothes you can buy second hand, and the sellers I have interacted with are so nice. My only suggestion is to continue working on the “made for you” feature. Thanks for creating such a great app!

title: Can get a account
review: I originally had a Depop acc, but then I deleted the app which logged me out of my account. I redownloaded the app and tries to log into my account. Of course this didn’t work. So I tried to reset my password. This did not work bc I had recently changed emails. So I tried to use my new email. Which did not work. So my next option was to make a new acc. I clicked the button that says “make new account” or something like that. And when i pushed it asked to log into my account. WHEN I WAS TRYING TO MAKE A NEW ACCOUNT!  So now I am mad
developerResponse: {'id': 7601053, 'body': "Hey Madyson! Happy to get you back up and running - just pop over a quick email to support@depop.com with your previous @username on Depop. We'll make sure you're able to use a new email too.", 'modified': '2019-03-06T11:20:31Z'}

title: Very useful, one minor issue
review: I overall enjoy the app a lot, I've had a lot of success buying and selling clothing on here. The ui is very navigable and helpful. The only problems/rooms for improvement I can see right now is that: 1. There's no protection against fake/counterfeit clothing, so buy at your own risk. And 2: You can't save filter preferences, which is a big nuisance.

title: Selling Fees!
review:
Ive been using depop for almost 3 years didnt really sell much until now since Im jobless cause of covid.
Had no complaints or issues with buyers so thats good, just that the selling fee is a hassle
sellers want to make the exact amount of money they put on there depop items, the 10% selling fee has to go!
Especially if we add our own shipping price as well it shouldnt be included with the selling fees!
Atleast only charge the fees on the item price but not our shipping price!
The higher the price the higher the selling fees will be an its honestly not fair for us to make the money we want to make!
Please look into it! Im pretty sure every seller out here would consider this
An 0.5% of selling fee seems fair
Thank you!
developerResponse:
{'id': 18129412, 'body': 'Hey Ashevee,

We can imagine how frustrating this is. Please remove cached data by going to ‘Settings - Apps - Depop - Storage - Clear Data’ on your phone. Then, completely delete and re-download the app. 
We’ll get this sorted,

Team Depop
', 'modified': '2020-09-27T20:49:16Z'}

title: ...better than poshmark
review:
depop’s 10%  cut of the total sale (including shipping) is very very high for anyone trying to sell seriously....but it is much better than poshmark’s 20% cut 👎. The percentage Depop takes should be 5% or less depending on the total volume of money being exchanged through the app. 

but the app works great, is easy to use, and gives you so much more exposure than the average person can generate.
developerResponse:
{'id': 17534404, 'body': "Hey, thanks for the review. Our 10% fee allows us to keep Depop running smoothly. It contributes towards the cost of running the app, creating new features and improving our Community’s experience. 
 
See our article about fees by going to 'Settings - Need help' and typing in ‘What about fees’.
Team Depop
", 'modified': '2020-08-27T09:23:07Z'}

title: Amazing
review: By far one of the best reselling apps out there. You can filter result options for your specific sizes. Within the first couple of days of downloading the app I was already buying clothes. It’s kind of addicting. All different styles and types of clothes for super cheap. I tell all my friends about it!
developerResponse: {'id': 16192214, 'body': 'We love to see it.\n\nTeam Depop', 'modified': '2020-06-24T11:13:18Z'}

title: No customer service
review: I originally gave a 1 star because of how hard it was to get my PayPal started and for not getting a response from the help center. but now everything is fixed. I’m just giving depop a 3 stars because a lot of people over charge on this app. Also because of how much money this app has made off me (around $60) just from the 10% fee which includes shipping.
developerResponse:
{'id': 16866816, 'body': "Hey, sorry about this.
 
If you can follow this link and submit a request if you're still struggling that would be great. https://depophelp.zendesk.com/hc/en-gb/articles/360046290994-I-can-t-access-my-shipping-label-USPS-MyHermes-
 
Team Depop
", 'modified': '2020-07-25T18:17:47Z'}

title: Help me
review: I made an account and then deleted it but then I try and make a new account and it says put in phone number and it says phone number invalid then I tried to sign up with Apple it didn’t work and then I tried to sign up with Facebook it didn’t work I’m trying my best to get into this app cuz I remember how amazing it was but nothing is working please somebody reply to me I need to get back on this app
developerResponse:
{'id': 16190714, 'body': 'Hey, we’re sorry to hear this and we can imagine how frustrating this must be. Could you please submit a support request via this link http://bit.ly/depoplockedout
 Please remember to include your:
- Username
- Email address
- Phone number
- Phone operating system, example iOS 13
 
Let’s get this sorted,
Team Depop
', 'modified': '2020-06-24T10:20:46Z'}

title: Saved search
review: All I want is a saved search option. I’m always hunting for specific items and can only see new results next to the 5 most recent searches. When I click see all I want to see what has new results when I scroll down.
developerResponse: {'id': 13308843, 'body': "Hey. Thanks for the feedback. We love hearing about what we can do to improve Depop for our Community. When you succeed, we succeed. We'll be passing this along to our Product Team.\n\nTeam Depop", 'modified': '2020-02-05T12:23:13Z'}

title: Depop
review: Love this app but the only thing is i wosh i could dispute a review or old ones could disappear. One person bought an itsm that did not fit and left me a 3 star review years ago. I have 5 star reviews on other sotes which is why i think i sell better on other apps. They should change this so more people can improve their ratings.

title: Best app of 2020 BY far
review: This is such a good app for so many reasons. Not only are a lot of things pretty cheap, but if you find a good seller it’s also really good quality as well! Just beware of drop sellers! But this app is definitely one of my favorites and i will continue to buy from here for a long time.
developerResponse: {'id': 13939368, 'body': "Hey, thanks for the rave review, and keep shopping. That's what it's all about. In an effort to keep Depop a creative marketplace with quality products we have decided to update our policy on drop shipped items. We now don't allow drop-shipping on-app.\n\nTeam Depop", 'modified': '2020-03-09T12:10:16Z'}

title: Great marketplace
review: You can find anything here for any price. Very convenient. The only issue is that when it comes to selling the fees can put a damper on your profits. If they just did 9% instead of a 10% fee I would be pleased and excited about selling stuff but other then that great app

title: Shipping/ sharing
review: I love this app and have been selling on her for a few years I believe. But I hate that the shipping prices seem to just keep going up. Also I wish there were more ways to be able to keep putting your items out there or share them because once you post them then you just have to hope someone finds your posting eventually.
developerResponse:
{'id': 13416173, 'body': "Hey. Thanks for your feedback. With regards to shipping, this is something we're looking into as we speak. 

We've also created a dedicated Seller Handbook on our Help Centre to help our Users shoot, style and sell. 

Learn more about highlighting your shop by going to ‘Settings - Need help’ and typing in Sellers Handbook.

Team Depop", 'modified': '2020-02-11T10:08:59Z'}

title: BEWARE
review: This is a great app for buying items, but you better hope you don’t come across any issues because customer service is very hard to receive. Also, if you are a seller, especially selling cheap items, beware of bundle free shipping. This was automatically checked on my account, therefore I was forced to pay money for someone to receive my item rather than being paid for it!! Read online reviews  about Depop... they’re HORRIBLE.
developerResponse: {'id': 8502355, 'body': "Hi there, we're sorry to hear about your experience with us. Our support team is always there if you need a helping hand with any issues or questions. Just make sure to either report it through the app or send a mail via support@depop.com.\n\nLove, Depop", 'modified': '2019-05-04T03:31:15Z'}

title: Super unfun to use
review: Again , fees are ridiculous and they close accounts constantly for the slightest issues. They close accounts for using PayPal yet WE get charged by both PayPal and depop when we make a sale so it is absolutely absurd. They over police everything you post yet there are thousands of scammers out there still operating under the app . Absolute joke of an app. Not to mention half of the products are 1$ ugly thrift store finds that people somehow think to charge upwards of 30$ for . Save your money and just sell on eBay
developerResponse: {'id': 3074332, 'body': "Hey there! Please rest assured that we work hard every time to remove bad items and bad users from the app in order to keep our Community safe. We're a Community of millions though, so sometimes we might not get to these users/items as quickly as we'd hope. Please be sure to report any users you see infringing our terms. Our 10% is what allows a platform like Depop to exist in the first place, as it covers a wide variety of costs that come with running a business. We hope this goes some way to clarifying things for you. Thanks, Team Depop", 'modified': '2018-04-09T10:46:28Z'}

title: Lovely app but there's room for improvement
review: I've been using this app for about a couple months and overall I enjoy the app. I enjoy the overall diversity between shops. But as a small time seller it is very hard for me to make money on the app when the same depop famous people are always featured in the search section. Also I feel as if their should be a refund feature implemented somehow
developerResponse: {'id': 3052213, 'body': "Hey there! Please make sure you've read through all the relevant articles in our Help Centre that provide tips on how to improve your shop. With regards to a refund feature, this is something we're working towards and hope to have a far improved payment experience for our users by the end of 2018. Thank you, Team Depop", 'modified': '2018-04-06T14:18:51Z'}

title: Great people. Great app
review: 100% of my transactions have been with kind people who communicate well, of course Depop doesn’t directly control who uses the app but it does make communicating simple and easy to use. Only 1 purchase ever I didn’t receive but the seller contacted me and refunded me so no problem.
developerResponse: {'id': 16193848, 'body': 'We love to see it.\n\nTeam Depop', 'modified': '2020-06-24T12:13:21Z'}

title: Used to love but its gone downhill
review: Terrible customer service! Never give any help and are down right rude. App has MANY bugs. The explore page is chosen with no effort. Depop says they will notify you before they take action on your account but in actuality they notify you after the fact. They accuse you of photo copyright infringement before having any proof. Very irritating to have your items taken down. They delete your account before you can finish shipping your customers orders. Depop is very unhelpful and has no tact whatsoever!
developerResponse: {'id': 1661284, 'body': "Hi, thanks for the feedback and review. We're sorry to hear you've had a bad experience using Depop. If you send a message to productfeedback@depop.com with more details, such as your username, we can take a look into this for you. Thanks, Team Depop", 'modified': '2017-11-04T00:09:56Z'}

title: diversity
review: i love using depop but there is just one thing that bothers me the most and it’s not enough diversity on the explore/featured page. there are maybe over a hundred or so users that are trying to sell on depop and i think most of them aren’t selling...i like the fact that those on the explore page are able to sell their things here and there but i would appreciate if that page was a mix of all the users on depop. it should feature everyone and what they are trying to sell. it’s just a suggestion but coming from someone with a small shop, i think we would all appreciate it if it was combined with everyone :)

title: Cool app but glitchy
review: Love the app. Gotta be careful who you buy from as I've had a couple sketchy experiences but over all the idea is great and I've made some money too. My biggest complaint is the messaging in the app never seems to work for back and forth. I've used it on multiple phones and made sure the app is updated and it just never seems to work and it's a real problem sometimes.

title: Improve home page
review: When you open the app it should go to the explore page or your feed. The cropping of the suggested seller banners should be fixed. Our top picks should be endless down scroll instead of side and the photo ratio should be a little bigger. All this would give the app a cleaner look to help sales.
developerResponse: {'id': 19469664, 'body': "Hey. Thanks for the feedback. We love hearing about what we can do to improve Depop for our Community. When you succeed, we succeed. We'll be passing this along to our Product Team.\n\nTeam Depop", 'modified': '2020-12-01T16:25:37Z'}

title: Notifications don’t go away
review: The app is fine minus one huge thing- notifications don’t go away on your phone even if in the app you have none anywhere. Please fix this- it makes keeping track of what is important vs a glitch very difficult and stresses me out if I’ve accidentally missed something.

title: Great app, should be upfront about paypal linking
review: App is great, but I sold my first item and didn’t know I needed to link my PayPal until after I made the sale. This took a couple of days and delayed the time I could ship my package to my buyer. This should be part of the setup process and you shouldn’t be allowed to list items until this is done.
developerResponse:
{'id': 17495471, 'body': "
Hey. Thanks for the feedback. We love hearing about what we can do to improve Depop for our Community. When you succeed, we succeed. We'll be passing this along to our Product Team.

Team Depop
", 'modified': '2020-08-25T18:09:06Z'}

title: great app but needs an update
review: i love this app so far i have sold 12 things and made about $170 but - shipping fees, anyways i have also bought a lot of items from depop and i’m so happy an app like this exists. there is a downside though this app is ALWAYS lagging it always glitches me out of the app and lags when i type. this app needs some improvment.
developerResponse:
{'id': 17298976, 'body': 'Hey. We can imagine how frustrating this is. Please remove cached data by going to ‘Settings - Apps - Depop - Storage - Clear Data’ on your phone. Then, completely delete and re-download the app. 
We’ll get this sorted,
Team Depop
', 'modified': '2020-08-15T21:31:04Z'}

title: Love it, but...
review: i love the app, but there’s one complaint i have. i’ve specifically set my currency to the american dollar, yet my explore page continuously pushes items that aren’t available in my region, and it’s very annoying when i see something i like but can’t buy. i could be using the setting wrong, but idk. can anyone help??

title: Nice, except...
review: I would REALLY like it if there were some way to block seeing a specific seller’s listings in a tag. The wares are usually fine, but just not what I’m interested in and I don’t want to see a wall of it in a tag. It is getting to be really frustrating. Other than that, no real complaints. I like this app and use it [as a buyer] a lot.

title: FEES + SCAMMERS!
review: i honestly love this app. i find so many good things and everyone on there is amazing, but the fees are ridiculous. overtime they start taking more than 10% of your sales and it’s FRUSTRATING. i swear i lose more money on there than i make and it needs to stop. not to mention, this app does absolutely NOTHING when there are scammers or girls charging five times retail price for a used item. depop needs to do something now.
developerResponse:
{'id': 16786644, 'body': "Hey, thanks for the review. Our 10% fee allows us to keep Depop running smoothly. It contributes towards the cost of running the app, creating new features and improving our Community’s experience. 
 
See our article about fees by going to 'Settings - Need help' and typing in ‘What about fees’.
Team Depop
", 'modified': '2020-07-21T16:46:44Z'}

title: Can’t buy anything
review: I’m trying to buy a few items off of depop but Every time I try to check out and pay a message pops up saying “Error purchasing this item: The Item(s) you want to buy have been updated. Please check you’re happy before paying.”  it’s been doing this for the past few days I literally can’t buy anything. Every item I try to buy an item that message would always pop up.
developerResponse:
{'id': 16719389, 'body': "Hey, we can imagine how frustrating this is. Please get in touch by going to 'Settings - Need help - Technical issues - I've still got an issue' and send us a report.
 
We’ll take it from here,
Team Depop
", 'modified': '2020-07-18T22:47:25Z'}

title: So far so good😊
review: I’ve purchased three items from Depop and all 3 have been in the same condition as pictured. I think that this app is a great way to save some money while also getting a better price from items then selling them somewhere else like Facebook.

I enjoy shopping on this app as ive found some great finds and honest people, but not impressed at the initiative taken by depop on scammers, dropshippers, and glitches. Almost every time i ise the app something is glitching , my explore page is filled with things far out Of my Interest , sold items or items in other countries. Im sick of seeing garbage from
China be sold to people ripping them off and creating more waste :/

title: Stop Showing Sold Items on the Explore
review: The app is great, no qualms other than the fact that the app keeps recommending me sold items on the Things We Love page. I’ll see something I love and would buy without hesitation only to find out it’s been sold. It’s a huge annoyance and is what is keeping the app from being perfect.

title: New update...
review: It’s already hard enough to get people to see your posts and to actually get traffic flowing to your account, and now it’s reduced to 5 hashtags??? You’ll never sell anything because no one will see it! It’s so stupid to do that :/ might just go back to eBay I guess.

title: Payment (UK)
review: It’s a good app in the whole buying and selling aspect easy to use etc the only thing is that when trying to pay (from the uk) if you don’t have a paypal account it forces you to make one and my parents can’t remember the password to it and I can’t make a new one because every email I use it says it already belongs to an account which stops me from buying anything

title: love this app!
review: Depop is one of my favorite apps of all time. i sell my own items and buy many and have never had a poor experience. This app beats out all of the other item selling apps. Also constantly comes out with updates that have great new features.
developerResponse: {'id': 4540534, 'body': "Hey Mia - it's great to read that you're having a good time on the app. Long may this continue! Team Depop", 'modified': '2018-08-06T11:52:06Z'}

title: App lags when scrolling through hundreds of items
review: I am enjoying the app however my experience is worsened when the app starts to lag and freezes up for a second when scrolling through lots of items. You guys should fix it because it gets frustrating.
developerResponse: {'id': 6784123, 'body': 'Hi there, we do want to get to the bottom of this, please pop over a report via our in-app support Settings - Need Help? - Technical Issues and then we can get this sorted together.\n\nLove, Depop', 'modified': '2019-01-11T06:57:13Z'}

title: Easy to use
review: I'm starting out as a small art business and I have a few selling apps. I love this one due to how simple and easy it is to use. I haven't been on long, so I don't have many followers or anything but it's nice to have another quick and simple store front going.

title: Some suggestions
review:
Items that have been sold should always say sold, wherever the photo is.

It would be nice to see size/price info from the thumbnail vs having to click on it. Or even if price/size showed up by clicking and holding the photo.

title: Variety
review:
I am a seller and buyer, I love finding new accounts. The thing is, Depop doesn’t make that easy. The Depop community only shares sellers who are already popular which is sad because the small accounts I buy from are just as good (actually better) than the big accounts that get all the attention everyday.

Depop needs to bring together EVERYONE in its community. Not just the elite a-list popular kids. 😑😑

title: uninviting appearance
review: I like depop a lot. I’ve been able to sell a good amount of my pre-loved clothes but i’m still not a fan of the new bright red design. It’s very harsh and uninviting. I’ve started using the app less since the change from the “hello we’re open” to the new kinda ugly new red design. Every time there is an update i really hope it’s to change the look of the app. so i would recommend that :)

title: An easy app
review: Honestly, I love shopping on depop because these are pieces that would be hard to find in stores! It has a variety of styles and that are cheap. I’ve gotten everything shipped from sellers and had no issues with depop. I’m not selling anything, but it sure looks easy to!
developerResponse: {'id': 19697776, 'body': "We're glad you're loving Depop.\n\nTeam Depop", 'modified': '2020-12-11T12:35:18Z'}

title: NO CUSTOMER SERVICE
review: there’s absolutely no customer service in this app. no phone number i can call, no email i can write to, nothing. i have had issues with my shop and sent in 4 reports. they NEVER got back to me. then, they removed and item i was selling because they thought it was counterfeit, and they sent me an email about it so i replied to that email regarding that item and also all of the other issues i’ve had with depop and NO response. START WORRYING ABOUT YOUR USERS’ PROBLEMS AND GET CUSTOMER SERVICE!!!!

Awesome app.
I'd suggest to make it work like Instagram, where you can scroll down a person's feed rather than have to click on each listing, and find a way to help smaller accounts grow quicker, since the accounts with the most followings sell the most.
developerResponse:
{'id': 10995315, 'body': "Hey. Thanks for the feedback. We love hearing about what we can do to improve Depop for our Community. When you succeed, we succeed. I'll be passing this along to our Product Team.

We've also created a dedicated Seller Handbook to help our Users shoot, style and sell. 

Check it out here: https://sellers.depop.com/SellerHandbook_UK_18.12.18-1.pdf

Keep exploring,
Team Depop", 'modified': '2019-10-01T09:59:31Z'}

title: Depop Closes your account’s for no reason
review: My first account was apparently closed bc I was using external payment methods as a seller. Which I totally understand. So I made a new account. The next day they shut it down. A few days after that I made a 3rd account. Depop shut it down AGAIN for no reason. I’ve contacted customer support and no one has responded. This app is terrible and if you want to lose all your money go for it. This is the only way to get their attention. Will be informing everyone NOT to sell on Depop.
developerResponse:
{'id': 16212753, 'body': "Hey, our support response times are currently slightly longer due to the current pandemic, but we'll be in touch ASAP.
 
 
We're here for you,
Team Depop
", 'modified': '2020-06-25T09:26:47Z'}

title: Great app! But there is a major bug
review: This has been my favorite selling app. The only MAJOR downside I’ve experienced is that pretty often when I click on a listing, the screen goes to a white blank white.  And this repeats several times so I can’t see the listing at all. This happens in my likes too. Can this be fixed?
developerResponse:
{'id': 18549401, 'body': 'Hey there,

We’re sorry to hear this and we can imagine how frustrating this must be. Could you please submit a support request via this link http://bit.ly/depoplockedout
 Please remember to include your:
- Username
- Email address
- Phone number
- Phone operating system, example iOS 13
 
Let’s get this sorted,
Team Depop
', 'modified': '2020-10-18T18:44:52Z'}

title: Depop as a company is lazy
review: Depop multiple times has logged me out for no reason and when i try to reset my password it won’t allow me. I’ve sent several emails to the depop team but they never answer. Depops team seems to be either unbelievably lazy or understaffed because this has happened to dozens of people! There are whole threads on twitter and reddit with the same problem. Also it won’t allow me to make a new account because you have to use your number!!!! This is beyond frustrating!
developerResponse:
{'id': 17002618, 'body': 'Hey, we’re sorry to hear this and we can imagine how frustrating this must be. Could you please submit a support request via this link http://bit.ly/depoplockedout
 Please remember to include your:
- Username
- Email address
- Phone number
- Phone operating system, example iOS 13
 
Let’s get this sorted,
Team Depop
', 'modified': '2020-07-31T11:15:38Z'}

title: Great when it works, consistently buggy
review:
Depop is great - when it works. The interface is simple and clean and it’s social media-like qualities make it fun to use. 

My messages are super buggy and often all the messages in my inbox disappear. They usually come back, whether it’s when I check hours later or delete and reinstall the app, but it’s pretty frustrating when you’re trying to work out a sale. 

The search functionality could use better filtering. I know lots of sellers include other brands, often irrelevant, for exposure but it makes it hard to find what you’re looking for when. 

I also wish you could upload more than 4 images per listing!
developerResponse:
{'id': 16718994, 'body': "Hey, we can imagine how frustrating this is. Please get in touch by going to 'Settings - Need help - Technical issues - I've still got an issue' and send us a report.
 
We’ll take it from here,
Team Depop
", 'modified': '2020-07-18T21:12:28Z'}

title: Update Error
review: Ever Since Depop had the update two days ago it's messed up the search bar. When i scroll through numerous of pictures of different clothes and click on an item that i had to scroll a while for when i view it and swipe out it doesn't leave me where i left off scrolling it takes me all the way to the top and its fustrating

title: Needs An Update
review: I love the concept of this app but it’s customs are unprotected and disorganized. It’s extremely difficult to print out a label when depop and websites are telling me to do something different and it’s connection with paypal doesn’t make things easier. Thank you depop but I’ll stick with mercari’s liable system than going 30 mins out of my way to figure out how to do things on this app when shipping. the process is unbearable and a waste of time.
developerResponse: {'id': 13666143, 'body': "Hey. We protect all purchases made in-app using the 'buy' button. If you ever need us, just head to 'profile - settings - need help' and reach out. As for shipping labels, we're also working on some exciting updates here, so stay tuned. In the meantime, we'll be sure to pass your feedback onto our Product Team.\n\nTeam Depop", 'modified': '2020-02-24T11:23:04Z'}

title: Fees
review: I love Depop, but what I'm not a big fan as a seller is that whenever paypal has the funds on hold, Depop still gets their cut of the fee right away. It shouldn't be like that. If the money is put on hold, Depop shouldn't get the money right away too. There's times where I have to transfer money from my savings to cover the fee since it was taken directly from my bank and not from the funds received from the purchase of the buyer. Depop needs to work on that.
developerResponse: {'id': 12203613, 'body': "Hey. We hear you, this isn't ideal, and we'll be passing it onto the relevant teams for them to consider. In the meantime, be sure to upload your tracking information as soon as possible once you've shipped an order. This is the quickest way to get PayPal to release funds.\n\nTeam Depop", 'modified': '2019-12-04T09:39:25Z'}

title: Depop Review
review: I absolutely love this app, it’s a quick and easy accessible way to find clothes and accessories of all sorts. I just finished ordering a few bundles last night and the people in which I was buying products from were all a pleasure to talk to. Definitely recommend this app!

title: Confused
review: Overall the app is great, but I’m confused by this. So I add an item to my bag, and it appears no one has bought it (it isn’t marked as sold) but when I open my bag it’s marked as sold. I’ve refreshed the sellers page several times and it still shows that no one has bought it, but it won’t let me buy it. Very annoyed right now
developerResponse: {'id': 8680252, 'body': 'Hi there, that does sound annoying. Can you send us some love via support@depop.com and our team will have a look into this and see whats up.\n\nLove, Depop', 'modified': '2019-05-15T09:07:37Z'}

title: 🖤🖤🖤 love this app
review: So much vintage clothing, when I first opened the app they had a huge selection of clothing from street wear to straight up clothing from the 1980’s, I just bought a super cute pair of sketchers on this app. They were only 16 bucks! Also checking out and ordering is really simple and easy to use.
developerResponse: {'id': 7357462, 'body': 'Big boi Barry on that sketechers vibe.. whoop whoop.\n\nKisses, Depop', 'modified': '2019-02-19T05:36:09Z'}

title: Has potential
review: Everything is great about the app. But correct me if I'm wrong because maybe I'm not seeing something. I think it's extremely inconvenient that I cannot save my searches. The fact that I would have to re-enter everything down to my size and brand, it takes too much time than just clicking on a saved search. It takes that much time away from me shopping. Not be extra about this.
developerResponse: {'id': 8502787, 'body': 'Hi there, thank you for the feedback. You should be able to saved any items you like when you see a listing - this is the third icon that looks like a banner. Once you click on this you can enter your own account and see your "saved" items on top. \n\nLove, Depop', 'modified': '2019-05-04T05:50:05Z'}

title: Unfair
review: I've been using Depop for almost a year now and the one thing I don't understand is how they continue to put the same sellers on the explore page rather than help new shops. The people who run this app need to be more consistent. Also I think they need to lower the amount they take form each sell, they don’t take into account they’re taking 10% out of sales INCLUDING shipping and then PayPal takes out a percentage too. Doesn’t make any sense to me.
developerResponse:
{'id': 8170661, 'body': 'Hey, Thanks for your review and sorry to hear that you feel this way! If you send a message in support@depop.com we can give you some advice on how to appear on the explore page. 

I understand that you may believe that the Depop fee is high and believe me if we didn’t have to charge a fee we wouldn’t!

The 10% fee may seem like a lot for your sale but, when we break this down into what the fee contributes to, it makes a lot more sense. The fee is in place to keep the app up and running, with general up-keep costs and to pay all of our employees, from engineers to us in support. 

Unlike many other selling platforms, at Depop only charge you when you make a sale, this means there are no fees for the length of time your item has been listed for or any initial costs to list the item, so list to your heart’s content because its all free!

Love, Depop', 'modified': '2019-04-11T11:55:30Z'}

title: Best Selling App
review: I’m a seller on Depop, I love the app! I like that it doesn’t have many fees like other selling apps. The shipping process is really smooth. I just think that Depop should have a PC version too instead of just an app version. The PC version allows you to look but you can’t buy. Overall again I LOVE IT!

title: Has been crashing less
review: This app came very annoying to me in the beginning because it crashed every 2 minutes. But since the last update its been much better!!! Love this app!! Making lots of profits and finding one of a kind pieces every day💜💜💜
developerResponse: {'id': 3419346, 'body': "Hey! We're glad to read that your experience has improved recently. Thanks for the 5 stars! Team Depop", 'modified': '2018-05-10T08:56:43Z'}

title: I really enjoy Depop
review: This app is so much fun to me. I make extra money and enjoy doing it! Ive got nothing but positive things to say about it. I’ve been reading the comments and I’m pretty surprised by how nit picky some can be. It’s far better than other second hand apps I’ve seen in my opinion. <3 <3
developerResponse: {'id': 3159463, 'body': 'Thank you for the love! Team Depop', 'modified': '2018-04-17T10:44:35Z'}

title: Great tool for Thrift lovers
review: I love Depop. I get to make some money on the side; connect with people around the world; and I'm able to shop and sell unique items. I've even been able to make a new hobby with modeling items I'm selling and creating an alter-ego instagram account. Very useful tool if you commit to it. A+

title: SHIPPING AND DELIVERY ARE THE WORST
review: the website is amazing and the clothes are very cute and a lot of nice stuff, but the shipping and delivery are TERRIBLE I’ve been waiting almost 2weeks to receive my purchases! I’ve been debating if I’m going to stop shopping on Depop Bc of how long it’s taking just to get my orders I ordered 3 things and it’s taking forever
developerResponse:
{'id': 16866827, 'body': "Hey. We can imagine how frustrating this is. Head in-app to 'Settings - Support - Need help - Buying - My purchase - I haven't received my item'.
We also moderate the app 24/7 to ensure scammers are kept away. If you notice anything suspicious, please report the item/user in-app (by clicking on the 3 dots top right of their profile/item) so we can investigate.
 
We're here to help,
Team Depop
", 'modified': '2020-07-25T18:20:19Z'}

title: Only 1 wish!
review:
As a seller, there is ONE thing I wish Depop would do. When a seller lowers a price, all the people who’ve liked that item would get a notification!! Poshmark does this and it increase my sales by 75%!!! Pleeeaasee do this! 
Sometimes shoppers forget what they’ve liked in the past & need reminding! Buyers AND Depop will benefit from this! Otherwise, I enjoy the app.

title: New Update
review: I really like depop but I don’t like the new update. I like when it shows the price and size when i’m scrolling through. Change it back to the old one pleaseee! it’s much more convenient for me because the price matters a lot and with the price and size in the front, I don’t have to click into every post.
developerResponse: {'id': 18213094, 'body': "Hey. Thanks for the feedback. We love hearing about what we can do to improve Depop for our Community. When you succeed, we succeed. We'll be passing this along to our Product Team.\n\nTeam Depop", 'modified': '2020-10-01T10:15:32Z'}

title: Improvements
review: I love this app and browse it almost everyday. I’d love to see some options for inseam on shorts when filter and length for pants. It’d make things so much easier. I’d also love it if there was an option to put cheaper items in preferences. I don’t like how my recommended is will with $100 sweatshirts. I’m filtering by $10, shouldn’t it know?

title: It’s a great app but...
review: So I had a drop account and one day I logged out and then I wanted to log back in and so u forgot my password and so k hit the forgot password thing and it wasn’t es me to enter in my email and so I did but instead of helping me it told me it couldn’t reset the password for that user
developerResponse:
{'id': 14987868, 'body': 'Hey. Could you please try resetting your password from a laptop or PC. This provides a more secure connection, and should do the trick. Remember, you can use either your username or linked email address to login. Just make sure you’ve typed it correctly with no spaces. 

Let’s get you back on the app,
Team Depop
', 'modified': '2020-04-29T09:13:33Z'}

title: Getting worse
review: I've been on depop since 17' and have made my fair share of sells on this app. However depop's new guidelines honestly have gotten a lot more strict. Which I understand, but I got my posts removed for my hashtags. My descriptions and items are all authentic and true and they could have just sent me a warning to take off hashtags I put for exposure rather just deleting my entire post. This honestly made me not want to sell on this app anymore. Bye depop.

title: Scam Alert, Support Team Lousy Job
review: The app is good overall, honestly I love the clothes and items there but there are sellers whose are not very honest. And I have been spammed which, obviously, is not a cool thing.  And the support team don’t help with fully protecting my money... because the seller disappeared and deleted the account. That worries me because that person probably did a lot of scamming, to other people than me...and that seller could cash in a pretty lot of the money. which disappoints me. I hope I gets my money back somehow :(
developerResponse:
{'id': 15490341, 'body': "Hey. We can imagine how frustrating this is. Head in-app to 'Settings - Support - Need help - Buying - My purchase - I haven't received my item'.

We also moderate the app 24/7 to ensure scammers are kept away. If you notice anything suspicious, please report the item/user in-app (by clicking on the 3 dots top right of their profile/item) so we can investigate.

We're here to help,
Team Depop
", 'modified': '2020-05-22T11:02:14Z'}

title: Love this app!
review:
The idea to bring thrifting to an online platform is genius and the interface is super easy to navigate. 

For the next update it would be even better if we can delete multiple items from our wishlist at once.
developerResponse: {'id': 13803097, 'body': "Hey. Thanks for the feedback. We love hearing about what we can do to improve Depop for our Community. When you succeed, we succeed. We'll be passing this along to our Product Team.\n\nTeam Depop", 'modified': '2020-03-02T11:08:21Z'}

title: Terrible
review: This app is full of fakes, overpriced items, and listings totally unrelated to clothing.  Do not use this app if you are looking to spend anywhere above $40 because the item is most likely fake and the customer service is terrible.  A bad UI and inability to sort or filter well and the lack of prices without clicking on listing  also makes it a pain to use.  I was really hoping this app would be good but honestly do yourself a favor and get grailed.
developerResponse: {'id': 14083040, 'body': "Hey. We have a team of experts working round the clock to ensure counterfeits are kept of off the app. If you see anything you think may not be authentic, or isn't a valid listing, just report it to us by clicking the 'three dots' on the item. We'll take it from there. As for your suggestions around usability, we're constantly working to ensure our users can buy, sell and discover with ease. We've got some exciting developments coming soon, so stay tuned.\n\nTeam Depop", 'modified': '2020-03-18T09:59:15Z'}

title: Love this app!
review: This app has helped me get a new phone and put money towards a car! I’ve tried every selling app and this one by far has been the best! Love it for buying too, never had a problem. My shop is creer3 if you want to check it out I’d really appreciate it (:
developerResponse: {'id': 12549708, 'body': "We love this. Empowering our users to go on journeys like this is what it's all about. Keep killing it.\n\nTeam Depop", 'modified': '2019-12-23T15:26:41Z'}

title: Love it!
review: I love depop. I shop on other thrift sites but the fact that most sellers model their clothes helps when shopping online. Having a direct line of communication with them is also great. The prices tend to be lower and I like buying from individuals too. I have only had positive experiences!

title: Annoying
review: I get depop notifications every day. Open the app theres nothing there. I also have my settings to only notify me when Ive sold something and I get a notification for every promotion, like sunglasses giveaways and free shipping over $100. Leave me alone depop and let me sell my clothing.

I’ve enjoyed my experience both buying and selling on Depop so far. Have come across spammers though quite frequently but I think Depop’s on top of them to delete the accounts. Overall great place to look for vintage and unique clothing that others won’t have.
developerResponse: {'id': 5873938, 'body': "We like spammers less than anyone else, we'll be sure to be on top of this for you. Welcome to the community.\n\nLove, Depop", 'modified': '2018-11-09T11:04:47Z'}

title: Love the app! Would be better if you could turn on post notifications for users
review: Adding post notifications for user profiles would make it easier to buy the product so you can be the first person to it.

title: Great App!
review: I’ve been selling on here for about 4-5 months and have made some great sales. I think it’s a great app to clean out your closet and earn some extra money. The amount of fees it takes out and stuff is a little much but just be aware of that when listing ur prices! ❤️❤️❤️
developerResponse:
{'id': 16344179, 'body': "Hey, thanks for the review. Our 10% fee allows us to keep Depop running smoothly. It contributes towards the cost of running the app, creating new features and improving our Community’s experience. 
 
See our article about fees by going to 'Settings - Need help' and typing in ‘What about fees’.
Team Depop
", 'modified': '2020-07-01T18:38:52Z'}

title: Rules applied arbitrarily
review: After receiving a message from a depop staff (with blue check so I know it was staff) telling me it wasn’t allowed to tag staff to try and get featured (which sellers had previously been encouraged to do) I immediately deleted my staff tags and haven’t done it since. However—numerous items on the Explore page today have staff tagged in them. Why are there different rules for different sellers?

title: Great but every once in a while, it crashes
review: It is great most of the time. But twice already this month, i had to delete the app and re-download because the app will not open anymore. Re-downloading the app does help this problem but I don’t want to keep deleting and re-downloading the app to fix it

title: Great app but there’s one downside...
review: So Depop mandatorily takes 10% out of whatever you sell in order to keep the app up and running, that’s fine, but the problem is they are starting to take MORE than 10%. This has happened to me multiple times and it is absolutely unfair. I have emailed their support team multiple times only to receive no answer. I’m not sure what kind of scam you’re running here but this is disgraceful.
developerResponse:
{'id': 18215188, 'body': 'Ciao,

grazie per averci scritto. Abbiamo ricevuto la tua email e ti risponderemo presto, promesso!

Nel frattempo perché non dai un occhio alla sezione Aiuto all’interno dell’app? Troverai le risposte alle domande più frequenti. Apri l’app, vai in Profilo (o, su Android, vai alla sezione principale del tuo profilo) » Aiuto » Domande frequenti. Se preferisci, puoi anche trovare queste informazioni nel nostro «a href="https://depop.zendesk.com/hc/it" target="\\_blank"»Centro Assistenza«/a» online.

Se vuoi segnalarci un problema con una transazione per favore fallo tramite l’app. In questo modo avremo tutte le informazioni necessarie per indagare e darti la migliore assistenza. 
Vai al tuo Profilo (o, su Android, vai alla sezione principale del tuo profilo) » Aiuto » Problemi con una transazione e segui le istruzioni.

Grazie, saremo presto da te.

Buona giornata
Team Depop', 'modified': '2020-10-01T12:21:27Z'}

title: Somewhat difficult to get a hang of as a beginner
review: I’m having a somewhat difficult time trying to figure out if I got paid or not, (it says received - pending) and I can’t do anything to find out since there is no button or anything else that reads what’s happening ... also how to create a shipping label. I got two 1 star reviews because I don’t ship the item until I have the funds which brings me back to why I don’t like this app.
developerResponse:
{'id': 17298999, 'body': "
Hey, sorry about this.
 
If you can follow this link and submit a request if you're still struggling that would be great. https://depophelp.zendesk.com/hc/en-gb/articles/360046290994-I-can-t-access-my-shipping-label-USPS-MyHermes-
 
Team Depop
", 'modified': '2020-08-15T21:35:19Z'}

title: Organized Horribly
review: You would think you are shopping at a messy thrift store the way this app is run. Even when you ask to show new items they are all jumbled in and don’t automatically show the new items up top. They are mixed in with everything else so I’m constantly seeing the same things over and over again. Take a tip from Mercari because they give you alerts when new items on your saved searches are posted. Hire a new app developer please.

title: Favorite shopping app ever!!
review: I’ve been using depop for a couple of months now and I’m so IN LOVE with it! My style is very 80’s/90’s, vintage-hipster-retro type, and with depop it fits my needs exactly. It’s practically a big thrift store! Which is great because I don’t have to leave my house to go to the other side of town to thrift at lol
developerResponse: {'id': 5971747, 'body': 'Winter is coming and Depop is here to help you stay in the comfort of your house.\n\nLove, Depop', 'modified': '2018-11-16T09:26:40Z'}

title: Tired
review: I have been so tired of trying to shop at depop recently. I need a plaid skirt. I search plaid skirt up and as I scroll through the search results, most of the clothes were tops, dresses, and other random items. When I click on them, people are writing paragraphs of words and excusing it as “tagging for exposure.” I cannot find any items anymore because of this!!! If you are a seller, please stop doing this. I purposely will not buy clothes from sellers because of this. Depop needs to somehow make this stop.

title: LISTINGS NOT SHOWING UP ON SEARCH
review: For the past week none of my clothes have been showing up in searches so no one has been coming to my page. I’m a small shop and don’t have much of a base to be able to rely on followers. I tried emailing and messaging you guys but still haven’t gotten a response. BTW OTHER THAN THIS I HAVEN'T HAD ANY PROBLEMS WITH DEPOP. Depop please fix this because for a lot of people this is their full time job.
developerResponse:
{'id': 15777865, 'body': "Hey, our support response times are currently slightly longer due to the current pandemic, but we'll be in touch ASAP.
 
 
We're here for you,
Team Depop

", 'modified': '2020-06-04T13:41:32Z'}

title: Bad service
review: I actually liked this app until I bought from someone who will not reply and will not send me my stuff I paid for. I have tried talking with Depop to see if they could sort it out because I didn’t used a card connected to a paypal account. No help at all I get the same automated email telling me the same thing I’ve already tried. I really thought I was protected but YOU'RE REALLY NOT. I’ll probably uninstall this app without even getting my money or the thing I paid for. Great protection Depop!
developerResponse:
{'id': 15577697, 'body': "Hey, our support response times are currently slightly longer due to the current pandemic, but we'll be in touch ASAP.
 
We're here for you,
Team Depop
", 'modified': '2020-05-26T16:09:31Z'}

title: Good app, need to work on fees
review: Honestly, I love this app so much! It is a wonderful platform to sell and buy clothing and other items. The community on here is amazing and most people are kind and helpful! The only problem I have is the fees, they seem to be irregular and I still don’t really understand them completely. Overall, wonderful app.
developerResponse:
{'id': 15396196, 'body': "Hey, thanks for the review. Our 10% fee allows us to keep Depop running smoothly. It contributes towards the cost of running the app, creating new features and improving our Community’s experience. 

See our article about fees by going to 'Settings - Need help' and typing in ‘What about fees’.
Team Depop
", 'modified': '2020-05-18T15:36:15Z'}

title: good app overall currently has terrible bug
review: Please fix the search aspect of your app, I frequently skim through my favorite brands for items but I can’t deal with being sent back to the top of the results after looking at a listing that I scrolled pretty far for. If this could be resolved asap that’d be great thanks.
developerResponse:
{'id': 15395796, 'body': "Hey, sorry to hear about this! The good news is we've got a fix for this bug on the way. 
 
Stay tuned, 
Team Depop
", 'modified': '2020-05-18T15:14:03Z'}

title: Problems with the app?
review: I love the app, but recently it’s been giving me issues because it doesn’t seem to even start when I open the app. It shows a blank screen for about 30 seconds and then crashes. Would be great if I could get a response as to why this is happening. I’ve done all the troubleshooting solutions online but nothing seems to work :/.
developerResponse:
{'id': 12704406, 'body': 'Hey. I can imagine how frustrating this is. Please try removing cached data by going to ‘Settings - Apps - Depop - Storage - Clear Data’ on your phone. Then, completely delete and re-download the app. 

Still crashing? Drop us a line at support@depop.com.

We’ll get this sorted,
Team Depop', 'modified': '2020-01-03T10:21:38Z'}

title: Great App, Keeps Glitching
review: This is my favorite buying/selling app, but recently every time I open the app, it completely freezes and won’t let me scroll or tap anything! I get notifications that I’ve been messaged, but because of the app freezing I can’t even see what the messages are, much less respond to them.
developerResponse:
{'id': 11146117, 'body': "Hey there. Thanks for the feedback. We're currently working on a quick fix for this.

In the meantime, please try removing cached data by going to ‘Settings - Apps - Depop - Storage - Clear Data’ on your phone. Then, completely delete and re-download the app. Still crashing? Drop us a line at support@depop.com.
 
We’ll get this sorted,
Team Depop", 'modified': '2019-10-09T10:49:34Z'}

title: WRONGFULLY SUSPENDED
review: I was really enjoying this app and selling a lot from my closet. Then about 2 weeks after downloading, the app logged me out. When I tried to log in it said my account was suspended. I have no idea why I would be suspended. I emailed the support team several times and have gotten no response. This was SUPER frustrating as I had just sold to two buyers and am unable to communicate with them. This is actually one of the most annoying things I have experienced and I still don’t know what to do.

title: Suspended my account..
review: Depop suspended my account because I sold two things around 6-8pm on August 20th ,2019 and i couldn’t ship them out because the post office was closed and then sold another thing later that night and they shut my account down because i wasn’t “delivering fast enough” or something of that nature. So furious and I even purchased something’s and now it’s hard to contact the seller because they won’t ship out my package! ABSOLUTELY HORRIBLE.

title: I like this app
review: I like this app. You can really make some money on it. The only problem is that sometimes it kicks me out to my home screen. That’s the only glitch. I don’t know if this happens to everyone. The good news is once u got kicked I out from the app I could immediately go into the app🤑🤑🤑🤑🤑🤑🤑🤑🤑🤑🤑🤑🤑🤑🤑🤑🤑🤑💵💵💵💵💵💵💵💵💵💵💵💵💵💵💵💵💵💳💳💳💳💳💳💳💳💳💳💳💳💳💳💳💳💰💰💰💰💰💰💰💰💰💰💰💰💰💰💰💰

title: Love depop but..
review: I've been using depop for about a year now. When I first started selling depop would often feature my items on the explore page and it's been months since that has happened! I see the same people on the explore and it's just not fair. Those people already have a big following. Give the small accounts a chance like you used to!

title: DO NOT US depop
review: You can say you get what you pay for but for depops case you do not get exactly what you pay for. If a package gets lost say goodbye both to your package and money, say goodbye to seller cuz majority of the time they will disappear and you can notify depop but all they will do is send you the same email over and over n over n over again... -.-)(seriously) depop is not an app you can trust nor depend to keep your money or package safe that being said I strongly advise (DO NOT USE depop!) you got a better chance on Craigslist sadly
developerResponse: {'id': 3316671, 'body': "Hey there - this sounds far away from the experience we offer our users, and we'd encourage you to update this review to include your Depop @username so that we can investigate what's happened here. We hope you'll take the time to do this, as we're keen to help. Many thanks, Team Depop", 'modified': '2018-05-01T14:33:46Z'}

title: Hate Depop
review: So I just made 3 sales and I was so happy about it, until I got suspended from the app forever. My PayPal was in the process of getting verified and I just don’t know why I’m banned from depop?? All I want is for my customers to get their orders. They probably think I scammed them but I didn’t. Please help. :(
developerResponse: {'id': 10233976, 'body': "Hi there, sorry to hear your experience hasn't gone to plan. In order to keep our Community a safe space we ensure that all decisions made to permanently suspend users are taken after careful consideration and deep investigation. If you feel as though an unfair decision has been made, please reach out to us at support@depop.com with supporting proof as to why you should be let back on the app.\n\nTeam Depop", 'modified': '2019-08-19T10:15:21Z'}

title: Crash issue
review: I’ve been using this app for a while now and I love it. I’ve sold a lot of things through this app. The most recent update however has caused my app to crash when I open and I can’t access my customers info to ship items out or get into contact with them. Please fix this soon.

title: Sketchy
review: Don’t get me wrong I’ve made money using this app/bought cute things and most users are respectful but there are so many scam artists and people trying to rip you off on this app. Community guidelines are very poorly enforced and buyer protection is practically nonexistent compared to the other buying/selling apps I’ve used. I’ll continue to use Depop for now (unless my account is suspended for this review), but I don’t really recommend it overall.
developerResponse: {'id': 19676231, 'body': 'Hey. We moderate the app 24/7 to ensure scammers are kept away. If you notice anything suspicious, please report the item/user in-app (by clicking the 3 dots (...) top right of their profile/item) so we can investigate.\n\nTeam Depop', 'modified': '2020-12-10T15:45:42Z'}

title: Honest review.
review: I’ve given this app numerous amounts of times, within the past year. Mind you, I’ve never made an account using my email address or phone number. I’ve tried logging in through Facebook, or Apple ID and once again it says “failed to log in”. This is getting ridiculous, I tried forgot my password, and it says it cannot reset pastors for that email address. I’ve tried signing up again, and it says I already have an account. This is so annoying.

title: Sensitive
review: I got banned because I was joking around with my friend with some foul language, which I understand is a bad thing with with an app and I apologize, however, you guys completely banned my account without even giving me a warning and when I try to make a new account you guys banned my IP address so I can’t. I emailed you guys with no reply, but I heard your guys customer service is horrible. My shop was: wos101. I would appreciate if you let me back in my account . It was a joke. Too sensitive

title: Disappointed
review: I love Depop and it’s always been kinda glichie with me but now since the update it virtually freezes on me and the screen goes white every time I try to view anything. I hate leaving a bad review on an app I love so much but it def needs to focus more on performance rather than new features.
developerResponse:
{'id': 18530575, 'body': "Hey Amina,

 We can imagine how frustrating this is and we’re currently working to resolve this issue. Please get in touch by going to 'Settings - Need help - Technical issues - I've still got an issue' and send us a report leaving your username and details regarding your listings. 
 
We’ll take it from here,
Team Depop
", 'modified': '2020-10-16T19:07:03Z'}

title: Laggy
review: I love this app, and I’ve been using it for years. But lately, every time I’m trying to upload an item to sell, the app lags terribly. I can’t even type the description in the app anymore because it lags and won’t type what I want my description to say. It also lags when choosing the other options for listing. Instead of taking a few minutes per post, it’s now taking 10 minutes per post to even get the app to cooperate.
developerResponse:
{'id': 17279498, 'body': "Hey, we can imagine how frustrating this is and we’re currently working to resolve this issue. Please get in touch by going to 'Settings - Need help - Technical issues - I've still got an issue' and send us a report leaving your username and details regarding your listings. 
 
We’ll take it from here,
Team Depop
", 'modified': '2020-08-14T08:40:37Z'}

title: Search inefficiency
review: Love depop, BUT they need to fix the search element because every time i search something and scroll and try to look at an item when i go back to the search it makes me go all the way to the beginning again  and have to scroll so much to find where i was.
developerResponse:
{'id': 15871315, 'body': "Hey, we can imagine how frustrating this is. Please get in touch by going to 'Settings - Need help - Technical issues - I've still got an issue' and send us a report.
 
We’ll take it from here,
Team Depop
", 'modified': '2020-06-09T10:13:37Z'}

title: Won’t let me back in my account
review: Depop is overall good but I wrote down everything that I signed in with and accidentally deleted the app I download it again I keep trying to log in my account and it won’t let me and I can’t use my phone number because it will say a account is already logged in for this reason I will no longer be using the app.
developerResponse:
{'id': 15472261, 'body': "Hey, we’re sorry to hear this and we can imagine how frustrating this must be. Could you please submit a support request via this link https://depophelp.zendesk.com/hc/en-gb/articles/360001904568-I-m-locked-out-of-my-account'. Please remember to include your:
- Username
- Email address
- Phone number
- Phone operating system, example iOS 13
 
Let’s get this sorted,
Team Depop
", 'modified': '2020-05-21T15:26:33Z'}

title: Can’t look for items
review: Every time I’ve scrolled, clicked on an item to view it, then went back to search it always brings me back to the very top of the search. This gets pretty annoying and makes it super difficult to look through items. Other than this I haven’t encountered any other software related problems
developerResponse:
{'id': 15395880, 'body': "Hey, sorry to hear about this! The good news is we've got a fix for this bug on the way. 
 
Stay tuned, 
Team Depop
", 'modified': '2020-05-18T15:17:54Z'}

title: Annoying sometimes
review: today I decided to post some things on my depop to sell, and all of a sudden I was logged out! it told me that I had to wait and try again later to log back in. I had already had this issue with my previous account and made a new one. I’m not sure why this is happening and I hate it. that being said I love the concept, would really appreciate some help with this issue though.
developerResponse:
{'id': 15249576, 'body': 'Hey. Could you please try resetting your password from a laptop or PC. This provides a more secure connection, and should do the trick. Remember, you can use either your username or linked email address to login. Just make sure you’ve typed it correctly with no spaces. 

Let’s get you back on the app,
Team Depop
', 'modified': '2020-05-11T19:37:14Z'}

title: Poor Management
review: Are you looking to scam people from their money? This is your app. There is literally no management. All DePop replies are automated- see below. No help. No effort made whatsoever. Seller gets to ignore messages, DePop sends patronizing auto replies and the buyer gets absolutely NO PRODUCT and NO HELP whatsoever! Literally points fingers at everyone else (Contact PayPal! No, call your bank! Contact the seller over and over repeatedly until you sound like a desperate deranged bully stalker!) without any attempt at resolution. Theft and extremely poorly managed.
developerResponse: {'id': 13136773, 'body': "Hey. We offer full buyer protection in the rare event that things don't go to plan. We also have very strong measures in place to assure this doesn't happen in the first instance. If you need a hand, just reach out. We're here for you.\n\nTeam Depop", 'modified': '2020-01-27T12:58:17Z'}

title: The latest update
review: I love this app! However, the latest update made a slight change in search for clothings. The features and sort bar on the bottom is really a n n o y i n g! As I scroll down it’s disappeared then when I release to continue to scroll it’ll reappear over and over it starts to get buggy! Please change it back or something better not in that WAY!
developerResponse: {'id': 11241749, 'body': "Hey. Thanks for the feedback. We love hearing about what we can do to improve Depop for our Community. When you succeed, we succeed. I'll be passing this along to our Product Team.\n\nTeam Depop", 'modified': '2019-10-14T15:35:39Z'}

title: Depop
review: I just got wind of DEPOP and I am super excited and super nervous! Super excited because you can post videos I love that feature. Super nervous because it’s a lot of vintage things listed and I have more modern fashion, but I will make it work. Depop is the future for sure. Hope to make the explore page one day 💋
developerResponse: {'id': 5275533, 'body': "Kaytee, this is the nicest thing we've ever read. We are excited because you are excited about our exciting future together. So much love, Team Depop", 'modified': '2018-09-28T09:26:45Z'}

title: Great but...
review: I love this app so much. It’s very easy to use and the “For You” page is awesome. But it keeps crashing. Every time i try to open it it will crash and takes forever to re-open. I can’t open my messages or check who just followed me, and everything else just shows the loading screen.
developerResponse:
{'id': 10164772, 'body': "Hi there! Thanks for the rave review and being transparent about your experience - that doesn't sound good at all about the app crashing.

Could you please send us a screen recording video of your problem to support@depop.com so we can do some investigating, alternatively get in touch by going to 'settings - support - need help - technical issues - I've still got a problem' and either chat to us or send a report.

Let's get you happy again,
Team Depop", 'modified': '2019-08-14T10:12:14Z'}

title: So many problems.
review: The only redeeming factor about this app is that they only take a 10% cut of sales, everything other than that is a fail. Even if the item listed doesn’t infringe on the terms and conditions, your item listing will be deleted, depop only enforces rulers when it’s reported from the buyer. As a seller your pretty much on your own. The app crashes regularly and there seems to be a lot more scammers on the page.
developerResponse: {'id': 6174563, 'body': "Sorry to hear about your whole experience. Please do make sure to send support a mail if you feel an item has been delete that shouldn't have been deleted. They will look through this and list the item back up if it's a fault from our end. \n\nLove, Depop", 'modified': '2018-11-30T07:14:10Z'}

title: Decent App
review: It’s a good app for selling clothing. My only complaints are that the brand choices are limited, it would be nice to be able to post more than four photos for an item, and when I get a notification from the app I have to click on the notification 2-3 times before it will clear.

title: Read
review: I like that they only take 10% but I hate that the leaving feedback is difficult. I sold something and I couldn’t figure out how to leave feedback until the person who bought it helped me. Then I bought something and there wasn’t a button to leave feedback

title: Beware of their overcharging on fees.
review: Depop sure is sneaky. They are easy to purchase from sure, but when it comes to selling, get ready for it. They send you a nice polite email saying “you paid xx in fees” and when PayPal lets you know of their “payment” it’s usually 2-3 dollars more. Why? Because you’re paying for sales tax. They do not advertise this whatsoever and you are stuck paying for the sales tax that THEY should pay for. Their support is also a joke. If you can use a different app. I’m tired of the lies.

title: Login Issues
review: I like the app but I have deleted and re-downloaded it multiple times and it wont let me log in. I have changed my password multiple times and still it wont let me log in, I’ve tried on both the website and the app and cant log in on either. My password is correct and I’ve even changed it about three times and tried to log in and still nothing. Please fix this, there are so many things I’d love to buy if I could log in. :(

title: I don’t like the new format
review: Can depop got back to the old format, I can’t stand only having 2 columns to look at it makes it feel like it’s taking forever to look through all the items I’m interested in
developerResponse: {'id': 18528329, 'body': "Hey Jules,\n\nThanks for the feedback. We love hearing about what we can do to improve Depop for our Community. When you succeed, we succeed. We'll be passing this along to our Product Team. Team Depop", 'modified': '2020-10-16T16:15:09Z'}

title: If I could give less than 1 star, I would
review: I started selling at the beginning of 2019, and I loved Depop ever since. It was so much fun. As of today I had almost 300 sales, 200 something reviews, and thousands of followers. They closed my account, won’t give me the option to appeal, and NO ONE in customer service will respond to me. I emailed and sent messages on Twitter. This is so sad because it’s my only source of income. I have always been a friendly and honest seller and this is how I’m repaid. F Depop
developerResponse:
{'id': 18829993, 'body': "Hey there,

We’re sorry to hear your experience hasn't gone to plan. In order to keep our Community safe, all decisions made to suspend users and items are taken after deep investigation and consideration. If you feel this is unfair, just drop us a reply in the original email thread. We’re always happy to take a second look.
Team Depop
", 'modified': '2020-11-01T16:44:19Z'}

title: Vintage Clothes Haven
review: I was looking for a white Harley Davidson tee that sold on Grailed for 85$. I thought I’d never find anything similar to it, but I eventually found it here and for less!! This app’s community is growing by the day, so much movement is going on in depop! If u love clothing as much as I do, then do yourself a favor and try it out!
developerResponse: {'id': 17298966, 'body': "We couldn't agree more.\n\nTeam Depop", 'modified': '2020-08-15T21:27:56Z'}

title: THEY TOOK MY MONEY
review: So I’ve only sold a few items on Depop, but I soon stopped selling once I realized they took over 50% of my profit. I was supposed to make about $36 on three items, but I only ended up making about $15. They disclosed that they would take 10% from each sale (which is fine), but I found that they also automatically took another 10% and what the buyers paid me for shipping costs as well. I am very disappointed, and I would not recommend selling on this app.
developerResponse:
{'id': 16730648, 'body': "Hey, thanks for the review. Our 10% fee allows us to keep Depop running smoothly. It contributes towards the cost of running the app, creating new features and improving our Community’s experience. 
 
See our article about fees by going to 'Settings - Need help' and typing in ‘What about fees’.
Team Depop
", 'modified': '2020-07-19T20:29:57Z'}

title: Refunds
review: I love the aesthetic of depop and I think this is an awesome platform for finding authentic vintage and trendy pieces. That being said, I ordered a dress from Depop and the seller never shipped it. I had to open a dispute with PayPal and it was almost an entire month before I was refunded. I had a similar issue with a seller on Poshmark, Poshmark resolved the issue and refunded me within days. If you can find the item you want on Poshmark, that would probably be a safer route as far as refunds go.
developerResponse: {'id': 13716035, 'body': "Hey Lily. We're sorry to hear your experience didn't go to plan. Our number one priority is the happiness of you, our Community, and we're sure there's a great experience right around the corner. We're currently working on some updates around payments at Depop, which we think you'll love. So stay tuned, more coming soon.\n\nTeam Depop", 'modified': '2020-02-26T12:09:39Z'}

title: Terrible
review: There's too many bot issues. Too many scams happen and the app moderators don't help at all. They just tell you to make a Paypal claim. They say they don't allow people to make sales outside the app (which makes the chances of you getting scammed higher) but if their moderators like you they let you make outside sales, if they don't they block you off the app. It's really glitchy also and has constant maintenance issues. Too many problems and poor customer / seller service.

title: False notifications
review: Almost every time I open the app it says I have a sale notification but there is no sale. I think it’s a bug with the notification setting. Sometimes I have to open the app, hit the home button and close out but open the app again in order for the badge icon prompting the false notification to go away. 😳🙄
developerResponse: {'id': 6450960, 'body': "It is a bit annoying isn't it? Thank you for passing this feedback. We're currently having a look into this and see how we can resolve this ASAP for you guys. Hang in there, we got you.\n\nLove, Depop", 'modified': '2018-12-19T02:00:41Z'}

title: Love the app but...
review: I love this app it’s super easy to navigate. Makes selling and buying a breeze. Although I feel like it should have a way of alerting you of sales (or price drops) from people you fallow if not items you’ve liked. I feel like this would be a great feature and make it even more easier to sell.
developerResponse: {'id': 5258775, 'body': "We LOVE this idea. Who doesn't want to know of a good sale. Good for the heart bad for the wallet, but it's all good. Will pass this feedback on to our team.\n\nLove, Depop", 'modified': '2018-09-27T11:04:44Z'}

title: Option to add more than 4 photos per listing.
review: As a seller the limit of only adding 4 photos per listing is very tedious. Therefor the option to add more than 4 picture should be added. Being only allowed to list 4 photos makes it hard to capture the glory of items with such little detail.
developerResponse: {'id': 4688741, 'body': "Hey Ariel! We introduced a video feature to listings a few months back, and whilst we don't have plans to increase the number of images you can upload we do feel that this new feature will give you another outlet to better show off the items you're selling. Thanks, Team Depop", 'modified': '2018-08-16T13:03:07Z'}

title: Just Starting Out
review: I’m new to the app, but have made 3 purchases. They’ve all been pretty smooth. Easy interface that lots of people are familiar with. I wouldn’t take anything away from this because it’s good as it, I would say just to add on to what’s there. Other than that the app is Great! I will still continues to use it

title: I love the app but the glitches are not it
review: i can’t explain to you how many times i’m casually on the app and then it just shuts down and stops working and keeps saying error it’s so annoying. I don’t even have an old phone. I have an 11 pro max and the app always stops work very inconvenient especially when you’re in the middle of finding a good buy PLEASE FIX THIS DEPOP

title: Depop is stealing my money
