review: Ever since I set up depop payments I haven’t received any money.... there is no one I can call or contact. If this isn’t figured out soon I will be deleting my account. I’m not making all this money for depop to keep.  If you are looking to make yourself some money I’d look for another app because these people have taken hundreds from me that I am trying my best to get back but depop wants it to be as hard as possible. I DO NOT RECOMMEND! I will update my review if anything changes

title: The app doesn’t work
review: I downloaded the app and it doesn’t let me make an account or login. I tried everything like logging in with Apple, Facebook, and all of the emails I made. When I try to make an account it says “oops something went wrong try again” and it doesn’t ever work. I had the same problem a couple months ago and it doesn’t let me do anything even when I wait a month to re download or try deleting and re downloading.... can someone pls help :/
developerResponse:
{'id': 18129419, 'body': "Hey there,

Sorry to hear about this. If you can submit a request via this link we'll help you get onto Depop ASAP.

https://bit.ly/depopsignup

Team Depop
", 'modified': '2020-09-27T20:50:53Z'}

title: WORST APP
review: hello i am a buyer and seller on this app. there is a lot of things that need to be fixed on this app but that’s not why i’m here for. i recently got in contact with the depop team and they’re uncooperative. they blocked me from my account for no reason and won’t even help me wit hmm any questions. they keep sending me the same emails as before and ask me to provide documentation of stuff i already have gave them. honestly one of the most annoying, so unprofessional and seems like it’s ran by teenagers
developerResponse:
{'id': 17653429, 'body': " 
Hey, we’re sorry to hear your experience hasn't gone to plan. In order to keep our Community safe, all decisions made to suspend users and items are taken after deep investigation and consideration. If you feel this is unfair, just drop us a reply in the original email thread. We’re always happy to take a second look.
 
Team Depop
", 'modified': '2020-09-02T15:38:46Z'}

review: i think depop is a good app to sell your cloths and stuff but i’ve been having problems with the shipping, on only some of my items it says i can mark them as shipped but then others it dosnt, i don’t know what to tell my buyers and they just have to trust my word. Also since it says i can’t marked it as shipped i also can’t get a review back so please please please depop fix this oml
developerResponse:
{'id': 17534873, 'body': " 
Hey, we can imagine how frustrating this is and we’re currently working to resolve this issue. Please get in touch by going to 'Settings - Need help - Technical issues - I've still got an issue' and send us a report leaving your username and details regarding your listings. 
 
We’ll take it from here,
Team Depop
", 'modified': '2020-08-27T09:40:31Z'}

title: Just one thing
review: I love using Depop as a shopper as it has a simple and easy design, and is easy to navigate. However I do wish that there was a feature that enabled you to select multiple items from your saves or likes folder to move them easily. Please look into that.

title: Rearranging
review:
The app is good. Just wish you could rearrange your listings/posts from the app on your phone. Not everyone has a computer they can go on to do that. 
Also you should be able to move your likes to different categories even after you’ve liked them.
developerResponse: {'id': 9142090, 'body': 'Hi Rose, thank you for the feedback. Will make sure this is passed on to the team for you.\n\nLove, Depop', 'modified': '2019-06-13T06:34:00Z'}

title: for the amount of people using this app it glitches way too much
review: i’m a frequent seller on depop and have sold over 200 things at this point. i’ve been buying stuff on depop for the last two years and they have thousands and thousands of people using the app and yet they seem to be unable to fix the simplest bugs. i currently can’t post without the app glitching out and closing 3 times and having to restart all over again. the app should not be taking 10% of buyers profit if they can’t even put a small percent back into the app to make it basically function. until this and other things change i will try selling on other apps as this one is extremely disappointing and could have so much more potential
developerResponse:
{'id': 17264773, 'body': "Hey, we can imagine how frustrating this is and we’re currently working to resolve this issue. Please get in touch by going to 'Settings - Need help - Technical issues - I've still got an issue' and send us a report leaving your username and details regarding your listings. 
 
We’ll take it from here,
Team Depop
", 'modified': '2020-08-13T14:28:27Z'}

title: BUGS STARTED TONIGHT
review: the app logged me out and i can’t get back in on my phone, i changed my password twice thinking it was me. i can log in on my laptop but as soon as i check messages it glitches out and won’t load it says operation error or something. i just updated the last right now to see if it would help but it didn’t do anything.  fix pleaseeeee
developerResponse: {'id': 16719370, 'body': "Hey! The good news is we've fixed this bug, if you update to the latest version it should be resolved now. Team Depop", 'modified': '2020-07-18T22:42:20Z'}

title: Makes me not want to use the app
review:
Lots of cool items on here, but it’s hard to get to them all. It’s super frustrating to be deep on a page and you click something you like, then when you want to go back to all the other items it takes you all the way back to the top! 

It makes using the app frustrating and not worth it.
developerResponse: {'id': 15443568, 'body': "Hey! The good news is we've fixed this bug, if you update to the latest version it should be resolved now.\n\nTeam Depop", 'modified': '2020-05-20T11:05:48Z'}

title: Love the app
review: I LOVE THIS APP I have been on it for about two weeks and it is the most practical and productive thing ever!💕 but in like the past hour it hasn’t been letting me access my account🙁 so I think there is a bug or something that needs to get fixed
developerResponse:
{'id': 15249311, 'body': 'Hey, we had some temporary outage but it should be fixed now, so you get back to Depoping.
 
Keep exploring,
Team Depop
', 'modified': '2020-05-11T19:20:46Z'}

title: So good, until.....
review: I love Depop so much but the recent update has made me so so frustrated. Every time you search for an item and then leave that post, it scrolls you all the way up to the top of the page once again!!!! It’s like you already went through it so why would u want to go all the way back up then hopefully find the posts again if you were at the bottom of the page! Very VERY irritating

title: Pretty Great, worth a try!
review: I was scared to use Depop before, but it’s a pretty good community! Depop service responds quick to solve any issues with accounts and really anything regarding the people using the app to ensure a good experience! I don’t buy on Depop, but I sell items and it’s never a problem.
developerResponse: {'id': 13666177, 'body': "Hey, thanks for the rave review. We're always here to help you, just reach out if you need us. In the meantime, keep killing it.\n\nTeam Depop", 'modified': '2020-02-24T11:24:27Z'}

review: I’ve stayed loyal to this app for awhile now but they’re simply no help when issues come up, I have multiple issues coming by and no one responds to my emails if they do it’s no help. I’ve sold about 20 items yesterday and they charged my bank account but won’t release the funds I made. I had about $300+ now have -30 in my account since they’ve taken all their “fees” from me. Idk how I’m going to pay any of my foods and shipping when they’ve taken everything I’ve made.
developerResponse:
{'id': 15031979, 'body': "Hey, sorry to hear about this.

Due to the current global situation our support response times are slightly longer currently, but we'll get back to you ASAP, it may also be worth contacting PayPal as it's likely an issue with your account setup.

We'll get this sorted,
Team Depop", 'modified': '2020-05-01T10:21:58Z'}

title: Frustrated with this app!
review: Most of my apps keep me logged in but this one likes to mysteriously log you out and today it did so where it wouldn’t allow me to log back in AT ALL! My password refused to work, the password reset feature never would send me an email to try reseting it and then I get banned for trying JUST a handful of times to log in for a whole 24 hours... good lord! I know my password works and I only use one email for this so what the heck is the problem? Fix your app!
developerResponse:
{'id': 15011022, 'body': 'Hey. Could you please try resetting your password from a laptop or PC. This provides a more secure connection, and should do the trick. Remember, you can use either your username or linked email address to login. Just make sure you’ve typed it correctly with no spaces. 

Let’s get you back on the app,
Team Depop
', 'modified': '2020-04-30T10:36:00Z'}

title: Tags are misleading
review: Overall a good app. It's just become frustrating for me to search for the clothes that I'm looking for as sellers are now tagging their items with every tag that they possibly can to get exposure. Now I realize that none of the items I am looking for are going to show up in the search so I would prefer to look for clothes somewhere else.
developerResponse: {'id': 13689146, 'body': "Hey Taylor. We hear you, this can be very frustrating. However, we're currently working on an update here, which should be with you very soon. Our priority is surfacing the items you want to see, so stay tuned. More coming soon.\n\nTeam Depop", 'modified': '2020-02-25T10:23:56Z'}

title: worth it
review: I have gotten so many adorable clothes from here for a great price! 💕 depop offers so many different styles of fashion you can find almost anything on the app! purchasing in the app and messaging with a seller is very easy and reliable highly recommend! ☺️
developerResponse: {'id': 4767160, 'body': 'Thank you so much for the 5 stars! Team Depop', 'modified': '2018-08-22T12:32:51Z'}

title: Terrible interface
review: The concept is good but the interface is terrible! Seems to be coded by high schoolers with no basic knowledge in how to filter results or reject showing accounts I have blocked (accounts that resell what I assume is upcharged romwe). Also the “for you” section completely ignores your input size filters, what was the point of putting them in then?? This company needs to hire new coders because a company like this should have more than 150 working for them if THIS is all their workers can do.

title: Needs way to set the same shipping details for all your listings!
review: I’ve been selling on Depop for a year now, and I absolutely love the app. It would make it easier though if the shipping details could be set for all the listings you post instead of having to set the address, size, and who’d pay for it every time!
developerResponse: {'id': 10699085, 'body': "Hey. Thanks for the feedback. We love hearing about what we can do to improve Depop for our Community. When you succeed, we succeed. I'll be passing this along to our Product Team. \n\nTeam Depop", 'modified': '2019-09-16T09:56:34Z'}

title: Depop doesn’t care about its loyal users
review: I had a false review written about me on depop that i’ve been using for SEVERAL years and I have grown my shop without depop doing anything for me and what do i get in return? no help. They are not taking down a review that breaks their rules and they are asking me to ask the person who wrote it to take it down? the person who has been crazy rude to me... I have been sexually harassed on this app, I have gotten rude messages on this app and depop doesn’t do anything about anything.
developerResponse: {'id': 7788856, 'body': "Hi Liv, let's get to the bottom of this for you. Can you let us know your username? We can reach out to the support team and investigate the reports further.\n\nLove, Depop", 'modified': '2019-03-18T15:28:19Z'}

title: One thing missing
review:
I love depop and I’ve made some money on here I’m not going to lie. But as a seller I wish there was a “read” or seen” receipt in the DMs. Because sometimes someone will be messaging me and really eager to buy something and then they just stop messaging which gets sooooooo annoying.

Edit to depops response- I rather have read receipts
developerResponse: {'id': 5172428, 'body': 'UPDATE - 22nd September - We can def understand that as it can make this easier for sellers,  I will forward this information to our team and make sure your feedback has been heard as a seller. Thank you so much.\n\nLove, Depop', 'modified': '2018-09-22T10:44:50Z'}

title: I love DEPOP
review: I love using Depop because I love how there are some very unique items on there and it’s just a easy app to shop from all the purchases I’ve ever made were always on time and exactly like the pic never had any problems and my daughter and I have used it for months....
developerResponse: {'id': 3159339, 'body': 'Thanks for this review Alisande! Team Depop', 'modified': '2018-04-17T10:32:06Z'}

title: Send pictures over PM
review: I just started using Depop and I love it, I just wish you could send pictures over private message, it would make it so much easier to talk to a possible buyer if they want more pictures so I don't have to delete the ones on the original post of the item and replace them with the ones that just one specific buyer wants to see
developerResponse: {'id': 3270837, 'body': "Hey there, thanks for this feedback - this is something we know many users are after; we'll bring this up with the relevant people! Team Depop", 'modified': '2018-04-26T13:12:17Z'}

title: Great
review: Could be better! Depop sellers have started selling new items instead of second hand and I wish there was a filter option to remove those from my search. It would also be nice to have additional filters, specifically color, pattern, price, and seller location.

title: Where is customer service ??????!!!!
review: People canceled orders on me and I lost money .... that sucked I gave up on selling.  But I decided to keep purchasing since I didn’t run into any issues with that until recently. A seller hasn’t sent and item or replied to my messages it’s been 11 weeks and I reported it. Depop hasn’t responded to the issue or at least hasn’t notified me . I’m extremely frustrated and just want to delete this app that’s repeatedly jerked me over but I’d at least like to get my 85 bucks back.

title: I can’t login to my account
review: I re-downloaded depop after deleting it a couple months ago and it’s basically impossible to log back in to my account or creat a new one!! Whenever I try to reset my password with my email address it’s says I can’t reset password for that user, and it won’t let me make a new account because I can’t use my phone number twice. And depops customer help is basically non existent. Pls fix this I’m not the only one this has happened to!!

userName: Why Must You Do These Things
title: I love the app, but this is dumb
review: It kicked me out of the account and I use slight variations with my passwords so I wasn’t sure which one I used and because I did so they said I tried too many times and permanently locked my account, it won’t let me reset my password, and I can’t make another account without changing my phone number. For the love of all that is good in this world just let me reset my password, it’s great otherwise, but it’s unusable to me now and I think that’s incredibly dumb.

title: WORST PLATFORM
review: take it from a seller who keeps being threatened by customer service for no reason. They act on false claims and don’t care about their sellers. I’ve sold over $300 this week yet they still want to threaten me over false claims and not even ask me if they’re true or not. Buyers are scammed and never see their money again bc Depop’s negligence. They also delete bad reviews on the App Store but I will continue to post this. Look up their reviews on a different platform they are all 1 stars. STAY AWAY!!!!!!!

title: Horrible
review: At first I didn’t know you couldn’t accept any other form of payment besides through Depop until I received an email from them. I stopped accepting other forms of payment and only accepted through Depop. I later received another email from them saying it was my final warning but I wasn’t doing what they claimed I did. All my sales have been through Depop I had 100+ sales and reviews now if I was accepting other forms of payment I wouldn’t be having 100+ reviews.
developerResponse:
{'id': 18549321, 'body': "Hey there,

We’re sorry to hear your experience hasn't gone to plan. In order to keep our Community safe, all decisions made to suspend users and items are taken after deep investigation and consideration. If you feel this is unfair, just drop us a reply in the original email thread. We’re always happy to take a second look.
 
Team Depop
", 'modified': '2020-10-18T18:36:14Z'}

title: Login
review: I used this app a while ago to buy a bts lightstick but I later had to delete the app because I ran out of storage I finally wanted to get back into the app and it isn’t letting me. I tried going through Facebook but it didn’t do anything so I tried to use my gmail and password and it didn’t work so I then tried to reset my password but it said it couldn’t reset my password. I really want to use this app but I can’t get back into so i really need this fixed asap
developerResponse:
{'id': 16192596, 'body': 'Hey. Could you please try resetting your password from a laptop or PC. This provides a more secure connection, and should do the trick. Remember, you can use either your username or linked email address to login. Just make sure you’ve typed it correctly with no spaces. 
Let’s get you back on the app,
Team Depop
', 'modified': '2020-06-24T11:30:10Z'}

title: Best Clothing App Ever
review: Selling on depop is easy, intuitive, and so fun. They really make it feel like a community, and I feel I always have so much support from the people at Depop when I have problems with customers or the app itself. 10/10 would recommend, I’m addicted!
developerResponse: {'id': 8679871, 'body': 'We love you and your trust in us.\n\nLove, Depop', 'modified': '2019-05-15T08:51:15Z'}

title: App keeps crashing
review: The only reason I gave 2 stars instead of 1 is because I love how user friendly this app has become. We used to not be able to choose our preferences, being a plus sized person, it would take hours for me to even find one thing I liked that would fit me. Now we can choose yay! But for some reason after about 5 min of browsing the app closes out! Please fix u deserve 5 stars
developerResponse: {'id': 9132063, 'body': "Hi there, let's have a look into this for you. Can you please pop over a report via our in-app support Settings - Need Help? - Technical Issues and then we can get this sorted together. Keep us posted ❤️\n\nLove, Depop", 'modified': '2019-06-12T13:37:42Z'}

title: Super Great!
review: Depop is a great app for buying and selling, I’ve had success on both ends. The app is easy to work and works very well with its customers. This is a great spot to buy gifts, clothes, shoes etc for yourself and others or sell your unwanted items. Definitely worth a download.

title: Great but...
review: The app is great for it’s use the only problem is leaving feed back, I can’t give feed back to the things I buy and feel bad not giving feed back about how my items arrived and how great the seller/sellers were I hope the feed back option is fixed in the next update
developerResponse: {'id': 7329728, 'body': "Hello there. Let's have a look into this, this could be different depending on the transaction you are dealing with. Please pop over a report via our in-app support Settings - Need Help? - Technical Issues and then we can get this sorted together. Keep us posted <3", 'modified': '2019-02-17T13:19:01Z'}

title: Not Fair.
review: I love Depop but sometimes its not fair. I buy from a seller that has all 5 stars and good reviews but they don’t send my item / I never get it. They won’t give me a refund but they have “proof” they sent it so then I don't get a refund. I have waited 4 weeks for an item to come that was said to take 1-2 weeks. I am a teenager as in can’t get a job yet except babysitting so this is not fair at all.

title: Flawed Password Reset Process
review: I’m very upset with Depop to be completely honest. When I went to make an account, it turned out my phone number was already associated with an account - which is a requirement for starting an account. However, the only way to change the password for the account my phone number is linked to (so I can gain access) is by sending it to the email associated with the account, which I do not know!! AND THERE IS NO CUSTOMER SERVICE AVAILABLE TO HELP ME, SO THAT I CAN USE THE APP?!!!!?? Please fix this.
developerResponse: {'id': 4856771, 'body': "Apologies for this.. Our Support team are available 7 days a week, and the best way for you to contact them would be via email. They can be reached on support@depop.com. Please remember to include any relevant screenshots in your message, and we'd also ask that you let us know which phone number you're using to sign up with. Team Depop", 'modified': '2018-08-29T09:53:28Z'}

title: Love it but...
review: Even though I haven’t used the app for a while, I’ve noticed that all the clothes are so small. I wish they had a feature or a setting where you can only see clothes that fit your size or at least your measurements. It’s low key irritating when you see a really cute pair of jeans and they’re a size 1-2 when your someone like me, who’s an 8 and proud of it. I just don’t wanna be teased with cute clothes that I can’t wear!!! :)
developerResponse: {'id': 2776056, 'body': "Hey Julez - you can filter by size when you search for an item, which should solve this problem for you? Hopefully this'll just show all the cute stuff you want! Let us know if you're unsure about how to do this. Thanks, Team Depop", 'modified': '2018-03-08T10:49:52Z'}

title: Great app!
review: I really enjoy buying cool things on this app it’s very easy to use. I’ve been experiencing some crashing every time I search an item. I was trying to buy something and then it crashed. I’d love to be fixed as soon as possible. Overall it’s a great app!!

title: Can’t even enter in my address 🤦🏾‍♂️
review: Signed up for your app but every time I try to buy something and enter my address it won’t let me 🥺 It keeps returning back to the input screen every time I choose a state... This is really disappointing 😔
developerResponse:
{'id': 17910092, 'body': " 
Hey, we can imagine how frustrating this is and we’re currently working to resolve this issue. Please get in touch by going to 'Settings - Need help - Technical issues - I've still got an issue' and send us a report leaving your username and details regarding your listings. 
 
We’ll take it from here,
Team Depop
", 'modified': '2020-09-16T11:21:34Z'}

title: Please fix the shipping address it isn’t working for region
review: Whenever I try to purchase an item I go to shipping address, everything works except when I choose my region it locks me out of the whole shipping address tab. Please fix this so I can purchase items 🥺
developerResponse:
{'id': 17951354, 'body': "Hey, we can imagine how frustrating this is and we’re currently working to resolve this issue. Please get in touch by going to 'Settings - Need help - Technical issues - I've still got an issue' and send us a report leaving your username and details.
 
We’ll take it from here,
Team Depop
", 'modified': '2020-09-18T09:33:18Z'}

title: Scammers
review: Be careful every one there’s a lot of scammers on here , I ordered shoes and paid through Venmo, and the guy said he would shipped them and I sent him a message asking if he sent them to ship yet and he said yes and deleted his account and I never received my shoes so please don’t be dumb like me

title: A really good idea
review: Love the app but PLEASE make it to where you can filter out the stuff that has already been sold on the explore it will make things so much easier and better ..... everyone will appreciate it ...please

title: I like it!
review: This app is basically like an eBay or a poshmark, but better! I’m able to find everything I’m looking for, and the sellers are super nice. If you’re looking for Brandy, polo,kanken, or any other trending items, they’re definitely on here. I suggest downloading it, you won’t regret it :)

title: Love hate relationship
review: I love this app bc it’s helped me make a ton of money, but this most recent time I sold a ton of stuff and it won’t let me access my shipping labels. I’ve tried everything and sometimes when I click on the receipts it just logs me out and won’t let me log back in. Wish they would fix the issue so I can ship my items! I can’t without it!
developerResponse: {'id': 16719275, 'body': "Hey! The good news is we've fixed this bug, if you update to the latest version it should be resolved now. Team Depop", 'modified': '2020-07-18T22:12:46Z'}

title: NEEDS A SCROLL FEATURE
review: That’s the only thing that prevents me from spending hours on the app, it’s so annoying being on the explore page and having to click off every picture I want to look at. I understand that fallowing people allows you to do that but I don’t fallow everyone. You guys need one, bad.

title: Needs software improvement
review: I’ve had problems with loading items. Errors purchasing items. And bugs throughout the app. One thing that I don’t like is that when I view my item I lose my place where I scrolled and I had to start from the top. It also needs a filter in the search. Thank you for reading
developerResponse:
{'id': 15340555, 'body': "Hey, sorry to hear about this! The good news is we've got a fix for this bug on the way. 

Stay tuned, 
Team Depop
", 'modified': '2020-05-15T12:04:40Z'}

title: Just doesn’t make sense.
review: Why do you charge the fee from us on SHIPPING? Probably one of the stupidest things I’ve ever seen on a selling platform. Such a surprise on this dumb blatant choice coming from a multi hundred thousand user app. That money hungry huh? Scrounging at the bottom of the barrel at what’s left from sellers after your already outrageous 10% fee that you have to take it out from the shipping costs, the price that both you and I know shouldn’t have a fee taken from. Shame on you guys. Just sad.
developerResponse: {'id': 9141328, 'body': "Hi there, we're sorry to hear you're not having the best experience with us. The fees are taken rom a full transaction once a sale is made. This is done in order to make sure that our users add the correct value for the item and the shipping so that we can protect the community. I hope this clears some issue. If you feel that this may be somewhat confusing, do get in touch with our support team and they can clarify this further.\n\nLove, Depop", 'modified': '2019-06-13T05:33:56Z'}

title: Confused
review: I’m sure this app is great but it looks like I’ll never find out lol. I just heard about this app and was interested and decided to create an account. When going through it I entered my phone number and all the other info but as I hit submit it said my number was already in use. Not sure how that’s possible if I just heard of this app and had never made an account before. I looked on there website and couldn’t find any contact info for customer service.
developerResponse: {'id': 7601752, 'body': "Lauren! We can fix this! \nPop over an email to support@depop.com with your full phone number including the country code, and we'll get on this right away. You will absolutely find out how great Depop is.", 'modified': '2019-03-06T11:52:18Z'}

title: Recent update= not it
review:
Love the app, or what it used to be.
This updated version of the app in my opinion..”not appealing”. It’s sorta ghetto like offer up. Ig if you like that lay out then this is the app for you. 
There are great sellers on this app, just wish this update didn’t change the overall cosmetics of the app :/
developerResponse:
{'id': 18548526, 'body': "Hey there,

 Thanks for the feedback. We love hearing about what we can do to improve Depop for our Community. When you succeed, we succeed. We'll be passing this along to our Product Team.

Team Depop
", 'modified': '2020-10-18T16:39:37Z'}

title: Update failures
review: I can’t view my photos/ other people’s photos/ swipe. This makes it very difficult and frustrating to navigate/purchase/ sell. Please fix. Other than that, app is decent. A lot of up charge for selling but it helps get the job done! You can do really well if you have clout, or take nice photos with detail and a good description.

title: New update
review: I updated depop recently and ever since then the app will freeze multiple times when I’m using it, causing me to have to close and reopen it. Other wise it’s a great app with great opportunities to sell, but the latest update is not the move
developerResponse: {'id': 17787469, 'body': 'Hey there. Sorry to hear about the trouble you’ve experienced. This bug will be fixed in the coming update. Thank you for your patience.\n\nTeam Depop', 'modified': '2020-09-09T16:32:42Z'}

title: Great app, takes your selling profit
review: I love this app. for the longest time i wondered why everyone’s basic things were so expensive. until i realized. i had just made a $25 profit only for depop limited to take $13!!!!! leaving me with $12. i find this absolutely ridiculous and i don’t recommend for selling purposes if you actually want to make a profit. not impressed
developerResponse:
{'id': 18004117, 'body': "Hey, thanks for the review. Our 10% fee allows us to keep Depop running smoothly. It contributes towards the cost of running the app, creating new features and improving our Community’s experience. 
 
See our article about fees by going to 'Settings - Need help' and typing in ‘What about fees’.
Team Depop
", 'modified': '2020-09-21T15:52:23Z'}

title: ADDICTED
review: i love depop! pretty easy to navigate, there are scammers which is pretty inevitable with buy and sell apps. the application itself freezes up sometimes which can be frustrating but others than that the user experience is great.
developerResponse:
{'id': 15853588, 'body': 'Hey. We can imagine how frustrating this is. Please remove cached data by going to ‘Settings - Apps - Depop - Storage - Clear Data’ on your phone. Then, completely delete and re-download the app. 

We’ll get this sorted,
Team Depop
', 'modified': '2020-06-08T15:49:23Z'}

title: Update doesnt give “my size” option
review: Everything is great except, in the updated version, there is no more option to filter clothes of your size. You have to hand-select the sizes every time when you search for something. Frustrating
developerResponse:
{'id': 17298957, 'body': " 
Hey, we can imagine how frustrating this is and we’re currently working to resolve this issue. Please get in touch by going to 'Settings - Need help - Technical issues - I've still got an issue' and send us a report leaving your username and details regarding your listings. 
 
We’ll take it from here,
Team Depop
", 'modified': '2020-08-15T21:25:42Z'}

title: never helped when needed
review: i’ve been emailing depop for the past 8 days about how i can’t get a shipping label to SHIP AN ITEM for my buyer. i’ve emailed depop so much in this span of a week and barely any emails back!! they helped me with one shipping label before but ever since now they haven’t been answering me. the app even logged me out and won’t let me log in anymore. don’t recommend at all because they will not help you when you need it
developerResponse:
{'id': 16719085, 'body': "Hey, our support response times are currently slightly longer due to the current pandemic, but we'll be in touch ASAP.
 
 
We're here for you,
Team Depop
", 'modified': '2020-07-18T21:28:22Z'}

title: Exposure
review: Absolutely amazing app, but people who brand their clothing popular brands for “exposure” are terrible. If I type Urban Outfitters into the search bar, for example, the majority of what pops up is things that AREN’T Urban Outfitters. I have to scroll through a bunch of unnecessary items just to find something that is actually that brand.
developerResponse:
{'id': 15703323, 'body': "Hey, we can imagine how frustrating this is. Please get in touch by going to 'Settings - Need help - Technical issues - I've still got an issue' and send us a report.

We’ll take it from here,
Team Depop
", 'modified': '2020-06-01T14:18:35Z'}

title: The best Jean skirt I bought
review: Saleena is a great person to buy your clothes from she is also a great person to go and ask about the item you will buy she will reply to you as quick as possible and is also very humble and caring person.

title: Horrible
review: I use this app, but the customer service is awful. You have to literally spam their Instagram comments and send up to 10 emails to get them to respond to one. And when they do respond, they basically say "it's not our problem, contact PayPal" and paypal isn't much help either as their customer service is just as bad as depop. If you are looking to sell stuff I would recommend Etsy. Don't even put yourself through the headache that is this app.
developerResponse:
{'id': 15625145, 'body': "Hey, our support response times are currently slightly longer due to the current pandemic, but we'll be in touch ASAP.
 
We're here for you,
Team Depop
", 'modified': '2020-05-28T10:13:43Z'}

title: App update
review: I like using this app a lot but I really really really wish there was an update that you are able to send pictures/videos in the private messages to communicate better with others

title: Best thing ever
review: Depop has helped me get into business with the technology that has been developed for us. getting a business started with out having to stress out to much . It can be a hobby or a full time job, you choose what you want to do sis. Team depop ! Your doing great honey

title: Depop Shippo Shipping label not ideal for label printers
review: Depop should start making their shipping labels optimal for shipping label printer users. They are only ideal for conventional printers. People who use shipping label printers must go through odds and ends to edit the pdf shipping label provided which is very tedious and time consuming. PayPal offers the option to have shipping labels optimal for 4x6 shipping label printers as well as selling apps like Poshmark and Mercari. Depop should look into this ASAP!!

title: need my money back now
review: i have recently bought a product on this website and the seller has yet to mail me my item. it has been 2 weeks and I would like my money back or the product.
developerResponse: {'id': 4767124, 'body': "Hey there! Our support team is best placed to let you know how to retrieve your money - we're sorry you've having to experience this. Please find the transaction on the app and report it so that our team can get back to you. Thanks! Team Depop", 'modified': '2018-08-22T12:29:45Z'}

title: It’s amazing except...
review: It’s an amazing app, I find the cutest clothes and accessories here. I love this app except for the fact that you can only earn/pay with a paypal. I’ve been trying to connect my paypal for a while now and it won’t work. So I can’t shop or sell. I just wish there were other payment methods.

title: Send pictures
review: I think it would be super helpful to be able to send pictures in the messages! If people want to see more before buying or different angles close ups of the clothes. Not sure if not available for safety reasons but it would be helpful!

title: Great app, some flaws
review: I love this app! However, I did buy from a seller who didn’t sent me my purchase and when I tried to get help from the app they told me to contact the seller which I did multiple times with no response. I wasn’t able to get any further help and still wasn’t sent my $30 purchase. Make sure you buy from a reliable seller
developerResponse: {'id': 4691493, 'body': "Hey there! If you've not received an item, you should be able to retrieve your money via PayPal's dispute resolution process. If you need some help understanding how this works, our Support team can provide more insight. Thanks - Team Depop", 'modified': '2018-08-16T16:37:13Z'}

title: I love it, sometimes...
review: I can’t use this app for longer than half an hour without it crashing, which is annoying when it comes to putting things up for sale. There’s also quite a few scammers on here (like everywhere) so be careful! I hope Depop fixes the crashing issue though because it’s becoming very annoying!!

title: Annoying
review: It’s just really hard to navigate and find what you want. It’s very clearly made for people who don’t need to check price tags. Their is no sort from low to high option, the price is not shown while scrolling through the feed, you have to click the image and read the description. It’s become a place where people go to sell thrifted clothes for 10X their worth.
developerResponse: {'id': 19676289, 'body': "Hey. Thanks for the feedback. We love hearing about what we can do to improve Depop for our Community. When you succeed, we succeed. We'll be passing this along to our Product Team.\n\nTeam Depop", 'modified': '2020-12-10T15:48:07Z'}

title: Losing stars update after update
review:
Please go back to 3 pictures wide and/or add pages instead of continuous scrolling

Please have an option to go to world wide first and only. I always have to scroll past aaaaaall of the usa post every time I want to see world wide. Also scrolling to world wide, it doesn’t toggle at the top of page to let you know you made it. You scroll past the “ world wide” boarder which wastes more scrolling time to go to the most recent world wide post. 

I often buy worldwide... but getting more and more harder to scroll to it... 

Not the greatest for selling what I have... I know I don’t promote or do all the hashtags but other apps have been easier to sell imho and personal experience.
developerResponse:
{'id': 18576859, 'body': "Hey there,

Thanks for the feedback. We love hearing about what we can do to improve Depop for our Community. When you succeed, we succeed. We'll be passing this along to our Product Team.

Team Depop
", 'modified': '2020-10-19T16:52:28Z'}

title: awful team.
review: i love(d) depop. i finally started using it a couple months ago and i was loving it, until about a month ago when they changed the layout. it makes it harder for sellers to sell more items, but also it’s so hard to find the items i want to see and buy now. you can’t even complain because they use the same copy and paste developer responses for everyone. they say they’ll pass it along to their team but nothing changes. it’s been a month. if they’re working on new changes for the app, they could at least revert it back to the old layout for the time being. you know, the one where we could buy and sell easier? if this is how depop’s going to be, i’ll start buying on another app. this is terrible.

title: Can’t log in
review: I can’t log in. It keeps crashing and unfortunately every other way of contacting you guys takes so long for a response. I’m in the middle of buying a item that’s super rare as well and now I don’t know if I’ll even be able to because it tells me “error the item has been updated. Make sure you’re still happy” everytime I go to purchase but doesn’t let me move on. Then it just kicks me out of the app and now I can’t sign in.
developerResponse: {'id': 16727840, 'body': "Hey! The good news is we've fixed this bug, if you update to the latest version it should be resolved now. Team Depop", 'modified': '2020-07-19T15:34:27Z'}

title: Great App but needs a better filter
review: When I try to add a price filter to the items i search for it still doesn't offer me clothes within hat price range:( Other then that love the app! Im able to buy and sell clothes w no problem!
developerResponse:
{'id': 15625159, 'body': "Hey, we can imagine how frustrating this is. Please get in touch by going to 'Settings - Need help - Technical issues - I've still got an issue' and send us a report.

We’ll take it from here,
Team Depop
", 'modified': '2020-05-28T10:14:15Z'}

title: Shipping label
review: Depop won’t allow me to see my printing label because supposedly I need to verify my PayPal account when I already did that with my previous sale. I’ve done everything to verify my PayPal account again, but it still won’t show me my shipping label!

title: Good app! Make sizes/prices easier to find!
review: Love using the app but searching through clothes would be so much easier if I knew the size and price of an item before I clicked on the listing! They could totally be placed on the corner of the listing photo

title: DEPOP TOOK $5 FROM ME
review: I love this app I really do, and I hate for it to come to this. I refunded a buyer when things got too complicated with depop not sending me the label that the buyer paid for (the money was taken out of my paypal transaction with the buyer). So I refunded her because I wasn’t about to pay for shipping plus the label that the buyer bought which was absurd. When I refunded her i was expecting the $5.10 that depop had taken for the label to be sent back to her!!! INSTEAD I PAID THE BUYER FOR THE $5.10 THAT DEPOP HAD TAKEN ME!!! poof it was gone.

title: Well I did like it...
review: I bought something from a great seller, transaction was flawless. I just updated my app and now every time I click to search, the app closes out!!! I can't even search anymore! Will delete if not resolved.

title: Depop gamble
review: Depop is a really cool app. I really like how everything is relatively easy to search up and to post your items. However, there is always that little part of me that doubts sellers will actually send your purchase to you at all. I don’t hate on gambling but Depop is one of those platforms I’ll spend my money on.

title: Generally Good
review: Depop is a nice app to make a bit of money. The app itself crashes and glitches often, but it’s not a huge deal. My biggest complaint is Depop changing their policy to allow dropshippers. Depop is getting flooded with these people selling AliExpress items for a massive profit, not even having them on hand. If they want to maintain their “eco-friendly” image, Depop should revert to not allowing dropshipping.
developerResponse: {'id': 8920437, 'body': 'Hey Korina, thanks for this feedback and we really do olve our eco-friendly goals. We hear you and you’re right - we are all about buying and selling amazing unique things between our amazing community. We do always want buyers to have the best experience, which is why we ask Sellers for original pictures in their listings.\n\nIt looks like there’s been some confusion - We still stan for our love for sustainability and adding new stories for secondhand clothes to tell through the fashion grapevine. This is why we’re looking into how we can make our rules around ‘drop shipping’  clearer for users and want to assure you that we’ve been discussing it in detail this week to ensure we are all doing the best for our Depop community', 'modified': '2019-05-29T15:03:26Z'}

title: Awful
review: Ive had so many issues with this app it’s stupid. Depop doesn’t respond when I contact them for issues, PayPal is glitchy as hell and I can’t buy anything as I either have a service error and depop hasn’t helped at all. Not to mention their layout is confusing and as soon as something goes wrong it’s over because they will not help you. If I ever figure how to fix this issue by myself I’m getting the item intended and deleting this terrible app for good
developerResponse: {'id': 7937238, 'body': "Sounds like you're having a bad time and that's not what we want :(. Can you let us know what your username is? We will contact the support team and try to find the report to figure out what the issue might be.\n\nLove, Depop", 'modified': '2019-03-27T19:10:18Z'}

title: Terrible UI/UX
review: I’ve been on depop for a year and it’s one of the worst apps I have, especially considering how large and established Depop is. The interface constantly has issues loading despite my connection being fine. The layout and lack of type sensitivity makes the app look jankier than it actually is. Depop as a company is fine and I’ve had little to no issues but the app needs a lot of work.
developerResponse: {'id': 7057028, 'body': 'Thank you so much for your feedback. We really do appreciate it. As we are growing we want to make sure we hear from our users and find ways to improve in any way shape or form we can.\n\nLove, Depop', 'modified': '2019-01-29T06:12:05Z'}

title: Cool
review: My favorite resell app, but sometimes the shipping options for some items will switch from USPS to “my own shipping” and although it maintains whichever price point you chose, if you don’t catch it before the item sells you’ll be responsible for a shipping label. I don’t know why this happens but it’s definitely frustrating.

title: Love it!
review: This app is really great and is full of a lot of unique, one of a kind pieces. The staff are extremely kind and helpful. Interface is simple and easy to use for buying, browsing, and selling clothing. Definitely some of the best vintage items i've come across.

title: Great!
review: So far I think this is a great app to buy/sell items because you get to be as creative as you want with your selection. Also the process less complicated than other apps which is a plus!

title: RECOMMEND
review: This is absolutely the first time I’ve given a five star review for fashion app. Usually, none of them even think about having my size, because I have very abnormally large sizes for my age, even in shoes. They personalize choices based on sizes and sense of style.

title: Night Mode neeed
review: I feel like this app would definitely be much better with the simple addition of being able to toggle a dark or night mode, like in most other apps nowadays. Other than that, depop is pretty good as it is.

title: Annoying bug/glitch + suggestion
review: I love depop, but it’s so annoying to work with as an app. I can barely leave it open for 3 seconds without it just closing on its own CONSTANTLY. I also think buyers should be able to leave pictures of the products they buy in their reviews. It would be a lot more helpful for future buyers.
developerResponse:
{'id': 15249075, 'body': 'Hey, we had some temporary outage but it should be fixed now, so you get back to Depoping.
 
Keep exploring,
Team Depop
', 'modified': '2020-05-11T19:08:42Z'}

title: Bug fix?
review: I don’t know if it’s just me, but my Depop notifications don’t go away even if I have viewed them in the app. It’s takes about 5 or 6 tries of going into the app and refreshing the notification page for it to go away. Please either fix or improve this!
developerResponse:
{'id': 18380963, 'body': 'Hey there,

We can imagine how frustrating this is. Please remove cached data by going to ‘Settings - Apps - Depop - Storage - Clear Data’ on your phone. Then, completely delete and re-download the app. 
We’ll get this sorted,
Team Depop
', 'modified': '2020-10-09T15:16:14Z'}

title: hate this app
review: at first i thought how it was so easy to sell on here, and it was way simple but i’ve lost money because of the paypal system. I don’t understand why did they choose paypal with all the fees. Depop also bans good accounts for no reason and lets the overpricing, scamming, and rude sellers do whatever they want. Some sellers are overpricing $20+ the original price and sometimes they lie about the brand, yet depop lets them do whatever they want and bans others for doing absolutely nothing.
developerResponse:
{'id': 17299033, 'body': " 
Hey, we’re sorry to hear your experience hasn't gone to plan. In order to keep our Community safe, all decisions made to suspend users and items are taken after deep investigation and consideration. If you feel this is unfair, just drop us a reply in the original email thread. We’re always happy to take a second look.
 
Team Depop
", 'modified': '2020-08-15T21:41:38Z'}

title: Pretty good
review: Sometimes this app glitches but otherwise its an excellent platform for small business. The only thing I wish was available is the ability to "dislike" or filter out certain items so the algorithm stops showing it (bc it's annoying to see Brandy Melville ISO's all the time :P)
developerResponse:
{'id': 17283823, 'body': "
Hey. Thanks for the feedback. We love hearing about what we can do to improve Depop for our Community. When you succeed, we succeed. We'll be passing this along to our Product Team.

Team Depop
", 'modified': '2020-08-14T11:47:46Z'}

title: Unreasonable
review: I had my account deleted for no reason. I’m guessing it was because I had PayPal and Venmo in my bio but they only do payments through the app. Even though nobody ever purchased through Venmo. After my account was deleted I tried to use my moms. I edited the bio and never posted anything yet. A few days later they deleted her account! This app is ridiculous, now I can’t make money as easy as I used to! 😡

title: Sellers can change price on you at anytime
review: I attempted to purchase a hat from a seller multiple times but because the sellers PayPal was inactive from being absent from his page so long the lurchase could not been made but I messaged him for days and even sent depop emails to help resolve the problem but once a week went by and he fixed his PayPal he doubled the price of his product on me, there should be a way to prevent these schemes 👎🏾

title: Love this App
review: The interface nice and easy to navigate. Its easy to discover new stores based on different styles of clothing. Easy to message to other user. Best platform to sell not too many lowballers like on Poshmark. Overall I love this app just love. Download it, just download it,
developerResponse: {'id': 5794231, 'body': "Best feedback. You tell 'em... Just download it.\n\nLove, Depop", 'modified': '2018-11-04T12:08:21Z'}

title: Shame on u depop
review: Depop used to be great until they started messing with features. Now I never get message notifications and my items never get marked shipped even after I mark them as shipped + add tracking. App also freezes and force closes like crazy. Updates were all unnecessary and cause the app to act up even more than it already was. Just waiting on another fix so it’ll be back to normal.

title: Can’t purchase anything & now keeps quitting when I try to open it
review: This app has been frustrating over the past week. I haven’t been able to purchase anything when I try, yet it doesn’t tell me what the issue is. I’ve tried PayPal & adding different cards, as well as playing with different settings. It says there’s an error, but doesn’t tell me how to correct it. I deleted the app & re-downloaded, but now it won’t open. Please fix!
developerResponse:
{'id': 15249310, 'body': 'Hey, we had some temporary outage but it should be fixed now, so you get back to Depoping.
 
Keep exploring,
Team Depop
', 'modified': '2020-05-11T19:20:37Z'}

title: Great app could use some improvements
review: Loveee this app and I feel like I’ve earned so much more $$ than any competitor! However, it takes forever to re-list posts. It would be great if there could be a way to re-list multiple posts at the same time, or manually move them.

title: The fall of Depop
review:
I’ve been selling on this app for almost 3 years now and it was great in the beginning. A really wonderful community to find unique upcycled pieces.

I’m sorry to say it but I will be saying to goodbye to my shop and this app. Depop (who ironically supports Earth Day and campaigns their whole brand around sustainability 🧐) has announced they will now be allowing the dropshipping that has FLOODED this app. 

Goodbye vintage, hello aliexpress/wish garbage at 900% markups. So much for that sustainable and anti-fast fashion attitude upon which your brand was built.

title: Better filter use
review: You should be able to save a filter preset or keep the filters you’ve chosen after you put another key word into the search bar it’s very meticulous to go back and click all the sizes after every search other than that the app is great
developerResponse: {'id': 8888321, 'body': 'Hey Clay, thank you for the feedback. We always love to hear from our users. Will make sure this is pass onto the team.\n\nLove, Depop', 'modified': '2019-05-28T05:12:07Z'}

title: Love it
review: The app is fairly easy to use and manage. I only wish that “our” address could automatically be selected when choosing “ship with depop.” It’s annoying to have to always go in and click our address over and over again per listing.

title: great app when it works
review: i’ve only recently started using this app and so far, i really like it! but the problem is is that it only works about maybe half the time. the other half, it wont load any of my information and will simply say “loading error” or whatever. i tried updating the app, and while the update worked and the app looked different, it still wouldn’t load my info or anything. usually when this happens nothing i do fixes it and i just have to wait to try again hours or days later. i hope that this gets fixed so that i can one day successfully buy/sell something on depop
developerResponse: {'id': 8346742, 'body': "Hey Arlon, that's odd! Let's have a look into what may be causing this. Can you please pop over a report via our in-app support Settings - Need Help? - Technical Issues and then we can get this sorted together. Keep us posted <3\n\nLove, Depop", 'modified': '2019-04-24T10:47:59Z'}

title: A beautiful place
review: Incredibly fun and easy; this app allows you to be as creative as you want and makes it easy in the process. Easier than ever to buy OR sell, I highly recommend you download and join the depop community!
developerResponse: {'id': 5794399, 'body': "The title of this feedback is any goal we've ever had. Thank you for being part of our community and much love your way.\n\nDepop", 'modified': '2018-11-04T12:35:48Z'}

title: Good App
review: Love selling on Depop. Enjoying the new updates. The only suggestion I can make is to have a Refund or Cancel Sale Button. Other sites makes this very easy and it is very cumbersome on this site as you have to work through PayPal & email them to reimburse fees. Too many steps! Otherwise, great!

title: Cool app but...
review: I've been using Depop for years now and it is fun & easy to use, it's just that they are constantly featuring the same sellers on the explore page everyday and sometimes multiple items. It would be nice to see more variety and quality items instead of wannabe models. Seems more about them than the actual clothing. Still cool.

title: I would sell somewhere else...
review: Depop features the same people over and over. They don’t really give a chance to smaller shops to flourish because they only feature the same accounts on the explore page, which is huge for someone’s sales. It may be good to buy from,  but getting seen is tough, even if you have good quality items. I would try eBay or Etsy if you’re a seller.

title: Unwanted notifications..
review: I keep getting notifications for things like “check out this item..” and other spam/marketing. I went to check my settings and it was already set to only get notifications if I get a message or if someone purchases an item. It feels very wrong that they blatantly ignore my preference and send these spam notifications to my phone anyway  :/

title: Style Edit in My DNA is incredibly inaccurate
review:
I wish I could give this app 5 stars! It’s really helped me develop my sense of style and put it into fruition. 

Unfortunately, the update from a few weeks ago has made me use the app much less due to frustration. 

The old For You page was intuitive and spot on, it really helped me find pieces I like. After the update, my Style Edit is crazy inaccurate and does not match items in my likes or saves. As well, it has had the same items on there for WEEKS with no changes. I can’t find anything new that I like and it’s so disappointing. This did not use to happen, please fix!

I will update my review if this is fixed but until then :((
developerResponse: {'id': 19390554, 'body': "Hey. Thanks for the feedback. We love hearing about what we can do to improve Depop for our Community. When you succeed, we succeed. We'll be passing this along to our Product Team.\n\nTeam Depop", 'modified': '2020-11-27T11:05:31Z'}

title: Inaccurate delivery dates/ glitchy
review: I’ve started using depop recently and I can never seem to be able to leave feedback. I really wish I could but I guess with this new update I can’t. There’s literally no button for it. Also a lot of people on depop give out inaccurate delivery dates and make you wait way longer than anticipated.
developerResponse:
{'id': 18830164, 'body': 'Hey Bob,

You can leave feedback via the receipts button in the top mid section of your account page.
Please contact support@depop.com if you need further assistance.

Thanks,
Team Depop', 'modified': '2020-11-01T17:12:51Z'}

title: New update:(
review: This update is terrible! The algorithm is all messed up. I went from selling like 20 things a week to absolutely nothing. I put a lot of time and money into creating my shop to just give up. This is happening to many people and it is very sad! I hope depop listens and does something about this stupid update cause this isn’t fair for anyone. Whenever something good comes along it always has to get ruined..

title: Depop ripped me off
review: Only told me the price they took from what I made and took the shipping out of my pocket when I didn’t select that option. I tried selling a hoodie for $30 and only ended up with $15 because of that. There also isn’t an easy way to reject the offer. I do not recommend this app and will soon be taking all my items off it. If you want to sell clothes or any other items use poshmark instead.
developerResponse:
{'id': 18690852, 'body': 'Hey there,

Rest assured that Depop can only take payments for sales and shipping labels, so you won’t be overcharged. Check here for more info or to contact our support team

Team Depop
', 'modified': '2020-10-25T22:31:16Z'}

title: Difficult for new sellers
review: Love buying on Depop, the algorithm knows my style, but being a seller is difficult. It would be nice if there were a way to search for lesser known sellers. I also would like to be able to search by location, which would encourage more sustainable local sales.
developerResponse:
{'id': 16728931, 'body': "Hey, we completely understand your frustration. We're looking at ways to give our Sellers better visibility. The hashtags were a start, and your items will now match with potential buyers much faster. 
 
Learn more about highlighting your shop by going to ‘Settings - Need help’ and typing in Sellers Handbook.
 
Keep selling,
 
Team Depop
", 'modified': '2020-07-19T17:42:08Z'}

title: 0 STARS
review: I’ve sold quite a few items already, and have not received any money yet due to it being on hold from PayPal for almost a month. I have already contacted the buyers to confirm their purchases and no responses. I’ve tried contacting support and clearly doesn’t seem to work. PayPal is not reliable, especially going through the hassle of setting everything up and confirming account. Poshmark is much easier to sell items and much safer !!!!!!!!
developerResponse:
{'id': 17419203, 'body': 'Hey. Thanks for sharing your feedback. PayPal is our payment provider, which ensures that buying and selling are protected in-app. Good news though, you now have access to Depop payments available in settings - preferences which allows you to buy and sell without paypal. 

Thanks
Team Depop
', 'modified': '2020-08-21T12:31:52Z'}

title: Messages
review: I would absolutely love to be able to send &  receive pictures through messages it would be so much easier to send a picture to show the shipping confirmation instead of posting it so everyone to see

title: Love Depop
review: I have been selling on depop for a while now and I love it! Depop is the one app that when u sell something they only take 10% off what u sold and that is really good comparing to Poshmark and other selling apps that sometimes take half or a big portion of your profit.

title: please fix this bug!!
review: I love depop but since the update anytime I click an item then go back it brings me to the top of the page. This makes it really frustrating whenever searching for an item because you have to continue to scroll to where you were and has caused me to not be as active.
developerResponse: {'id': 15443588, 'body': "Hey! The good news is we've fixed this bug, if you update to the latest version it should be resolved now.\n\nTeam Depop", 'modified': '2020-05-20T11:06:51Z'}

title: Even more similar to Instagram
review: Wouldn’t it be great to have the feature of notification when a seller makes a post/listing? I think it would keep people from missing new items
developerResponse: {'id': 10886857, 'body': "Hey. Thanks for the feedback. We love hearing about what we can do to improve Depop for our Community. When you succeed, we succeed. I'll be passing this along to our Product Team.\n\nTeam Depop", 'modified': '2019-09-25T11:41:53Z'}

title: Pathetic
review: I never write reviews but need people to know that if your gonna sell anything use another app. I downloaded this on Friday and put a few things up. A lot of people bought stuff and when I went to log in my account was suspended and that I would have to email them for questions, after emailing 4 times they said that I had shipping charges???? I asked what that meant and how I could fix it and they deleted my account. Don’t trust this app!
developerResponse:
{'id': 11016656, 'body': "Hey Clara. I can imagine how frustrating this is. 

Here's a breakdown of our US Shipping: https://depophelp.zendesk.com/hc/en-gb/articles/360001790787-Shipping-guide-US

It seems as though you have some outstanding charges on your account, once you get those settled, I'm sure we'll be able to reactive your account again, as we definitely don't do any permanent deletions. 

If you need a hand with that, drop us a line at support@depop.com.

We're here to help,
Team Depop", 'modified': '2019-10-02T10:01:00Z'}

title: Good but slow to launch
review:
The app is pretty good but why does it take so long to open?

Launching the app takes over 4 seconds on my brand new iPhone XS with the latest software and on wifi or cellular

No other app is this slow
developerResponse: {'id': 9725997, 'body': "Hey there! Thanks for this helpful feedback - I'll pass it along to our Product Team so hopefully we can start speeding things up for you.\n\nTeam Depop", 'modified': '2019-07-18T11:14:31Z'}

title: Pros & cons as a new seller
review: Wish there was more laptop usage capabilities with this app as managing my profile on a phone can get really tedious. I love the depop shipping but can we please get a 1lb size allowance? The price jump from 8oz to 2lb is steep, deters buyers, and I almost never reach 2 full lbs but I am ALWAYS over 8oz.
developerResponse: {'id': 5904422, 'body': "Hello helloooo... Did you know you can upload and buy items via our website? If not, have a look! This might be the capabilities you're looking for. We've also passed on the shipping feedback, it's really great to know what our sellers are experiencing so we thank you for that. Thank you for joining our community.\n\nLove, Depop", 'modified': '2018-11-12T10:39:05Z'}

title: Excellent marketplace, app needs iPad support
review:
The app used to crash a lot when browsing many items in a row, but frequent updates have greatly reduced this issue. 

The main thing I would like to see is proper iPad support , as right now it's still an iPhone only app that looks stupid on the iPad.
developerResponse: {'id': 9664976, 'body': "Hey Josh! That's great to hear about our updates. Thanks for the suggestion about iPad Support, will certainly mention this one to the Product Team.\n\nTeam Depop", 'modified': '2019-07-15T12:04:48Z'}

title: Buy low sell h...low as well
review:
Great app for thrifty finds. I’ve had issues in the past with its pay out but feel good about it again.

I do wish the percent they took was smaller though and they added more variety to featured people.
developerResponse: {'id': 3340646, 'body': "Hey there - without having access to the details of your account, this does sound like the shipping cost that is initially charged to the seller before being recouped from the seller. If you'd like us to take another look then please edit this review to include your Depop @username. Thanks! Team Depop", 'modified': '2018-05-03T09:35:47Z'}

title: Add Notifications when Messages are received!!
review: I love the app, and have little problems with it, but I wish you could receive a notification when you receive a message. I think I did at first, but haven’t seen anymore after my first purchase.

title: Meh
review: It’s alright, I felt like it was better back then like a year ago when the explore page wasn’t all just the same color themed nor famous Depop users. Also, sometimes my posts of Depop when I want to edit a post the size button disappears and I can’t edit it because it’ll say “oops choose a size”. I have to keep remaking the post and re-uploading  it and it’s so annoying. Honestly, I’m disappointed.
developerResponse: {'id': 4515530, 'body': "Hey Mimi. We're working to make the Explore page more varied and fair to our users, and we really think there's been a difference lately. With regards to the glitch you wrote in about, be sure to contact our Support team (support@depop.com) as they may be able to help. Thanks. Team Depop", 'modified': '2018-08-03T15:47:07Z'}

title: My Favorite App To Use!
review: I love this app because I can just about find everything I want for cheap!. You may come across a few scammers who want to do business outside of the app, as well as inside the app, but they use the safest platform (PayPal) when purchasing items. Definitely an app I recommend
developerResponse: {'id': 4408931, 'body': 'Thanks for taking the time to write in about us! Team Depop', 'modified': '2018-07-26T13:06:29Z'}

title: Not good for buyers
review: No real system for holding bad sellers accountable, and no the star system does not count. You can't review users until they ship the product you bought, which is a problem if they never ship it. I had a user not ship the product, and i have no way of really holding the person accountable. Depop does not handle the situation at all, they just direct you to Paypal. I reached out to Paypal, and they were no help. I went through so much bs to never get my 17 dollars refunded.
developerResponse: {'id': 3876579, 'body': 'Hey there! Would you mind updating this review to include your Depop @username so we can take a look at your account specifically? Many thanks, Team Depop', 'modified': '2018-06-18T10:55:25Z'}

title: Give Everyone A Chance!
review: Love this app so much but it needs to give everyone a chance to be seen. This is about selling/finding awesome, unique clothes! How can we if it’s become a popularity contest that features the same people over and over?
developerResponse: {'id': 2866065, 'body': "Hey there! We try and curate our Explore page to always include the best items and the best pictures - moving forwards we want to be in a position where Depop is tailored to suit your specific style and likes. We think we're getting there, but we're aware there's alot more work for us to do still. Thank you for bearing with us. Team Depop", 'modified': '2018-03-19T13:34:33Z'}

title: terrible
review: I’ve had depop and it’s been good but the customer service of the app is just terrible. I’ve had my first encounter with a bad seller where I haven’t received my item. I’ve told them over three times the seller is inactive and won’t reply so going to PayPal about it will only waste my time and it’ll be too late by the time I’m protected under he 180 days of purchase rule but they just don’t care, they don’t want to protect your purchases at all. Don’t even bother with this app.
developerResponse: {'id': 2866129, 'body': "Hey there - PayPal, being our payment provider, subsequently handle all transaction disputes that arise on Depop. They're customer service team will judge on the dispute, but we also have Depop Protection in place should we deem that they've come to a conclusion that we disagree with. We're confident that this combination of PayPal and Depop protection adequately look after our users, and would welcome some more specific feedback if you don't feel as if this has been the case for you. Thanks, Team Depop", 'modified': '2018-03-19T13:40:11Z'}

title: Love
review: If you like to shop, especially when it comes to a variety of items from vintage clothing, shoes, art, or even things from today’s fashion but for a better price then this is the app you need to download. I use depop soooo much and love it(:

title: Incorrect sizing
review: Although I’ve put in all my exact measurements the app keeps suggesting items that are completely way too small for me. Examples: I wear a shoe size 9 and the app keeps suggesting 6s. I wear a size 8 for pants and I get suggestions for stuff that’s 2-6. It’s really hard to find nice things to wear because everything I find nice ends up being the wrong size

title: PLEASE FIX THIS
review: The app itself is great! Love how kind everyone is... However, it has SOOOO many awful glitches and can barely work for some reason. I can’t look at posts or even like them with ease. Which was why I deleted the app last year. I decided to re-download today to see if it’s fixed, but it’s still the same, broken app. Please fix this ASAP since it harms sellers’ ability to sell things with ease, as well disrupting buyers’ peaceful online shopping.

title: Don’t usually write reviews
review: I love Depop but something changed where the “my DNA” section that suggest stuff based on recent activity turned to garbage. It used to be so good but now I am only recommended a) crochet tops and b) graphic tees. I have never searched, looked at or interacted w either things and it’s just these two sellers. I blocked both of them hoping that would help but no luck. I’m so sad, I loved browsing and finding cute things. Hopefully there’s an update that fixes this!!!
developerResponse: {'id': 19442135, 'body': "Hey. Thanks for the feedback. We love hearing about what we can do to improve Depop for our Community. When you succeed, we succeed. We'll be passing this along to our Product Team.\n\nTeam Depop", 'modified': '2020-11-30T15:42:06Z'}

title: New Algorithm has killed Depop
review: The new algorithm makes it IMPOSSIBLE to get ANY engagement. I have 103 listings & over 8K followers & have gotten 3 likes in the last hour WITH reposting. I usually make multiple sales daily. Buyers cannot see sellers listings via the search tab because it’s full of the same items for over a WEEK. It’s ridiculous that Depop refuses to listen to its sellers. The app is completely unusable & nobody is benefiting. Bring the new algorithm back for the love of GOD.

title: Weird glitch
review: I have been experiencing this weird glitch where it logs me out of my account and that happens when I try to look at my messages it also happens when I try to look at what I’ve purchased I had nothing but positive experiences so far on this app but when this started occurring it overall makes things a burden and annoying to deal with please fix this
developerResponse: {'id': 16719141, 'body': "Hey! The good news is we've fixed this bug, if you update to the latest version it should be resolved now. Team Depop", 'modified': '2020-07-18T21:45:34Z'}

title: Amazing
review: Love this! For someone who is horrible at online shopping this is amazing it’s adorable and great for shopping with a budget. Just read the description of what you are buying and watch out for fakes and other things like that

title: My feedback button
review: This app is absolutely amazing and I’ve made some great purchases from some sellers but for someone reason my feedback button isn’t showing so I can’t give them the 5 stars they deserve :(( help
developerResponse:
{'id': 15032006, 'body': "Hey, we can imagine how frustrating this is. Please get in touch by going to 'Settings - Need help - Technical issues - I've still got an issue' and send us a report.

We’ll take it from here,
Team Depop
", 'modified': '2020-05-01T10:24:04Z'}

title: Fine app, but has gaps
review: Search function seems almost useless- always get weird products I'm not searching for. Receipts for sales/purchases should be its own tab. Sometimes chats don't load and if they do they don't generate previous messages. I would recommend they add face ID or pin before confirming purchases for added security.

title: IMMENSELY SATISFIED
review: Incredibly easy to use, very user friendly. I had no trouble navigating through the app and everything went really smoothly. Plus I love the wide variety of clothes and impressed with the overall layout and everything
developerResponse: {'id': 14972571, 'body': 'We love to see it.\n\nTeam Depop', 'modified': '2020-04-28T17:03:25Z'}

title: Overpriced items
review: Exactly what the title says. People on here are crazy and trying to get over on people who are less knowledgeable to some of these items. Shame shame. We should be trying to educate people not use them
developerResponse: {'id': 7055676, 'body': 'That is a shame and nothing we want our users to experience. We really do value your feedback and we will make sure to dig a bit deeper on this topic.\n\nLove, Depop', 'modified': '2019-01-29T03:40:58Z'}

title: It’s okay
review: I’ve been using the app for close to 6 months and I’m always having problems with the app. So many tiny glitches that really screw you over as a seller. Every time I contact support they take days to get back to me and never end up solving any of my problems. The app still needs a ton of work before it will really be great.

title: Please add notification sound
review: This app is great for shopping and finding unique items, but the only complaint I would have is that there is no notification sound when someone messages you. I wish the app developers would update this .
developerResponse: {'id': 10722936, 'body': "Hey. Thanks for the feedback. We love hearing about what we can do to improve Depop for our Community. When you succeed, we succeed. I'll be passing this along to our Product Team.\n\nTeam Depop", 'modified': '2019-09-17T09:58:17Z'}

title: Great app, high fees
review: Little difficult to reach wide audiences, and the 10% fee on top of the PayPal fee is pretty gnarly. Makes it hard to price competitively if you want a fair price for your goods after fees and shipping costs. I pretty much only use it because my account already has some credibility via positive feedback here
developerResponse:
{'id': 8111770, 'body': 'Hi there, thank you for your feedback. 

I understand that you may believe that the Depop fee is high and believe me if we didn’t have to charge a fee we wouldn’t!

The 10% fee may seem like a lot for your sale but, when we break this down into what the fee contributes to, it makes a lot more sense. The fee is in place to keep the app up and running, with general up-keep costs and to pay all of our employees, from engineers to us in support. 

Unlike many other selling platforms, at Depop only charge you when you make a sale, this means there are no fees for the length of time your item has been listed for or any initial costs to list the item, so list to your heart’s content because its all free!

Love, Depop', 'modified': '2019-04-08T12:29:33Z'}

title: prettyyy good
review: Tried Poshmark, Instagram but Depop is by far the best. Within four days I already sold three of my listings. Definitely don't waste your time with other apps. Only issue is the shipping is expensive but you can alternate between your own and Depop's.
developerResponse: {'id': 5381910, 'body': "Whuuut..that's amazing! Congrat on your sales and welcome to the community.\n\nLove, Depop", 'modified': '2018-10-06T13:41:52Z'}

title: Love it!
review: I’m really loving the app so far and how it essentially has an Instagram sort of formatting so it’s easier for me to use. The only thing I wish the app would add is folders for different items of clothing like oh I want button ups over here and doc martens here etc. Other than that the app is terrific!
developerResponse: {'id': 6784555, 'body': 'What a lovely idea! Thank you for passing this to us.\n\nLove, Depop', 'modified': '2019-01-11T07:09:27Z'}

title: I love it!
review: The updates depop make are useful and create a better community on the app. It's super easy to use and super easy to get started. There's a wide variety of items for anything you could be looking for, there's something for everybody!
developerResponse: {'id': 3269254, 'body': 'Thanks for this review, we really appreciate it! Happy Depop-ing', 'modified': '2018-04-26T10:54:19Z'}

title: Got scammed
review: I bought a designer shirt from somebody on depop for $110, but they never sent my shirt and never sent my money back. I wrote to depop about it 3 times and each time they wrote back that it was up to PayPal to send me a refund. They wouldn’t do anything to discipline the seller who ripped me off, so I guess if you’re a scammer then this is a great place to sell- he’s still got other listings for sale, depop did nothing at all about it :/ I don’t think they care about their customers at all.
developerResponse: {'id': 3800297, 'body': "Hey there! Please rest assured that we do take action on users who are breaking our rules. With regard to PayPal - as they are our payment provider they are therefore responsible for judging any transaction disputes that arise. Depop Protection exists to fill in any gaps should PayPal rule unfairly, and we'd ask you to inform us if this is the case so that we can help. Thanks! Team Depop", 'modified': '2018-06-11T15:02:57Z'}

title: It’s a super easy app to use but....
review: Whenever you go on the explore page they will often have already sold items on there & sometimes the messages glitch out but maybe that’s just me ,?? Other than that it’s a super easy to use app & 90% of the people on there are SO sweet !!
developerResponse: {'id': 3315675, 'body': "Hey there - thanks for the review. Please do reach out to our support team (support@depop.com) about the messaging glitch; we'd love to get this sorted for you. Thanks! Team Depop", 'modified': '2018-05-01T11:57:19Z'}

title: Really amazing app
review: This app is so cool and got me a bunch of cool stuff but I wish it was more diverse and kept refreshing rather than just showing me the famous Depop users (which prices are around $50 so no way I’m buying) So far all 5 stars on the stuff I bought

title: It’s good but it could be better
review: Don’t get me wrong. I love Depop more than eBay BUT I wish either I could add more pictures or send pictures in chat. Sometimes I have items that need a little more. The video thing is cool but I don’t have any use for it other than if I was selling an vinyl/CD/DVD/VCR or anything that has sound.
