developerResponse: {'id': 3268996, 'body': "Hey there, thanks for letting us know your thoughts. Whilst we don't currently have plans to increase the number of images you can post, we truly believe that the video function should allow users to get a little more creative showing off the items they're selling. We hope over time this will be the case for you too! Reach out to our Support team if you need any more tips. Thanks! Team Depop", 'modified': '2018-04-26T10:29:18Z'}

title: Support team doesn’t do anything if things go wrong
review: I purchased a pair of Snapchat specs on March 19 it’s now April 3 still no sign of my money put back in my paypal and no shipping confirmation. The support team told me to go through PayPal to solve this issue. I tried to talk to the seller they said the money didn’t show up in their account a straight lie. So I’m out a good chunk of change until PayPal can review my claim when ever that will be. I would be carful because I also see people selling fakes
developerResponse: {'id': 3052945, 'body': "Hey there! You've done the correct thing in reaching out to PayPal, and they'll ultimately judge the dispute resolution process for you. We're sorry you've had to experience this and hope this will be sorted for you soon - please do keep us posted. Team Depop", 'modified': '2018-04-06T15:29:13Z'}

review: I'm only writing a review again because depop apparently doesn't know when people have already RATED them a MILLION TIMES. Maybe with all the updates you guys should fix that. I can't tell you how many countless times I've just been on the app and almost every time I'm on it it wants me to rate it ! It gets annoying after a while !

title: could use a lot of improvement but very useful
review: depop is easy to navigate but there things annoying about it. for ex: when you refund your buyer, depop doesn’t automatically refund you for shipping or depop fee so you have to go through a long process of sending emails to customer service to get them to refund you. also there are a few bugs like the little red notification dot on messages doesn’t go away unless you open your message twice. but it has been a great way to make quick cash!

title: Fix the algorithm!!
review: Depop used to be such a great app for buying and selling cool stuff, but the new way the algorithm works is big time messed up. Refreshing posts is a waste of time, my sales are way down, and I have a hard time finding new things when I search for them. This seems to be a widespread opinion among people who use Depop currently as well. Please change it back, I used to love using Depop!!

title: Horrible customer service
review: I worked hard for four months in hope to become verified, I even received an email from someone who works there that I would, however, my account got flagged for some reason for “breaking their community guidelines” but I HAVE NO IDEA WHAT I DID WRONG. Now I can’t get verified when I worked so hard for it. I emailed depop back asking what I did and I kept getting the same automated email back. I love depop but their customer service is the worst.

title: A Fun Place To Buy & Sell
review: I enjoy the Depop platform among all the reselling apps because the sellers there always have interesting finds and ways of styling and I find that selling isn’t a “race to the bottom” with how people try to negotiate on quality items.
developerResponse: {'id': 13465550, 'body': 'This is what we like to hear, Alana. There are certainly a tonne of interesting finds out there, keep exploring.\n\nTeam Depop', 'modified': '2020-02-13T12:57:57Z'}

title: Don’t Download
review: Depop won’t let my log in bc i specifically said that i was selling a brand dupe in all caps. I put the brand as Brandy Melville because it was a dupe and lots of other people do that. I went back to see my sales and likes and it said i needed to log in. When i went to log in it said it could send any info to that email or allow me back into the app. I had just purchased some items and had a couple sales. I need my account back please.😔
developerResponse:
{'id': 18386057, 'body': "Hey Eovicyoria,

We’re sorry to hear your experience hasn't gone to plan. In order to keep our Community safe, all decisions made to suspend users and items are taken after deep investigation and consideration. If you feel this is unfair, just drop us a reply in the original email thread. We’re always happy to take a second look.
 
Team Depop
", 'modified': '2020-10-09T21:54:20Z'}

title: My size feature gone WHY!?
review: I love Depop and I have used it to both buy and sell for a while but ever since the most recent update I can longer search items using the “my size” feature where it only shows you results matching your size preferences you’ve put in settings. Having to enter this everytime you search is so tedious when you already had a feature to eliminate this I don’t get why you got rid of it.

title: I don’t like the depop dms
review:
Love depop but I wanted to review the current update—the depop dms make it seem as though a customer is asking a question, and it is disappointing to then see a promotion.  You can’t even delete them,  Feels very obtrusive.

Otherwise thanks for an amazing app that’s been keeping me sane during this time.

title: Generally awesome
review: Love this app, I’ve gotten so many gems. The recent update has made it frustrating to scroll through my search. Every time I click on an item and go back it sends me to the top of the search page. I’ve deleted it twice already! Otherwise AMAZING APP
developerResponse:
{'id': 15395770, 'body': "Hey, sorry to hear about this! The good news is we've got a fix for this bug on the way. 
 
Stay tuned, 
Team Depop
", 'modified': '2020-05-18T15:12:53Z'}

title: Fix it !
review: I love depop so much but the recent update is the most annoying thing and I’m on depop less bc of it . When u search for something and click on an item and then go back it takes u back all the way to the top and it didn’t use to do that and it’s so annoying . Please fix it

title: Suggestions
review: I think it would be really nice if there was an option to hide your personal likes, so you can still show love for pieces you like without having to just save them. Bc some people don’t know how to be original and find things themselves.

title: search issue
review: I’ll be scrolling through items and click on one. When I press the back button it always takes me back to the  very top of the page. It would be nice if it held my place while exploring items.
developerResponse:
{'id': 15340185, 'body': "Hey, sorry to hear about this! The good news is we've got a fix for this bug on the way. 

Stay tuned, 
Team Depop
", 'modified': '2020-05-15T11:49:00Z'}

title: Very glitchy
review: I uninstalled it 1 hour after browsing. When you select an item (to view more details) and then come back to your search results, the page ALWAYS starts over even if you’re half way through it. Also, I’ve had multiple search results that were totally different to what I was looking for (those results would disappear if I started my search all over).
developerResponse:
{'id': 15301019, 'body': "Hey, sorry to hear about this! The good news is we've got a fix for this bug on the way. 

Stay tuned, 
Team Depop
", 'modified': '2020-05-13T17:16:55Z'}

title: Worst Customer Service team
review: I have been using this app to purchase fun and unique pieces for a few years now but as soon as I became a seller is when everything went south. Their customer service team doesn’t have a phone number and there was an account issue I have been having for the past 3 weeks and I emailed their team to fix it. It took them over a week to respond and didn’t even help or fix my issue at all!!!! DONT BECOME A SELLER ON THIS APP
developerResponse:
{'id': 15248549, 'body': "Hey, our support response times are currently slightly longer due to the current global situation, but we'll be in touch ASAP.
 
We're here for you,
Team Depop

", 'modified': '2020-05-11T18:32:02Z'}

title: Doesn’t always work
review: This app looks nice and buying and selling would be super easy, if it would load. I connected my paypal when I made my account and for some reason I have to reconnect it every time I want to buy or sell something, and it takes 30+ minutes to load if it ever does. The app works great other than that. I love the easy shipping method and finding cute stuff.
developerResponse:
{'id': 14972421, 'body': "Hey, we can imagine how frustrating this is. Please get in touch by going to 'Settings - Need help - Technical issues - I've still got an issue' and send us a report.

We’ll take it from here,
Team Depop
", 'modified': '2020-04-28T16:53:07Z'}

title: Won’t even let me log in.
review: App force logged me out and won’t let me back in. Changed my password multiple times, checked to make sure my email was correct, even tried making a new account with the same email then it tells me I already have an account. Can log in fine on mobile site but the app is useless. Also the mobile site could use a “favorites” button to keep track of items you like.
developerResponse:
{'id': 14659362, 'body': "Hey, we’re sorry to hear this and we can imagine how frustrating this must be. Could you please email us at support@depop.com with the subject line saying 'Login Issues'. Please remember to include your:
- Username
- Email address
- Phone number
- Phone operating system, example iOS 13
 
Let’s get this sorted,
Team Depop
", 'modified': '2020-04-14T12:42:42Z'}

title: Won’t let me log back in
review: I usually love Depop and have used it to buy a lot of things. But I just noticed that it logged me out, and when I logged back in it immediately logged me back out and says “operation could not be completed right now.” It is updated, I tried deleting and re downloading and it still won’t work :/
developerResponse:
{'id': 14485867, 'body': "Hey, we’re sorry to hear this and we can imagine how frustrating this must be. Could you please email us at support@depop.com with the subject line saying 'Login Issues'. Please remember to include your:
- Username
- Email address
- Phone number
- Phone operating system, example iOS 13
 
Let’s get this sorted,
Team Depop
", 'modified': '2020-04-06T10:58:27Z'}

title: A really good app for cheap clothes, and your style.
review: I only use Depop to shop now. Just put in you sizes and your good to go. Also I thought at first that it was going to take forever for them to ship the clothes, but honestly they ship pretty quick.

title: CAN'T LOGIN!!!!!
review: i used to love depop so much but for some reason i can't log in anymore. it keeps saying "This operation could not be completed. Please try again later." ive deleted and reinstalled the app countless times, rebooted my phone, connected to different wifi networks, still won't work. this is hugely frustrating since i have things to sell and i can't even make a new account or anything the app is just entirely broken. please fix this asap.

title: Irresponsible
review: I have ordered five items from Depop, and three of them are missing in shipping transit. I requested a feedback, and there was no help. Depop Team provided me a link to resolve this problem, and the link was blank. They asked me to contact Paypal, Seller, and USPS - merely attributing the flaw to the other company. Although I paid money, all the responsibility of this situation was on me. Since I have a doubt about purchasing items from Depop, I don’t recommend to use App due to the poor buyer protection.
developerResponse:
{'id': 10700227, 'body': "Hey, we’re sorry to hear your experience hasn't gone to plan. We offer Buyer Protection for all items purchased in-app using the BUY button. 

Follow these steps so we can put this right:
https://depophelp.zendesk.com/hc/en-gb/articles/360001772448-I-haven-t-received-my-item

We're here to help you,
Team Depop ", 'modified': '2019-09-16T10:51:35Z'}

title: It’s great
review: I love this app so much! It’s perfect for people like me who live for online shopping but hate all the generic things you can buy. Here I can find so much cool stuff without having to go through tons of pages to find something I like!
developerResponse: {'id': 7510748, 'body': 'Who wants to be generic when you can shine bright like a diamond.\n\nKisses, Depop', 'modified': '2019-02-28T12:13:22Z'}

title: Debit Card Won’t work
review: I keep emailing this dudes, and they keep going back and forth with me saying it’s my banks fault, check with my bank blah blah blah. So I did, but I bank doesn’t see any failed transactions, so it’s Depop fault, and they won’t do anything to fix it. It used to work with my debit card just fine, now it’s not. Please do something. Other than that, they app is marvelous.
developerResponse: {'id': 7601095, 'body': "Jean - this doesn't sound great I agree. If the team think it's your bank but you don't, we're always happy to look in to details again and make sure we help as much as poss. We don't have access to your bank or your PayPal account, but we can absolutely help direct you in the right way with the info we have!", 'modified': '2019-03-06T11:22:55Z'}

title: Save search
review: Would be convenient if there was an option to save a search and be notified when something goes up for sale!
developerResponse: {'id': 5576327, 'body': "That's definitely a sexy idea! Will pass this on to our team. Glad you have joined our community.\n\nLove, Depop", 'modified': '2018-10-19T11:37:26Z'}

title: I love !!!
review: I love how easy it is to use the app and connect your paypal. A lot of other sites i’ve tried using wont let me connect my paypal and it’s annoying ! I do wish they would put the subcategory section back, but they haven’t yet.

title: I think it’s better
review: So I use Poshmark, Vinted and Mercari and I can truly say this app has better quality of sellers. They are note forthright with their products and their almost always brand new it seems. I get the best deals for new quality. Really is awesome!

title: Price
review: There’s some really nice stuff on here and for the most part it’s not to expensive for regular clothing start but in my opinion it’s a bit pricy for second hand clothes. Going to goodwill or another store in person is a lot cheaper, however this is more convenient and there’s some real gems on here. It’s really up to you what’s more important

title: Always improving
review: The app feels a lot better imo, thank you for that bug fix to not skip to the beginning after each view of a product.  Thank you!

title: As sellers and buyers we need to know if our messages are being received!
review: Could you guys please add an option to be able to know if someone read a direct message? It’s really annoying to wonder if someone read a message when I’m trying to confirm a purchase!
developerResponse: {'id': 2913132, 'body': "Hey Sara - this isn't in the roadmap right now but it's something we're definitely thinking about for the future. Thanks! Team Depop", 'modified': '2018-03-23T10:57:33Z'}

title: Design is a hot mess
review:
As someone who used this app for a good year or two, I have to say i can’t stand the sight of it anymore.   Design goes a long way. 

It’s just not....appealing? I don’t even have the words.

The words are: I can’t stand the sight of how it looks and that makes me not want to be on the app which makes me neither sell or buy. A design that makes you want to close the app immediately is kind of doing the opposite of what you would want your users to experience.
developerResponse: {'id': 1991139, 'body': 'Hi, thanks for the review and feedback. We would like to know more specifically you dislike about the design and why? Perhaps you can drop us an email to productfeedback@depop.com. Thanks, Team Depop', 'modified': '2017-12-11T12:04:25Z'}

title: A cool suggestion!
review: You guys should create a feature that filters users to other accounts in the same general area. For example it only shows accs that are located near the users. So people who live in nyc are grouped in one category and so on and so forth. I thought this would be a nice feature to add!

title: Awful
review: Have had TWO awful experiences! Depop does NOTHING to resolve or assist. Buyers BEWARE! Scammers are prevalent on this site and the administration does  not care! Ask 100 questions before thinking about a purchase and then another 100 more before you actually purchase. People will sell you baby clothes and swear a junior size girl can wear. They claim they mail a package and you never receive nor receive a refund. Just be careful before you buy!
developerResponse:
{'id': 18383183, 'body': "Hey there,

We’re sorry to hear your experience hasn't gone to plan. We offer Buyer Protection for all items purchased in-app using the ‘BUY’ button. 

Read more in-app about what to do next by going to ‘Settings - Need help’ and typing in ‘Buyer Protection’.

We're here to help you,
Team Depop 
", 'modified': '2020-10-09T17:43:43Z'}

title: It’s not that good
review: As a seller the app is okay. There’s always something wrong when i try to get the shipping label. It says i need to confirm my email and all of that on paypal but there’s nothing to verify. Honestly i think Poshmark is better because it doesn’t need to be connected to Paypal, you just need a card. Also you don’t need fill out if you want to do your own shipping or with the app, Poshmark has the shipping all set, it doesn’t matter the size or weight.
developerResponse:
{'id': 17418720, 'body': "Hey, sorry about this.
 
If you can follow this link and submit a request if you're still struggling that would be great. https://depophelp.zendesk.com/hc/en-gb/articles/360046290994-I-can-t-access-my-shipping-label-USPS-MyHermes-
 
Team Depop
", 'modified': '2020-08-21T12:01:25Z'}

title: Unexpected charges
review: i wanted to say that it was great, but this app is really just mediocre. i recently sold an item, used depop for shipping, i used the correct shipping label and box, and because im paying depop to pay for the label, i should not have to pay anything extra. but i had to. it was only $2 more, but i wasn’t expecting to have to pay that. at the same time i was shipping something from poshmark, and i had no issues. im just using poshmark from now on lol.

title: Weirdos
review: Someone messaged me on the app telling me to text them they sent their number. And obviously I did bc it could’ve been easier for them to talk over text then the told me they were out of town and they would have to wait and they asked me to send my person address and full name. After they texted me that I went to check their account and it was already deleted.

title: the community
review: Most of the people are super nice here. But this app has given me so much anxiety because I’ve been left with some nasty reviews that just don’t add up. I do my part in shipping the items in the conditions and descriptions that they were given. However, it seems like Depop only sides w the customer and refuses to side with the seller even though they take a percentage from every sale we make. :/
developerResponse: {'id': 15703157, 'body': "Hey, sorry to hear about this, if you can contact our support team we'll be happy to consider to reconsider.\n\nTeam Depop", 'modified': '2020-06-01T14:11:07Z'}

title: Love
review: This app is a staple if you’re a second hand enthusiast like me! I’ve loved everything I’ve gotten, the sellers are super sweet, and it’s overall just a safe, friendly app (it has buyer’s protection on all your purchases!). Pretty easy to navigate as well. :)

title: My package never came
review: I bought some shoes from a lady and she shipped them really soon but then corona came around . My package got lost and no one new where it went . I didn’t pay with pay pal cause I didn’t have an account so they weren’t able to refund me. It has been 4 1/2 months and still no package. I don’t expect the package to come . I do like this app but this was just a bad experience for me.
developerResponse:
{'id': 15300679, 'body': "Hey. We can imagine how frustrating this is. Head in-app to 'Settings - Support - Need help - Buying - My purchase - I haven't received my item'.

We also moderate the app 24/7 to ensure scammers are kept away. If you notice anything suspicious, please report the item/user in-app (by clicking on the 3 dots top right of their profile/item) so we can investigate.

We're here to help,
Team Depop
", 'modified': '2020-05-13T16:51:53Z'}

title: great app except...
review: it's so annoying when people put 100 different tags "for exposure" but really it just makes it so much more difficult to find something im looking for using the search because i'll only see a hundred UNRELATED things to my search that showed up because it was tagged, it is SOO annoying, you should make it so we can report a post if they keep using unrelated tags

title: Love this app, very great!
review: However, I have a little issue with PayPal because they have my money on hold even though I already shipped an order. So I feel like you guys should add different payment systems because I’m not happy with PayPal right now.
developerResponse:
{'id': 11973740, 'body': 'Hey. Thanks for sharing your feedback. PayPal is our payment provider, which ensures that buying and selling are protected in-app. Good news though, we’re currently looking at alternative payment methods. 

See our article ‘Why do I need PayPal?’ by going to ‘Settings - Need help’ in-app.

Stay tuned,
Team Depop', 'modified': '2019-11-21T11:09:28Z'}

title: LOVE DEPOP
review: I'll start off by saying I LOVE depop. It's such an easy way to thrift - the app itself has the same interface as instagram, so it's easy to scroll and find gems. However, their app still has many bugs that need to be sorted. Nonetheless, awesome app & way to shop!
developerResponse: {'id': 5198055, 'body': "LOVE YOU. As for the bugs issues, do try to report anything you find glitchy, we want to make sure we're on top of things so we can help fix things for our community much faster. \n\nLove, Depop", 'modified': '2018-09-24T11:29:59Z'}

title: Yet again- it’s harder to shop....
review: Overall depop is a pretty good shopping app. Just when I get used to the changes, there are more made that make it hard to shop. Please fix it so that I don’t have to click so many times to see the shipping price 🙄 And please don’t default to “relevant” when searching. I want “recent” listed.
developerResponse: {'id': 7510582, 'body': 'Hey there, thank you for getting back to us about this. We can see how annoying this might be! I will make sure to pass this on to the team.\n\nLove, Depop', 'modified': '2019-02-28T12:01:06Z'}

title: Great app however there are bugs
review: Love the ease of shopping on the app however my push notifications will not disappear after I’ve read my messages! Super annoying to see always see 6 push notification alerts on my iPhone but there are no new notifications when I open the app.
developerResponse: {'id': 7752399, 'body': "Hey Violet, that is a bit annoying and we're sorry that you're experiencing this. We've been looking into this and will make sure to jump quick on fixing this in order to get this baby riding smooth again. Do make sure to report this as there might be a way to fix this for ya and investigate further. \n\nLove, Depop", 'modified': '2019-03-15T13:57:43Z'}

title: Read please
review: I buy and sell on Depop and I want to be able to refresh my posts with one easy click. My older posts that need to be updated or put on the top of my page are very difficult to refresh. One click refresh is needed!!
developerResponse: {'id': 3877944, 'body': 'Hey Makeda, thanks for bringing this idea to light! Team Depop', 'modified': '2018-06-18T12:36:08Z'}

title: Some problems
review: Great app, but sometimes they remove things that don’t violate their terms and when your email them about it they don’t get back to you. So they could defiantly improve. They have also removed some of my items hat have been sold saying it violated their terms but I know for a fact it didn’t!
developerResponse: {'id': 3878383, 'body': "Hey there! Could you update this review to include your Depop @username so we can take a look at what's happened? Thanks, Team Depop", 'modified': '2018-06-18T13:03:13Z'}

title: Depop Fan!
review: Depop is great. An amazing place to buy and sell SAFELY!!!! Safety is KEY when it comes to reselling anything. I have never once had a problem with selling or buying anything on Depop. 30+ items bought and sold without a problem

title: Love everything about the app except...
review: The explore page is the same ppl over and over again.  Additionally, I'm not thrilled that I can only follow a specific amount of people and when I e-mailed depop directly about this I got a very sassy & rude response.  There is a direct correlation with how many people you follow and how many follows you get regardless of what depop says y'all.

title: Interesting and easy
review: Cool app, please adjust it so we can add more photos instead of just 4, customers would like to see more details of a product there going to purchase. Over all good and very simple to use, they take a 10% fee. Will choose this app over others

title: Great place to buy/sell, but...
review: I wish the user interface was a bit more intuitive and allowed for easier searches. Also, more options to customize clothes recommended in your feed and ipad display compatibility please!

title: dark mode
review:
can y’all at depop headquarters PLEASE consider having a dark mode for the app. sometimes at 3 am i like to go on but i try not to because it blinds my poor eyes. 
you’d have much more people making impulse purchases at midnight, i promise you.

title: Easy to get block !!!!!!!!!!
review: I only use the app today and I got 2 account who sell rep and not authentic item block me. First, who I just give them an offer without answering - get blocked. Second-she just sale an item we countered in the morning so i say i’m glad for her but she blocked me and said doesn’t need my praise which is so rude and very dangerous if you pay for them through Paypal and if they don’t like you, you’ll get blocked and lose money. Be careful!!
developerResponse: {'id': 19701108, 'body': 'Hey. We moderate the app 24/7 to ensure scammers are kept away. If you notice anything suspicious, please report the item/user in-app (by clicking the 3 dots (...) top right of their profile/item) so we can investigate.\n\nTeam Depop', 'modified': '2020-12-11T15:19:38Z'}

title: used to be great
review: this app used to work pretty well. now we just get useless updates. how have we not gotten an update for more brands yet? do y’all know how many brands you’re missing?? it makes it SO HARD to accurately describe items when you don’t even provide us with the necessary resources. same goes for styles of clothing. there are SO MANY different clothing styles y’all don’t have anything even close to list it as
developerResponse:
{'id': 18690472, 'body': "Hey Carly,

Thanks for the feedback. We love hearing about what we can do to improve Depop for our Community. When you succeed, we succeed. We'll be passing this along to our Product Team.

Team Depop
", 'modified': '2020-10-25T21:13:46Z'}

title: DO NOT GET THIS APP!
review: This app will f you over the sellers are very sketchy and are not here for customer service, a lot of them are here to scam people out of money. I personally had an issue where u accidentally bought something (which is very easy to do for some reason) and I reached out to customer service about 6 times and they did nothing. I had to reach out to PayPal and they did nothing as well. I am out of $116, do not get this app if you don’t want to be scammed

title: Liked the idea of it
review: I tried to make an account but it kept glitching and wouldn’t accept any passwords (even though I tried different ones and all passed the requirements) so I restarted the app but it wouldn’t take my phone number cause there was “already an account with that number” and when I tried signing in with the password it wouldn’t login. I don’t know how to fix it. I don’t have another phone number. Please advice.
developerResponse:
{'id': 17287203, 'body': "Hey, sorry to hear about this. If you can submit a request via this link we'll help you get onto Depop ASAP.

https://bit.ly/depopsignup

Team Depop
", 'modified': '2020-08-14T15:02:05Z'}

title: Fees
review: I love using Depop but the downside is that Depop charges a fee of 10% of the total sale +shipping and then PayPal also charges a fee of $.30 + 2.9%. It would be better if we had another payment option. The outcome of this is seller having to charge buyers more in order to make a profit.
developerResponse:
{'id': 16727867, 'body': "Hey, thanks for the review. Our 10% fee allows us to keep Depop running smoothly. It contributes towards the cost of running the app, creating new features and improving our Community’s experience. 
 
See our article about fees by going to 'Settings - Need help' and typing in ‘What about fees’.
Team Depop
", 'modified': '2020-07-19T15:37:22Z'}

title: Could use a better fraud detector
review: The app for the most part is great. The only problem it has for me is the fraudulent accounts. I've had to file disputes because of this. I suggest maybe having a registry system for electronics that makes you enter an IMEI number for proof of existence and ownership.

title: Missing a feature
review: Should add an option to show only available items. And let costimize things you search for based on your measurements etc like shoe size. Thanks

title: Shopper idea
review: I’m running into a lot of nice clothes I’m willing to buy but sadly I can’t because it’s not located in my region and they don’t do international shipping so if a filter was created to help solve this issue by showing items I can actually buy domestic or international shipping it would help otherwise you there looking at stuff you can’t really obtain.

title: It’s ok but..
review:
I haven’t had any problems with this app until today....

 I was just scrolling down my TL when the app just crashed ... I tried to open it again and it crashed again. Been doing this for about 30 minutes now . Fix it Please!
developerResponse:
{'id': 15249116, 'body': 'Hey, we had some temporary outage but it should be fixed now, so you get back to Depoping.
 
Keep exploring,
Team Depop
', 'modified': '2020-05-11T19:11:15Z'}

title: Very hard to get customer support
review: Although I like the layout of this app I find it very difficult to get in touch with anyone when there is an issue. Refunds or any issues with a sale are very hard and you will not get a quick response. No phone number for customer support, email only.

title: Algorithm and platform always changing for the worse
review:
Despite their policies dropshippers are allowed to continue spam tagging and selling cheap items.

as a seller and buyer its hard to navigate. unless youre featured youre not going to be able to be seen, because the only other way to be seen is for your items to turn up on the searches but when the  spam tagging is out of control searching for specific items is near impossible.
ie: search for a belt and a bunch of cheap earrings or other random crap from wish or alibaba will pop up before you see any actual belt posts.

the section thats supposed to be catered to your specific sizes and likes is never relevant. I always get the same items that arent even my size.

title: Love the app ..but
review:
I love the app to buy and sell, but not to browse. 

please bring back the option to see the price without having to click on the image. I find myself avoiding the app often and using others that are easier to look at.

title: Honest opinion about this app
review:
I’ve been selling on Depop since 2017, and I absolutely love it. But, still 4 stars.

Why 4 stars? Simple. Anyone who is verified, is people Depop likes. There are people who JUST started, uploaded 7 items, received 300 likes and was instantly verified. But they never sold anything.

The people who should be verified are those who have been working hard since day one, those who have so many great and amazing reviews, not new people.

The fees are great because it barely takes anything from you. Shipping is fast and simple, and customers are so nice and sweet.
developerResponse: {'id': 14083125, 'body': "Great to hear you love Depop, in terms of verification we offer this to topsellers, staff members and users we deem at high risk of impersonation, if you're not quite there yet just email sell@Depop.com and we'll be able to give you some advice getting more sales.\n\nTeam Depop", 'modified': '2020-03-18T10:00:39Z'}

title: Good app
review: Love depop but just seems the updates keep on getting worse. Especially with the new filter setting taking up so much space on the screen you can’t even click on the items. Also it takes a long time to be refunded if you come across a scammer because you have to deal with PayPal not depop.
developerResponse:
{'id': 10700114, 'body': "Hey. Thanks for the feedback. We love hearing about what we can do to improve Depop for our Community. When you succeed, we succeed. I'll be passing this along to our Product Team.

We’re also currently looking at alternative payment methods. 

Stay tuned,
Team Depop", 'modified': '2019-09-16T10:45:59Z'}

title: ok app, but can’t set up shop
review: I love love this app and have had success with buying from friendly sellers so far. However, wanting to make some extra money I wanted to set up a shop and... when it asks for my PayPal, no keyboard shows up! So I can’t login. The in-app browser pops up but nothing else. Would be a great app if I could only sell!
developerResponse: {'id': 8888552, 'body': 'Hi there, please pop over a report via our in-app support Settings - Need Help? - Technical Issues and then we can get this sorted together. Keep us posted ❤️\n\nLove, Depop', 'modified': '2019-05-28T05:35:12Z'}

title: Buyer and seller
review: I really enjoy this app, they make it easy to become a seller by providing you with lots of information, tips, and guidelines on do's and don'ts of selling. There are so many great authentic brand items at affordable prices, so being a buyer is great too!
developerResponse: {'id': 4782581, 'body': "Glad you're having a great buying AND selling experience. Thanks for the review! Team Depop", 'modified': '2018-08-23T12:21:06Z'}

title: Terrible UI, Great Service
review:
Aside from the fact that it is nearly impossible to navigate this app (many users I’ve interacted with have experienced issues with finding “receipts” in the app), I enjoy this app. 

There are many users posting great things and for the most part the app is usable. 

There are some weird glitches. Messages load in strangely. They don’t always show up right away. Also the notifications icon alert (the red dot) stays there even after notifications have been viewed. 

Please spend more time developing this app and get a new UI designer or dev who can build out the UX the way it was intended

title: Nice, diverse, endless possibilities and products
review: You can filter to your liking in the explore page, on profiles, and in search. Good if you’re a lil bigger and wanna limit the amount of clothing down to what can actually fit you

title: Please add location back to search options
review: Use this app daily, but was annoyed to discover that posts outside my country were moved to the very bottom of the searches. It was so much more convenient when I could view posts worldwide in the same spot.
developerResponse: {'id': 4768260, 'body': "Hey there! Thanks for your feedback - we do find this to have had a positive impact on the user experienced based on various different tests we've run. Nevertheless we still see your point of view and so would like to apologise if your particular experience has suffered as a result. Team Depop", 'modified': '2018-08-22T13:26:02Z'}

review: Quick and easy way to sell old clothing or any item, as well as starting up your own online store! Most users very friendly and understanding. Any problem DEPOP support is always available
developerResponse: {'id': 3801170, 'body': 'Thanks so much for this review! Team Depop', 'modified': '2018-06-11T16:17:51Z'}

title: the only place to buy clothes
review: buying and selling is SO easy on depop. you can message sellers, save items, and so much more. i’m never buying clothes from a real company for full price again!!! i’ve found the BEST clothes on depop!!
developerResponse: {'id': 16441113, 'body': "We're glad you love Depop as much as we do.\n\nTeam Depop", 'modified': '2020-07-06T17:20:12Z'}

title: Small inconveniences
review: In chat we should be able to send images, I do not see an option for Mobile. Also, if a seller is inactive it is risky for buyers and the seller doesnt ship or communicate in over a week it makes buyers nervous. Im not sure how depop can fix that, but it would be nice if they could.
developerResponse: {'id': 3340249, 'body': "Hey there! Thanks for the review. At this moment in time we're not working towards being able to include images in chat, but this is something we're considering for the future. Please rest assured that if a user hasn't logged any activity on the app for 28 days, you won't be able to see their items - we hope this helps somewhat. Team Depop", 'modified': '2018-05-03T09:22:07Z'}

title: Need to be able to filter by location more specifically
review: Why is there no feature to sort by city. Sometimes I would like to look at products that I can pickup locally. This is especially true for furniture.

title: unauthorized charges
review: i used to be an avid seller on depop, and my account was banned over a month ago. yet a month later, they are taking unauthorized transactions/fees from my bank account. i emailed them about it multiple times and it took them over 3 days to get back to me, and when i was selling on depop and had an issue with another seller, they got back to me within 24 hours. and when they finally responded, they weren’t even able to tell me what i got charged for, and they told me to go talk to paypal? they do not take responsibility at all, and i will not be recommending this platform to anyone, as it feels like they are more set on making money for themselves then actually helping the sellers on the platform.
developerResponse: {'id': 19694203, 'body': "Hey, we’re sorry to hear your experience hasn't gone to plan. In order to keep our Community safe, all decisions made to suspend users and items are taken after deep investigation and consideration. If you feel this is unfair, just drop us a reply in the original email thread. We’re always happy to take a second look.\n \nTeam Depop", 'modified': '2020-12-11T10:15:33Z'}

title: Meh
review: it’s a good app to sell because tons of users sell on there but how are you going to promote that you support small business and take almost half a fee from your users when their product is bought?????. the fee is terrible i sold a $25 shirt and got only $16 out of it due to limited fees. i understand a couple of dollars but $7????

title: The worst update ever.
review: Yeah no. This app is not good for buyers and sellers. The whole layout of the app is terrible. As a seller, I can no longer refresh my listings because they don’t even show up on the public feed at all. So when you search up, “dress” you will get anything but a dress! Or a brand. You will get anything but that brand you want. Constant spamming of tags to get more people, lack of interaction on my page anymore due to the update. This is so bad.

title: Great and all but charges me $5.75 every 2 weeks
review: I’ve been using this app for years to sell my things and buy from it as well. But recently they started taking $5.75 from my PayPal account every two weeks and it doesn’t say what for especially since I haven’t bought anything. Now because of them I’m at a negative balance in my paypal. Like what are you guys charging me for? To have the app or what? I’m unlinking my PayPal and deleting this app.

title: Error
review: I downloaded this app to use because my friends have told me it is the best to sell clothes and it seems I already had an account??? I’ve tried the retrieve password but it keeps saying error and now I don’t know who even made the account. I’ve been attempting to get in for over a week now. I know what you might be saying, make an account. But my number isn’t registering and keeps saying error too. Kind of a large bust.

title: Can’t list items
review: Put my billing address in at the start, and when I go to list anything, it requires an address. I don’t know why they don’t save the address you give, but every time I choose my state, it kicks me out of the insert address field. So, I can’t put my address (or any address) up, so I can’t list anything or buy anything. Kinda ruins the whole app. Tried restarting the app, reinstalling, and restarting my phone. Nothing helped
developerResponse:
{'id': 17908964, 'body': "Hey, we can imagine how frustrating this is and we’re currently working to resolve this issue. Please get in touch by going to 'Settings - Need help - Technical issues - I've still got an issue' and send us a report leaving your username and details regarding your listings. 
 
We’ll take it from here,
Team Depop
", 'modified': '2020-09-16T10:05:56Z'}

title: Annoying explore page
review: REALLY hate the new layout forcing the explore page on me everytime I open the app. It’s not even a simple swipe to get to my actual feed.. because that will just scroll sideways through the explore options. Makes it a hassle to easily get to my feed which also makes it kinda pointless to follow people for the reason to catch the things they sell before they are gone.

title: Alright
review: As a buyer I really enjoy this app. I have yet to sell on it. However it freezes up on me a lot which is annoying because I have to close it each time which results in me losing my search and all the items I scrolled through.
developerResponse:
{'id': 17495214, 'body': " 
Hey, we can imagine how frustrating this is and we’re currently working to resolve this issue. Please get in touch by going to 'Settings - Need help - Technical issues - I've still got an issue' and send us a report leaving your username and details regarding your listings. 
 
We’ll take it from here,
Team Depop
", 'modified': '2020-08-25T17:48:01Z'}

title: great BUT
review:
I used to go on the app to just look around & try to narrow accounts to see if they have my sizes but then I no longer have the option to do that. 

Like I have to manually input my sizes each time. Is that a problem to others or just me?
developerResponse:
{'id': 17495253, 'body': "Hey, we can imagine how frustrating this is and we’re currently working to resolve this issue. Please get in touch by going to 'Settings - Need help - Technical issues - I've still got an issue' and send us a report leaving your username and details regarding your listings. 
 
We’ll take it from here,
Team Depop
", 'modified': '2020-08-25T17:52:07Z'}

title: Doesn’t let me create an account of sign in
review: I’ve had a Depop account before, but then I deleted the app. Today I re-downloaded it and it will not let me sign in or create an account.  In order to create an account I need to submit my phone number, but when I submitted my phone number, it told me that there was an “Error”. I’ve restarted my phone and checked to see if it needed updating but nothing worked.
developerResponse:
{'id': 17420889, 'body': "
Hey, sorry to hear about this. If you can submit a request via this link we'll help you get onto Depop ASAP.

https://bit.ly/depopsignup

Team Depop
", 'modified': '2020-08-21T14:06:52Z'}

title: shipping label problems persist
review:
Pros: user-friendly platform, fairly egalitarian in who gets views, some great needles in the haystack
Major con: every time I’ve sold an item, Depop doesn’t give me the shipping label, but instead an error message. I have to bug customer service (which is slow and anonymous—you can submit a report or DM on twitter and that’s it) until they can get the correct one days later.
developerResponse:
{'id': 15703939, 'body': "Hey, our support response times are currently slightly longer due to the current pandemic, but we'll be in touch ASAP.
 
We're here for you,
Team Depop
", 'modified': '2020-06-01T14:45:39Z'}

title: Crashes more than any app
review: Depop is great in theory. The fees are less than poshmark, but poshmark has a WAY better app so idk if it’s really worth it. There’s no way to reshare your listing so I feel like when I post something it’s then lost forever in the app. I’ve only made a few sales but I sell on poshmark pretty often. Also this app crashes all the time. It’ll say you have a bunch of notifications even when you don’t and it’s constantly crashing
developerResponse:
{'id': 16341577, 'body': 'Hey. We can imagine how frustrating this is. Please remove cached data by going to ‘Settings - Apps - Depop - Storage - Clear Data’ on your phone. Then, completely delete and re-download the app. 
We’ll get this sorted,
Team Depop
', 'modified': '2020-07-01T16:03:16Z'}

title: Reach out!
review: Make sure you reach out to sellers to make sure the item is still available. Doing that I haven’t had any issues! Love my pieces such a variety of things and this app is very easy to use.

title: Love the app but..
review: Love the app but I wish Depop would allow you to post more than 4 photos!! Then it has us having to make a whole separate post for more photos! Also, the fear of getting scammed by sellers and buyers is a constant struggle!! I know that is out of Depop’s control but it’s so annoying

title: fix the scrolling!!
review: after the new update, the page keeps sending me back up after i scroll down through my search feed. lets say i search for a purse and then click on an item that i like, i save it for later and then click on the back arrow. but then it just sends me back to the start of the feed and it’s ridiculously annoying, especially if you’ve scrolled for a long time and deep. can you guys please fix this? it’s honestly very inconvenient, but otherwise the app is great. thanks :)
developerResponse:
{'id': 15394738, 'body': "Hey, sorry to hear about this! The good news is we've got a fix for this bug on the way. 

Stay tuned, 
Team Depop
", 'modified': '2020-05-18T14:26:38Z'}

title: SCAM
review: I bought something off Depop hoping it wasn’t a scam but also thinking “if it is it’ll be okay I’ll get my money back” WRONG!!!! I lost a lot of money and Depop did NOT give me money back. I bought from a scammer who deleted his account and the transaction disappeared off paypal and I am so angry. Then I put a post about the scammer trying to warn buyers because he makes new accounts daily selling the same thing. DEPOP EARSED MY POST!!!!!! Calling it hate speech and discrimination!!!!!!!! THIS JUST GOES TO SHOW DEPOP DOES NOT CARE ABOUT ITS COSTUMERS!!!!!!!!!
developerResponse:
{'id': 14972777, 'body': "Hey. We can imagine how frustrating this is. Head in-app to 'Settings - Support - Need help - Buying - My purchase - I haven't received my item'.
We also moderate the app 24/7 to ensure scammers are kept away. If you notice anything suspicious, please report the item/user in-app (by clicking on the 3 dots top right of their profile/item) so we can investigate.

We're here to help,
Team Depop
", 'modified': '2020-04-28T17:17:27Z'}

title: Minor Fix!
review: I love Depop and the app, but the tracking speed of swiping is too fast. I’ve accidentally lost my place because I was trying to swipe up, but it swiped back to the homepage instead. This is super annoying because I then have to reset all my filters and look through all the same items...

title: Easy to buy and sell!
review: I love depop and I am a buyer and seller. I’ve been using depop for over a year now and it’s been so easy to use in all aspects. the atmosphere of depop is kind and reasonable! I recommend depop to all of my friends and followers on social media. it’s great :-)
developerResponse: {'id': 6885297, 'body': 'Bring the whole family to the community. \n\nKisses, Depop', 'modified': '2019-01-17T13:40:59Z'}

title: Horrible Experience
review: I recently sold an item to a buyer and she has “not” received her item in mail, I have told the buyer that I have sent it to her a week ago and she keeps lying that she hasn’t. customer service has not helped me at all through out this whole process, I have messaged them over 10 times and still no refund on the $14 they took out of my bank account without my permission and it’s still pending to this day.
developerResponse:
{'id': 10145193, 'body': "Hey hey! That doesn't sound good at all. We offer Seller Protection so rest assured we'll do our best to help you out.

Read more here: https://depophelp.zendesk.com/hc/en-gb/articles/360001845367-Seller-Protection

To get in touch with Support, please go to 'settings - support - need help - technical issues - I've still got a problem' and either chat to us or send a report.

We've got your back,
Team Depop", 'modified': '2019-08-13T09:51:40Z'}

title: Favorite retail app!!
review: Never have I ever received such love from vendors!! This app is filled with so many cute things and I really don’t know what I’d do without it. I’ve never once have had problems with buying from anyone on this platform.

title: Such a great app
review: Honestly one of my favorite apps I love it I search through at least once a day it is very useful and finding items you couldn't elsewhere amazing app would recommend to everyone
developerResponse: {'id': 5369711, 'body': 'Can I get a Woot Woot.\n\nLove, Depop', 'modified': '2018-10-05T09:18:21Z'}

title: The best selling clothes app.
review: Everything so easy and quick. The only down side is that the % they take is a little too much. But business is business I guess. Besides that everything is perfect!
developerResponse: {'id': 2933460, 'body': 'Hey there, welcome onboard! Reach out if you have any questions at all. Team Depop', 'modified': '2018-03-26T11:24:46Z'}

title: Right but not Quite!
review: Seems to me they feature the same ole same ole Depop famous/popular people on the explore page! It’s hard to sale your items on Depop when your items are never featured or seen. Definitely, feeling extremely frustrated and like the little guy on the totem pole! 🤦🏽‍♀️  I’m hoping Depop makes some changes soon. I look forward to doing “better” business with Depop.
developerResponse: {'id': 3499427, 'body': "Hey there! We want to improve the Explore page as well as provide more outlets for our sellers to gain exposure and visibility on the app. This is something that WILL improve over time, so thanks for bearing with us and we hope you'll notice improvements in the not-so-distant future. Team Depop", 'modified': '2018-05-17T09:44:09Z'}

title: Great idea but executed poorly
review: So many ways for users to get scammed and it doesn’t seem like much is done about any of it other than just accepting a loss. Users can be left incredibly poor reviews for things like giving a fake tracking number and still be able to run their shop? I am no longer comfortable using this app in all honesty. If there was more protection and guarantee for buyers and consequences for sellers I’d still consider using it.
developerResponse: {'id': 3458846, 'body': "Hey there! We think that PayPal's buyer and seller protection is thorough enough to keep our users safe. Nevertheless if this isn't the case Depop Protection also exists to fill in the gaps. If you need any more assurances about how this works then please don't hesitate to contact our support team - they're available on support@depop.com. Thanks, Team Depop", 'modified': '2018-05-14T11:55:33Z'}

title: i love this app for buying stuff
review: this app is so convent for buying items. most everything is at a lower price than they would be retail and you can direct search something if youre looking for something specific (ex adidas specific color shirt or anything like that) you can have communication with the seller which helps you possibly negotiate prices or get shipping updates and stay informed. from a buying perspective its a great app. the selling is a whole different ball game. most starters take a while to get something sold and thats not fun. overall not the worst app!
developerResponse: {'id': 3224767, 'body': 'Hey there, thanks for leaving us your feedback! Team Depop', 'modified': '2018-04-23T11:33:07Z'}

title: Shipping Label Issues
review: Depop won’t let me access my shipping label because my Paypal account is “Unverified” when i have already verified it in the past. I have sent them emails letting them know abt the problem and no answers.

title: It can be 5 stars if
review: If when a seller sells something it will let the people who follows them knows on their notifications  . It be nice to know when a seller puts something up because I have to go to the seller page and sometimes if it’s a popular seller it’s gone fast
developerResponse: {'id': 2627774, 'body': 'Some interesting feedback there, thank you for this! Team Depop', 'modified': '2018-02-20T11:36:42Z'}

title: Good to buy, hard to sell
review:
On the one hand I love this app - beautiful interface, so much great stuff to buy! 

On the the other hand, as a regular gal it's difficult to sell as unless you are already popular or running a full scale business, it's hard to get exposure and sell your items. 

Definitely room for improvement

title: Avid depop user but...
review:
Don't get me wrong, I LOVE depop. I've been buying and selling on the app for the last 3 years and love it! However something that REALLY bothers me is that after I've looked at my notifications and I quit the app there is still a red 1 on the app icon saying I have a notification even if I don't...this is super frustrating bc it leads me think I have a notification when I really don't. 

Secondly I'm not huge fan of the new font choice after one of the last updates. Go back to the other font or maybe try a new one!

Other than that I'm a big fan of the app and will definitely continue using it.

:)

title: Noooo😭
review: Idk if you guys did this on purpose but everytime im viewing an item and I exit out it takes me straight to the top again and i have to go back where i was again to look for more clothes😭
developerResponse:
{'id': 15340384, 'body': "Hey, sorry to hear about this! The good news is we've got a fix for this bug on the way. 

Stay tuned, 
Team Depop
", 'modified': '2020-05-15T11:58:19Z'}

title: Unresponsive - Did not get my payment
review: I have had someone purchase an item and ever since I couldn’t mark it as sent because an error kept coming up. The buyer has received the item a few weeks ago and I still have not gotten my pay. Contacted Depop by email, Twitter and Facebook. Emails I get no response. Twitter and Facebook tell me the same thing saying that they are working on it. It’s been weeks and still gotten nothing.
developerResponse:
{'id': 16212384, 'body': "Hey, our support response times are currently slightly longer due to the current pandemic, but we'll be in touch ASAP.
 
 
We're here for you,
Team Depop
", 'modified': '2020-06-25T09:13:42Z'}

review: I love Depop!! I think it might be the new update, but while scrolling through, I can’t click on an item and go back without it automatically going back up to the top of the search results:( Annoying, but other than that a great app!
developerResponse: {'id': 15577434, 'body': "Hey! The good news is we've fixed this bug now, if you update to the most recent version it should work but just get in touch if not.\n\nTeam Depop", 'modified': '2020-05-26T15:52:26Z'}

title: Maybe a bug problem ?
review: Since i updated depop recently, i’ve been unable to even open the app past the opening page without it crashing :(
developerResponse: {'id': 12645832, 'body': 'Hey. We can imagine how frustrating this is. Please try removing cached data by going to ‘Settings - Apps - Depop - Storage - Clear Data’ on your phone. Then, completely delete and re-download the app. This should do the trick. \n\nTeam Depop', 'modified': '2019-12-30T10:25:51Z'}

title: Error purchasing item
review: I loveeeee Depop but from time to time I get error purchasing item, now I’ve been getting it for anything I buy, I have money in my account so that’s not the issue but I’ve tried everything from making another paypal, using a different computer, using my hotspot nothing works!):
developerResponse:
{'id': 14972523, 'body': "Hey, we can imagine how frustrating this is. Please get in touch by going to 'Settings - Need help - Technical issues - I've still got an issue' and send us a report.

We’ll take it from here,
Team Depop
", 'modified': '2020-04-28T17:00:34Z'}

title: BEWARE OF SCAMMERS
review: i understand it doesnt happen to everybody. I bought and paid $110 total for these Doc Martens in DECEMBER and its now april only to never get the shoes or a response from seller. Emailed Depop and called Paypal support to try and get a refund. After messaging the seller on tracking info on what i bought she blocked me. this also happened with 2 other sellers. just make sure the person you buy from has no bad reviews on not receiving or selling items like they did.
developerResponse:
{'id': 14562210, 'body': "Hey. We can imagine how frustrating this is. Head in-app to 'Settings - Support - Need help - Buying - My purchase - I haven't received my item'.

We also moderate the app 24/7 to ensure scammers are kept away. If you notice anything suspicious, please report the item/user in-app (by clicking on the 3 dots top right of their profile/item) so we can investigate.

We're here to help,
Team Depop
", 'modified': '2020-04-09T09:13:44Z'}

title: SCAMMMM
review: My friend got banned off Depop for no reason when she spent 2 hours reading the terms and conditions and she got banned like what the heck. Nikki and Peter need to get themselves in check because she was banned for nothing. Also the fact that y’all ain’t doing nothing for Coronavirus is scary cause it’s an issue that’s gonna affect us all and Imma get it from y’all. She literally paid y’all so much she got so many sales but she gone now so thanks a lot now we gonna be homeless bye.

title: Mikki
review: I’ve purchased the bad hair day hat and it’s amazing!!! Mikki was super easy to work with and very kind. I just ordered something else and I know that shipping was reasonable both times and that it shipped soon the first time and I know it will the second! Thanks my dude! 💜💜💜
developerResponse: {'id': 6340247, 'body': 'You is welcome my dude.\n\nLove, Depop', 'modified': '2018-12-11T14:20:16Z'}

title: Annoying
review: Half the time the app never works for me. It doesn’t ever want to load regardless of if I’m connected to a WiFi source or not. It also constantly tells me to open a shop, and I’m not going to do that. My only reason for downloading Depop is because I want to buy things from the cute shops but I can’t even do that half the time because the app doesn’t work.
developerResponse: {'id': 8619755, 'body': 'We also want you to enjoy the fruits of the cute shops. Can you please pop over a report via our in-app support Settings - Need Help? - Technical Issues and then we can get this sorted together. Keep us posted ❤️\n\nLove, Depop', 'modified': '2019-05-11T11:53:04Z'}

title: Good but can be better
review: I enjoyed the app and have sold a couple of things but the only thing I think they should change is the shipping price (way too expensive) $4 for a small object
developerResponse: {'id': 6141933, 'body': 'Hi there, thank you for the feedback. Should you wish, you can try to arrange your own shipping if this is most cost efficient, however, we know the in app shipping is super handy! So I will make sure to pass this information down to our team for an overview.\n\nLove, Depop', 'modified': '2018-11-28T09:51:59Z'}

title: Bundles
review: There needs to be a function in app where buyers can bundle items together into one transaction automatically instead of the seller having to make a post for them!
developerResponse: {'id': 2866022, 'body': "Hey there! We know this is something our users would really benefit from: whilst we can't specify when such an option might be available just yet, please be aware that shopping carts and bundles are very much on our future radar of improvements. Thank you, Team Depop", 'modified': '2018-03-19T13:30:13Z'}

title: Fun & Easy to use!
review: I started using Depop less than a month ago and am already selling items, and found the perfect prom dress! It’s also super easy to use and convenient that USPS shipping labels are prepaid and provided to you to print out. loveeee this app

title: Depop is THAT place
review: The pop is great for showcasing special and unique items from decades past and now. I love it because people are more creative, and the feed is more of a blog style. I feel that makes it such a comfortable community of creatives, fashion lovers, buyers, and sellers. Love it!

title: So many bugs and glitches
review: I'm a seller on this app, the community is awesome, and selling is simple, but it has sooo many problems. I can’t even post an item lately before it freezes and shuts down completely! It’s horrible! I’m scrolling through other posts and after about 5 it’ll shut down on me. FIX IT PLEASE It so annoying I’m considering moving my entire shop to eBay.

title: Seller: I wish I could deposit money into something else
review: PayPal has never worked for me, I have money stuck from last year in it that I still can’t get out. I wish I could deposit straight to my bank or through Venmo or cash app.
developerResponse:
{'id': 18097345, 'body': 'Hey. Thanks for sharing your feedback. PayPal is our payment provider, which ensures that buying and selling are protected in-app. Good news though, we’re currently looking at alternative payment methods. 

See our article ‘Why do I need PayPal?’ by going to ‘Settings - Need help’ in-app.

Stay tuned,
Team Depop
', 'modified': '2020-09-25T10:39:03Z'}

title: User Friendly But Photo Issues
review: This is a very user-friendly app & I really like it a lot!! Recently I’ve noticed it doesn’t allow me to select photos from particular albums (in iOS) when I’m trying to post a new item. I truly hope that is one of the bugs that’s being fixed!!

title: Scammers
review: Be careful on this app!! Well some people just want to sell their clothes others will scam you. Once you send them your money they will delete the account, and then their will be no way to get your money back. I only buy from people that have many 4-5 star reviews. Besides from scammers this app is amazing!
developerResponse:
{'id': 18690515, 'body': 'Hey there,

We moderate the app 24/7 to ensure scammers are kept away. If you notice anything suspicious, please report the item/user in-app (by clicking the 3 dots (...) top right of their profile/item) so we can investigate.

Team Depop
', 'modified': '2020-10-25T21:22:59Z'}

title: My Products are cute but Unimportant
review: i wish my products would show more on the explore page. I try hard to get things that my buyers will like but it’s hard when i feel like no one is seeing them. love the app still
developerResponse:
{'id': 17738780, 'body': 'Hey. We get it, this can be super frustrating. Rest assured, we’re always looking for ways to discover exciting new users. 
Have a read through our article ‘Suggested Sellers’ by going to ‘Settings - Need help’, for some tips on how to become a Suggested Seller.

Keep exploring,
Team Depop
', 'modified': '2020-09-07T14:14:19Z'}

title: 3 starts until bug fixed
review: I love this app but there’s a bug whenever I try to put in my address for buying or selling. I had to enter it through my laptop because when I put in my state on the mobile app it quits me out to the home screen. 5 stars if not for this annoying bug.
developerResponse:
{'id': 17909011, 'body': "Hey, we can imagine how frustrating this is and we’re currently working to resolve this issue. Please get in touch by going to 'Settings - Need help - Technical issues - I've still got an issue' and send us a report leaving your username and details regarding your listings. 
 
We’ll take it from here,
Team Depop
", 'modified': '2020-09-16T10:08:32Z'}

title: Seller review
review: I’ve been selling on depop and it’s awesome, but there are some issues I’m still having. There are bugs that will cause the listing making process to freeze multiple times. And if they could add a filter to sort by color that would be great.
developerResponse: {'id': 15249080, 'body': "Hey. Thanks for the feedback. We love hearing about what we can do to improve Depop for our Community. When you succeed, we succeed. We'll be passing this along to our Product Team.\nTeam Depop\n", 'modified': '2020-05-11T19:09:01Z'}

title: Hate it
review: I hate this app. Customer service is terrible and the whole payment using paypal isn’t working for me. I sold something 4 day’s ago and still can’t see the shipping label bc depop is telling me that my paypal isn’t verified even though I’ve had it for years and it is verified. Emailed depop for help and they were useless. Tomorrow will be 5 days without having shipped the item and the buyer is, understandably, not happy. Blaming depop for this
developerResponse:
{'id': 17357435, 'body': "Hey, our support response times are currently slightly longer due to the current pandemic, but if you've sent an email we'll be in touch ASAP.

Thanks for sharing your feedback. PayPal is our payment provider, which ensures that buying and selling are protected in-app. Good news though, we’re currently looking at alternative payment methods. 

See our article ‘Why do I need PayPal?’ by going to ‘Settings - Need help’ in-app.
 
 
We're here for you,
Team Depop
", 'modified': '2020-08-18T15:29:03Z'}

title: Almost perfect
review: I love this app so much, it’s great for shopping and selling. Everyone is so nice, and I love this app. The only bad thing about this app is that it takes 10%, and that would be fine if it was 10% of the price. But it takes 10% out of the shipping price too.
developerResponse:
{'id': 16731584, 'body': "Hey, thanks for the review. Our 10% fee allows us to keep Depop running smoothly. It contributes towards the cost of running the app, creating new features and improving our Community’s experience. 
 
See our article about fees by going to 'Settings - Need help' and typing in ‘What about fees’.
Team Depop
", 'modified': '2020-07-19T22:55:19Z'}

title: A LOT to improve
review:
I tried to refund my buyer following their FAQ instructions. And when I reached the transaction page there literally is no option for refund. Tried to contact customer service but they asked to file a complaint? And I can’t find their customer service number anywhere. 
In addition to that. I hope they start using Venmo instead of PayPal soon. Cuz latter always charges a fee out of the buyers transaction.
developerResponse:
{'id': 16866171, 'body': 'Hey. Thanks for sharing your feedback. PayPal is our payment provider, which ensures that buying and selling are protected in-app. Good news though, we’re currently looking at alternative payment methods. 

See our article ‘Why do I need PayPal?’ by going to ‘Settings - Need help’ in-app.

Stay tuned,
Team Depop
', 'modified': '2020-07-25T16:30:10Z'}

title: Love it
review: I absolutely love this app. It has totally helped me sell and buy items from here. At the moment though every time I try to get on it kicks me back to my home screen. Idk if it’s a big but please fix it.
developerResponse:
{'id': 15249082, 'body': 'Hey, we had some temporary outage but it should be fixed now, so you get back to Depoping.
 
Keep exploring,
Team Depop
', 'modified': '2020-05-11T19:09:14Z'}

title: can be a little hard to navigate
review: I love depop but the interface could be a little smoother and more user friendly, especially for settings. I also wish you could edit listings without bringing it to the top but that’s kinda arbitrary

title: TOXIC AND RUDE
review: such a toxic and rude environment. sellers and buyers are so toxic and rude and it’s honestly a horrible platform to sell on. i have tried reporting the behavior i’ve had to endure but depop would not do anything about it because it was not serious enough. even though i was harassed in my messages and comment sections. i sent depop over 20 screenshots of abusive behavior but they did nothing. depop also deleted many sellers posts without notifying them and deletes so many posts for no reason.

title: Update not so good.
review: I normally love depop but the update is making the experience frustrating. Typically, when you click on an item and go back to browsing it will leave you at the place where you were. Now it scrolls all the way back up to the top of the search page. Please fix this depop!🥺
developerResponse:
{'id': 15395837, 'body': "Hey, sorry to hear about this! The good news is we've got a fix for this bug on the way. 
 
Stay tuned, 
Team Depop
", 'modified': '2020-05-18T15:15:17Z'}

title: New update
review: love the app but the new update is terrible. Everytime i look at a item and i go back it goes back to the top every single time. now i have to scroll back down to keep looking when originally when i click back it would go back to the same place i was looking. bad update

title: Glitch!
review: Items are delivered and tracking says they are still in transit even days after. Also feedback button does not appear on some buyers. Please fix!!!
developerResponse: {'id': 5723917, 'body': 'Hi Steph, we want to understand a bit more what might be happening regarding delivered items. Can you please pop a report to the tech team about this? Report via our in-app support Settings > Need Help? > Technical Issues and then we can get this sorted together.\n\nLove, Depop', 'modified': '2018-10-30T10:17:19Z'}

title: love this app
review: i absolutely love depop! I get a lot of style inspo from it as well as really cool clothes. the only problem I have is that I have been getting logged out everyday and have to download the app again and put in all of my information. other than that i love the app
developerResponse:
{'id': 15248539, 'body': ' 
Hey. We can imagine how frustrating this is. Please remove cached data by going to ‘Settings - Apps - Depop - Storage - Clear Data’ on your phone. Then, completely delete and re-download the app. 
We’ll get this sorted,
Team Depop
', 'modified': '2020-05-11T18:31:05Z'}

title: Doesn’t work
review: I’m trying to buy a sweater off the app and the app doesn’t let me. It tells me an error has occurred and then that’s it. I tried using the app, the website, switching between credit and paypal and nothing. And when I googled it I realized it’s been going on for literal years. Such an embarrassment having such a big issue going on for years with no fix.
developerResponse:
{'id': 13416234, 'body': "Hey. This isn't an ongoing issue we're aware of, although we can imagine how frustrating this is. 

Please remove cached data by going to ‘Settings - Apps - Depop - Storage - Clear Data’ on your phone. 

Then, completely delete and re-download the app. 

We’ll get this sorted,
Team Depop", 'modified': '2020-02-11T10:11:50Z'}

title: They don’t care about the safety of their buyers AT ALL!!! beware
review: I bought something and the seller deleted the listing right after and never shipped my item. Apparently the buyers protection do not work if the listing is deleted!! Like excuse me?????? I wasn't even able to ask for a refund since the listing was deleted. Like???? So the whole app has NO MEANS to stop someone from scamming ANYONE???????? honestly this is SO disappointing. Do not use this app if you don’t want to be scammed

title: Really good app
review: Great to get style ideas catered to items you already liked. Only downside is that I wish that showed the shipping price along the items price so you could get an idea of how much you’re going to spend before you actually spend.
developerResponse: {'id': 9142107, 'body': 'Hi there, we hear you. Thank you for the lovely feedback. Will make sure this is heard by our team.\n\nLove, Depop', 'modified': '2019-06-13T06:35:02Z'}

title: yikes
review: this app is great except for the fact that if you run into a problem, your fully on your own. i purchased something and never received it. it’s been almost a whole month and i still haven’t got my money back. i contacted depop THREE TIMES. waste of my time for sure. they didn’t help one bit and i have no idea how to get a refund. it’s quite irritating and annoying. don’t recommend this app for buying anything🤷🏽‍♀️
developerResponse: {'id': 8676000, 'body': "Hi there, this is definitely a yikes moment we don't want you to be having. Our support team is always there to give you a helping hand and send out support on how to get a refund. So let's what has happened this time around, can you please give us your username? We can reach out to the support team for you.\n\nLove, Depop", 'modified': '2019-05-15T05:44:55Z'}

review: This app is great way to get rid of old clothing you don’t want or promote your brand. It is a little confusing at first but once you pick it up you can find great clothing for cheap and make a little money on the side.
developerResponse: {'id': 5158239, 'body': 'A little bit of pocket monies is always handy. Especially for midnight run snacks. \n\nLove, Depop', 'modified': '2018-09-21T10:33:21Z'}

title: Pretty good
review: I don’t use Depop to sell things yet but I have bought things from it and I can say the whole process was really easy and not stressful whatsoever! My package came super fast too, but of course that all depends on the seller.
developerResponse: {'id': 3801214, 'body': 'Thanks for the 5 stars! Team Depop', 'modified': '2018-06-11T16:21:35Z'}

title: Poshmark way better
review: After using both depop and posh, I’m not a fan of depop the way it automatically deposits money into paypal (which has been a huge annoyance in itself because it put my money ON HOLD with my first sale of which I’ve had no access to) *my biggest annoyance and complaint.  The buyers on depop are also rude with how they communicate with you vs poshmark. I’ve made more sales on posh anyways so after this item is delivered I’m deleting depop for sure.

title: Irritating and Lack Communication Skills
review: I never write reviews however this app is very frustrating. For some odd reason my account was suspended and after contacting the support team three times, I still haven’t heard anything back. So I made a new account and I wake up to find my brand new account (which I haven’t done anything on yet) suspended. I am writing this in hopes that I may ACTUALLY be able to get some answers from the developers.
developerResponse: {'id': 4540505, 'body': "Hey there - please let us know your Depop @username so we can properly investigate what's happened here? Please also be sure to check the spam/junk folders of the email address associated to your account, in case the messages have ended up in there. Thanks - Team Depop", 'modified': '2018-08-06T11:50:18Z'}

title: Get Community
review: I’ve been selling and buying on Depop for almost a year now, it’s amazing how popular and how much it’s grown. I love the fact that you can either sell or buy unique items; from clothing (women & men), shoes, home decor, art, and much much more! I love Depop! ❤️
developerResponse: {'id': 3801191, 'body': 'Hey there! Thanks for being a part of the journey! Team Depop', 'modified': '2018-06-11T16:19:38Z'}

title: Should be more new user friendly
review:
There should be a unisex option when posting items. More newer people
To the app should be featured on the discover page

title: Great but needs to improve
review: Please add more brands, more categories, and maybe subdivide the description box into title, condition, size, with/without tag, etc.... so that there could be more information regarding the item being sold.

title: Great overall
review: You have to watch out for scammers and fake products on this sight! I have had money taken ... Never pay outside of the website and always use PayPal or apps like that to pay!! But overall it’s a great app to shop and sell old or unused items😊
developerResponse: {'id': 3315714, 'body': "Hey there! Thanks for the review. If you come across any fraudulent users or prohibited items that we haven't got round to catching just yet, please be sure to report them to us so that we can keep our community safe as quickly as possible. Happy Depop-ing!", 'modified': '2018-05-01T12:04:40Z'}

title: Always Crashes
review: I like Depop - unlike other shopping apps, you don’t have to sift forever to find something good. But my number one complaint is that the app ALWAYS crashes. Out of nowhere, the screen goes black and the app closes. You’d think with each update and how many people use it, they’d have it controlled by now.

title: Fixed the bug
review: Thank you for fixing the bug that made the search page refresh and start from the top.
developerResponse:
{'id': 15395102, 'body': "Hey, sorry to hear about this! The good news is we've got a fix for this bug on the way. 
 
Stay tuned, 
Team Depop
", 'modified': '2020-05-18T14:41:50Z'}

title: Newer does not equal better
review: i didn't update for a while because i didn't like the new icon, but now i did update and i majorly regret it. the squashed font is hard to read, items not saying they're sold before you tap on them is inconvenient, the profile being under the picture makes it hard to focus on anything, and it was a better app overall before everything was changed.

title: Full of Bugs for IPhone 12 Pro
review: Overall I’ve enjoyed using this app but it’s been difficult the past week due to all the bugs. I can’t scroll through my own post pictures or make edits such as add or remove photos. Can’t even mark an item as sold or delete the post!
developerResponse:
{'id': 18830063, 'body': "Hey Ashley,

We can imagine how frustrating this is and we’re currently working to resolve this issue. Please get in touch by going to 'Settings - Need help - Technical issues - I've still got an issue' and send us a report leaving your username and details regarding your listings. 
 
We’ll take it from here,
Team Depop
", 'modified': '2020-11-01T16:57:31Z'}

title: Depop supports scammers‼️‼️
review: Hoooleyy on depop is a scammer but depop allows it because she has a big following and they make profit off her shop so they allow it and cover it up they will delete reviews and comments at all costs just to continue to make money and they claim they care but in reality they don’t and won’t help you if you get scammed so be safe because I’m suree there’s plenty more scammers on there which depop protects because they only care about money
developerResponse:
{'id': 18830194, 'body': 'Hey there,

We moderate the app 24/7 to ensure scammers are kept away. If you notice anything suspicious, please report the item/user in-app (by clicking the 3 dots (...) top right of their profile/item) so we can investigate.

Team Depop
', 'modified': '2020-11-01T17:14:58Z'}

title: Deleted my account.
review: Been a seller and buyer for a few months. Depop deleted my account today for apparent harassment via comment, I have not left any comments so this makes no sense. Horrible customer service, filed a different inquiry a few months back and have yet to receive a response.
