Just filed one right now regarding my lack of account and doubting a response because of the horrible service.
developerResponse:
{'id': 18530295, 'body': "Hey there,

Thanks for the review. Our 10% fee allows us to keep Depop running smoothly. It contributes towards the cost of running the app, creating new features and improving our Community’s experience. 
See our article about fees by going to 'Settings - Need help' and typing in ‘What about fees’.

Team Depop
", 'modified': '2020-10-16T18:46:23Z'}

title: dislike the update
review: I am not one to complain or write reviews but please fix this!! the update is so not efficient when you search items you only see two boxes at a time and they got rid of the gallery view of items! it’s make it difficult for sellers to promote their items and buyers so see a wide variety of items!! please fix this back to the original way
developerResponse:
{'id': 18485877, 'body': "Hey Alexa,

Thanks for the feedback. We love hearing about what we can do to improve Depop for our Community. When you succeed, we succeed. We'll be passing this along to our Product Team.

Team Depop

title: love depop BUT
review: 10% is a lot when it comes down to it. I feel like i can’t have anything listed for much less than $9 or $10 because i have to keep the 10% fee in mind since i will be receiving less than what was listed.
developerResponse:
{'id': 17298971, 'body': "Hey, thanks for the review. Our 10% fee allows us to keep Depop running smoothly. It contributes towards the cost of running the app, creating new features and improving our Community’s experience. 
 
See our article about fees by going to 'Settings - Need help' and typing in ‘What about fees’.
Team Depop
", 'modified': '2020-08-15T21:29:32Z'}

title: So many bugs
review: This app used to be great, but for the past few months, it’s been functioning TERRIBLY. It takes me almost 10 minutes to upload ONE listing because of a terrible lag when you type. Things in my shop get rearranged all the time. Sometimes you don’t get notifications/can’t access messages which makes you look like an unresponsive seller. So many things need to be fixed.
developerResponse: {'id': 17378402, 'body': "Hey! The good news is we've fixed this bug, if you update to the latest version it should be resolved now. \nTeam Depop\n", 'modified': '2020-08-19T12:33:30Z'}

title: I deleted this app - shoppers beware
review:
After multiple bad purchasing experiences. Had to fight with PayPal on 3 separate occasions when the the item I purchased was not mailed or when the item was blatantly different than advertised. 

Even though I won the cases, it took over a month to go through the whole process of providing proof to PayPal, for them to make a judgment, the money to be returned to my account. Just not worth the risk to buy here.

title: Too many bugs
review: The app itself is a great platform. Recently, the app has been appearing with a lot of bugs such as “error loading this users information.” Or “no messages” in my inbox when there are tons. There was also a period of time the app itself didn’t open
developerResponse: {'id': 16730589, 'body': "Hey! The good news is we've fixed this bug, if you update to the latest version it should be resolved now. Team Depop", 'modified': '2020-07-19T20:24:06Z'}

title: Please put email as an option to sign up!!
review: So my dad recently disabled our sms texting services and our data to use when there is no wifi.. so now when i want to sign up for depop the only way i can do it is using my phone number and the new update where we can use apple id doesent work for me either bc i can’t use my apple id to make other acc which is wierd but yea.. please put email as an option to sign up PLEASE!!

title: Crashes a lot
review: So they have a lot more interesting stuff then Poshmark, but the app crashes a lot. I mean a LOT!!!! I was only using it normally and it crashes on me, it’s not because of my phone, I read it’s also happening to others too. I wasn’t sure to give 2 stars or 3 because I liked the stuff listed
developerResponse:
{'id': 15703018, 'body': "Hey, we can imagine how frustrating this is. Please get in touch by going to 'Settings - Need help - Technical issues - I've still got an issue' and send us a report.

We’ll take it from here,
Team Depop
", 'modified': '2020-06-01T14:06:18Z'}

review: I've tried turning my phone on and off and deleting the app and redown loading but it won't let me go on to the app none of my other apps are doing this

title: Ban these people
review: Don’t get me wrong I used to LOVE depop it was my go to place to shop other than thrifting. But now the atmosphere of this app is so annoying with all these drop shippers and brandy Melville feins tryna sell one “rare” tank top for $100 or posting their collection even though they’re not selling any of it. This is an app for SELLING, but until depop bans this or gets rid of annoying sellers I’m not gonna use it anymore and the majority of the people feel the same way :/

{'id': 15317136, 'body': "Hey, sorry to hear about this.

Stay safe,
Team Depop", 'modified': '2020-05-14T10:14:05Z'}

title: Incredible App!
review: I want there to be seeable stories like instagram, so you could talk to your all your followers in some way without having to post something that's not a product but way to interact.

title: Really love it!
review: I am obsessed!!! Depop has great prices and brands and it’s the best way to thrift! This app is a great way to stay in style and help the environment. By using the perfectly good clothes that are already on the planet, we save resources that animals, plants, and people on earth desperately need.

title: Freezes and quits way too often
review: I really love using depop but it is very frustrating when it freezes every time I exit (not quit) the app and go back on. I’ve deleted and reinstalled the app so many times but eventually it always gets to the point of freezing. Please look into this!
developerResponse:
{'id': 14114659, 'body': "Hey, we can imagine how frustrating this is. Please get in touch by going to 'Settings - Need help - Technical issues - I've still got an issue' and send us a report.

We’ll take it from here,
Team Depop
", 'modified': '2020-03-19T10:05:08Z'}

title: worst app
review: the first day i downloaded this app and i ordered something and immediately got scammed or whatever you want to call it... i reached out to the help center about a refund and they were absolutely no help! they didn’t understand the issue and kept repeating things that i had already tried. if you download this app connect your paypal IMMEDIATELY or you will never see a refund🤬 lots of people getting hacked and lots of fake name brands...
developerResponse:
{'id': 13465073, 'body': "Hey. We're really sorry to hear your experience didn't go to plan. Our Support team work hard round the clock to keep our Community happy, and that really is priority number one. Could we ask you to let us know your username? We'd be happy to chase this up for you and get this resolved as quickly as possible. 

We also have expert teams to detect and remove counterfeits. If you ever see anything suspicious on-app, just send us a report by clicking the 'three dots' on the item. We'll do the rest.

We've got you,
Team Depop", 'modified': '2020-02-13T12:39:18Z'}

title: Sales
review: My sales on this app are awful. I have really good photos, descriptions, and tags. I even have about 1,000 followers. I normally sell on Etsy and do really well on it. I’m apart of a few Depop Facebook groups and other sellers have been talking about how awful their sales have been and how changes to the app have caused sales to tank. Specifically with bumping items. Please change this back! I’ve hurting my sales and I feel like Depop is pointless to be on.
developerResponse:
{'id': 12039056, 'body': "Hey. We get it, this can be frustrating. However, we've created a dedicated Seller Handbook on our Help Centre to help our Users shoot, style and sell.
 
Learn more about highlighting your shop by going to ‘Settings - Need help’ and typing in Sellers Handbook.

Keep exploring,
Team Depop", 'modified': '2019-11-25T12:54:52Z'}

title: Selling
review: It seems like no matter what I do on depop my sales are nowhere near what I achieve in other apps. There needs to be a refresh button for listings and a way to make offers to buyers that are interested so I’m not individually harassing buyers. I also notice the algorithm has more control over me than the effort I lay forth here. It seems there’s no consistent way to put forth effort that doesn’t make you a slave to the app.
developerResponse:
{'id': 10699924, 'body': "Hey. We get it, this can be frustrating. However, we've created a dedicated Seller Handbook to help our Users shoot, style and sell. 

Check it out here: https://sellers.depop.com/SellerHandbook_UK_18.12.18-1.pdf

Keep exploring,
Team Depop", 'modified': '2019-09-16T10:34:58Z'}

title: great
review: i love Depop but i do wish there was an option to save your searches with the sizes/price range/etc you set for it because it’s a little annoying to always have to do it manually.

title: need better scrolling!
review: I looove depop but am desperate for the option to scroll through a person’s whole feed or through a whole search, so I don’t have to keep returning to the thumbnail grid
developerResponse: {'id': 3052852, 'body': 'Thank you for this feedback Arebzzz! Team Depop', 'modified': '2018-04-06T15:15:20Z'}

title: Greedy company allows drop shipping. NOT OKAY
review:
Went from being a cool place for vintage, secondhand/recycled items to a place now the staff at depop are trying to justify allowing people to sell crap from AliExpress and drop shipping. But it’s OK to support unethical fashion and cheap quality items, as long as the sellers use pictures they took themselves!
Absolute joke. People who drop ship are irresponsible, lazy sellers and ruin the vibe of depop, but they Depop doesn’t  care because it’s more money in their pocket.

title: BRING BACK ‘SEARCH WORLDWIDE’ option!!
review: I loved buying and selling things on Depop and one of the main parts I loved was looking at worldwide items for sale. Well now I can’t because I have to scroll all the way DOWN to the BOTTOM of the item I’m looking for! Please bring back the option to search for worldwide items no one complained about it before I don’t know why you would take it away.
developerResponse: {'id': 4374345, 'body': "Hey there - we decided to play around with the order of items as we know that users generally demand more items close to them as these are likelier to be purchased. Nevertheless we've taken your feedback on board and will continue to closely monitor this one. Thanks for raising the issue - Team Depop", 'modified': '2018-07-24T09:45:44Z'}

title: Yo mama gettin slapped if you don’t like this app
review: I'm in the navy and am currently stationed far away from home (CA.) , miss shopping with my mom and dad at downtown LA . But with the app it's like I'm still home , helps me cope a bit with the distance. Very great community with reliable people . Thank you Depop !!!!!

title: It's alright
review: As someone who's generally too lazy to post items for sale I use depop primarily to look for clothes. However, the app crashes ALL the time! With every update I’ve hoped for the problem to be fixed but nothing. I originally thought it was my phone but I got a new one and the app still crashes! Please fix this.
developerResponse: {'id': 2572486, 'body': 'Hey Alexis - sorry to hear about the app crashing for you. Would you mind dropping us an email (support@depop.com) with your Depop @username, some information on when/how the app is crashing for you and any screenshots that might be relevant. Once again our apologies, and looking forward to hearing from you - Team Depop', 'modified': '2018-02-13T13:27:41Z'}

title: Incredibly frustrating
review: I’ve contacted Depop several times but their support team has never contacted me back. I can not post more than one item on my page because the items will just be deleted (I understand it’s a glitch). I still give them some credit since the platform is easy to use and I have made great purchases through them!

title: Not worth it
review: I prefer Mercari over Depop. It sells faster and they have better deals. Shopping on it is way more worth it too. Depop features the same people and it’s hard to sell things fast I have been on it for a couple months and sold nothing although my prices are very affordable and the featured items are wannabe vintage items for $60+ dollars. It’s just not very efficient.
developerResponse: {'id': 2099145, 'body': 'Hey, thank you for the review and feedback. If you would like to send anymore thoughts on how you think the app can be improved please feel free to email productfeedback@depop.com. Thanks, Team Depop', 'modified': '2017-12-21T10:24:15Z'}

title: Nice app and nice people.
review: The app is so easy to navigate through and the dna feature is so accurate when displaying items you would like. And the sellers are all so nice and my order shipped so fast.
developerResponse: {'id': 19223783, 'body': 'We love to see it.\n\nTeam Depop', 'modified': '2020-11-19T15:54:51Z'}

title: PayPal
review: I've been trying to connect my PayPal account with my depop account but once I log in it takes me to a "not a robot" page then asks me to click the images that match what it asks and then once I'm done it just keeps reloading the not a robot page and keeps going through the cycle and not letting me connect my PayPal.

title: Algorithm could use some tweaks?
review:
I LOVE this app— it’s got so much variety; it gives a lot of autonomy to sellers, and I’ve found some super cool stuff on here. 

I’m surprised, though, at how slow the algorithm was to pick up on my preferences and trends. If it were to be enhanced just a bit further, you’d be DRAINING my wallet haha

title: Won’t work !

{'id': 18549382, 'body': "Hey there,

https://bit.ly/depopsignup

Team Depop

title: Update Has Decreased My Sales
review: I started depop a few months ago and am nearing 100 sales. I’ve been gaining a ton and selling a lot, but ever since I updated the app, I haven’t gotten one sale. I’m not gaining followers, and not as many people are viewing my page. I don’t know why this is, maybe due to the increase in in-app shipping prices? Lack of exposure on the app? I dont know but I’m really dissapointed.

title: Good app but...
review: I love this app but it would be much easier to find items I am interested in buying if posts automatically deleted after they were sold. That’s why I gave the app a 4/5.

title: Help
review: I love Depop, I sell on here frequently and it’s my main source of income at the moment. But these last few updates have been affecting my experience as a user, I can’t even post any new items, edit captions, or upload item photos.
developerResponse:
{'id': 16731540, 'body': "Hey, we can imagine how frustrating this is. Please get in touch by going to 'Settings - Need help - Technical issues - I've still got an issue' and send us a report.
 
We’ll take it from here,
Team Depop
", 'modified': '2020-07-19T22:49:03Z'}

title: App keeps crashing
review: This is one of my favorite apps but I’m upset that it constantly crashes, despite the fact that I’ve updated my phone and the app itself. I have messages that need to be opened and I can’t get to these people on time.
developerResponse: {'id': 16570996, 'body': "Hey! The good news is we've fixed this bug, if you update to the latest version it should be resolved now. Team Depop", 'modified': '2020-07-12T21:12:37Z'}

title: One problem
review: I love this app soo much it cleans my closet for me! But I have one problem, we can’t send pictures in dm which is a Major problem for me. Because people ask for more photos of the item and we have to go to another app to send the photos.

title: Please fix scroll bug
review: I just upgraded to an iPhone 11, and every time I’m making a search and click on an item, it backs out to the top of the search listings - making me have to scroll down over and over again and I usually only end up checking out maybe the first 50 listings because it gets very annoying

title: Makes me broke!😂
review: I love this app. Awesome people with awesome products. I look at it everyday and buy alotttt of things. Definitely recommend over poshmark or whatever the other app is called. Easier to talk to people and seems safer.

title: selling needs to be facilitated
review: before this app i didn’t have a paypal, and i thought that we could connect depop to whatever bank. Now I am forced to have a paypal that i do not want. After I made my paypal i went to sign in but now the app makes my keyboard take up like half my screen and I can only use three keys.

title: THANK YOU FOR YOUR SERVICE
review: Came with my son and bought the hoodie from Mookie outside @ a consignment store. Got it LC before buying it for my kid. Just wanna personally thank Mookie for how professional an kind he was. I usually don’t do reviews at all.. but from a former marine to a current one.. Oorah!

Depop features the same sellers over and over again. It’s difficult for smaller sellers to be featured and bring in new followers when the same sellers keep being featured. Other then that the app is great

title: Great app but notification bubble is annoying
review: Please fix the always there notification bubble, when ever I see the app I think I have a notification to look at but then I open it and everything is the same. Really annoying please fix it in the next update,

title: Need an upgrade to your look?
review:
Look no further.
This amazing, and I mean amazing, app allows me to find excellent thrifts, vintage pieces, and glamorous new picks to make my appearance shine. I’ve been able to sell my old wears and come out with amazing new fits.
developerResponse: {'id': 6089618, 'body': 'Look. No. Further. We. Say. \n\nLove, Depop', 'modified': '2018-11-25T09:13:30Z'}

title: Video
review:
Please make it easier to reach the video recoding module. We have to press three different buttons just to get the video cam going. Please make it more directly accessible. 

Would be even better if we could use 3D Touch to launch the camera directly from the home screen. 

Thank you!
developerResponse: {'id': 6231139, 'body': 'Another great feedback! Will pass this one too.\n\nLove, Depop', 'modified': '2018-12-04T09:29:03Z'}

title: Update with these features please
review: I love depop but please let us change our user names and maybe we can specifically tag items instead of having to type a color and style it in the description
developerResponse: {'id': 6231452, 'body': "You're in luck with one of them. We're now offering username changes. You just have to pop over a mail to support@depop.com and will get on it.\n\nLove, Depop", 'modified': '2018-12-04T09:40:18Z'}

title: Awesome diverse app
review: Most reselling apps for clothes all focus on women only. This app has amazing clothes for men and easily allows to filter by men’s categories and sizes and find unique things you could never find on any of the competitors apps that only focus on women sections.
developerResponse: {'id': 2744902, 'body': "Hey Eleafent - great to read that you're finding plenty of rare items on our app! Thanks for the review! Team Depop", 'modified': '2018-03-05T10:47:39Z'}

title: DONT BUY THIS APP!!!!
review:
AWFUL CUSTOMER SERVICE
I wish I could give zero stars
I sold a item 3 months ago now and I still have not been paid and the buyer never responds to my messages so I reached out by email to depop. They were very awful and were basically putting the blame on me. Not ever offering a ounce of help. Emailing back and forth for a week now and they say they can’t do anything about it. So I got screwed over and they don’t even care. Don’t buy this app.

title: I love this app...but
review: This app is great for buying and selling. I’ve done my share of both. However...at times I want to just uninstall it because no matter what I do I cannot get rid of the notification bubble. I have all notifications OFF, and I still get a “red ‘1’” chilling at the top of the icon. It’s ABSOLUTELY annoying. Please fix this.
developerResponse: {'id': 5561416, 'body': "We're on ittt.... Thank you for leaving us some feedback on this.\n\nLove, Depop", 'modified': '2018-10-18T14:10:08Z'}

title: NO REFUND
review: They say that you don’t have to use a PayPal account to buy something but if you don’t then don’t expect to get your refund. The seller never shipped my item but they keep telling me to talk to PayPal about it. It doesn’t help that PayPal is hard to communicate with when you didn’t pay with an account. I asked Depop many MANY MANY MANY times to help me get a refund but they just keep telling me the same things!!!!! I still haven’t got a refund
developerResponse: {'id': 4978174, 'body': 'Hi there,\n\nSorry to hear about this whole experience. Whenever you pay for an item via Depop, it is all covered via our protection scheme. If you pay by card or a guest check-out, you can still get a refund by contacting PayPal - they will just have to open this manually as you did not finalised the transaction with a PayPal account.', 'modified': '2018-09-07T09:51:24Z'}

title: 10% fee is gigantic
review: With the separate added PayPal fee you only really make a profit when you sell name brand stuff not so much with the $15 or less value t shirts from your closet that you actually want to get rid of, where is that 10% going to anyway
developerResponse: {'id': 3224670, 'body': "Hey there! Thanks for the review. The 10% fee goes absolutely everywhere! It's what helps pay for the cost of running a business and the fee does truly contribute to every part of this. We appreciate the feedback, but hope that the ability for Depop to keep improving and connecting more users is a worthy compromise for this. Thank you! Team Depop", 'modified': '2018-04-23T11:20:33Z'}

title: Excellent for buyers & sellers
review: This app has everything buyers ask for and is fun to browse. Customer service is extremely quick and Kaye was amazingly helpful and friendly!! I will be recommending this app to everyone 🥰
developerResponse: {'id': 17719883, 'body': 'Glad to hear it, we feel the same! Team Depop\n', 'modified': '2020-09-06T23:03:33Z'}

title: Rearranging before posting
review: I dont really like that you cant drag photos around to rearrange them when you're posting a new item up. You have to delete all the pictures and then choose them again. It is really inconvenient when you want to update pictures.

title: Really unique inventory
review: I love the searches and how it pulls up similar items when you click on something. One thing is I wish it would notify me when the seller ships it. I had to go check for myself. Other than that there is a ton of good stuff!
developerResponse: {'id': 2584820, 'body': 'Thanks for the review and that very valuable feedback regarding shipped notifications! Team Depop', 'modified': '2018-02-14T16:15:56Z'}

title: Obsessed
review: I'm on here honestly more than instagram lol! Awesome app and love that you can ask questions from ppl on depop only problem is when you buy something and seller isn't replying its confusing trying to find help on depop at least from my experience.

title: Terrible update👎🏼
review: I absolutely despise this new update. It made it not only harder to navigate. Also the majority of people who buy on here are  so cheap it’s actually offensive. They want everything for $10 or less. Also, There’s still lots of people getting scammed on the daily. Lots of people have stopped buying because they’ve gotten scammed 3-4 times and Depop doesn’t do much about it. They just continue to make more accounts.

title: The last updates
review: I’m not sure what happened but with the last 2 updates I’m unable to log into depop via the app. I’ve contacted support and they keep running me around in circles and Keep giving me the same solutions that don’t work.

title: Fix it
review: Make the search result small again! Everyone says that. There’s too much stuff. You can’t scroll for so long. It’s also not right for the eyesight. This ruins the app. If it doesn’t change I’m going to eBay. Also make a search options in your own likes and saves. So you can find things you liked and saved a while ago
developerResponse:
{'id': 18691021, 'body': "Hey there,

Thanks for the feedback. We love hearing about what we can do to improve Depop for our Community. When you succeed, we succeed. We'll be passing this along to our Product Team.

Team Depop
", 'modified': '2020-10-25T23:22:52Z'}

title: update style edit please
review: i usually love this app and would usually give 5 stars, but for weeks now my style edit has stayed the same and it’s really aggravating to see the same clothes from weeks ago that have all been sold. i don’t know why it’s doing that, and i’ve updated the app, logged out and signed back in, and even deleted the app. like i said, i usually love this app when the items get refreshed, but when it’s been the same stuff every day for weeks, it makes me not want to use the app.

title: BRING BACK MY SIZE FILTER!!!
review: i updated this app and it was perfect before and then they took away the my sizes filter which allows you to save all your sizes and switch it on when you’re looking for clothing in your size. Now you have to type in your size for each individual item you’re looking for every time you search and it’s such a hassle:/ like i haven’t gone on in so long because of it. fix pls !
developerResponse: {'id': 17654001, 'body': 'Hey, we can imagine how frustrating this is and sorry for the inconvenience. We’re currently working to have this issue resolved by the time our next update is released. \nTeam Depop\n', 'modified': '2020-09-02T16:22:05Z'}

title: Wont let me login
review: I haven't been able to sign in or create a new account for a couple of months now . When i reached out to customers support i never got an email back .
developerResponse:
{'id': 16999858, 'body': 'Hey, we’re sorry to hear this and we can imagine how frustrating this must be. Could you please submit a support request via this link http://bit.ly/depoplockedout
 Please remember to include your:
- Username
- Email address
- Phone number
- Phone operating system, example iOS 13
 
Let’s get this sorted,
Team Depop
', 'modified': '2020-07-31T09:21:31Z'}

title: Be careful
review: There’s no way to authenticate items and people have advertised items as authentic and they turned out to not be. Also it’s very easy to get scammed where you buy something and then they don’t provide you tracking for your order and then will delete their account and the item so you can’t contact them

title: Fast and easy to use
review: I got set up and ready to start buying and selling things in less than 30 minutes with the help ups guidance great job developers.

title: They’ll take majority of your money
review: Even if you choose “buyer pays for shipping” they’ll take a little less than half of your profits, always. I’ve never sold on any other app but I have a feeling they’re all the same money hungry and dgaf about you or your customers. (They really don’t care when your customers are angry at you because you have to put the prices up a little so you can actually make a profit)
developerResponse:
{'id': 16938991, 'body': " 
Hey, thanks for the review. Our 10% fee allows us to keep Depop running smoothly. It contributes towards the cost of running the app, creating new features and improving our Community’s experience. 
 
See our article about fees by going to 'Settings - Need help' and typing in ‘What about fees’.
Team Depop
", 'modified': '2020-07-28T22:55:42Z'}

title: Love it!
review: I love the app, and always got what was advertised! The only thing I have issue with is in the “Things We Love” page there was stuff that has already been sold, but that’s so small of thing!

title: PLEASE FIX
review: okay so i love this app, however the crashing is super annoying. NOW, none of my messages are loading, and it won’t let me message anyone. please fix this!! NOW it’s not letting me purchase anything!!! every single item from different shops keeps saying “error purchasing item, item(s) have updated make sure you’re happy before paying” um hello? i’m missing out on potential sales! this is ridiculous i am so angry!!
developerResponse: {'id': 16719357, 'body': "Hey! The good news is we've fixed this bug, if you update to the latest version it should be resolved now. Team Depop", 'modified': '2020-07-18T22:39:19Z'}

title: Can’t see my messages, receipts or get notifications
review: Depop is one of my only incomes during the pandemic so I ship out quite a few purchases almost every day. First the app kept logging me out and crashing whenever I opened it, now I can’t access any of my receipts, message buyers or get notifications for likes or comments. Needless to say my store has come to a complete halt (at the most crucial time where $$ is really tight too :/).
developerResponse:
{'id': 16719272, 'body': "Hey, we can imagine how frustrating this is. Please get in touch by going to 'Settings - Need help - Technical issues - I've still got an issue' and send us a report.
 
We’ll take it from here,
Team Depop
", 'modified': '2020-07-18T22:11:53Z'}

title: For some reason I couldn’t even make an account
review: It said “there was an issue” once I was done making my password.. every time. I deleted the app then got it again, refreshed it. Idk what else to do, my WiFi is working well. I’m gonna have to give it a one star until I can actually make an account without there being an “issue.” If this can be fixed I’ll be happy to give an actual review on the app.

title: Bugs!
review: The app is a great place to find deals on items but the most recent update has created a few new bugs! While in the search bar and you see an item and try to go back to the search page it brings you back alllll the way to the top!
developerResponse:
{'id': 15392276, 'body': "Hey, sorry to hear about this! The good news is we've got a fix for this bug on the way. 

Stay tuned, 
Team Depop
", 'modified': '2020-05-18T12:49:25Z'}

title: I love depop!
review: This app is the best!! I order so much clothes and awesome things on this site, I have never had any problems with anything on this app! Everyone is also so nice and everything is resolved quickly
developerResponse: {'id': 6548721, 'body': "Some nice love you're sending to us Maleah! Hope you're having a great holiday season.\n\nKisses, Depop", 'modified': '2018-12-26T03:01:01Z'}

title: No, just no
review: This app always takes down my posts, and it’s not even “harmful” they’re just my pictures of my clothes! Also they keep deleting my account, when I finally had my chance to make a new account, two days later it was deleted by depop! It was only my art that I was selling! When I try to contact them they’re just people who don’t even try to help, I’m kinda convinced they’re just robots. :/

title: REPORTING DOESNT HELP!!!!
review: I had the worst experience with a user who was trying to scam multiple times, they then decided to say that I was sending hurtful comments and that they were going to call the police on me because I warned others about their scamming. They also got one my my posts having nothing to do with them removed. I reported how many times and to no avail. Depop won’t help you so don’t bother trying to help yourself or others. :/
developerResponse:
{'id': 11284168, 'body': "Hey. Sorry to hear your experience didn't go to plan.

We're here to help, contact us via in-app support with any supporting evidence, including screenshots, and we'll take the appropriate action.

We've got you,
Team Depop", 'modified': '2019-10-16T10:38:59Z'}

title: half and half
review: i half like this because all the products i buy come amazing and great but i’ve sold my first item on here and i’m not happy. i sold a fitbit and i’m 100% sure i got scammed. i’ve been waiting 10 days for my money to come and it keeps saying “pending” i’ve looked up videos and etc and it’s always something i’ve already had done. i watched one video that said you could be scammed from a fake paypal @ and from a whole website when you go to see what’s happening. i will no longer be selling on this app only buying. i lost over 40 dollars from 1 items.
developerResponse:
{'id': 10374758, 'body': "Hi there! Sorry to hear your experience hasn't gone to plan. We offer Buyer Protection as long as the item was purchased using the BUY button in-app. 

We recommend following these steps to get the best outcome: https://depophelp.zendesk.com/hc/en-gb/articles/360001772448-I-haven-t-received-my-item

We're here to help you,
Team Depop 
", 'modified': '2019-08-27T10:28:21Z'}

title: one of my favorite clothing/accessory apps
review: I love the concept of thrifting. this app is golden. If you’re into vintage, unique items, & great service, I HIGHLY recommend depop. The sellers are so sweet & answer questions very fast & honest. I can’t think of a better thrift style app!

title: Notifications
review: I love buying and selling on this app because it makes it so easy. However for some reason I don’t always get a notification that someone has messaged me. (Already checked my notification settings on my phone). I hate to reply late to my potential customers.

title: Great app for online thrifting!
review: While it is a bit of a gamble buying off individual sellers, Depop does its best to ensure a safe, fun community to shop from! Would really recommend, simply keeping in mind that you spend at your own risk.
developerResponse: {'id': 4797550, 'body': "Thanks for your review! Whilst we're constantly working to make the app safe and trustworthy, we always recommend that you read seller reviews and chat to them before buying an item just to be assured that you're dealing with a serious seller. Thanks again! Team Depop", 'modified': '2018-08-24T15:36:11Z'}

title: Awesome app
review: I’ve had nothing but good experiences on Depop, buying & selling. I was so surprised at how fast it took to make a sale after listing items! I love the easy layout and transaction process. I’m so inspired every time I use this app. Love it!
developerResponse: {'id': 4767426, 'body': "We love to see you using the word 'inspired' in there - that means so much to us and is exactly what we're trying to achieve! Thank you! Team Depop", 'modified': '2018-08-22T12:44:43Z'}

title: I LOVE DEPOP
review: It's so easy to interact with others and connect with people that have similar fashion interests. It's so encouraging to be featured on the explorer page and all of the depop moderators I've come in contact with have been nothing but friendly and helpful. Thanks❣️

title: No contact
review: I’ve only been using this app for a short time and I recently listed stuff for sale on my account and the item was sold to 2 different people now. It’s been 2 weeks, I haven’t received ANY payments, and it doesn’t seem like depop is doing much to fix the issue here. Very unreliable and I do not want to refund $30 for a single item I listed for $15, especially when I NEVER received either payment.

title: Video capabilities...
review:
Would love to be able to tap to record rather than hold down to record. For people shooting themselves, it would enable me to post video rather than trying to do an awkward selfie video while holding down the shutter button ;)
Thanks!
developerResponse: {'id': 3270808, 'body': "Hey Stevie, thanks for this feedback. We're going to be refining and improving the video function throughout the course of the year, so stay tuned! Team Depop", 'modified': '2018-04-26T13:10:37Z'}

title: love!
review: I’ve been obsessed with this app because you can find some amazing deals! You can even interact with the sellers and ask questions before purchasing an item.

title: Glitches
review:
The glitches on this app tho. Can’t even use it to accomplish the basic purpose of it. I love the app, but I hate the glitches. 
It keeps me from seeing items after clicking on them and scrolling to see the 
other pictures. Idk what happens but the screen freezes a ton

title: Feed is not loading properly
review: I dunno what happened but when I used depop today on my iPad, my feed is not loading it only scrolls down a bit and then it won’t load any new listings? So that’s cool I’m missing updates for all the people I’m following >_>

title: Pretty bad
review: Yeah sure you can sell clothes and what not just like any other craigslist type thing the only difference with this is you HAVE to have an account to get stuff so not anyone can get it you HAVE to get scammed into their blog somehow kinda lame, huge waste of time for me could be useful to others.

title: i’ve made money but needs new features.
review:
first off, i wanted to start by saying that this app does work. there are just some issues i’ve found that need to be fixed. 

one of these is brandy melville auctions. depop needs to do more to stop these. they’re taking up my feed, my “recommended”, and honestly, i’m so sick of watching people trying to auction these things for $80+, when they’re worth $20. 

also, there needs to be more moderating to help with scamming. i’ve witnessed lots of people trying to scam. 

also, my phone slows down when i try to type my description on the app. i’m not sure if it’s the app, but it takes forever just to write a description of an item. 

last of all, why would you remove the ability to insert as many hashtags as you want? now you made it harder for people to find your items 🤦‍♀️

anyways, other than that, it’s great, but those things need fixed and then i’ll fix my review :)

title: ridiculous
review: im a seller on this app. i’ve posted HANDMADE masks at a reasonable price that have been REMOVED FOR NO REASON. i’ve had over 20 items removed. those same listings are being sold by other sellers without penalty. i’m really tired of their terrible customer service too. it’s practically impossible to get a hold of them. AND they have been taking an absurd amount of depop automatic payments and i don’t understand why. WHY TAKE $12 FROM MY ACCOUNT WHEN I DIDNT MAKE A SALE?

title: Good app just terrible sellers
review: I have used and bought off this app for about 2 months now and I’ve already been scammed out of around $900! And the customer service is basically useless cause they send the same old crap email saying that they’re working on it and never help! I still haven’t gotten any of my money back and it’s just a pain!

title: sell elsewhere and save ur $ n time
review: I lost at least $50 I received in payment because i was a “new seller” and didn’t have access to the money I was paid (?? like that don’t seem right b) the money literally returned to the buyer because it was sitting pending in my account for so long. total bs I made 0 profit while y’all still got ur percentage thanks <3 one would b better off using other apps or websites. hope u money wh0r3s r happy <3

title: failed customer support
review: I am a seller and depop is the WORST at responding to help requests. My PayPal has been connected and confirmed yet depop still will not give me access to my shipping label. I submitted a help request two weeks ago and have heard NOTHING from depop. Now i have an unhappy customer that can’t get their order and i can’t refund them because Depop won’t recognize my PayPal. I recommend taking your business to apps such as Mercari or Poshmark.
developerResponse:
{'id': 16191456, 'body': "Hey, our support response times are currently slightly longer due to the current pandemic, but we'll be in touch ASAP.
 
 
We're here for you,
Team Depop
", 'modified': '2020-06-24T10:48:55Z'}

title: Error Purchasing Item
review: I am consistently given an error cod when trying to check out no matter my method of payment. Have tried redownloading the app as recommended but nothing seems to solve the issue. Have encountered many others with the same issues. Aside from this, great platform, but with some bugs that need fixing.
developerResponse:
{'id': 14972479, 'body': "Hey, we can imagine how frustrating this is. Please get in touch by going to 'Settings - Need help - Technical issues - I've still got an issue' and send us a report.

We’ll take it from here,
Team Depop
", 'modified': '2020-04-28T16:57:40Z'}

title: Takes too much money from the seller
review: I have been using this app for 2 years now and I live it but the biggest complaint I have is how much money they take from you after you sell something. They say they take a %10 fee but I just sold an item for $27 and 10% off it is $2.70 and they take a fee for the label which the buyer pays. But tell me why I made $23 in the end. There taking more then they should.
developerResponse:
{'id': 14538538, 'body': "Hey, thanks for the review. Our 10% fee allows us to keep Depop running smoothly. It contributes towards the cost of running the app, creating new features and improving our Community’s experience. 

See our article about fees by going to 'Settings - Need help' and typing in ‘What about fees’.
Team Depop
", 'modified': '2020-04-08T09:45:56Z'}

title: NEEDS MORE PHOTOS
review: 🧡☀️☀️Great app and have been selling on the platform for a little more than a year! I was even featured for the cyber week promotion! The app needs to have more photos available per post. 4 IS NOT ALWAYS ENOUGH TO SHOWCASE THE ITEM AND DETAILS OF A PIECE IN FULL!!! Otherwise great app and can’t wait for further improvements!☀️☀️🧡
developerResponse: {'id': 13155989, 'body': "Hey. We're always looking to feature new sellers, so keep creating and we'll keep an eye on your shop. As for photo limits, thanks for your suggestion, we'll pass this onto our Product Team.\n\nTeam Depop", 'modified': '2020-01-28T09:47:39Z'}

title: Buggy
review: Cannot list because it wont let me put size  blank page when trying to. Like that i will have stop using it and i think more sellers will feel the same. Been like that for over 3 weeks

title: so great for selling clothes!
review: I have been selling clothes on depop for a while now, and i’m making a decent amount of profit from it! there is also a lot of buying options for shopping for vintage clothing! love the app:)
developerResponse: {'id': 7510792, 'body': 'Hey Hey, geddit... Get.That.Cash.\n\nLove, Depop', 'modified': '2019-02-28T12:16:58Z'}

title: It would be better if...
review: It would be better if they added a photo/video option in the messages. Life would be 100x easier. Just saying Depop😌 thanks! Besides all that, I love Depop to sell my clothes.
developerResponse: {'id': 5078770, 'body': 'Gotcha. Will make sure to pass this one through.\n\nMuch love, Depop', 'modified': '2018-09-17T10:28:10Z'}

title: The Best Thrifting App
review: You can find anything on Depop and it’s easy to communicate with the sellers and ask about items. Also if you want to sell it’s a really easy way to make some extra money!
developerResponse: {'id': 5113565, 'body': "Welcome to our community. Great to hear you're having the best time.\n\nLove, Depop", 'modified': '2018-09-19T08:11:49Z'}

title: Sales Have Gone Down Since New Update
review:
I used to like Depop when I first started using it, but lately with all the new updates I've hardly done any sales :( 
I'm not 100% sure if it's that or that they care more about all the famous depopers. I don't mind the 10% commission they charge, but I'd be happier if it were like it used to!

title: New design is cluttered and unintuitive
review: Made the mistake of updating this app. The layout is honestly pretty atrocious now- the font is really odd and stretched out looking, it's not chronological so it makes me not check the app regularly, and now the notifications are not in the quick access section so they're a pain to get to. Really sad that they've gone and made a nice, minimalistic app into this eyesore.

title: “My DNA”
review: Please please please listen to what people are saying, the “my DNA” style edit thing is not good. I get shown 15 items where as before I could go on my explore for you page based on my activity and be scrolling forever. There’s no way to find clothes in the style I like anymore without directly searching brands or tags.... this was a huge backtrack for the app

title: This used to be my favorite app
review: I sell and buy a lot on this app and recently they have been rolling out a lot of updates that are usually big changes. I’ve noticed over time with each update it has become more difficult to buy and sell. This used to be my favorite app but it is becoming too complicated and not so user friendly. The app was best when it was at its simplest set up
developerResponse:
{'id': 18579303, 'body': "Hey Elijah,

Thanks for the feedback. We love hearing about what we can do to improve Depop for our Community. When you succeed, we succeed. We'll be passing this along to our Product Team.

Team Depop
", 'modified': '2020-10-19T20:40:08Z'}

title: Good
review:
I’ve gotten a lot of people to download this app and they love it. So do I! Haha lowkey sponsor me tho 🤪

I’ve gotten a lot of nice stuff off of this. I wish you could leave pictures of the product being used in reviews.
developerResponse: {'id': 17421314, 'body': 'We’re glad you love Depop as much as we do.\n\nTeam Depop', 'modified': '2020-08-21T14:26:53Z'}

title: Won’t let me log-in
review: I’ve been trying to log into the app for about a week now and I still can’t. I’ve reset my password and it that wasn’t the issue but I have been able to sign into the website.
developerResponse:
{'id': 18574969, 'body': 'Hey there,

We’re sorry to hear this and we can imagine how frustrating this must be. Could you please submit a support request via this link http://bit.ly/depoplockedout
 Please remember to include your:
- Username
- Email address
- Phone number
- Phone operating system, example iOS 13
 
Let’s get this sorted,
Team Depop
', 'modified': '2020-10-19T15:12:15Z'}

title: Don’t like the new product page
review: I love this app! But the new update making the products when you search for them in rows of two is very hard to scan the page and have an overview of what I’m looking for. Please change it back, I liked the simplicity and visually it used to look wayyy better.
developerResponse: {'id': 18213092, 'body': "Hey. Thanks for the feedback. We love hearing about what we can do to improve Depop for our Community. When you succeed, we succeed. We'll be passing this along to our Product Team.\n\nTeam Depop", 'modified': '2020-10-01T10:15:29Z'}

title: Bad Customer service
review: Iv been having trouble with depop that won’t let me ship or receive money for my sold items. Iv been trying to contact them and no luck. There is no efficient way to reach them, and all my replies have been copy and paste replies with no helpful information. I am losing money and i am trying to be understanding with delays and covid but I'm disappointed with the lack of help:/
developerResponse:
{'id': 18175177, 'body': "Hey, our support response times are currently slightly longer due to the current pandemic, but if you've reached out to us we'll be in touch ASAP.
 
 
We're here for you,
Team Depop
", 'modified': '2020-09-29T13:11:25Z'}

title: Logged me out ??
review: I like the app and I’m always on it, and I was going to open the app and noticed I was logged out of my account. I tried to log back in , and it said my password wasn’t right, so I tried to reset my password and it says it won’t let me either ???? I don’t get why, I haven’t done anything wrong. I either was hacked or something is wrong with depop.
developerResponse:
{'id': 18097408, 'body': 'Hey, we’re sorry to hear this and we can imagine how frustrating this must be. Could you please submit a support request via this link http://bit.ly/depoplockedout
 Please remember to include your:
- Username
- Email address
- Phone number
- Phone operating system, example iOS 13
 
Let’s get this sorted,
Team Depop
', 'modified': '2020-09-25T10:41:24Z'}

title: Sign up
review: It won’t let me sign up and there isn’t a place on the actual website to sign up either. I am very disappointed because I see good potential for this app.
developerResponse: {'id': 5604642, 'body': "This IS disappointing, but there is almost certainly a reason why - and certainly a solution! Email support@depop.com popping through the @username and email you're trying to register with, they'll get things moving right away.", 'modified': '2018-10-22T10:08:34Z'}

title: Good app, only one problem
review: When I’m looking for something, if I click on an item but then go back, it takes me to the top of the page. Kind of annoying but I like the app otherwise
developerResponse:
{'id': 15395891, 'body': "Hey, sorry to hear about this! The good news is we've got a fix for this bug on the way. 
 
Stay tuned, 
Team Depop
", 'modified': '2020-05-18T15:18:48Z'}

title: Help please
review: I forgot my account password so I went to forget your password and it still wouldn’t let me reset my password. I tried to make a new account but I only have one phone number so I couldn’t make another one. The service is horrible I recommend selling on other apps.

title: RIPOFF
review: i ordered something ten days ago and ended up trying to get my refund which they couldn’t even give me the right method i didn’t use paypal but yet they were able to take my card and i still haven’t got actual help this wasnt a small price either either way by the time i get my refund it will take 10 days overall horrible
developerResponse:
{'id': 10863190, 'body': "Hey, we’re sorry to hear your experience hasn't gone to plan. We offer Buyer Protection for all items purchased in-app using the BUY button. 

Follow these steps so we can put this right:
https://depophelp.zendesk.com/hc/en-gb/articles/360001772448-I-haven-t-received-my-item

We're here to help you,
Team Depop ", 'modified': '2019-09-24T10:53:27Z'}

title: Disappointed
review: I’ve been a loyal Depop user for about a year now. I’ve bought so many items from this app and loved them all. In the new update, there’s a new button for the filter and sort. Every time you scroll it disappears and pops back up. I hate the placement and it’s extremely annoying! I just wish I had the old version back.
developerResponse: {'id': 10787421, 'body': "Hey. Thanks for the feedback. We love hearing about what we can do to improve Depop for our Community. When you succeed, we succeed. I'll be passing this along to our Product Team.\n\nTeam Depop", 'modified': '2019-09-20T10:18:43Z'}

title: This app has had nothing but problems.
review: I’ve had this app for about 5 months, and every week there seems to be something different to make it difficult to use. i wouldn’t recommend this app as it has made me lose money, they don’t help when items haven’t been sent and you’ve been ripped off. they have hidden fees and as it is getting good deals sometimes, it isn’t worth it.
developerResponse: {'id': 7216246, 'body': "Hi Erin, sorry to hear you've been having a bad experience. If you have report this can you let us know your username? We can then try to reach out to the support team and see how we can help you out with this.\n\nLove, Depop", 'modified': '2019-02-09T03:51:55Z'}

title: Notifications?
review: App is truly amazing for finding new and old clothes! However, I don’t get any notifications from the Depop app (using iPhone 6s) this would be helpful so I could get back to buyers/sellers quicker!
developerResponse: {'id': 5472178, 'body': "We're on this like white on rice! \n\nLove, Depop", 'modified': '2018-10-12T09:17:44Z'}

title: App keeps crashing!
review: Will change the review as soon as some bugs are fixed. The app keeps crashing out of nowhere, other than that I love this app.
developerResponse:
{'id': 15340438, 'body': "Hey, sorry to hear about this! The good news is we've got a fix for this bug on the way. 

Stay tuned, 
Team Depop
", 'modified': '2020-05-15T12:00:13Z'}

title: Love it
review: It’s so easy to sell and buy on the app! Been selling and buying for a while. Only downside both depop and PayPal take money from the transaction and from time to time there are scammers. But as long as you’re careful you can get what you want at great prices!
developerResponse: {'id': 4754242, 'body': "Thanks for the review! We also encourage buyers to 'do their research' on sellers as you mentioned and we find this to be a great tip. We're sorry about your feedback around our fees presently. We have this in place to keep our business alive and running and it really is critical for us at the moment.. Thanks - Team Depop", 'modified': '2018-08-21T15:33:28Z'}

title: A scam.
review: I purchased an item and they charged my credit card, but the item was never even shipped. I’ve attempted to contact the company several times, to which they send me the same generic “file a dispute with PayPal” response. Passing your problem to another company is not “buyer protection”, it’s being downright lazy. This is genuine scam with little to no real costumer support. Do not give them your credit card information!!! You’ll regret it.

title: Love the app but the new update isn't good
review: They constantly update things that don’t need to be updated and each upsets they put out still doesn’t work. Notifications glitch, other users items don’t show on feed, constantly crashing. If you’re going to put out an update every week, at least make sure it works.
developerResponse: {'id': 3052598, 'body': "Hey there! We regularly push out new updates with the very intention of fixing issues that appear on the app. Sorry this doesn't seem to be happening for you! Please make sure to reach out to our support team (support@depop.com) who will be best placed to look into the problems you're facing. Thanks, Team Depop", 'modified': '2018-04-06T14:44:28Z'}

title: App constantly malfunctioning
review: I love the depop community, however the app itself is a mess! It’s constantly crashing, displaying blank pages, and saying errors have occurred. With the new update, the app won’t even open on my iPhone 8! I really hope depop fixes this quickly, as it’s making it very difficult to manage my shop and stay contact with buyers.
developerResponse: {'id': 1667970, 'body': 'Hey, thanks for the feedback. We have fixed some crashes recently. Can you please go to help under settings and check you are on v2.7.1? If not, you need to delete the app then reinstall it. If you are still experiencing the crashes after doing this please contact us at productfeedback@depop.com. Thanks, Team Depop', 'modified': '2017-11-05T21:29:36Z'}

title: Still so buggy and impossible to use
review: Listing pages go white after I post so I can’t edit. Can’t delete listings, can’t mark as sold. Genuinely hope no purchases from my store as I’m worried it won’t mark as sold or I won’t be able to access the info I need. This used to be one of my favorite apps but I am over waiting for an update that will fix the mounting issues.

title: Can’t type billing info
review: I just downloaded depop on iPhone 12 pro max and couldn’t enter my billing info at all because I couldn’t type anything in. I had to use my old galaxy note9 which worked fine. I also continuously ran into problems trying to sign up in the first place (kept getting an error message whenever I attempted signing up automatically). Guess depop isn’t programmed for iOS.

title: Question
review: I had the app for a while and loved it, then I had to delete it for space. But when i tried logging it again, it wouldn’t log it with Apple info, wouldn’t accept my phone number when I tried to sign in, won’t send me an email when I click ‘forgot password’. Is there any sort of tech support for this?
developerResponse:
{'id': 18550189, 'body': "Hey there,

We can imagine how frustrating this must be. Sounds like your phone number is already connected to an account. Refer to this article (https://depophelp.zendesk.com/hc/en-gb/articles/360001792427-My-Depop-app-isn-t-working) on our Help Centre, and submit a request for support with your phone number and email address. Once we've received your report, one of the team will be back in touch via email as soon as we can and will connect you again from scratch.

We’ve got you,
Team Depop
", 'modified': '2020-10-18T21:12:21Z'}

title: Love this app!
review: It’s a great way to find clothes that fit whatever aesthetic you’re going for. You’ll find people who sell great stuff for cheap as well as stuff on the pricey end. One of my fav apps! Great well to sell too.

title: After recent update...
review: I’ll do a search in the app, scroll, click an item I like, then go back to the search and be taken back to the top of the results, not where I left off on the feed. Makes shopping pointless for me as it requires way too much hassle

title: Best Vintage Streetwear
review: I absolutely love being a seller and customer on Depop. I never expected to sell better items for decent prices besides trudging loads of clothes to Buffalo Exchange and Crossroads Trading. So many style options and personalities on this marketplace!

title: So close!
review: I’ve been buying and selling on Depop for a few years now, and I would say the thing that would make this app perfect for me is if there was a setting in your likes where you could HIDE SOLD ITEMS! Other than that, I’m loving it!
developerResponse: {'id': 13803188, 'body': "Hey. Thanks for the feedback. We love hearing about what we can do to improve Depop for our Community. When you succeed, we succeed. We'll be passing this along to our Product Team.\n\nTeam Depop", 'modified': '2020-03-02T11:11:32Z'}

title: takes too much for what it is
review: i have sold around 50 items on depop and i love the community and concept. however, i think that the 10% fee that depop takes is far too much. if this app were more high functioning and less glitchy, i think the 10% could be jusitified. i am on depop about 1-2 hours a day and i have to restart the app so many times because of the constant freezing and crashing. it also sometimes doesn't let me see my own account! overall, depop needs to fix their problems or i'm switching over to other apps!

title: Deleted sold item but didn’t give me a refund
review: After I bought something the seller deleted the item right after and they didn’t give me my money back smh 👎🏽
developerResponse: {'id': 7056493, 'body': 'Hey Watson, sorry to hear about this. Have you been able to report this? Can you let us know your username? We can reach out to the support team about this.\n\nLove, Depop', 'modified': '2019-01-29T05:28:49Z'}

title: Beware
review: People are able to scam you on Depop. Their method of pay is paypal. That’s good if you are a buyer. Someone bought a purse from me and once they received it, they opened a case with paypal saying “ it wasn’t as described”. All is good, I’ll refund you. However the buyer had a lot of pictures of the purse beforehand and I’m confident I didn’t leave anything out. It ended up being she sent me an empty box. So I lost my purse and my money. Don’t use this app people
developerResponse:
{'id': 10835112, 'body': "Hey, we’re sorry to hear your experience hasn't gone to plan. We offer Seller Protection for all items sold in-app using the BUY button. 

Follow these steps so we can put this right:
https://depophelp.zendesk.com/hc/en-gb/articles/360001845367-Seller-Protection

We're here to help you,
Team Depop ", 'modified': '2019-09-23T09:42:39Z'}

title: Options Without PayPal
review: Such a large selection of items and the app is easy to navigate. However, I personally hate using PayPal and I would be very grateful if you could add more payment options such as Venmo or something else.
developerResponse:
{'id': 10792045, 'body': 'Hey. Thanks for sharing your feedback. PayPal is our payment provider, which ensures that buying and selling are protected in-app. Good news though, we’re currently looking at alternative payment methods. 

Read more on PayPal here: https://depophelp.zendesk.com/hc/en-gb/articles/360001772668-Why-do-I-need-PayPal-

Stay tuned,
Team Depop', 'modified': '2019-09-20T14:56:02Z'}

title: Buy bundle
review: Depop is a great buying and selling app. I love it soo much. I want the bundle buy feature! Buyers can’t buy more than one item once. It’s inconvenient. Buyers have to contact sellers to make a bundle list, I don’t quite like that. Hope got the new feature soon!

title: Love it!
review: Great app to buy and sell, I wish they had it set up so you could scroll through someone’s profile the same way you can on Instagram but it’s still amazing 💞

title: Fun shopping, great finds.
review: Have been able to find some really great pieces for really in expensive. Everyone has been super friendly & communicative. Definitely worth checking out!
developerResponse: {'id': 3159639, 'body': 'Thanks for this review C&C! Team Depop', 'modified': '2018-04-17T11:05:04Z'}

title: Run by idiots unfortunately
review: They have a very poor abuse system. No idea. Snowflakes can do and say what they want. Had a fatuous response below but of course I had contacted them. Basically you can be illiterate and call someone an imbecile. But if you tell them your opinion of them you’ll get banned and they are fine. They will obfuscate the issue and avoid answering but their policy is awful, cry first and they win. Fine to be called an imbecile 😳🙈
developerResponse: {'id': 3800335, 'body': "Hey there! We do our best to remove abuse from the app as soon as we pro-actively find it our re-actively are told about it. If you've been the victim of such behaviour then please reach out to our support team; they're available on support@depop.com. Thanks, Team Depop", 'modified': '2018-06-11T15:06:47Z'}

title: Brand names don’t show!
review: Whenever I want to look up a brand to list, it’s not even there! I’ve seen other accounts post the same brand as well but for me it doesn’t let me add it or is on the list. It’s kinda frustrating because my brand name items aren’t being seen as much

title: Improvements
review: Ive been using depop to sell for a few years now and one tool I wish I could see added is automatic offers we can make to all likers of a certain listing. I saw they have this on Poshmark and I feel it will greatly boost sales!
developerResponse: {'id': 3355659, 'body': 'Hey Erika, super interesting idea there - thank you! Team Depop', 'modified': '2018-05-04T10:52:04Z'}

title: Normally it’s great
review:
Normally Depop is awesome but for some reason I can’t see ANY dms that I’ve sent or received, not just new ones but old ones as well 🙄🙄

Edit: 
Everything is all good and fixed now, back to the great old Depop
developerResponse: {'id': 2865811, 'body': "Hey there! This issue should now be fixed, but please be sure to edit this review or contact support (support@depop.com) if you're still having trouble with your messages. Thanks, Team Depop", 'modified': '2018-03-19T13:16:23Z'}

title: Love depop but the app has some flaws
review: Love lots about the depop community and the kind of stuff I can find but pretty please give me a way to sort posts on my shop and hide or archive already sold items. I hate scrolling through the explore feed only to click on an item that’s already sold!
developerResponse: {'id': 3052220, 'body': 'Hey livi11111, thank you for this feedback! Team Depop', 'modified': '2018-04-06T14:19:21Z'}

title: Great app
review: I absolutely love depop. I’ve been buying since early this year and recently started selling. It’s very convenient and I haven’t had a single bad experience with the app. Definitely worth using.

title: New update
review: I’ve been using depop for over a year and so far generally enjoyed it. However, the new update makes the free shipping option automatic and sneaks it at the bottom...I got $6 for a shirt because of this and just had to go and manually change all my other recent postings, which then said free shipping since this is a new thing.

title: “Repost All” Feature
review: Please, make a “repost all listings” feature!!! It’s so exhausting having to repost all of my items individually, especially at times when I have 40+ items listed.
developerResponse:
{'id': 18528783, 'body': "Hey Owikinz,

Thanks for the feedback. We love hearing about what we can do to improve Depop for our Community. When you succeed, we succeed. We'll be passing this along to our Product Team.

Team Depop
", 'modified': '2020-10-16T16:48:55Z'}

title: FIX THIS, DEPOP
review: When I sort my searches by “newly listed” it doesn’t actually sort them in that order anymore. It used to work. I used to be able to see the newly listed items at the top, but now it’s completely out of order, showing me items that were listed weeks ago and hiding the new items. PLEASE JUST FIX THIS ISSUE, IT USED TO WORK AND IT HAS NOT BEEN WORKING FOR WEEKS. I JUST WANT TO SEARCH BY NEW!!!!!! COME ON, DEPOP.

title: Love it!
review: I just recently got this app and I love it! I’ve found so many cute items and also already sold some things ;) shipping is a bit confusing but still a great app.
developerResponse: {'id': 16866222, 'body': 'We love to see it.\n\nTeam Depop', 'modified': '2020-07-25T16:37:57Z'}

title: The new EBay
review: It’s super easy to use and has quite good personalization methods. I’ve had great interactions with sellers, and have not had a problem. Will continue to use their app for future purchases.

title: change it back!
review: I could be on this app for hours. please change the size filter setting back to scrolling and tapping them

title: Fix the bug please
review: I have avoided using this app this past week when normally i’d spend a few hours a day scrolling through cute items. It now takes you all the way back to the top of the search when you click on an item and ruins the experience overall. I end up spending 99% of my time scrolling instead of actually looking at anything.
developerResponse:
{'id': 15395605, 'body': "Hey, sorry to hear about this! The good news is we've got a fix for this bug on the way. 
 
Stay tuned, 
Team Depop
", 'modified': '2020-05-18T15:05:03Z'}

title: I’m over this app !!!!
review: I’ve been selling on here for a long time now. I have all five star reviews. I got a message I need to review my and verify my PayPal account ummmm ok my account is verified already I checked. I contacted PayPal w writhing clear on their end. So what’s depop ?! I’ve sent message and have go no response at all. This is ridiculous people want their product and I can’t supply it to them because you have some dumb message going on
developerResponse:
{'id': 15248376, 'body': "Hey, it may be that your PayPal is already verified, which is great! Our support response times are currently slightly longer due to the current global situation, but we'll be in touch ASAP.
 
We're here for you,
Team Depop

", 'modified': '2020-05-11T18:20:51Z'}

title: Trouble app
review: I recently downloaded this app every time I click on it disappear back out and it just freezes when I try to stroll up on the site

title: thank you, depop. 👼🏽
review:
since starting depop (4 weeks ago) i have fallen in absolute love. depop is such a good platform for not only buying & selling clothes, but expressing your own personal style and getting glimpses at other sellers’. the platform isn’t biased and seems to give such an amazing opportunity to start an entire career, selling clothes and adornments online. thank you so much to the creators and workers of depop, i am loving every feature of this app. 🕊✨🦋

sending light,
veronica desjardins 
(vintagebyvero)

title: Overall doing good
review: Please give me a way to have the sort/filter button not pop up every millisecond on the search page; it would be so much better as a little icon at the top. Otherwise great 👍🏻
developerResponse: {'id': 11105906, 'body': "Hey. Thanks for the feedback. We love hearing about what we can do to improve Depop for our Community. When you succeed, we succeed. I'll be passing this along to our Product Team.\n\nTeam Depop", 'modified': '2019-10-07T17:01:35Z'}

title: Awesome
review: at first it was a little hard to get noticed but within about a week i got my first sale it’s easy to use and easy to talk with others on the app
developerResponse:
{'id': 17320658, 'body': "Hey. Thanks for the feedback. We love hearing about what we can do to improve Depop for our Community. When you succeed, we succeed. We'll be passing this along to our Product Team.

If you're looking for more ideas to help you get noticed have a read through our article ‘Suggested Sellers’ by going to ‘Settings - Need help’, for some tips on how to become a Suggested Seller.

Team Depop
", 'modified': '2020-08-17T08:47:39Z'}

title: Never loads/ internet problems
review: I love the stuff on this app, but it never works for me. Stuff only loads when I use data instead of wifi, and recently it’s been so glitchy and nothing has been loading. I’m really sad bc all I wanna do is browse through my depop but nothing ever loads :(

title: So sad :(
review: I got suspended for no reason and when i tried emailing Depop they replied once then never replied again and I still can’t get into my account after more then two weeks and I also can’t make a new account. It is very unfair how they don’t even look into the problem or if there is even one at all and just suspend accounts without reason. I lost all my hard earned followers and reviews
developerResponse: {'id': 6668331, 'body': 'Hi there, thank you for your feedback. Can you let us know your username? We can get in touch with support and try to help you further.\n\nLove, Depop', 'modified': '2019-01-04T03:54:58Z'}

title: Trash
review: Recent update has awful graphics that make the app look cheap and trashy. Just so unpleasant to use/look at. The thing that makes this app totally unusable for me is the rampant issue with sellers using inappropriate tags for items. It is impossible to do any brand-related search because sellers spam all their listings with every popular brand name they can think of, which fills search results with irrelevant items.
developerResponse: {'id': 6634438, 'body': "Hey Claire, thank you for the feedback. We understand that it can be a bit of a drag when you're looking for specific items and other items pop up. We feel you on this. We have a moderation team that are tackling this down and making sure to lower the problem. If you see any items overusing the tags, we would love you to death if you help us by reporting them so we can investigate this issue further. I will pass this feedback on to make sure your voice is heard. \n\nLove, Depop", 'modified': '2019-01-02T08:44:34Z'}

title: Notifications please!
review: I wish there was a feature where we can turn on to get notified whenever someone we follow adds a clothing item to their page! It would be super helpful. Thank you!

title: Multiple Drafts & Fees...
review: I’d like to save multiple drafts so I can have my descriptions prepared the day before adding my pictures. Great if Sellers have a specific posting day, for holidays and such. The fees are kind’ve ridiculous if you don’t price your items really high!!

title: Do not like the update!!! Bring the old depop back!
review: The update hurts the eye and is more confusing ! I also can't put items off of instant buy!!! How do I do that now when there's no option for it any more ????  Also why make accessing the notifications more difficult now too???

title: Not good
review: I have had to open more PayPal disputes then received orders. Sellers say they Weill ship then will keep your money for months and you won’t get orders. Then PayPal never issues refund. As a seller Depops fee and shipping takes out most income then you still have to pay for shipping again at the post office so still not sure what I’m paying Depop for.... Poshmark is way better
developerResponse:
{'id': 19075033, 'body': "Hey there,

We’re sorry to hear your experience hasn't gone to plan. We offer Buyer Protection for all items purchased in-app using the ‘BUY’ button. 

Read more in-app about what to do next by going to ‘Settings - Need help’ and typing in ‘Buyer Protection’.

We're here to help you,
Team Depop", 'modified': '2020-11-12T21:58:42Z'}

review: Trying to view my reciepts on stuff ive purchased but it doesnt load and when i keep trying to view it logs me out and then when i try to log back in it says action couldnt not be completed right now..
developerResponse: {'id': 16719327, 'body': "Hey! The good news is we've fixed this bug, if you update to the latest version it should be resolved now. Team Depop", 'modified': '2020-07-18T22:31:23Z'}

title: Suspended account for absolutely no reason !
review: I got a new phone and forgot my depop account password, when I went in to change it it told me my account had gotten suspended and when I asked the support team they said they closed my account due to infringement. Mind you I hadn’t bought or sold anything in over 6 months! I love the array of items on depop and now I’m annoyed because I cannot access them!

title: really good app!
review: this app is awesome and ive only had great experiences w/ it but i think theres some things that could change. first of all on the “made for you” section i get excited and click on the listing for it to say sold/ listed 118 weeks ago or whatever. another concern is there should be an option for a price to say “on hold” or to just not set a price so you can post biddings and such instead of putting the price at 999,999,999 or whatever. overall its still an amazing app and i recommend it!

title: Okay at first
review: The first couple of times the people I bought from were great and communicated, no issues. My last purchase has not arrived and it’s been almost a month, seller has been ignoring me and Depop has been no help because I paid through pay pal. Lost 40 dollars.
developerResponse:
{'id': 15777830, 'body': "Hey. We can imagine how frustrating this is. Head in-app to 'Settings - Support - Need help - Buying - My purchase - I haven't received my item'.
We also moderate the app 24/7 to ensure scammers are kept away. If you notice anything suspicious, please report the item/user in-app (by clicking on the 3 dots top right of their profile/item) so we can investigate.

We're here to help,
Team Depop
", 'modified': '2020-06-04T13:39:28Z'}

title: Lots of Vintage
review: Love the photos and creativity people express here. There is quite a bit of 90’s vintage and being someone who was in high school in the 90’s, I love the items I come across! Fun shopping experience!

title: Notifications
review: PLEASE fix the notification bug. It’s so annoying to open the app, refresh every possible tab I can, close out of the app and there still being a notification there.

title: Hi
review: I started using Depop  since 1 month. The only think that I have is that when I post the picture the people asked me to contact them on email! This is the way that Depop works or (I think) is a scam??
developerResponse: {'id': 6783502, 'body': 'Hi Maryal, should a user do this, please make sure to report this through to us and we will investigate the issue further, this is not how Depop works and we will make sure to take actions against users such as these.\n\nLove, Depop', 'modified': '2019-01-11T06:30:52Z'}

title: It’s okay
review: When the app first starting it was great ! But now it’s filled with wholesale and overly priced thrifted clothes 🤷🏽‍♀️And when you post your barely get sales because Depop doesn’t promote any products at all so unless you have a large following or promote your shop on social sites it’ll take you awhile to sell
developerResponse: {'id': 7523641, 'body': "Hi there, are goal is to make every shop shine - after all we want our users to expand their empire and creativity. I will make sure to pass this feedback to our team as it's imortant for us to know how our users feel. \n\nLove, Depop", 'modified': '2019-03-01T09:20:32Z'}

title: emails
review: I used to love this app but within the last few weeks I’ve been getting messages for every item I’m selling from people telling me to contact them via email who have no listings, all saying the same exact thing. so weird and annoying, seems like a scam.
developerResponse: {'id': 7057184, 'body': "That's very annoying. We totally agree. Please make sure to report this to us and we will get on it like white on rice.\n\nLove, Depop", 'modified': '2019-01-29T06:19:25Z'}

title: Only cons
review: I don’t like the new update, there is so much space left open on the upper right corner. My profile pic could fill it up. Change it back. Other than that it’s a good app
developerResponse: {'id': 6507278, 'body': 'Will make sure to let the team know about this.\n\nHappy holidays. Kisses.', 'modified': '2018-12-22T03:02:29Z'}

title: Love this app 💕
review: This app is very easy to use! It’s also easy for me to maneuver around and find certain things. I sell as well as shop on this site so I enjoy using it. It’s like my own thrift store 💚
developerResponse: {'id': 3316285, 'body': 'Thanks for the review! Team Depop', 'modified': '2018-05-01T13:42:39Z'}

title: A fun, useful, and overall great app.
review: I've been using depop for a little over a year to help raise money for my fathers surrogacy, and everyone along the way has been super kind and helpful to my family.
developerResponse: {'id': 3052923, 'body': 'Hey there! This is an AMAZING story, thank you so much for sharing! We wish you the best of luck. Team Depop', 'modified': '2018-04-06T15:26:34Z'}

title: Amazing but...
review: This is a great shopping app. Kind of like an online thrift store. The only thin is that the app will crash and will lose your process if you had been scrolling awhile. Other then that it's great

title: Love this app
review: Can you guys please make a music playlist feature so when customers are shopping they can hear your music * I think that would be so cool!
developerResponse: {'id': 19811087, 'body': "Hey. Thanks for the feedback. We love hearing about what we can do to improve Depop for our Community. When you succeed, we succeed. We'll be passing this along to our Product Team.\n\nTeam Depop", 'modified': '2020-12-16T17:18:28Z'}

title: Wish they had offers to make it easier
review: I think having an offer mechanism similar to Eb*y would make it a lot easier for sellers. It would be much more direct and smoother than back-n-forth convos. Besides fees, it’s easy & pleasant to use, wish it had more categorization. Still a good app

title: Depop has helped me so much
review: Depop is amazing! It’s such a unique and friendly outlet to be creative and sell old clothes that still have life in them, it’s a really great place to buy and sell, and avoid fast fashion!
developerResponse: {'id': 19693899, 'body': 'We love to see it.\n\nTeam Depop', 'modified': '2020-12-11T09:57:59Z'}

title: Enjoy using this app
review: It’s an easy way to buy items from people. Especially if items that are being sold are from Todrick Hall😂
developerResponse:
{'id': 18690496, 'body': 'Hey there,

Glad to hear it, we feel the same!

Team Depop
', 'modified': '2020-10-25T21:19:56Z'}

title: Great app
review:
Just wish you could filter by currency in the style edit section. The UX is also not ideal - find myself lost in the app more than I’d like. 

Otherwise, great ways of featuring clothes and sellers.
developerResponse:
{'id': 18485441, 'body': "Hey there,
