Thanks for the feedback. We love hearing about what we can do to improve Depop for our Community. When you succeed, we succeed. We'll be passing this along to our Product Team.

Team Depop
", 'modified': '2020-10-14T21:46:02Z'}

title: Dark Mode?
review: I gave a suggestion last year about having a dark mode for the app so I was wondering if this is still something that y’all are considering.
developerResponse: {'id': 9711885, 'body': 'Hey hey! Thanks for the rave review and cool feature suggestion - will be passing this one along to our Product Team.\n\nTeam Depop', 'modified': '2019-07-17T16:40:29Z'}

title: Can’t even make an account
review: This is so annoying I just downloaded the app and I can’t even make myself an account because it keeps saying failed. FIX YOUR APP
developerResponse:
{'id': 17353548, 'body': "Hey, sorry to hear about this. If you can submit a request via this link we'll help you get onto Depop ASAP.

https://bit.ly/depopsignup

Team Depop
", 'modified': '2020-08-18T12:21:54Z'}

title: Has some work to do
review:
I absolutely HATE HATE HATE HATE when tags are added purposefully but they don’t apply. I’ve been looking for a corset and a good chunk of items under this tag are from one seller, and they’re boots, shorts, jackets, shirts, etc. This is so frustrating. 
Hopefully there’s a way to limit hashtags and tags.

title: Terrible customer service
review: I’ve emailed multiple times in the last few MONTHS about issues I’ve been having with correcting my address in the app and have gotten no response. Extremely unprofessional l. If you go on their instagram you can see people have gotten so desperate that they voice their issues in the comments and still don’t get helped. Seriously unbelievable
developerResponse:
{'id': 17671294, 'body': "Hey, our support response times are currently slightly longer due to the current pandemic, but we'll be in touch ASAP.
 
 
We're here for you,
Team Depop
", 'modified': '2020-09-03T11:47:12Z'}

title: App is crashing after update..
review: Can’t get access to my Depop and it’s quite concerning when you have to ship products out and it affects your customers..
developerResponse: {'id': 16719311, 'body': "Hey! The good news is we've fixed this bug, if you update to the latest version it should be resolved now. Team Depop", 'modified': '2020-07-18T22:26:02Z'}

title: Stupid
review: Wasn’t able to but anything for someone’s restock because I need to be signed in and can’t continue as a guest. So I tried to create a new account but my number is already linked. Then I entered all the emails I have into the forgot password and it said it can’t change anything for all of them so I had to watch as everything got sold bc I couldn’t sign in or just continue as a guest.
developerResponse:
{'id': 16937900, 'body': " 
Hey, we can imagine how frustrating this must be. Sounds like your phone number is already connected to an account. Refer to this article (https://depophelp.zendesk.com/hc/en-gb/articles/360001792427-My-Depop-app-isn-t-working) on our Help Centre, and submit a request for support with your phone number and email address. Once we've received your report, one of the team will be back in touch via email as soon as we can and will connect you again from scratch.
We’ve got you,
Team Depop
", 'modified': '2020-07-28T21:01:49Z'}

title: This app is awesome
review: I love the app and if you are looking for any clothes that you want but you can’t find you should definitely go on this app. With its cheap prices you can get like anything.

title: it’s alright...
review: On Depop I have had a great experience and a not so great experience. I purchased an item and to make a long story short the girl scammed me. she never shipped my item and I tried to get help from Depop to get my money back. Their support isn’t very good. If you do shop on here it’s worth it to get a paypal account, that way you can ask for a refund without needing Depops help.

title: It’s an okay app
review: It’s a good app to buy clothes but it’s been three times that I buy something and I don’t receive my items. The first time I bought something the buyer told me she shipped it to me but I never received my sweater and she never responded to my texts and I couldn’t receive my money back.
developerResponse:
{'id': 16192077, 'body': "Hey. We can imagine how frustrating this is. Head in-app to 'Settings - Support - Need help - Buying - My purchase - I haven't received my item'.
We also moderate the app 24/7 to ensure scammers are kept away. If you notice anything suspicious, please report the item/user in-app (by clicking on the 3 dots top right of their profile/item) so we can investigate.
 
We're here to help,
Team Depop
", 'modified': '2020-06-24T11:08:20Z'}

title: Great App but Brand Filter is Garbage
review: There is so much great stuff for sell on this app. I like to search by brand for clothing, but this is completely futile on Depop. Thousands and thousands of articles of clothing are falsely marked as the most popular brands and it makes it impossible to actually find the clothing of specific brands. Please find a way to be more strict about what brand sellers mark their clothes as.

title: DEPOP SCAMMED ME
review: i sold an item for $79 dollars including shipping, depop took out the normal 10% fee, which was $6.50 on my receipt. BUT, they took out $30 from my bank account, THIRTY DOLLARS. there is no explanation or reason. this apparently has been happening to other people as well. they’re stealing money from you. and not to mention their terrible costumer support. so when i try and get help about my stolen money they don’t do anything about it.
developerResponse:
{'id': 15777903, 'body': "Hey, thanks for the review. Our 10% fee allows us to keep Depop running smoothly. It contributes towards the cost of running the app, creating new features and improving our Community’s experience. 
 
See our article about fees by going to 'Settings - Need help' and typing in ‘What about fees’.
Team Depop
", 'modified': '2020-06-04T13:43:31Z'}

title: PLEASE FIX
review: recently when i click on an item and return to the main page it takes me all the way back up and i have to keep scrolling back down to where i left off. it is so annoying that i have stopped going on the app.
developerResponse: {'id': 15444428, 'body': "Hey! The good news is we've fixed this bug, if you update to the latest version it should be resolved now.\n\nTeam Depop ", 'modified': '2020-05-20T11:45:37Z'}

title: Eh
review:
Depop has generally been great but today it keeps signing me out of my account and then saying the operation could not be completed. I reset my password on a laptop like the Depop team said to do in the other reviews but I still can’t login. 
Help!
developerResponse:
{'id': 15031963, 'body': "Hey, we’re sorry to hear this and we can imagine how frustrating this must be. Could you please email us at support@depop.com with the subject line saying 'Login Issues'. Please remember to include your:
- Username
- Email address
- Phone number
- Phone operating system, example iOS 13

Let’s get this sorted,
Team Depop
", 'modified': '2020-05-01T10:20:46Z'}

title: Fix buggs
review: The app doesn’t work if you are a seller I’ve been having trouble since the update with enlisting my items and locking into my account saying it’s invalid and making me try again in 24 hrs and when i try after a day it still goes back to 24 hrs
developerResponse:
{'id': 14265269, 'body': 'Just to let you know, your Depop account is totally safe.

All you need to do is head back to the login screen and reset your password from there!

To reset your password, please follow these steps:

- Open the Depop app on your device 
- Click on the "Login" button 
- Click on Forgot Password 
- Enter your email address to receive instructions to reset your new password 
- Click on Reset my password 
- You'll receive an email from Depop shortly. Follow the instruction in the e-mail to reset your 
password.

Hope this works out, please let me know if you need anything else!

Stay safe, stay indoors,
Team Depop', 'modified': '2020-03-26T12:40:47Z'}

title: Needs a bit more work to perfect the app
review: On the search page, the tool bar glitches to the middle of the screen when I scroll. I’m new to the app and it’s a cool concept and all, just a few bug fixes.

title: Be careful who you purchase from... Depop takes forever to respond about disputes....
review: I’ve bought items from sellers and many have been successful, I’ve encountered 3 sellers so far that do not communicate. All purchases equaling up to $120+. I have disputed items purchased and have been waiting almost a 2 months for depop to get back to me about my disputes.
developerResponse:
{'id': 11145102, 'body': "Hey. We can imagine how frustrating this is. Try heading to 'settings - support - need help - buying - my purchase - I haven't received my item'.
 
Read more on that here: https://depophelp.zendesk.com/hc/en-gb/articles/360001772448-I-haven-t-received-my-item
 
If that doesn't seem to work, please get in touch by going to 'settings - support - need help - technical issues - I've still got an issue' and send a report.
 
We're here to help,
Team Depop", 'modified': '2019-10-09T10:09:30Z'}

title: Addictive, B E careful!
review: So many great finds it’s worth a look! Depop needs to give some type of incentive for referrals because I’ve told everybody I know about it and I could’ve used that money right back on that app! I love it!  😩🤣
developerResponse: {'id': 5443107, 'body': 'What a sexy little idea. Will pass this on to our team and thank you for bringing more people to our community. \n\nLove, Depop', 'modified': '2018-10-10T13:18:46Z'}

title: Item was never delivered, impossible to report
review: I have been trying to report a user who did not refund my item after it was never delivered. I tried to report it on the app which gets stuck trying to upload the claim, I tried sending an email and the replies have not been helpful. I also tried getting a costumer service phone number which I don’t believe exists.
developerResponse:
{'id': 11103693, 'body': "Hey. We can imagine how frustrating this is. Try heading to 'settings - support - need help - buying - my purchase - I haven't received my item'.
 
Read more on that here: https://depophelp.zendesk.com/hc/en-gb/articles/360001772448-I-haven-t-received-my-item
 
If that doesn't seem to work, please get in touch by going to 'settings - support - need help - technical issues - I've still got an issue' and send a report.
 
We're here to help,
Team Depop", 'modified': '2019-10-07T15:21:57Z'}

title: Canceling orders and getting in contact with depop is almost impossible
review: This app is great for buying but if something goes wrong with the order to cancel or even get in contact with depop is near impossible. Make you jump through so many hoops and figure things out on your own. Articles are unhelpful especially when buyers are unresponsive
developerResponse:
{'id': 10432322, 'body': "Hi there! Sorry to hear your experience hasn't gone to plan. We offer Buyer Protection as long as the item was purchased using the BUY button in-app. 

We recommend following these steps to get the best outcome: https://depophelp.zendesk.com/hc/en-gb/articles/360001772448-I-haven-t-received-my-item

We're here to help you,
Team Depop 
", 'modified': '2019-08-30T08:48:23Z'}

title: Decent
review: Overall, good app. Easy to use but I wish it would notify my likers when I mark down an item or allow me to promote older listings. Also, randomly it marks listings as “sold” when they really haven’t which requires me to go in and delete the current listing then create a new one.
developerResponse: {'id': 5906103, 'body': "Hey Joanie, thank you for the feedback. We're aware at the moment there's a little pesky bug roaming our platform with the listings and the sold features. We're working on it ASAP to make sure this is running smoothly. You can also pop over a report via our in-app support Settings > Need Help? > Technical Issues and we can keep track of the little bugs taunting our users.\n\nLove, Depop", 'modified': '2018-11-12T11:53:16Z'}

title: shipping fixed but feedback missing
review:
Amazing platform to sell and discover wonderful items. From 70s, to 90s, to y2k, to modern streetwear, you’ll find numerous gems!

One drawback is that the option to give feedback doesn’t appear sometimes

title: Love it!!!
review: Safe and easy way to sell used clothes that you are tired of but to others are new finds. I’ve sold many things and baught many others that I love so much!
developerResponse: {'id': 4841017, 'body': "Glad you're having a good time, thanks! Team Depop", 'modified': '2018-08-28T10:42:09Z'}

title: No response when there’s a problem transaction
review: My daughter bought clothing from a seller in May and she never received the clothing items. She has reported a problem transaction twice through her acct/profile since June and she still has yet to hear back from Depop.
developerResponse: {'id': 4841118, 'body': "Hey there! So sorry to read about this experience. Would you mind updating this review to include your daughters Depop @username so we can better understand what has (or hasn't) happened here? Thanks - Team Depop", 'modified': '2018-08-28T10:48:26Z'}

title: Please fix excessive crashing
review: This review is only to draw the developers’ attention to the excessive app crashing. At times the app is unusable. It almost always happens when I’m trying to edit my listings too, which is incredibly frustrating as my changes are lost before I can save them. A stable app should not be crashing multiple times within minutes or less.
developerResponse: {'id': 4841030, 'body': "Sorry to read you're experiencing these issues! If you've not done so already, please report this technical issue via the app so that our Support team can investigate what's happening. Apologies again, Team Depop", 'modified': '2018-08-28T10:42:49Z'}

title: Love it BUT
review: Hi Depop team, I love this app. It's amazing and I love having my store on here but this new update makes the app keep crashing? Shipping labels disappear & messages won't appear? It's getting really frustrating! Please fix it. Thank you guys!
developerResponse: {'id': 3269288, 'body': "Hey there! Thanks for the 5 stars, although sorry to read this latest update isn't working so well for you. Our Support team would be happy to troubleshoot for you, so please be sure to contact them - they're available on support@depop.com. Thanks! Team Depop", 'modified': '2018-04-26T10:56:38Z'}

title: great app
review: great app how it never changes ..I get notifications for things I’ve already seen which is a little confusing but other than that wonderful

title: Depop Review
review: Really great way and cause to give away your clothes but gain money doing it to buy more clothes once u can’t fit it sell it and u don’t have to have a big following to do so...

title: Change it back
review:
Wish they hadn’t taken away the 3 wide when browsing items. Since it’s 2 wide it takes forever to get through stuff.

Edited to say: I have been having issues with the app freezing at random. Updating to the latest version hasn’t helped.

title: Permanently banned for little reason
review: My account was banned after I left a comment on veggie blenders post that what she was selling was over 50 more $ then what you could get that item for brand new, “You could get this for 20$ brand new..”, (<my comment) and supposedly that was “inappropriate” and enough to get me permanently banned. And yes I have used this  app to buy products before too
developerResponse:
{'id': 18548538, 'body': "Hey there,

We’re sorry to hear your experience hasn't gone to plan. In order to keep our Community safe, all decisions made to suspend users and items are taken after deep investigation and consideration. If you feel this is unfair, just drop us a reply in the original email thread. We’re always happy to take a second look.
 
Team Depop
", 'modified': '2020-10-18T16:43:05Z'}

title: Add the my size toggle back
review: It’s slightly annoying that you have to add your sizes over and over instead of just pressing the option to include your personal size or not. Sometimes I like to explore the other sizes and most of the time I don’t. It makes searching for things take longer than it has to

title: The new update
review: I’m not the biggest fan of the new layout and prefer the way it looked before. It was much easier to look at things and search and because of the new update I haven’t been using it as much. Don’t get me wrong Depop is a great app but the way it looks now makes it feel like a chore to look for items.

title: Please update again
review:
Unable to open app on IPhone X since last update. Turned off phone and reinstalled app and is still kicking me out. Please help...
By the way I love the app 😄
developerResponse: {'id': 16571412, 'body': "Hey! The good news is we've fixed this bug, if you update to the latest version it should be resolved now. Team Depop", 'modified': '2020-07-12T22:28:48Z'}

title: Fake Brand Listings
review: The idea of this app is great and I’ve definitely found some great pieces on here. But one of the most annoying things is that people list their clothes as certain brands just for exposure. So if you do a search for “Free People” brands, there are things tagged as Free People that are really from other brands. Would be better if Depop regulated things like that.

title: love the app, hate the bugs
review: For some reason I’m unable to make purchases today with the app stating, “the item(s) have been updated. please make sure you’re happy before buying.”
developerResponse:
{'id': 16719362, 'body': "Hey, we can imagine how frustrating this is. Please get in touch by going to 'Settings - Need help - Technical issues - I've still got an issue' and send us a report.
 
We’ll take it from here,
Team Depop
", 'modified': '2020-07-18T22:41:25Z'}

title: So useful!
review: I go crazy about shopping even though I have no money. This app helped me find so many expensive etchings for way cheaper than they were new

title: creepy alliance
review: im a routine depop shopper. i love this app. when i was a seller, i understood the ease of accepting payments through paypal and having the return label generated. after i was done selling, i deleted my paypal. i hate the company. until recently i could always just check out with my debit card. now, depop has set checkout up in a way that you have to/are being tricked into creating a paypal account. i dont want to have to sign up for some other money site (a notoriously unethical one at that) to buy some clothes. depop should stop this alliance! work with paypal fine but dont use ur customers as paypal crabs in a depop barrel. its gross! im over depop!

title: Neeeever loads correctly
review: idk why but recently it’s stopped loading completely and keep saying that it’s unable to load user information and even if I push the retry button, nothing happens. I know it’s not just my wifi, because all of my other apps load properly.
developerResponse:
{'id': 16192511, 'body': 'Hey. We can imagine how frustrating this is. Please remove cached data by going to ‘Settings - Apps - Depop - Storage - Clear Data’ on your phone. Then, completely delete and re-download the app. 
We’ll get this sorted,
Team Depop
', 'modified': '2020-06-24T11:26:17Z'}

title: Good app, very glitchy though
review: I love the new updates but most of the time when I try and open the app, it just quits on me. Sometimes it takes 20+ tries. My iOS is up to date and none of my other apps do this...
developerResponse: {'id': 12793808, 'body': 'Hey. We experienced some issues yesterday that may have resulted in you not being able to use the app as normal. Rest assured, this is now fixed, and won’t occur again. You’ll now be able to discover, shop and sell as normal.\n\nTeam Depop', 'modified': '2020-01-08T11:54:44Z'}

title: Glitchy
review: It’s impossible to set up your PayPal and credit card, they make it very confusing and it doesn’t work a lot of the time
developerResponse:
{'id': 5172376, 'body': "Hi there, could you please try to connect your PayPal to Depop with just your mobile data, making sure your WiFi is switched off while you do so.

As an iOs user, can you try and clear your Safari cache and cookies from your iPhone settings? To do this, go to your iPhone settings > Safari > Clear History and Website Data. It'd also be great if you make sure you enable Javascript on Safari. 

Do get back to us if this doesn't work and let us know your username so we can try to help you out the best way possible.

Depop", 'modified': '2018-09-22T10:38:07Z'}

title: Good but needs to be fixed
review: it’s a good app but PLEASE fix the notification issues. it says i have 3 notifications but i have 0 and the notif won’t go away. it makes me paranoid i’m missing something and it’s just really annoying.
developerResponse: {'id': 9284634, 'body': 'Hi Jimmy, we feel you and we hear you. Our team is working hard to make sure this issue is solved and our community is back on track. Thank you for the feedback.\n\nLove, Depop', 'modified': '2019-06-21T10:49:34Z'}

title: Amazing app but...
review: Im in love with depop but There really needs to be a way to move sold items to the bottom IN APP, without having to update all your available items. Its extremely annoying. Thats my only complaint
developerResponse: {'id': 6356509, 'body': "Hey Annacesca! You should be able to do this via the website. We've arrange this to make it easier for big sellers!\n\nLove, Depop", 'modified': '2018-12-12T13:17:26Z'}

title: Good finds
review: Depop is a great place to find cute stuff to update your look. Just enough of a pick me up. You do have to sift through a lot of items to find good ones but the more you are on the app the better you can navigate
developerResponse: {'id': 5745417, 'body': 'Always nice to find those rare gems.\n\nLove, Depop', 'modified': '2018-10-31T14:56:37Z'}

title: Improvements
review: Love this app! A couple things could make it better. The ability to add quality at checkout & hold button. Thank you!
developerResponse: {'id': 3158925, 'body': "Hey there! Thanks for this feedback - this is something we'll definitely look to implement in the future. Team Depop", 'modified': '2018-04-17T10:04:35Z'}

title: Won't load
review:
Keeps saying "oops try again" the app is up to date and so is my phone. When this problem is fixed, I'll change my review.
Edit- problem was fixed. Thank you
developerResponse: {'id': 1689432, 'body': 'Hey, thanks for the feedback. Sorry to hear about this. If you could send some more details about this to productfeedback@depop.com that would be very useful. Your app version (found under help in settings), iOS and device is a good start, and anymore details about where this is happening in the app. Thanks, Team Depop', 'modified': '2017-11-07T15:18:05Z'}

title: Great concept but some flaws
review: I love depop. It’s been a SUPER useful way to get rid of old clothes or clothes that don’t fit. Only gave three stars because like reviews I’ve seen I agree that the same depop famous people get the most traction so it’s incredibly hard to sell as a non-famous depop person. Still love it though.
developerResponse: {'id': 2913261, 'body': "Hey there - thank you for this balanced review. We're constantly looking at new ways to improve the exposure that ALL of our sellers get, and we hope you'll continue to see improvements throughout the year and beyond. Thanks again, Team Depop", 'modified': '2018-03-23T11:06:24Z'}

title: HARDLY ANY SALES BECAUSE OF NEW ALGORITHM
review: seriously depop?? you’ve made it EXTREMELY hard for normal sellers to get any sales. it’s completely obvious you favor top sellers and celebrities by showing what you want buyers to see in the search in stead of seeing the most recent items. i used to love depop  and it was so easy to get sales. i absolutely hate it now and i know everyone else does too except your tops sellers. change back the algorithm please.

title: Great App For Teenagers
review: This A Cool App Where Teenagers Can Buy Sell And Exchange Stuff From Old Fashion To Trendy Items Or Old School Fashion To Making Your Own Business Here And It’s So Fun And Easy But You Need To Be Very Careful With Scammer Who Want To Buy From You Or Sell To You

title: Does it sell internationally?
review:
Hey,I’ve heard a lot about this app and this is my attempt of trying it I just have a question, does it sell internationally or to only specific countries?

Thank you for taking the time to read. 

Sending love
developerResponse:
{'id': 18690450, 'body': 'Hey Sally,

Sellers can choose to sell to both domestic and international buyers. 

Thanks for playing,
Team Depop', 'modified': '2020-10-25T21:08:33Z'}

title: Going downhill. Fast.
review: The sellers are so stuck up and entitled it scares me! Who would pay $80 for an old ripped up “vintage” tee? I cannot believe the amount of money I have lost on this app. I would recommend grailed as an alternative with kinder sellers and better prices that aren’t scams. I was banned without any reason which is actually a relief since I won’t have to worry about depop anymore.
developerResponse:
{'id': 18577337, 'body': "Hey there,

We’re sorry to hear your experience hasn't gone to plan. In order to keep our Community safe, all decisions made to suspend users and items are taken after deep investigation and consideration. If you feel this is unfair, just drop us a reply in the original email thread. We’re always happy to take a second look.
 
Team Depop
", 'modified': '2020-10-19T17:31:55Z'}

title: Improvements
review: Great app some updates to help sellers could be notification chimes and being able to bump old listing with one button

title: Stop spam tagging
review: I want to search for certain brands but half of the time, it’s a different brand because literally almost every seller on here wants to expose their items by putting a different brand. It’s annoying, please fix this! Other than that, this app is great

title: sick fits
review: Wow, I got three really clean polo and nautica shirts. honestly didn’t think they would be this nice for the price but look brand new. She sent a really nice letter in the package with it too 💯 def trying to get more in the future.

title: Used to be a good app
review: I thought this used to be a good app but until they added the new rules of can’t sell video games and electronics last month. They close my account because I had a few of the listings. They will not help or reopen my account. I will not come back. I have tried to reopen my account but they are useless at helping and a site that should be shut down.

title: stop selling children clothes.
review: i do not like is people are going to thrift stores and buying KIDS clothes and reselling them on here. thrift stores are starting to raise up the prices now and people who dont have enough money wont be able to buy clothes at all especially children because people are trying to be "trendy" and buy kids clothes which leaves no clothes for actual children.

title: Bugs
review: I love this app! But I recently had a issue where if I close the app and want to go back, it takes forever to load. Like if I Hop from one screen to the next, and go back to DEPOP it takes 30 seconds to load but it doesn’t happen with my other apps.
developerResponse:
{'id': 15443634, 'body': 'Hey. We can imagine how frustrating this is. Please remove cached data by going to ‘Settings - Apps - Depop - Storage - Clear Data’ on your phone. Then, completely delete and re-download the app. 

We’ll get this sorted,
Team Depop
', 'modified': '2020-05-20T11:09:04Z'}

title: Search Page Glitch
review: Developers: when I search for something and click on a item and go back to my search, it starts the page from the top. This is very frustrating when you’re halfway through the page and still looking. Please fix.. will update review
developerResponse: {'id': 15443540, 'body': "Hey! The good news is we've fixed this bug, if you update to the latest version it should be resolved now.\n\nTeam Depop", 'modified': '2020-05-20T11:03:27Z'}

title: Depop is great
review: Depop is great for selling used/vintage items. Been using it for a few years now. Never lets me down. Just needs to let you send pictures in the messages.

title: Keeps crashing
review: I love this app and constantly buy clothes from it. Lately it’s been crashing especially when searching or looking through the for me section.
developerResponse:
{'id': 14488714, 'body': "Hey, we can imagine how frustrating this is. Please get in touch by going to 'Settings - Need help - Technical issues - I've still got an issue' and send us a report.

We’ll take it from here,
Team Depop
", 'modified': '2020-04-06T12:25:00Z'}

title: No support and hard to connect
review: You have to connect your paypal and bank account to this app and they still won’t verify you to receive shipping labels after you made a sale. Their support is very spotty and there isn’t a phone number you can call for quick help. I refunded a 2 buyers because of their lack of support and I couldn’t get paid to mail out the items.

title: Best shopping app ever
review: I just got it and I love that I can get any clothes I want, also I can see the person that made it.... u don’t see that every day. Coming from a 13 year old-

title: Freezes
review: Ever since the new update it’s been glitchy and it freezes immediately once I get on it. I can’t even use it since the new update. Please fix this! I would like to get back on it soon. :(
developerResponse:
{'id': 11105643, 'body': 'Hey, we can imagine how frustrating this is. Please send a screen recording to support@depop.com so we can investigate. Please also include:

- Your username
- iOS Model

We’ll take it from here,
Team Depop', 'modified': '2019-10-07T16:52:35Z'}

title: Beginner on Depop as a seller
review: Still trying to figure out how to do my own shipping to help my buyers save some money- there should be calculated shipping on the Depop app- that would make it much easier and efficient!

title: Wayyyy better than Poshmark
review: At first, I was hesitant. I had tried Poshmark, and it just didn’t do it for me. Depop is amazing. I have been able to find so many adorable outfits for such low prices

title: Best app I’ve ever downloaded
review: At first I thought it’d be frustrating but I was wrong! I’ve found so many amazing things for very low prices! Highly recommend downloading!
developerResponse: {'id': 8529442, 'body': "Hey Ella, glad to hear you've had a change of heart. We love you too.\n\nKisses, Depop", 'modified': '2019-05-06T10:50:15Z'}

title: Sustanability
review: Depop is the perfect platform to promote a more sustainable environment for young adults and teens. I love that someone can get use or enjoyment out of the things that don’t serve purpose for me anymore while saving money and reducing waste. 💕 🌎 ♻️
developerResponse: {'id': 8258701, 'body': "Hey Tanya, great way to describe it. One man's trash is another man's funky fashionable treasure.\n\nLove, Depop", 'modified': '2019-04-17T10:42:38Z'}

title: Thank you!
review: So excited about my new purchase, I am grateful for the help I received from the representatives! Made it an easy and smooth process for me, the least tech-savvy person ever... 💝
developerResponse: {'id': 8258432, 'body': "Don't underestimate yourself. Look at that emoji you just send us. We're glad to hear we were able to support oyu in your needs. We got you.\n\nLove, Depop", 'modified': '2019-04-17T10:11:29Z'}

title: Great app, awesome prices.
review:
I have been wanting a Born x Raised hoody for quite some time now, and found the one I had my eye on (basically new) for 200 bucks cheaper than listed on their website.

Stoked!
developerResponse: {'id': 7936291, 'body': 'What a win. \n\nLove, Depop', 'modified': '2019-03-27T17:39:14Z'}

title: I LOVE DEPOP!!!
review: I've made over $500 on Depop! I love trading, selling, and buying and there are so many great features. As long as you post good pictures and products, you get great exposure. I already have almost 300 followers.

title: Unfair
review: It’s always the same type of stuff on the explore page. I’ve never seen any jewelry up there. That’s unfair because us jewelry sellers never get a chance to get noticed. So please next time you are deciding who gets to be on the explore page, put some jewelry post up there.
developerResponse: {'id': 5339328, 'body': 'WE ABSOLUTELY LOVE YOU. and we love new users to show to the world. This feedback is greatly appreciate and we will take note of it as we want everyone to have the chance to shine. \n\nLove, Depop', 'modified': '2018-10-03T10:18:10Z'}

title: great app but.....
review: Depop is a great app but I think they can improve by: 1. allowing sellers to use FedEx instead of just USPS to ship items and 2. creating some sort of promotion button that allows the seller to reduce price and tell ppl when an item they’ve like/saved has gone down in price (like Mercari does)

title: changes needed
review: I like to sell on depop but they have many problems. The separate PayPal transactions for their fees is horrible and seems unfair since PayPal and depop both take there fee percentage from the same total even though PayPal should take there fees after depop has taken theirs. Also it is extremely hard to get refunded for depop fees. These need to be fixed.
developerResponse: {'id': 3458957, 'body': "Hey there! Thanks for the review - please be aware that we're aiming to make the refund process far smoother for our users this summer, and we hope you'll notice the improvements. Thanks, Team Depop", 'modified': '2018-05-14T12:03:27Z'}

title: Would not let me get into Depop cause of my SMS
review: My SMS wouldn’t go through not allowing me to be able to get into the app, it was asking for the 6 digit number, must be an issue with your side? I had to get in through apple instead cause it blocked my number for asking for the SMS to resend.

title: Won’t work
review: I tried setting up a account through apple, wouldn’t work. Then I tried my phone number, wouldn’t. Work either.
developerResponse:
{'id': 18690560, 'body': "Hey there,

Sorry to hear about this. If you can submit a request via this link we'll help you get onto Depop ASAP.

https://bit.ly/depopsignup

Team Depop
", 'modified': '2020-10-25T21:35:08Z'}

title: Annoyed
review: Got my first order only for it to tell me my PayPal wasn’t confirmed. Once I confirmed through PayPal Depop still left it as unconfirmed and says I have to wait 7 days before it confirms. I am not able to print the shipping label until it is confirmed so I cannot send the order. I had to ask the buyer for their address to ship it myself but I don’t know if they will answer. Just annoying.
developerResponse:
{'id': 19697732, 'body': "Hey. We can imagine how frustrating this is. Head in-app to 'Settings - Support - Need help - Buying - My purchase - I haven't received my item'.
We also moderate the app 24/7 to ensure scammers are kept away. If you notice anything suspicious, please report the item/user in-app (by clicking on the 3 dots top right of their profile/item) so we can investigate.

We're here to help,
Team Depop", 'modified': '2020-12-11T12:33:48Z'}

title: Depop
review: I LOVE Depop and how it’s grown my jewelry business and wire wrapping passion. My only suggestion is that I wish we could rearrange our products though the app as well, not just through the web version.

title: needs improvement
review: I am not able to look at an item at all. Every time I tap on an item to look at the description or when trying to purchase something it turns complete white. Although i’ve deleted the app and tried everything, the same thing happens every time. It’s also updated and still doesn’t work....
developerResponse:
{'id': 18383529, 'body': "Hey there,

We can imagine how frustrating this is and we’re currently working to resolve this issue. Please get in touch by going to 'Settings - Need help - Technical issues - I've still got an issue' and send us a report leaving your username and details regarding your listings. 
 
We’ll take it from here,
Team Depop
", 'modified': '2020-10-09T18:20:36Z'}

title: Eh
review: Its pretty easy to sell things but the fees are way too high. They say they only take 10% of each sale, but it has to be much more. They end up taking more than what you get. Honestly, I'm starting to think that it may not be worth it at all to sell on here. This could also be why sellers price their items so high.
developerResponse:
{'id': 18195679, 'body': " 
Hey, thanks for the review. Our 10% fee allows us to keep Depop running smoothly. It contributes towards the cost of running the app, creating new features and improving our Community’s experience. 
See our article about fees by going to 'Settings - Need help' and typing in ‘What about fees’.
Team Depop
", 'modified': '2020-09-30T11:50:53Z'}

title: Great seller, fast responder
review: The seller responded to all my questions pretty quickly and mailed it the same day I purchased and provided me with tracking number. Highly recommend.
developerResponse: {'id': 18004395, 'body': 'Thanks for the 5 Star feedback. We love to see it!\n\nTeam Depop', 'modified': '2020-09-21T16:04:27Z'}

title: Amazinggg app
review: Lots of cute clothings here prices are reasonable, and I tried selling my stuff here, and I also made a mistake on selling because it was my first time , they actually reimburse my shipping fees. Friendly staff , shout out to Daniel!
developerResponse: {'id': 9976132, 'body': "Hey Valerian, we're always here to help, keep shopping!\n\nTeam Depop", 'modified': '2019-08-02T11:46:19Z'}

title: Its easy but customer service...
review: Impossible to reach and fix issues. I hate having to go through PayPal for a refund Poshmark and eBay dispute for you. I also hate that it automatically takes the money for a shipping label from your earnings because if there’s a mistake LIKE DEPOP DOESN'T GIVE YOU THE SHIPPING LABEL, you have to pay out of pocket and somehow wait for them to respond.
developerResponse:
{'id': 15777818, 'body': "Hey, our support response times are currently slightly longer due to the current pandemic, but we'll be in touch ASAP.
 
 
We're here for you,
Team Depop

", 'modified': '2020-06-04T13:38:57Z'}

title: It needs a new update.
review: Before the update the website was a 10/10 but with this new update it has made browsing way hard than it should be, Someone should check on it until than I won’t be using it, 5/10

title: What happened?
review: I LOVE THIS APP. For everything. But just recently when you’re in the Search tab and you start searching and scroll, & you Click on an Item . And decide to go back it sends you All The Way Up to where you began your search.... Instead of going back and continuing your search for items ......
developerResponse:
{'id': 15340345, 'body': "Hey, sorry to hear about this! The good news is we've got a fix for this bug on the way. 

Stay tuned, 
Team Depop
", 'modified': '2020-05-15T11:57:00Z'}

title: This Apps the bomb!!!!!
review: Really unique clothing I’m a baggy junkies 90s even though I was born in the late 90s and I never thought I would see any of the things I like and would love to wear besides eBay this is the best app I have ever been in

title: Way better than Grailed, wayyyyyyy
review: I literally spent a month trying to figure out grailed like I’m not kidding like like literally spent a whole month trying to set it up but it wouldn’t work
developerResponse: {'id': 6141750, 'body': 'Welcome to our community. We love you.\n\nDepop', 'modified': '2018-11-28T09:39:03Z'}

review: I have a hard time because it would be much quicker to upload items from a seller point on a computer but it isn’t a option with this app as Depop can be used on a computer but not to post from it.
developerResponse: {'id': 5906211, 'body': "Hey Minnie, we're looking more into this. At the moment we're expanding on site. You can re-arrange and buy items of the site, so we're working on it.\n\nLove, Depop", 'modified': '2018-11-12T11:57:14Z'}

title: Great eco friendly and vintage
review: This app has a ton of cool vintage clothing hat can be uncovered with a little bit of searching. It’s a great option if your also trying to buy second- hand
developerResponse: {'id': 5884492, 'body': "We coudn't have said it better ourselves. Welcome to our growing community.\n\nLove, Depop", 'modified': '2018-11-10T11:20:44Z'}

title: I love this app!!
review: Simply, this app is perfect for finding vintage clothes, no matter your style you’ll most likely find something, I never really review apps but I felt like this one has earned it
developerResponse: {'id': 4754481, 'body': 'Thanks for taking the time to leave us a review! Team Depop', 'modified': '2018-08-21T15:49:33Z'}

review: I love the app only suggestion I would say would be to update the mobile version I had a lot of trouble figuring out my password that was lost, other than that app runs smoothly and safe transactions .

title: Add notifications for uploading new items
review: hey! i love shopping on depop. could you guys please add a way for users to turn on notifications from like our favorite sellers so we don’t miss out on new items they upload? thanks! :)
developerResponse: {'id': 3458893, 'body': "Hey there! Thanks for this idea - we'll bring it to the table with our Product team(s) :) Thanks, Team Depop", 'modified': '2018-05-14T11:58:51Z'}

title: The devil might be working but depop is working harder
review: So far everyone is commenting about how depop does not provide customer service. The reason is they are too busy hiring people to monitor your messages to look for dumb BS to penalize you for. It’s sad but it’s true. I’ve had my account deleted multiple times for things I never did. (But the gag is they rlly think it’ll stop me from making another account. Sike)
developerResponse: {'id': 3269272, 'body': "Hey there - we have Support and Moderation teams in place to help our users as well as spot those that are breaking our rules. Please be aware that if you've been banned, your unable to set up a new account and therefore we'll have to take the same action(s) on any future accounts you open. Team Depop", 'modified': '2018-04-26T10:55:42Z'}

title: Great Community...Okay team
review:
I love selling on Depop! I love the community of sellers and buyers but it’d be a lot better if the team caught up to our speed. 
The employees do not treat sellers equally. You see the same shops on the explore page, even “inactive sellers” and I never get real human feedback when expressing my concerns. 

Let’s do better. 💋
developerResponse: {'id': 19444747, 'body': "Hey. Thanks for the feedback. We love hearing about what we can do to improve Depop for our Community. When you succeed, we succeed. We'll be passing this along to our Product Team.\n\nTeam Depop", 'modified': '2020-11-30T17:47:38Z'}

title: Terrible Algorithm
review: The style edit is so inaccurate it makes you not want to use the app at all. It already takes a lot to navigate this app properly (to find the clothes and accessories you want), and this new feature has just made it worse by not accurately reflecting your activity and your likes into the options they curate for you to consider buying.

title: Quantity bug?
review: Marked an item as sold to save it for a customer, now I can’t edit the quantity. Copied it to a new item and the quantity is set at zero and won’t change no matter what number I set it to.

title: Shipping and filters
review:
The filters on this app make it hard to find what you’re looking for. When you’re used to eBay like filters where you can filter everything from material to country of origin basic filters don’t cut it. 

Most of the sellers are outside of the US yet most do not ship to the US. Realizing that shipping is a preference sellers should be encouraged to ship internationally. America’s love European fashion.
developerResponse:
{'id': 18577749, 'body': "Hey there,

Thanks for the feedback. We love hearing about what we can do to improve Depop for our Community. When you succeed, we succeed. We'll be passing this along to our Product Team.

Team Depop
", 'modified': '2020-10-19T18:09:29Z'}

title: Cant log into or sign into anything
review: I’ve tried to log in and it keeps saying my password or email is invalid. I tried resetting the passcode and it says the email is invalid. I tried to make a new account but my phone number is already registered. And now i can’t shop. i cant log in with my apple ID or my facebook. So i cannot shop anymore.
developerResponse:
{'id': 18485685, 'body': 'Hey Safira,

Could you please try resetting your password from a laptop or PC. This provides a more secure connection, and should do the trick. Remember, you can use either your username or linked email address to login. Just make sure you’ve typed it correctly with no spaces. 
Let’s get you back on the app,

Team Depop

', 'modified': '2020-10-14T22:16:27Z'}

title: I love depop!
review: Honestly this is the best app to sell on! it’s so easy to make a listing unlike other apps. Ive sold many items so far! The community is great and everyone is so nice in my opinion. Thank you!

title: CHOOSE A DIFFERENT APP
review: I needed to delete my account ASAP. I have had a series of really poor experiences as a seller with this app- from being automatically charged for shipping when that is not what my shop policy is, to not being able to put my store on vacation mode, I am really not happy with how this is going and somehow Depop has my account in the NEGATIVE and they DID NOT offer any reimbursement of any kind. DO NOT USE

title: Bug
review: I love depop. But I just sold two items and the app keeps crashing every time I open it, so I am unable to ship out my items due to the bug. Please help.
developerResponse: {'id': 16677407, 'body': "Hey! The good news is we've fixed this bug, if you update to the latest version it should be resolved now. Team Depop", 'modified': '2020-07-16T15:07:59Z'}

title: Amazing app
review: I had recently been scammed, so I reached out to the depop team and they took care of my problem immediately! It’s a good app to find things on a budget, I highly recommend.

title: takes money away
review: I love this app and all because i get to find cute other clothes from other different people. But i hate when I sell an item and depop takes so much money & so does paypal. You’re basically not making money at this point. :(
developerResponse:
{'id': 16192683, 'body': "Hey, thanks for the review. Our 10% fee allows us to keep Depop running smoothly. It contributes towards the cost of running the app, creating new features and improving our Community’s experience. 
 
See our article about fees by going to 'Settings - Need help' and typing in ‘What about fees’.
Team Depop
", 'modified': '2020-06-24T11:33:04Z'}

title: Eh.
review: I really want to love and like Depop but it’s so hard when I’ve had so many horrible experiences with it. Depop takes forever to get back to you, there are so many scammers and I’ve had multiple instances where sellers just never shipped my item and Depop took way to long to get back to, could be personal but honestly just bad experiences.

title: Just one problem
review: Whenever I click on a post and I exit, it brings me all the way back up to the top of the search results. So it’s just kind of annoying to have to keep scrolling down to where I was. It didn’t use to do this, but it just recently started. Hopefully y’all can fix it someway.
developerResponse: {'id': 15444570, 'body': "Hey! The good news is we've fixed this bug, if you update to the latest version it should be resolved now.\n\nTeam Depop ", 'modified': '2020-05-20T11:50:44Z'}

title: More hyped that it’s worth
review: Makes it extremely difficult to receive the money for your items from PayPal, has no insurance for buyers for when the seller doesn’t pay shipping and you pay out of pocket, just overall more of a pain than I found worth the time and effort. really disappointing.

title: Hear me out!
review: So there’s a lot of great things you buy on this app, many people are legit and genuine but there’s also scammers and you have to look for that. It’s not a complete guarantee you’ll get your money back because I wasted $100 on something I never received. I was better off just actually buying my item brand new. But look out for scammers. They need to make sure people are legit.
developerResponse:
{'id': 14972661, 'body': " 
Hey. We can imagine how frustrating this is. Head in-app to 'Settings - Support - Need help - Buying - My purchase - I haven't received my item'.
We also moderate the app 24/7 to ensure scammers are kept away. If you notice anything suspicious, please report the item/user in-app (by clicking on the 3 dots top right of their profile/item) so we can investigate.

We're here to help,
Team Depop
", 'modified': '2020-04-28T17:08:40Z'}

title: Love it!
review: I love it. I gave it four stars because I miss having more tags. More people were able to see my listings and my items got sold faster. I also think there should be a dark mode! Otherwise the app is great. Love Depop!

title: Awesome.
review: For some reason this is just better than the rest of the shopping apps. It’s easy to maneuver through and I find the neat stuff for better prices.
developerResponse: {'id': 8346786, 'body': 'We feel you - good enough reason.\n\nLove, Depop', 'modified': '2019-04-24T10:50:43Z'}

title: need little bit more improvements
review: I bagged a couple of stuff when I went to my bag it was not there I lOwkEy pretty sad about.I just wanted to write this review because the app need a little bit improvement.

title: You need to make your own payment system
review: You need to make your own payment system, Depop!!!!!. That is the only thing I’ll ask you for because everything else is perfect.

title: Great app needs this one fix
review: I love Depop I’ve bought pretty much everything I wear on there butttt, lately I’ve been trying to sell and even when I tag 2 brands it won’t let me post which has been making me mad!!

title: GliTcHy!!:(
review: I love everything about the app except how glitchy it is. Like i can’t even like a couple pics without the app freezing and it’s soo annoying that it makes me not wanna use it. But yea if y’all fix that it’ll b perfect

title: so aesthetic
review: if your looking to dress aesthetic and 60s, 70s, 80s, etc this is the best app i promise. I bought earrings and a couple of clothing pieces that are ultimately some of my fave pieces in my closet. most def a recommendation for anybody looking to make their closet more aesthetic. keep it peachy! 🍑!
developerResponse: {'id': 7216544, 'body': "Peachy and juicy! We love our vintage aesthetics and we're happy you're part of our community.\n\nKisses, Depop", 'modified': '2019-02-09T05:44:44Z'}

title: a culture of its own
review: I get too many of my clothes on this app! The process is always very easy and most sellers are super easy to work with. There is a complete culture within the depop community.
developerResponse: {'id': 5856689, 'body': "We thrive on our culture and the love we have for our community. We're family boo.. so happy that you're part of it.\n\nLove, Depop", 'modified': '2018-11-08T10:15:24Z'}

title: Awesome app
review: App is great, everyone is very in communication, refunds are super easy and payments are super easy aswell. Selling thing is very easy and quick.  would definitely continue to use app.
developerResponse: {'id': 5590640, 'body': 'Thanks for the love Papi S. \n\nLove, Depop', 'modified': '2018-10-21T09:54:32Z'}

title: UPDATE NEEDED! 💖💖💖💖💖
review: It would be really great if each profile had a notification bell we could turn on, so we get the notification when that person posts something new! Just a suggestion
developerResponse: {'id': 5723986, 'body': 'Great suggestion too! We love how our users can think with us on ways to improve the platform and get our community closer. Will pass this on to our team.\n\nLove, Depop', 'modified': '2018-10-30T10:23:09Z'}

title: Almost perfect.
review: Please add an option to turn on post notifications for individual shops. Other than that, this is pretty much my main source for shopping. Love the design and concept. Such a great way to thrift from home.

title: Great for selling
review: Have sold so many items at decent prices so quickly. My only issue is that they take so much from the sales total.

title: Confusing!
review: So tracking didn’t show up for a few days then I couldn’t leave feedback when item arrived! I had to wait an extra day. The FAQ was off when I checked to see where I can leave feedback. Finally a day after item arrived I was able to leave feedback! I’d hate for seller to wait that extra day to get her money! So darned confusing. Won’t use it again

title: It's pretty legit
review: I've been using depop for about 2-3 months now and I love it. I get to sell my old clothes and buy things that I've always wanted. I also love how there's buyer protection from scammers.
developerResponse: {'id': 3876722, 'body': "Delighted to read it's been a positive start on Depop for you, thanks for joining us! Team Depop", 'modified': '2018-06-18T11:03:54Z'}

title: Can’t log in on app
review: This app would be great if I could actually log in. I made an account on my laptop and went to log into the app and I keep getting locked out. Tech support doesn’t help as I don’t think they actually read what I am sending them. They are clearly going off a script. This whole thing has been so annoying and I will be deleting my account and going to Poshmark
developerResponse: {'id': 5078266, 'body': "That's a shame to hear. Can you please send us your username of the account you made? We can try to get in touch with the tech team about this.\n\nLove, Depop", 'modified': '2018-09-17T10:04:28Z'}

title: Shipping
review: I absolutely love this app. The only thing I would change is making it easier to buy multiple things at once from one buyer instead of having to do “bundles”.

title: The beginning of something beautiful🖤
review: Maybe this is the best thing I have decided to invest some of my time to.. No better place to have had my very first EVER sell online. I’m in love with Depop, Thank you!❌⭕️❌⭕️ -Bloojay
developerResponse: {'id': 3458964, 'body': 'Thanks for this lovely review! Team Depop', 'modified': '2018-05-14T12:04:15Z'}

title: I’m a buyer.
review: Not a seller so from a buyer’s standpoint the app is awesome! I stopped buying clothing from large chains and come here or thrifting. I purchase clothing from urban outfitters half the price than I would in the actual store. I love it!
developerResponse: {'id': 2933385, 'body': "Hey there, we're glad Depop is fulfilling all of your purchasing needs! We hope you'll give trying a go at some point too.. Team Depop", 'modified': '2018-03-26T11:19:39Z'}

title: First and only app.
review: Depop is my fist app I started selling my things on. It’s easier and safest in my opinion. I wish Depop would gain the positive and recognition cause honestly it’s better then all the other apps.

title: Add a video feature
review: Love the app but i feel like it could use an upgrade. the format looks a bit outdated and being able to post videos would be helpful for my business.

title: Not working well on new iPhone
review: I just updated and it’s still not working and my phone is brand new. Too many issues lately and I can’t even delete sold items now. Not happy with the functionality of this app or the way their algorithms for having your items come up in the listings. It’s just not as good as other selling platforms.

title: The Online Thrift Shop
review: Honestly it’s like if Goodwill and Poshmark had a baby, and that baby was exclusively an app. It’s definitely great for all kinds of fashions and is definitely worth giving it a shot.

title: Needs more seller support
review: I’ve been a top seller for 4 months now and sometimes buyers try and scam you to get their money back and keep the items and depop does very little to protect you from that happening. I’ve also had several terrible encounters with users that just troll the app and break Depop’s politics but even after reporting them Depop still does not do anything about it.
developerResponse: {'id': 6884176, 'body': 'That really is a problem, we hate it as much as you do. Please do make sure to send us a report this to us and we will make sure to tackle this pronto.\n\nLove, Depop', 'modified': '2019-01-17T12:29:15Z'}

title: pretty good
review: Pretty good overall , has some issues with customer service and some people being shady but other than that it’s aight

title: HORRIBLE
review: This app is AWFUL ! Literally no affordable clothes. Everyone on there resells shirts for at least $30 when they bought it at goodwill for $2 !!!!! Majority of these people are stealing from low income families by buying all of the “good stuff” from thrift stores. I’m so sick of this app. I called a girl a scammer and since they reported me I am now banned forever. Seriously never buy clothes on this app it is NOT worth it.
developerResponse:
{'id': 18531600, 'body': "Hey there,

We’re sorry to hear your experience hasn't gone to plan. In order to keep our Community safe, all decisions made to suspend users and items are taken after deep investigation and consideration. If you feel this is unfair, just drop us a reply in the original email thread. We’re always happy to take a second look.
 
Team Depop

", 'modified': '2020-10-16T20:29:48Z'}

review: Everything works well except it crashes often when taking photos. So just use photos from your library instead.

title: Love this app but...
review: I really do love Depop I buy so much from it and it’s very reliable it’s just a very difficult process to get your money back if someone doesn’t ship your item out. Only happened once though. Still love depop!

title: Great for the Most Part
review: I love depop and it’s the only re selling websites that I understand. I like the wide variety of sellers and the clothing options BUT I just wish the depop limited fee was so hefty. I understand that it’s part of the shipping costs but YEESH. Anyways, I love depop and I’m glad it exists.
developerResponse: {'id': 4374728, 'body': "Thanks for taking the time to leave us a review! Our fee is currently 10% because it's what helps fund our business. We hope that one day we'll be in a position to reduce this for our users. Thanks, Team Depop", 'modified': '2018-07-24T09:58:34Z'}

title: Just started
review: I just received my first purchase on this App. It went very well and I was completely satisfied. Price was great and seller was honest, I’ll definitely keep using this App.

title: Good but suggestion!
review: My last update was very critical but after some adjustment I’m happy with the update! The only thing I’d suggest is adding more brands! Especially Y2K and vintage brands as that’s what the app is full of! Generic brands like “Phat Farm” and “JNCO” aren’t available. Seems silly.
developerResponse: {'id': 19444305, 'body': "Hey. Thanks for the feedback. We love hearing about what we can do to improve Depop for our Community. When you succeed, we succeed. We'll be passing this along to our Product Team.\n\nTeam Depop", 'modified': '2020-11-30T17:21:29Z'}

title: Reallllllyy glitchy
review: This app is really cool, but it’s really glitchy and has a lot of bugs. It really often freezes up and crashes the app, and I can’t click any of the buttons on the page of an item listed.

title: Not too good
review: They take a lot of your money in fees, Depop charge you 10% of what you sold and also PayPal charges you another percentage... I’ve had issues with the app many times and more than making money I’m loosing money. The customer service is really bad and they accused me of breaking Depop rules when I asked for help when I sold something for 15$ and only got 6$ in my account. C’mon guys...

{'id': 18690455, 'body': "Hey there,

Team Depop

review: over and over again this awful app deletes my items saying they break the rules but NONE of them have broken a single rule. when i contact support, nobody ever answers me. its only unhelpful bots. also this app is always broken. if i didnt already spend so much on inventory to sell i would have left this app already. SHAMEFUL. do not become a seller on here, they dont care about you.

I love Depop and everything it stands for and how it is working against fast fashion in modern day, but I would expect more in their support department. 

Responses take ages. Haven’t received a payment through Depop payments due to a mistake in the info and it’s been a month now of no resolution.

title: Must have
review: I know The ads that come up on Facebook and Instagram make you not want this app but I this is the only app I personally I purchase stuff on

title: APP IS NOT GOOD FOR RE SELLERS
review: Listen I’ve  sold throughout apps, mercari, Poshmark, etc. this is by far the WORST app I’ve ever came across for re selling. Not only do most of the people who use the app are broke teenagers who low ball at everything. But the fees ARE INSANE. I legit sold a t shirt for a good price, but I didn’t even make close to the profit due to depop’s extra fee. All I’m saying is if you’re an all time Re seller and you’re doing it for a living, THIS APP IS NOT YOUR FRIEND.

title: It’s so neat to find what you really love at great prices!
review: As long as people are legit, it’s a good place. I wanted a Kate Spade Bag for my daughter’s birthday and it never shipped. I did get the money back but, other than that, good vibes all around.

title: Love it!!
review: I only had this app for an hour now I found it out from my girlfriend and it’s already the best app I’ve ever used I love how everything’ is affordable and good quality

title: Great and Fun App!!☺️
review: Fun little app to find literally any piece of item! Its more like a thrift store from home. Most of the sellers are very friendly and reading the reviews helps a lot as well as messaging the seller!
developerResponse: {'id': 6141994, 'body': "Welcome to our community. Glad you're part of it.\n\nLove, Depop", 'modified': '2018-11-28T10:05:31Z'}

title: Bad communication
review: I emailed you guys the other day and I got a response which was great, but it was not really the response I wanted. The depop staff won’t reactivate my account and that didn’t make me happy. The email I sent out was explaining everything and why I need my account back, but the response from depop made it seem as like they didn’t care, so now I’m unable to sell which really bummed me out.

title: Lousy App and Service
review: First, I love the community of sellers and buyers that use this app with lots of items and styles I don’t find on Poshmark, Mercari, eBay, etc.  But the app feels like 10 years ago tech, there is no way to get customer service or help from Depop, shipping system is poorly setup making things really hard for sellers and buyers if the package is medium sized or larger or if your transacting internationaly, and there is no iPad app.

title: Horrible and you will not receive help with problems from this company
review: I sold an item on Depop and the person canceled their PayPal transaction so PayPal took the money I received for the sell back. When I contacted depop I got one response saying they would look into it and they never got back to me and I never received my money but the buyer received my item! Their customer service is horrible.
developerResponse: {'id': 7340767, 'body': "Hi there, thank you for this feedback. Can you let us know your username? We can have a look and reach out to the support team about this. Please know that any cancelled payment is taken seriously and we do make sure our seller's are protected by us in case such events happen.\n\nLove, Depop", 'modified': '2019-02-18T08:39:04Z'}

title: Love it, but needs filter in feed
review: Love this app! I wish you could filter sizes in your feed, because I love to follow sellers with great style, but find it difficult to get through all the posts that aren’t relevant to me. PLEASE ADD FILTER IN FEED.
developerResponse: {'id': 4361722, 'body': "Thanks for this suggestion! We're always looking to improve our search function so this is very relevant feedback; thanks again! Team Depop", 'modified': '2018-07-23T17:24:38Z'}

title: Good app
review: Really easy app to use however I havent sold anything...yet. I like that its similar to IG (can I mention IG on here?). Great way to get your product seen. Now if only I can sell some of my hand made wares.

title: okay
review: good app, pretty secure purchasing. app on IOS glitches out where if you look at your notifications and leave the app, the notification bubble is still there. have to go in once or twice more to make the bubble go away

title: Ring and Custom necklace
review: Amazing ring! I wear it too often, my finger feels weird if it’s not on. Got the custom necklace for my sister and she loves it since the day I gave it to her! Can’t thank you enough! Sweetest seller!
developerResponse: {'id': 17891748, 'body': 'Thanks so much for the 5 Star feedback, we love to hear from our community. Glad your sister loved the present!\n\nTeam Depop', 'modified': '2020-09-15T13:44:43Z'}

title: TERRIBLE CUSTOMER SERVICE
review:
This app was incredible to work with but has TERRIBLE CUSTOMER SERVICE. 

My account was suspended and permanently removed due to activity happening on my page. ((don’t bother to even respond support as I contacted you all and you all were very rude.))

They stated the same rules apply to everyone and therefore I can’t have my account reactivated EVEN THOUGH I NEEDED TO CONTACT A PERSON ABOUT MY ORDER. 

The actual platform itself has users violating terms as well but they seemingly have chosen to allow those users to stay up. 

End of the story if you want a place where customer service is on point and there are no users that can bully you this isn’t the place for you.

title: I can’t even log in
review: This apps bugs are making it impossible for me to log in, when I try to use my phone number or my email none work when they have worked for other apps. I think I would have liked the app become all my friends and family do but I can’t even test it out to see. This app is very frustrating.

title: Why isn’t the shipping shown??
review: I usually love buying things on depop but I think its a bit ridiculous that the shipping price is hidden until checkout. Many sellers price their shipping to extremely high it’s a bit annoying that the price is hidden. This something that should definitely be changed.

title: Shipping labels
review: I would prefer to use Depop labels for safety & easy access but labels come with the same date of sale. My post office always returns packages back to me if they have a past date. I wish the app would have a button to recreate labels or just simply add future dates to labels.
developerResponse: {'id': 19469248, 'body': "Hey. Thanks for the feedback. We love hearing about what we can do to improve Depop for our Community. When you succeed, we succeed. We'll be passing this along to our Product Team.\n\nTeam Depop", 'modified': '2020-12-01T15:58:35Z'}

title: The update makes me want to cry
review: I hate the new search layout. It’s super inefficient. I loved Depop because it was so easy to find cute things quickly because there were so many photos in the search. I literally hate the new one so much that I don’t even open the app anymore. It’s too frustrating. PLEASE make an option to go back to the smaller search layout

title: PLEASE DONT SELL ON THIS APP!!!!! Read below!
review: This app is terrible! They say that they take off a 10% fee yet they take far more than 10% without telling you! This should be illegal! I sold an item with a $3 shipping fee that the BUYER paid ME and Depop took $8 away from me ! I highly recommend not even wasting time on this app. Sell on Mercari instead. I found it way much easier to sell and not get charged unknown fees.
developerResponse:
{'id': 18575146, 'body': 'Hey Jose,

Rest assured that Depop can only take payments for sales and shipping labels, so you won’t be overcharged. Check here for more info or to contact our support team

Team Depop
', 'modified': '2020-10-19T15:19:41Z'}

title: Addicting!
review: This app is so fun to shop and post on. So straight forward and easy to use! It makes me feel great supporting small business and shopping sustainably!

title: Depop
review: The app is super helpful when it comes to advice and answering questions you may have if you’re new or don’t really know what you’re doing.

title: BRING BACK “MY SIZE” OPTION
review: I was excited to see a new update thinking it would bring back the “my size” option after the last update took it away, but was very disappointed to see it hasn't been brought back. PLEASE bring back this option. I don’t even want to shop anymore having to select individual sizes each time I try to browse.

review: Good platform to help sell old video games at first. Why did the newest update take out the tech category? Not sure what category to list video games under now.

review: This app is really easy to use and I have made some money within my second week of downloading it.

title: Good and Bad
review: The clothes are cheap for the most part and really cute, except you have to pay separate shipping for everything since it’s different sellers. it’s understandable, but it adds up a lot more money in the end if you’re buying a lot at once.

title: Very good app
review: I love using Depop but I wish we could use Venmo as a form of payment! Also sometimes after using the app for a while it’ll start to glitch and then closes. Though overall I like it

title: Really Great!!
review: I have been using Depop for about a month now and it only gets better and better. Highly recommended to anyone looking to sell clothing.

title: Best Online Shopping App

title: SO disappointed
review: I wanted to give this app a chance so bad but after trying to purchase 3 times I give up. First time it took over two months to get a word back from the seller and an extra month to get a refund (never got my package) Second time I received my package 2 months late and the third time( present) still wanting on package or refund 3 months later.
developerResponse: {'id': 4767478, 'body': "Hey there! We're really sorry you've had such a bad start to your Depop experience. This may not seem the case, but this isn't the true representation of how using Depop should be. If you haven't done so already, we'd encourage you to share this with our support team (support@depop.com) so that they can see how they may be able to help. Thanks - Team Depop", 'modified': '2018-08-22T12:48:05Z'}

title: Great items....sometimes
review: It can be a really amazing place sometimes to find nice pieces on the low, but a lot of ppl over charge and it can be a frustrating shopping experience sometimes

title: Setting Seller’s up for failure
review: As a seller on depop I come across the same issue. My packages take forever to ship. Even some on the packages I shipped out still haven’t gotten to the customers which makes me look like a scammer which I am not. I would appreciate that y’all would use a different shipping company because lately USPS has a bad rep right now and they’re employees are losing and stealing mail.
developerResponse: {'id': 3316351, 'body': "Hey there! This is the first time we've heard of such an issue, and our decision to implement a shipping solution in the US was very much based on the reliability of the USPS service. We sorry you've not had a positive experience with them recently, and would encourage you to reach out to their customer service team to voice your concerns over your recent deliveries. Once again; apologies! Team Depop", 'modified': '2018-05-01T13:50:46Z'}

title: Just don’t use it
review:
1. I bought a nickel board off a guy over a year ago and he cancelled the shipment because the shipping (due to weight) would be too expensive. Never got my payment back.

2. I bought a sweater off a girl and all went well. I got the sweater, loved it, the end, right? NOPE. She messaged me a week later saying she “accidentally denied the payment” so now it’s MY responsibility to send her another payment????

3. I bought a dress over 10 days ago and the seller says she shipped it however it’s not being tracked. We are both confused.

Bottom line, DON’T USE IT. After my purchases come through I am deleting this app and never using it again (-:
developerResponse: {'id': 2627940, 'body': "Hey there - sounds like you've definitely not had the experience we wish for our users :( we're confident that this is not the common experience though and we'd love to look into this to see how we might be able to help. If you're open to the idea, please reference this review in an email to support@depop.com alongside your Depop @username and we'll contact you back ASAP. Looking forward to hearing from you, and apologies! Team Depop", 'modified': '2018-02-20T11:49:30Z'}

title: Terrible customer service
review: Use eBay instead. If something goes wrong, they're actually there to help.

title: Needs a Bug Fix!
review: The app is SUPER BUGGY and loads slow. It freezes a lot and sometimes when you get messages they won't show up. Sometimes while posting a new product it takes 15 minutes for the item to show up on your page. Definitely needs an update!

title: AMAZING
review: Depop is such a great way to sell items that you don’t want anymore! You can also find the cutest most trendiest stuff being sold at other shops!

title: too many issues
review: honestly I had way too many issues with the app to be worth the small amount of money I was making. Such a hassle just for there to be fees taken out of my already pretty low prices.

title: improvements
review:
hi depop! i love your app and i have making quite a few purchases on there. i have some recommendations for you:
1) you used to put the price for each item’s square when i use the search bar, but it is now removed. i would like to see the price for each item again for convenience.
2) in our liked collections, you cannot see what has been sold. i would like to see this please.
3) in our likes, we cannot see the price for each item unless we click on the square.
4) i would like to see a low-high price feature and most recent feature please on search and likes. 
i am only a buyer and not a seller, so this is from a buyer’s point of view. but i would like to see these improvements to give everyone a better experience on your app!
developerResponse: {'id': 19695040, 'body': "Hey. Thanks for the feedback. We love hearing about what we can do to improve Depop for our Community. When you succeed, we succeed. We'll be passing this along to our Product Team.\n\nTeam Depop", 'modified': '2020-12-11T10:52:26Z'}

title: Annoying
review: This app is very hard when you sign in. I put my email and it says “Email taken” ?? 🤨 I never even had this app. When I tried to sign in again and put my number, it says “enable to sign in” then it gives me options saying “help”, “log in “ or “forgot password” It literally said that I already signed in when I never had this app ever in my life. 😐

title: Excellent Seller
review: Everything came on time in great condition.  Seller is excellent communicator, sent tracking info.  On top of the entire process.  Def buy from her again.
developerResponse:
{'id': 18831949, 'body': 'Hey Sally,

Thanks for the 5 star feedback, we love to see it!

Team Depop
', 'modified': '2020-11-01T21:38:03Z'}

We’ll take it from here,
