title: Possibly a glitch or change
review: I love this app and it runs very smooth, but after the most recent update prices aren’t showing up on the pictures when browsing through a category

title: love selling on here but...
review: never ship with depop. they put it AUTOMATICALLY on free shipping (you have to pay) and most times they don’t notice. also, if you refund someone, you have to EMAIL DEPOP just to get your fees back that YOU PAID FOR and the shipping label. meaning, you lose so much money if you don’t contact them. please fix this whole thing.

title: Layout could use an update
review: I actually really love the app!! But I feel like it’s layout could use an update to just look a bit nicer you know? It bothers me a bit. But other than that I really like it.

title: Golden idea. Slightly less golden execution.
review:
This app is good. The selling and the posts on the app are mostly really cool and there aren’t very many shady accounts on here, which is nice. However, more recently, I find that I can’t open the app at all. It tries to open and closes out. Every time.   

It would also be cool if they added the features that are on the app to the website.
developerResponse:
{'id': 15248298, 'body': "Hey, we can imagine how frustrating this is. Please get in touch by going to 'Settings - Need help - Technical issues - I've still got an issue' and send us a report.

We’ll take it from here,
Team Depop
", 'modified': '2020-05-11T18:16:42Z'}

title: Awesome app but needs one more thing
review: Love the app but would be great if pics where able to be sent through messages
developerResponse: {'id': 13487411, 'body': "Hey. Thanks for the feedback. We love hearing about what we can do to improve Depop for our Community. When you succeed, we succeed. We'll be passing this along to our Product Team.\n\nTeam Depop", 'modified': '2020-02-14T10:46:43Z'}

title: Worst platform to buy and sell on
review: As a seller, my very first sale was a scam. As a buyer, working through PayPal on this platform is horrible. I just bought a $90 item and the seller didn’t disclose the damage. Opened a claim with PayPal and they had me ship it back. Return shows as delivered and I don’t have my money back. Seller lied and said she already refunded me. Don’t gamble with your money on this garbage platform.
developerResponse: {'id': 13938986, 'body': "Hey. We certainly don't condone this sort of behaviour on app, would you be able to provide us with your username? We can chase this up for you and ensure your next experience is a happy one.\n\nTeam Depop", 'modified': '2020-03-09T11:55:46Z'}

title: Cool app
review: I just started using it but it’s really easy to use and it seems like you can find a lot of good deals or make some extra cash. So far I’m super into it 👍🏼

title: Fantastic
review: Its like an online thrift store, easy to use, convenient and absolutely amazing. Would highly recommend for all those interested in fashion. Products are cheap and usually if good quality.
developerResponse: {'id': 10470039, 'body': 'Yesss, we love this!\n\nTeam Depop', 'modified': '2019-09-02T10:19:09Z'}

title: Review
review: Today was my first day buying an item and it was extremely easy to fill out my information.
developerResponse: {'id': 9142029, 'body': 'Glad to hear it and congrats on your first purchase! Welcome to our lovely community. If you need anything, we got you.\n\nLove, Depop', 'modified': '2019-06-13T06:30:00Z'}

title: I’m out of money
review: This app is so cool and has so much unique stuff! I’ve had it for like 3 days and I’ve bought seven items! I just can’t stop finding things!
developerResponse: {'id': 4782519, 'body': "Welcome to Depop! Great that you're buying already - there's so much to explore! Team Depop", 'modified': '2018-08-23T12:15:53Z'}

title: THEY TAKE SO MUCH - REGRET
review:
Use Poshmark or Mercari
I used to love Depop, now I hate it
It’s decent at best to buy from- shipping costs WAY more then Mercari or Poshmark. 
To sell is AWFUL though. They take such a high percentage of the cash you make, don’t bother. Mercari and Poshmark are fair and take a small amount of what you make. Depop thinks it’s this edgy vintage street wear app that can charge $$$$ BANK. No. It’s an online thrift shop....
developerResponse:
{'id': 8502533, 'body': 'Hi there, I understand that you may believe that the Depop fee is high and believe me if we didn’t have to charge a fee we wouldn’t!

The 10% fee may seem like a lot for your sale but, when we break this down into what the fee contributes to, it makes a lot more sense. The fee is in place to keep the app up and running, with general up-keep costs and to pay all of our employees, from engineers to us in support. 

Unlike many other selling platforms, at Depop only charge you when you make a sale, this means there are no fees for the length of time your item has been listed for or any initial costs to list the item, so list to your heart’s content because its all free!

Love, Depop', 'modified': '2019-05-04T04:25:43Z'}

title: Accept other payment options!
review: It’s not possible for some people to use PayPal and it’s kind of a pain that that’s the only form of payment they accept. Venmo at least should be accepted too

title: Ripped me off!
review: I had one problem after another just trying to set up an account and sell off a few things. Depop owes me over $70 for the three sales I did make. I have repeatedly requested help and they’ve absolved themselves of any responsibility whatsoever. Also, there is no way to close your store in a way that keeps illiterate idiots from buying anyway. Get Poshmark instead.
developerResponse: {'id': 5456530, 'body': "Hi Minna, sorry to hear you're experience is not going great so far. Have you been able to get in touch with the support team about this? Can you let us know your username as well? We can try to reach from our end to them and see how it is going with your issue.\n\nLove, Depop", 'modified': '2018-10-11T10:21:58Z'}

title: Love this app
review: I’ve been using this app for almost a year now and I am getting all my clothes from here. There’s some really good stuff for a really good price. Such a great app with a lot of great sellers!
developerResponse: {'id': 4767935, 'body': "We hope it's been a great year! Thanks for the review - Team Depop", 'modified': '2018-08-22T13:09:36Z'}

review: App is amazing. Very user friendly. Safe purchasing. Have not tried selling yet, but I’m thinking about it. This app is like having the worlds largest thrift store at your fingertips.
developerResponse: {'id': 4767727, 'body': "Thanks for the 5 stars, we're glad you're having fun! Team Depop", 'modified': '2018-08-22T12:59:23Z'}

title: Better then most!
review: Depop is cool. I’ve found some really cool stuff through it and have managed to sell quite a few things too!
developerResponse: {'id': 3269046, 'body': 'Thanks for the 5 stars Beachbaby17! Team Depop', 'modified': '2018-04-26T10:34:07Z'}

title: Getting better
review: Really love the new feature that tells you the last time was one. It helps you avoid bad sellers, which there are a lot of on here. The design still is kinda wack.
developerResponse: {'id': 4753936, 'body': 'Thanks for the 4 stars! Team Depop', 'modified': '2018-08-21T15:07:51Z'}

title: So far so good!!
review: Depop has been a great platform for me to sell some clothes that I either don't wear anymore or find while thrifting. So far in one week, I've had a great experience. Thanks depop!
developerResponse: {'id': 2888804, 'body': "Welcome on board Woodgrain! We hope you'll continue to enjoy your experience. Many thanks, Team Depop", 'modified': '2018-03-21T13:47:59Z'}

title: BY FAR my favorite resale app
review: This app is so good for reselling and buying clothing the only problem I have is that you can only list 4 photos of an item which is a huge problem in my opinion

title: Can be better
review: Love this app because of the fact the the money goes right away to your account . But hate the fact that once you post your item you can’t reshare your listing so people can constantly view your listing . & do it can be constantly be posted. This needs an upgrade
developerResponse: {'id': 2649610, 'body': 'Hey Vellaa_j - increasingly visibility on items that our sellers list is super-important to us, so thanks for leaving this feedback. Team Depop', 'modified': '2018-02-22T10:09:23Z'}

title: new update
review: whenever i upload a new picture it seems 100 times more dull. I don’t know if depop is like lowering the quality of picture or something but on my camera roll it was super bright and that’s really frustrating.

title: Don’t need my phone number
review:
I’d love to use this app. In fact, I’ve made quite a few purchases in the past. But that was before Depop started requiring phone numbers. There is no reason for this app to need my cell phone number, and I’m not going to use it as long as that’s a requirement.

If they remove it, I’ll start purchasing things again.

title: Horrible app
review: I’m a seller and a buyer on depop. Unless you manually select that the buyer has to pay shipping it will deduct the full shipping price + a LARGE depop fee from your sale. I sold something for $50 + $10 shipping and only received $34 for the sale and there’s no option for me to cancel the depop shipping but I still have to refund the whole $50 to fix the sale. It’s a scam. I’m LOSING money by selling on depop

title: DO NOT GET
review: I have been having glitches and problems with the app since I got it over 5 months ago. I contacted the help center and they did not get back to me for two weeks. Then they did not even help me and every time I answer their emails someone new is on the other end and asks for information I have already given. HORRIBLE customer service.

title: Improvement
review: I think what would really help is if sellers were able to send more pictures to the buyer in the dm!!

title: The app keeps shutting down
review: I love this app but it’s constantly shutting down , I’ve tried everything they suggested and it still shuts down, hopefully they can fix this.

title: Allows its sellers to abuse its system
review:
Seller sold me the wrong sized shoes
I of course went through PayPal to get a refund and the seller emailed me some nasty words. I wrote a review on their page telling how I was spoken to and depop allowed the seller to report my comment and take it down. I emailed depop showing evidence that my review was accurate and never received an email back. 
Very unprofessional please protect your buyer more thanks
developerResponse:
{'id': 18967852, 'body': "Hey Yahnai,

We’re sorry to hear your experience hasn't gone to plan. We offer Buyer Protection for all items purchased in-app using the ‘BUY’ button. 

Read more in-app about what to do next by going to ‘Settings - Need help’ and typing in ‘Buyer Protection’.

We're here to help you,
Team Depop", 'modified': '2020-11-08T17:32:25Z'}

title: Hard to pay
review: I have now been trying to pay for an item for half an hour. The pay pal system is majorly messed up. Difficult to use. Difficult to buy things. Honestly don’t want to go through the trouble of having to pay at the end and would rather just not get the item I want. Really a shame
developerResponse:
{'id': 18528876, 'body': 'Hey there,

Thanks for sharing your feedback. PayPal is our payment provider, which ensures that buying and selling are protected in-app. Good news though, you now have access to Depop payments available in settings - preferences which allows you to buy and sell without paypal. 

Thanks,
Team Depop
', 'modified': '2020-10-16T16:57:43Z'}

title: Please change it back
review: I like this app (most of the time) but please change back the layout when searching for something. I feel like it’s taking forever to scroll through the results.

title: Update
review: My favorite app! I use it everyday and it’s never failed me until I got the update! It keeps crashing and signing me out! Please fix :)
developerResponse: {'id': 16719282, 'body': "Hey! The good news is we've fixed this bug, if you update to the latest version it should be resolved now. Team Depop", 'modified': '2020-07-18T22:14:43Z'}

title: Too much fee
review: personally believe that they take too much money!! i sold an item for $30 w/ shipping and only $25 was sent to my paypal. rly wish they could lower their fees. i’ve also heard that depop has taken money out of people’s cards. plus i would also like if they had a customer service line!
developerResponse:
{'id': 16788689, 'body': "Hey, thanks for the review. Our 10% fee allows us to keep Depop running smoothly. It contributes towards the cost of running the app, creating new features and improving our Community’s experience. 
 
See our article about fees by going to 'Settings - Need help' and typing in ‘What about fees’.
Team Depop

", 'modified': '2020-07-21T19:33:03Z'}

title: Worst app ever
review: I was selling fine for months on depop and then they told me to verify my PayPal. Even after verifying it, I still could not view my shipping labels. After that they deleted my account without notice. Don’t even try to contact them because they do not care; your message will be left unread because all they care about is the 10% they get.

title: Very great app
review: Easy to find treasures from all over the globe!! Highly recommend if you have a few looks on your list.

title: app won’t let me sign in
review: I’m disappointed. I logged out of my account because my saved items wouldn’t load and once I tried to sign in again I got a notification in the app saying that the action couldn’t be completed and to try again later. Still hasn’t worked even with turning off and restarting my phone.
developerResponse:
{'id': 15703313, 'body': 'Hey. Could you please try resetting your password from a laptop or PC. This provides a more secure connection, and should do the trick. Remember, you can use either your username or linked email address to login. Just make sure you’ve typed it correctly with no spaces. 

Let’s get you back on the app,
Team Depop
', 'modified': '2020-06-01T14:18:12Z'}

title: Update.
review: There’s needs to a search Bar Where the Followers part is. So Im aware Of who unfollows me and Im allowed to Follow any individuals who are inactivate for months On end with their account and keep track of pages I care about Following.

{'id': 15340302, 'body': "Hey, sorry to hear about this! The good news is we've got a fix for this bug on the way.

title: Great way to shop sustainably
review: Great way to shop sustainably and fashionably while saving $. I’ve had nothing but great experiences and great clothes for cheap prices since I downloaded the app!
developerResponse: {'id': 10470894, 'body': 'Yesss, we love this!\n\nTeam Depop', 'modified': '2019-09-02T10:54:23Z'}

title: PayPal😕
review: Unlike other selling apps, all transactions are done through PayPal. Unfortunately I can’t make and transactions because I’m not 18 and so PayPal has restricted me from making certain transactions which makes it hard to buy and sell through Depop.

title: Repeat shopper
review: Some of your sellers provide good service and their items are just as described, others are scammers. Sorry but that has been my experience and the ONLY reason I still shop here is because I’m doing it for my granddaughter. Only reason.
developerResponse: {'id': 12089610, 'body': 'Thanks for the feedback. We moderate the app 24/7 to ensure scammers are kept away. title: Very prompt shipping!!
review: Very happy with my new boots. Docs take a while to break in so I was happy to buy these. Great condition! Unfortunately, one of my daughters wears my size. She’s already planning her outfits. ❤️❤️❤️

title: HELP ME DEPOP!!!!!!!
review: Ok so i have a Venmo but not PayPal so can you please make a wider variety because Paypal never works for me and money doesn’t transfer correctly so please make a wider variety of options for users like me.

title: Love it

developerResponse: {'id': 6340242, 'body': "That's really handy! Especially with the bigger users, you can get straight to the point.\n\nLove, Depop", 'modified': '2018-12-11T14:19:56Z'}

title: Scam
review: I started a DEPOP account and linked my paypal.. I sold an item and the transaction went t perfectly. When it came time to receive my $ it was no where to be found! I contacted PayPal and DEPOP and they both had no recollection of where my money could be!!!! I EVEN made sure all of my accounts were verified like they asked. Still to this day haven’t received it after months

{'id': 17910288, 'body': "Hey, we can imagine how frustrating this is and we’re currently working to resolve this issue. ", 'modified': '2020-09-16T11:34:16Z'}

title: Horrible customer support for buyers
review: This is operated like a brand new platform for buying and selling. Depop has horrible customer service. As a buyer on depop I purchased two items for them to never be delivered. When contacting depop for support there was none just referral to a link. Avoid depop try other sites like mercai or poshmark as they care more for their users. Need more customer support for users.
developerResponse: {'id': 3499472, 'body': "Hey there, sorry that two of your purchases never arrived! Being our payment provider, disputes are resolved via PayPal. Nevertheless if they've ruled on something unfairly, Depop protection exists to fill in the gaps so please do let us know the outcome of these disputes. Thanks, Team Depop", 'modified': '2018-05-17T09:48:22Z'}

title: Update BLOWS, you guys
review: Ugh. Super unimpressed with the new update. Can't move the uploaded pics around so they have to be uploaded in a specific order, which is an unnecessary inconvenience. Seller icon covers small part of the listing pictures and looks less polished. Size of text and orientation (used to be even, centered and easy on the eye) is just wonky now. I wish I hadn't updated, please fix this mess Depop!
developerResponse: {'id': 1521401, 'body': "Hey, thanks for the review and feedback. Hopefully the new brand will grow on you as it has with us. With regards to the bug related to moving images in the listing flow, we are aware, and have fixed this in v2.6 which should be available to download in the next 24hours. You may need to manually update by searching for Depop in the app store due to the way Apple's new phased rollout feature works. Thanks, Team Depop", 'modified': '2017-10-18T10:11:32Z'}

title: Account Recovery
review: Extremely complicated for me to reset password, I no longer use the email that’s associated with my phone# and you are only allowed to create an account with a new number.. After diggin into my archives of old passwords and emails I finally was able to change my password on depop....only for them to suspend my account for 24 hours. Ok...

title: Notifications glitch
review: Decent app, but it drives me crazy that the notification bubbles (the red bubble w/ #s) on the app doesn’t disappear for a while even after you’ve checked all notifications.

title: can’t even sign up
review: I’ve wanted depop for a while now, but for some reason someone has already used my phone number to make an account. I tried everything I could, but there’s nothing else that I have linked to that account. I contacted depop MONTHS ago and they still have yet to respond about this error. terrible customer service

title: “Enter Quantity” Bug
review: Love the app, but recently with updating any listing’s quantity there’s an error message that says: “Somethings not right here. Enter quantity” every time I try updating it. It’s really annoying and I end up having to make a whole new listing for a product PLEASE FIX!
developerResponse:
{'id': 19229308, 'body': "Hey there, 

Thanks for reaching out about this. We know this must be a little frustrating and our Tech team are working on a fix for our next app release. 

Thankfully there's a little workaround that will save you time: 

**If your item has no size (e.g. a jewellery listing)**
Re-list the item by copying the existing listing to a new listing. Just head to the sold item and click the 3 dots - then 'copy to a new listing'.

**If your item does have a size (e.g. clothing listing)**
Click the 3 dots - select 'edit this item' - re-select the category and size, which will then enable you to then edit the quantity.

Hope this helps! Just let us know if you need anything else,

Olivia", 'modified': '2020-11-20T00:44:47Z'}

title: ok but could be much better by doing one thing
review: Get rid of the payment through PayPal. Makes things very difficult for buyer and nearly improved to get a refund. Due to this feature it makes it very easy for sellers to screw over buyers. Just allow purchases to be made through the app itself.
developerResponse: {'id': 19042633, 'body': "Hey. Good news, we're currently looking into alternative payment methods for our users and we’re rolling out Depop payments, watch this space.\n\nTeam Depop", 'modified': '2020-11-11T12:53:46Z'}

title: Great App!!!!
review: Didn’t think it would pick up any type of traffic. Sold something the first week I’ve had this. 💪🏽🙏🏽💯🏆 now I’m making a good side hustle
developerResponse: {'id': 17421648, 'body': 'We love to see it.\n\nTeam Depop  ', 'modified': '2020-08-21T14:45:40Z'}

title: Would not recommend !!!
review: New to Depop, I made an account and connected my PayPal getting ready to make a post and a couple hours later I’m ready to post something and I noticed I’m logged out. When I try to log in it says my account has been suspended and I’m confused because I just made this account. I’ll definitely stick to other selling apps.

title: Bring back the My Sizes option!!!!
review: The My Sizes option in search was super useful and convenient. What’s the point of taking it away if you still gonna ask us to put our interests and sizes in our settings? Make it make sense!
developerResponse: {'id': 16719394, 'body': "Hey! The good news is we've fixed this bug, if you update to the latest version it should be resolved now. Team Depop", 'modified': '2020-07-18T22:50:11Z'}

title: Highly recommend
review: Depop has made it very easy for me to find cute apparel that I would have otherwise bought new 🌍

title: Updates make it worse
review: You keep updating the app but don’t fix any problems still takes me 30 min to post one items it’s so laggy and buggy I have to click 20 times and wait 5 min then it will just crash and I just finding more with each update why can’t you just fix such a simple problem
developerResponse:
{'id': 17002064, 'body': 'Hey. We can imagine how frustrating this is. Please remove cached data by going to ‘Settings - Apps - Depop - Storage - Clear Data’ on your phone. Then, completely delete and re-download the app. 
We’ll get this sorted,
Team Depop
', 'modified': '2020-07-31T10:49:44Z'}

title: Good but need improvement
review: I love depop I have been making good money and I love that I can communicate with the customer but the app need some serious improvement it is always crashing and freezing and glitching it is so inconvenient and super frustrating
developerResponse: {'id': 16866343, 'body': "Hey! The good news is we've fixed this bug, if you update to the latest version it should be resolved now. Team Depop", 'modified': '2020-07-25T17:03:03Z'}

title: Worst selling app
review: This selling app is awful. The company will not reimburse you for lost packages like poshmark and mercari would. Transaction is through paypal instead of the app so sellers are losing more than 10% and they even take away 10% of the shipping fee from sellers profit even if the buyer already paid for it. It makes no sense why they would do that.

title: It’s been a great experience.
review: The community is creative, most of the time polite, and I am always finding new Vintage inspiration. It’s helped me pay the bills a little at a time. Ace!

title: Collections are bugged
review: I really like making collections in the app. Only thing is sometimes the cover photo gets glitches when you try and change it, and so there’s no photo and you’re unable to pick one. Drives my OCD up the wall.

title: It’s not thrifting.
review: First of, I am very dissatisfied and disappointed at the prices. I saw a lot of pieces I could find at Goodwill for 3.99. I actually have some of the pieces shown for exactly 3.99. I am sorry but why on earth am I going to pay 30-80 dollars for a used regular leather handbag when I can get it elsewhere for literally pennies on the dollar. You guys need to change this up. It’s ridiculous.
developerResponse: {'id': 11912069, 'body': "Hey. There's a variety of price ranges available on Depop. We encourage you to use the Filter Option to match items to your budget.\n\nTeam Depop", 'modified': '2019-11-18T15:25:32Z'}

title: Love, Love, Love
review: This is the second thing I have bought from Ashley. It literally comes in amazing quality and her prices are SUPER reasonable. Would 10/10 recommend!!

userName: I am a buyer and seller
title: No buyer protection
review: I made a purchase, seller didn’t send item. Debop did nothing to help me get my money back, despite asking for help. They told me I had to go through paypal. The seller never set up a paypal account so I had to wait a month for my money to be refunded. Debop should require sellers to confirm they have paypal and not make the buyer do the work to get their refund. I deleted their app...ebay is much safer.
developerResponse:
{'id': 10052027, 'body': "Hey there! Sorry to hear your experience hasn't gone to plan. In order to have a Depop account, whether as a Buyer or Seller, you need to have a PayPal account linked, so there may have been another reason why you had to wait for your refund.

As long as payments were made using the BUY button in app, you would be covered by Buyer Protection: https://depophelp.zendesk.com/hc/en-gb/articles/360001827248-Buyer-Protection

Hope we can win you back,

Team Depop", 'modified': '2019-08-07T10:55:34Z'}

title: Best app ever for any type of clothings or accessories!!!
review: has so much things to choose from! especially with clothes and chains etc.. I really love this app shipping is so freaking fast and it’s just great !!!
developerResponse: {'id': 3800511, 'body': 'Thank you so much for this review! Team Depop', 'modified': '2018-06-11T15:16:51Z'}

title: terrible logic
review: They provide a way to purchase by using only your card and not signing into a paypal account, but then when someone doesn’t ship the item Depop will completely ignore you, and the only way to get your money back is by ...guess! logging into the “paypal account you purchased the item with”. So a pretty nice app if you actually get someone who sends your sh—.
developerResponse: {'id': 8111631, 'body': "Hi there, thank you for your feedback. Please know that using your card or as a guest is also covered! This is also done via PayPal so we apologise for any confusion. Head over to the support team and they're able to give you further instructions on how to do so.\n\nLove, Depop", 'modified': '2019-04-08T12:16:20Z'}

title: Slow
review: I like this app because my stuff sells fast but it’s so stupid with the fee thing and getting your account deleted just because you sold something out of the app either Bc you had a problem or the buyer with their app not being able to buy from there!
developerResponse:
{'id': 6038413, 'body': 'Hi there, 

I understand that you may believe that the Depop fee is high and believe me if we didn’t have to charge a fee we wouldn’t!

The 10% fee may seem like a lot for your sale but, when we break this down into what the fee contributes to, it makes a lot more sense. The fee is in place to keep the app up and running, with general up-keep costs and to pay all of our employees, from engineers to us in support. 

As for out of payment, this is against our T&C and has been put in placed to protect our users within the platform as none of the transaction will be covered should a situation arises. 

Love, Depop', 'modified': '2018-11-21T10:10:14Z'}

userName: Can I eat this for lunch
title: great place to shop
review:
love Depop and can make hella bank but also just a great place to find clothes
Only thing is that things can be way overpriced

title: Thankful but needs work
review: The tagging and searches aren't the most user friendly but I am grateful for this app as I have found items only vintage hunters would come across. Much love to this company and all patrons.

title: Get rid of paypal, add more diversity on explore page
review: This app used to be super fun when depop didn’t change their algorithm for the explore page. Only accounts with large followings are on there; they used to rotate it for diversity when the app wasn’t as popular. Now depop and big accounts are in cahoots together it’s annoying.
developerResponse: {'id': 2765789, 'body': "Hey there - thanks for your feedback. Our Explore page is curated in-house according to our guidelines, but we're always on the hunt for users taking great pictures and selling great items. Here are some tips for how you could be included - https://depop.zendesk.com/hc/en-gb/articles/209921837-How-do-I-get-featured-on-the-Explore-page- . We hope this helps! Team Depop", 'modified': '2018-03-07T10:18:24Z'}

title: BEST APP EVER!
review: Selling vintage clothes has never been easier and I love the selection of vintage shirts. App is laid out well and works for me. Small flaws are no big deal as they will eventually be fixed.

title: Customer review
review: I think it's a great app, easy to navigate, however wish there was a shopping cart instead of individually purchasing everything with separate shipping costs 🤷🏽‍♀️ only complaint so far, literally just made my first purchase lol.
developerResponse: {'id': 2099178, 'body': 'Hey, thank you for the review and feedback. We will definitely keep this feedback in mind for future product improvements. If you would like to send anymore thoughts on how you think the app can be improved please feel free to email productfeedback@depop.com. Thanks, Team Depop', 'modified': '2017-12-21T10:27:24Z'}

title: iLuv this site😍
review:
This site has one of a kind unique old skool stylish fashion and accessories! 
Much different than any other buy/sell platform around~
developerResponse: {'id': 17653660, 'body': 'Thank you so much for your review!\n\nTeam Depop', 'modified': '2020-09-02T15:55:32Z'}

title: Customer service is nonexistent
review: Buyers can’t leave honest feedback for their transactions out of fear of retaliation from sellers. Deepop customer service is almost nonexistent. I wrote 8 emails to them regarding one issue and received 3 the same generic responses that don’t have anything to do with the issue that I experienced. Useless people, will not shop on Deepop ever again.

{'id': 18485242, 'body': 'Hey Milg,

Sorry for the inconvenience. Please let us know the nature of the issue you are facing i.e technical, payments etc.? We can help from there.

title: Suspended Account
review: I haven’t logged onto my depop in awhile and when I tried, I found out that I was suspending for “breaching” terms of service when I clearly haven’t. I haven’t been on for at least half a year and the last email they sent to me was late June. Support team wasn’t very helpful either.

title: An Awesome App!
review: This app is awesome and perfect for finding anything especially for gifts or buying stuff for yourself and if you want to make some money this is a great way to do so!

title: Great community!
review: Great community to sell things to, and just to get rid of some old stuff you have, or even make a business!
developerResponse: {'id': 5794256, 'body': 'Great feedback! Snoopy has alway been wise like that tho.\n\nLove, Depop', 'modified': '2018-11-04T12:17:51Z'}

title: Done with this app, screw Depop.
review:
If you haven’t noticed, Depop has allowed dropshipping. Dropshippers buy cheap, poorly made items from sites like Aliexpress, Wish, etc for cheap ($2-$10) and re-sell them on this app for higher amounts of money. If you see any seller that advertises shipping that takes 2-3 weeks, that’s a dropshipper.

Depop has started suspending and removing posts making people aware of this.

title: Love the app! Making good money on it.
review: I suggest doing your own shipping if you plan to sell! Depop takes a good amount of money from the order otherwise.

title: It’s a SCAM!!!
review: Tried Depop for the first time, and the seller never shipped it and immediately after money was sent deleted account and item for sale. I’ll never use this app again. Not worth the time, stress or hassle. Creeped out by the fake seller who now has my address. Yes, we contacted your customer service and they weren’t able to help us. So frustrating! Never again!
developerResponse: {'id': 5381904, 'body': 'Can you let us know your username? We will personally have a look and reach out to the support team and see how we can help you further.\n\nLove, Depop', 'modified': '2018-10-06T13:40:20Z'}

title: More brands!!!!
review: Depop is actually very good. It’s just they need to add more brands to their list of brands. I mean Dell and Microsoft aren’t even in their list of brands. Everything else though is actually very good though so would recommend this app
developerResponse: {'id': 4754427, 'body': "Hey there - this is something we'll be regularly amending so thanks for the heads up. Team Depop", 'modified': '2018-08-21T15:45:28Z'}

title: Thrifting for the environment
review: I wish it was more organized hard to find specific items i want

title: love it!
review:
depop is a super easy app to sell your unused stuff, as well as buy vintage and thrifted things. one thing a lot of users can all agree on is that people who buy thrifted items for a max of $6 just to sell it for $40+ and call it "rare" ruin the app. 
the point of depop is to thrift online! find vintage items! 

some of those things are, yes, not cheap, but a brandy melville shirt that costed $20 should not be resold for $60.

title: Keeps crashing & glitching
review: Great to sell on, but it has been crashing a lot lately. Haven’t been able to log in for a few days now. I hope they work on this glitches since it is a good app to use!

title: Best app for selling/shopping
review:
Amazing app. Really easy to use and everyone is really kind! Customer support is super fast and they always get back within a day or two. 
I use this both for shopping and selling and let me tell you, they have the MOST reasonable fees and shipping prices of any app. 

The only annoying thing is that you can’t sort by price, but you can always negotiate.

Love, love, love, this app!

title: sellers are not protected from fraud
review:
as the title states, sellers don’t seem to be protected from fraud. 

unfortunately, i was a victim of fraud and it resulted in a loss of over $200 after the buyer claimed i never sent them their products. they then blocked me. because paypal requires confirmation that the product was received by the buyer, the matter went unresolved as they blocked me & never updated.
 i tried to resolve this so many times with both paypal and depop, sending them proof of shipment. one depop representative did not understand the issue i was having and instead blamed me for using my own shipping label, rather than one provided by depop. they said “if you can’t ship with depop, don’t ship at all”. this not only was not my issue but it was downright rude. 

i am hoping that depop will eventually implement more strict seller protection in the future. i have accepted my losses but i have to admit that i am angry about this.
developerResponse:
{'id': 18380917, 'body': "Hey there,

We’re sorry to hear your experience hasn't gone to plan. We offer Seller Protection for all items sold in-app. 
Read more about this by going to ‘Settings - Need Help’ and typing in ‘Seller Protection’.
We're here to help you,

Team Depop 

", 'modified': '2020-10-09T15:13:05Z'}

developerResponse:
{'id': 14214578, 'body': "Hey, we can imagine how frustrating this is. Please get in touch by going to 'Settings - Need help - Technical issues - I've still got an issue' and send us a report.

We’ll take it from here,
Team Depop
", 'modified': '2020-03-24T12:31:33Z'}

title: Eh
review: Not as good as grailed, fees is more than grailed, always says i have a notification when i don’t (this has been a problem for years for me). Everyone who messages you just wants to lowball.
developerResponse: {'id': 12549598, 'body': "Hey Luke. We're working on the notification issue as we speak, so stay tuned. As for our fee, this allows us to keep Depop up and running, and show our Community the items they love.\n\nTeam Depop", 'modified': '2019-12-23T15:18:50Z'}

title: Notifications
review: In the notifications box there’s nothing there but once I exit the app it says there’s notifications

title: Solid app with its own unique culture
review: Have gotten some really nifty stuff from Depop. The app itself works great too, very functional and intuitive. No complaints!
developerResponse: {'id': 6695512, 'body': 'We like no complaints, frozen yoghurts and Leprechauns. What a treat.\n\nKisses, Depop', 'modified': '2019-01-06T15:55:45Z'}

title: The user interface is horrible
review: It’s unsmooth and very much like the old instagram, it’s not fluid and makes the experience very crappy, on top of that constantly buggy most of the time I get an error tryna make purchases for items
developerResponse: {'id': 6591466, 'body': 'Hey Kevin, sorry to hear about this but thank you so much for taking some time to give us feedback. Any feedback is appreciate as it is a learning lesson to us too. Will make sure to pass this on to the team.\n\nLove, Depop', 'modified': '2018-12-28T13:41:26Z'}

title: No pictures in messages
review: There is no way for merchants and buyers to send pictures back and forth in app besides making a separate post. A camera function in messages would make transactions much smoother.
developerResponse: {'id': 7112581, 'body': "Hi there, we totally hear you. We're having a further look into this and want to make sure our users have the best experience possible. Thank you for your feedback.\n\nLove, Depop", 'modified': '2019-02-01T08:30:44Z'}

title: Good app overall
review: App is great, I love it! But, as of now there’s a problem where the buyer can’t leave a review but the seller can. Please fix this issue. Thank you.

title: No refunds
review: As a seller if you refund your buyer for whatever reason you don't get your fee back to you. For example if you sold a $50 item you pay $5 to Depop and if you refund you lose your $5. You have to really dig around to find out how to contact them and when you do you have to go through a lot of trouble just to prove it to them
developerResponse: {'id': 5757492, 'body': "We can refund you right away, promise - we are keen to do so and are working super hard to make this even easier (even... automated!) as right now we do rely on sellers to let us know if they've refunded, as PayPal refunds are on a separate platform. Watch this space as you're right, this needs to improve!", 'modified': '2018-11-01T10:30:38Z'}

title: Need to add just one more thing
review: They should add a order from least expensive to most expensive
developerResponse: {'id': 4361724, 'body': 'Thanks for the 5 stars! Team Depop', 'modified': '2018-07-23T17:24:50Z'}

title: I think i’m... IN LOVE WITH THIS APP
review: Ok so, this app is only the best thing ever, it’s Instagram for clothes, it’s awesome, I love selling stuff on this app, and buying stuff on this app. Some people say depop is overrated, but it actually isn’t, it’s really cool.
developerResponse: {'id': 3269359, 'body': 'Thank you! We really appreciate this; thank you for using us. Team Depop', 'modified': '2018-04-26T11:03:25Z'}

title: Love it
review: Live in the USA and this is the best app I've used to buy used clothing and it's way better than poshmark because the buyer can try and negotiate shipping costs too

title: DO NOT TRUST DEPOP
review: I hate this app!!! I bought two items from an active seller on a Visa card but no PayPal after 12 days of me contacting the seller and asking when it was going to be shipped she deletes her account and I email the support team. They respond but do not offer me any help, instead they told me they would look into it I never got a refund and this seller still has my money!

title: AMAZING😱 But...
review: I've Only Had Depop For About A Month And Bought A Bunch Of Amazing Things💕 My Only Complaint Is: We Should Have An Option To Sell Lower Than $1. On A Bunch Of Listings I Want To Offer $0.50 Because It’s In That Condition But Then Again, We Can’t Go Lower Than $1! I Think It’s Pretty Dumb That You Can’t Go Any Lower😑

title: We love Depop
review: We are hoping to find a home for our selling needs,it is very much looking like our best option

title: Better than Etsy
review: I am a seller from oobash and our brand has grown ever since I listed our products there ❤️
developerResponse: {'id': 16999648, 'body': 'We love to see it.\n\nTeam Depop', 'modified': '2020-07-31T09:14:19Z'}

title: CHANGE TRACKING INFO BACK
review: When I edit a listing which was sold to re-list it, it keeps saying “Something’s not right here, please enter a quantity” when I DO enter a quantity. I want to re-list my items that have been sold because I have more, but it won’t let me. I don’t want to create a whole new listing. PLEASE FIX ASAP
developerResponse:
{'id': 19329256, 'body': "Hey there,

Thanks for letting us know! I apologize you're still having trouble. If you're unable to edit the item on either your mobile or a desktop computer, I'm afraid you'll need to wait for our Tech Team to release a fix for this. 

At the moment, we are unable to provide a definite time frame but I can assure you that our Tech team are working on releasing a fix for this as soon as possible. Please be sure sure to keep an eye out for any new app updates. 

Thank you so much for being so patient and understanding on why I can't be more specific at the moment.

All the best,
Olivia", 'modified': '2020-11-24T20:58:55Z'}

title: Please Update
review: Y’all need to update the app cuz when I click on someone’s post more than half the time the page is just white and I can’t see the product.

title: Just stop
review: Y’all need to automatically turn off the free shipping I know y’all hid it at the bottom for a reason!! If I wanted to put free shipping on my items I would but I don’t it’s stupid so don’t turn it automatically on!!!
developerResponse:
{'id': 18383621, 'body': "Hey there,

Thanks for the feedback. We love hearing about what we can do to improve Depop for our Community. When you succeed, we succeed. We'll be passing this along to our Product Team.

Team Depop
", 'modified': '2020-10-09T18:27:38Z'}

title: Not Convenient for Sellers
review: My payments have not gone through, and it has been 2 weeks since the order was placed and I shipped it out. I contacted customer support, but you can’t actually talk to a representative, just look at a list of frequently asked questions. So as of now, I don’t think they will ever give me my payments from the buyer.
developerResponse:
{'id': 17909188, 'body': "Hey, our support response times are currently slightly longer due to the current pandemic, but we'll be in touch ASAP.
 
 
We're here for you,
Team Depop
", 'modified': '2020-09-16T10:18:53Z'}

title: Logo Redesign
review: Not to be that guy, but the logo is bland. The lowercase “d” just isn’t screaming “Depop” you should redesign it with a D and include something universally recognizable to represent a popping sound like the “💥” emoji. Maybe silhouette it in white along with the “D” oh, and make it capital. Put the silhouette 2/3rds the top of the curve of the “D” with the edges of the “D”spacing the silhouette.

title: Frustrated
review: I love depop. I’ve had great experience as a seller and a buyer, but suddenly, the last time I tried selling something, the shipping label wouldn’t display. Depop says I haven’t verified my paypal account, but I have. I tried reaching out to Depop 2 weeks ago and heard nothing back. There is no help line I can call and no real time customer service. Very frustrated and stuck.
developerResponse:
{'id': 17298874, 'body': "Hey, sorry about this.
 
If you can follow this link and submit a request if you're still struggling that would be great. https://depophelp.zendesk.com/hc/en-gb/articles/360046290994-I-can-t-access-my-shipping-label-USPS-MyHermes-
 
Team Depop
", 'modified': '2020-08-15T21:04:13Z'}

title: MY ACCOUNT GOT LOGGED OUT AND I CANT PURCHASE ANYTHING IT SAYS ERROR
review: MY ENTIRE CART WAS EMPTIED IM SUPER MAD I LOST A LOT OF STUFF i can’t get anywhere because everything is saying error and now i got logged out and i have no idea why i hope the things i wanted don’t get taken :/

review:
The app is wonderful and I love the set up. I haven’t ordered yet because I’m a bit concerned about how the shipping works. 
If I buy from someone, will they be able to see my address?

title: I love this app
review: Everything I expected. Great deals on all items you could possibly imagine. Totally recommend it

title: Depop is going downhill.
review: Honestly don’t waste your time, go back to Poshmark. This app and its staff have disappointed me time and time again. Accounts being suspended for putting up info or notices to users about scamming. It’s so strict now and so sad that the good users get hurt and the scammers get protected. Reporting someone doesn’t really work the way it should be working and it’s sad now.

title: It’s okay
review: Hello its not letting me post a listing and won’t let me post a picture for my profile please fix this. everything else is pretty great.
developerResponse: {'id': 8027376, 'body': "Hello cutie, let's get your profile ready to go. Please pop over a report via our in-app support Settings - Need Help? - Technical Issues and then we can get this sorted together. Keep us posted <3", 'modified': '2019-04-02T15:33:24Z'}

title: Scammed?
review: I had bought a item from Lillyybearr and after I had bought an item from her it says that her account there is a problem with and my item cant be found. I can’t figure out if I was scammed or if she deleted her page. I want my money back I spent on shoes! I spent $81 and have not got a message from the seller nor any notifications!

title: Drop shipping is disgraceful
review: “Browse the best in vintage and secondhand fashion,” what a lie. Depop’s new policy that allows drop shipping goes against everything the app used to be about: a place to buy and sell secondhand items in a sustainable and ethical way. Now depop is supporting child labor, sweatshops, deplorable working conditions, and destroying the planet. All they care about is getting their cut from the drop shipping scammers. What a disappointment.

title: Do not trust Depop
review: Wish they would fix all these bugs. It’s keeps saying I have notifications after I’ve already checked them. This needs to be fixed ASAP. I wayyyy prefer other apps but use this sometimes. If it were better and easier I’d use it more. It’s just not great
developerResponse: {'id': 8502812, 'body': 'Hi there, we hear you. Our team is working hard to get rid of this pesky bug. Please pop over a report via our in-app support Settings - Need Help? - Technical Issues and then we can get this sorted together. Keep us posted ❤️\n\nLove, Depop', 'modified': '2019-05-04T05:55:27Z'}

title: A lot of scammers
review: There is a lot of scammers on this app that just make an account just to take people’s money,  never ship. App just takes commission and lets buyers fend for themselves. Have to dispute through PP every time. App just sends an automated response “of looking into it” every time. Just have to buy and sell from and to honest people or else its a huge headache and never worth it.
developerResponse: {'id': 8502382, 'body': "Hi there, we're sorry to hear about the experience you've had with us. Our team is always investigating account behind the scene to make sure we have our community protected. This means it may take some time, but it's definitely on the list of things to tackle! As for refund process, due to the purchase having been made via PP, we can only support our users with instructions on how to get a refund as we do not have direct access to our user's personal PP account. We are however, looking to improve this in the future.\n\nLove, Depop", 'modified': '2019-05-04T03:37:04Z'}

title: SUGGESTION

review: Quick and easy place to make money especially if you're a struggling college student and ya put in the effort.

title: if you don’t care about not receiving your item, this is the app for you
review: After contacting both the seller and Depop numerous times, I still never received my item that I bought (and my card was still charged.) It’s been months and I still haven’t gotten a refund. I have never written a negative review until now. Don’t download this app.

title: Be a better company ✌🏻
review: I got suspended on this app 2 years ago for selling used makeup... I have now created a new account and finally sold my first item in forever, then they found out I created a new account on Depop. So they deleted my account again because of my mistake from 2 YEARS AGO. So that means I’m no longer allowed to sell ever again on Depop? I guess so.
developerResponse: {'id': 4515549, 'body': "Hey there - please be aware that if you're banned from the app you're not subsequently allowed to open another account. This would simply be circumventing our rules. If you would like to appeal this decision, be sure to contact our support team. They're available on support@depop.com. Team Depop", 'modified': '2018-08-03T15:49:43Z'}

title: Love the app
review: Amazing app great for buying and selling clothes while getting the fun interaction of social media. Easy to get started and super helpful tips to boot. 10/10 Wouk recommend!

title: Very poor!!
review: This app is awful! You can’t buy anything without paypal which makes it so difficult to buy things. I made an account and everything but whenever I try to log in it doesn’t let me. Now I can’t buy Any of the things I liked. Very disappointed and would recommend getting poshmark instead
developerResponse: {'id': 3074392, 'body': "Hey there! Could you let us know if you're having issues logging in to your PayPal account? If so, their Customer Service team will be best placed to help. If the issue is with connecting PayPal to your Depop then we'll be able to help. Looking forward to hearing back from you - thanks! Team Depop", 'modified': '2018-04-09T10:52:20Z'}

title: Very sketchy
review: I used this app for the first time last week and bought an item. Then the seller sent me a message saying that they will not be sending me the item I purchased. The money left my bank account and now I have to wait 30 days to get a refund. This company Depop has no customer service. It’s all through email. Very unprofessional app!!!!

title: Needs post notifications when seller posts
review: I would give 5 stars if there was an option to receive notifications when a seller posts an item

title: pretty good

Could you please email us at productfeedback@depop.com with more details about the crash you're experiencing please? When the crash happens, your device model and iOS version would be very helpful so we can track down the issue and fix it ASAP! Thanks, Team Depop", 'modified': '2018-01-18T08:55:35Z'}

title: My New Addiction
review: User friendly, aesthetically pleasing. Love the items and the prices. I’m. Makes it a little too easy to buy sustainably on my lunch break lol.

title: deleted my review.. I don't think so depop ;-)
review: Terribly unfair corporation that will delete your entire platform once you become successful for no reason at all. They decided to delete my last review. Not only that they deleted my shop saying that I had a second account just because my brother logged into his account through my phone.

title: Scam
review: The fees are a bit high, and very frustrating that it doesn’t show you how much is the shipping anymore. They’re purposely making sellers have to put an even higher price to make up for the fees. And we have to see the shipping price!!!!! Even if the listing is cheap the shipping can be expensive

title: So Bad
review: Everytime I try to make an account it gives me an error and when I try to create an account on the computer it gave me a weird password and to reset it takes so long to give me the reset password link😐. So I can’t own the app on my phone and can’t just make another account on pc cause I only got 1 phone number....

title: Team of Liars
review:
I’ve been using Depop for years and I can say with confidence that their team is full of liars. They will not help you fix an issue, in fact they will lie to your face with receipts and go back on their word.

 I would NOT recommend Depop to anyone, you are better off on other selling apps.

{'id': 18968781, 'body': "Hey Avoxes,

Thanks,

Team Depop", 'modified': '2020-11-08T19:24:34Z'}

-CATCHTHISWAVE

title: sos
review: Love this app, I use it everyday but when I input my sizes in the filter, it truly doesn’t filter it. I end up scrolling through everything & when I think i’ve found something I like, it’s not the right size posted.

title: Glitches
review: Love the app however I think they obviously favor top sellers. Would be nice to see more ways for smaller shops to gain exposure. It’s also riddled with glitches.. most annoying one is my “filter” in the search section does nothing. Cannot filter my results it’s very frustrating.

title: used to be good
review: depop used to be good and now no matter what i do the app doesn’t work. no matter how many times i update the app or my phone it only works for 10 minutes after i delete the app and redownload it AGAIN. it shouldn’t be this hard to use the app y’all are sucking
developerResponse:
{'id': 14784333, 'body': "Hey, we can imagine how frustrating this is. Please get in touch by going to 'Settings - Need help - Technical issues - I've still got an issue' and send us a report.

We’ll take it from here,
Team Depop
", 'modified': '2020-04-20T11:47:31Z'}

title: mercari is a better app to sell on
review:
1) there should be a way to filter your notifications, like to only get a notification when you have a sale, i had 300 notifications and didn’t realize i had a sale, so since i didn’t see i had a sale i didn’t open the app for like a week. 

2) you can only get paid through paypal, no direct deposit. they should really update that; my first sale depop said my paypal wasn’t verified (it had been for years) and had to contact paypal support for them to say it was an error on depop’s end. i had to forward emails from paypal saying my account was verified to depop for them to resolve the issue. 

3) you can only contact support over email and they took days to respond (for the issue mentioned above) 

overall it’s an okay selling app, i think mercari is better.
developerResponse: {'id': 13939144, 'body': "Hey. Thanks for your notification suggestion, we'll keep that in mind and pass it onto the relevant team. As for PayPal payments, we're working on something exciting here, so stay tuned. More coming soon. As for support over email, this is the quickest and most effective way for us to get back to our users.\n\nTeam Depop", 'modified': '2020-03-09T12:02:08Z'}

Still having issues? Drop us a line at support@depop.com.

We'll get this sorted,
Team Depop", 'modified': '2019-10-28T16:42:03Z'}

title: I can’t sign up...

title: Will Lose Money
review: Most orders come incomplete or never come. You will likely lose more money. Also, sellers can block you before you leave feedback. They can also leave the app after they receive the payment and never send anything. When this happens you can only send a message to the app. There is no follow up.
developerResponse: {'id': 7056375, 'body': 'Hey Alan, that does sound awful. Do not worry as all transaction made in the app are covered. So if you have any problems with your item please do rpeort this and the support team will have yur back with this.\n\nLove, Depop', 'modified': '2019-01-29T05:11:57Z'}

title: Explore page

title: Not for me
review: I’ve been scammed here about two times already... Be careful with your purchases because Depop is very bad with customer service
developerResponse: {'id': 2571974, 'body': "Hey there - sorry to read about this negative experience you've had. If you haven't done so already, please reach out to our Support team who will be able to assist and advise you in more detail. They're available via email on support@depop.com: please remember to include your Depop @username and a summary of the issue(s) you've had. Thanks! Team Depop", 'modified': '2018-02-13T12:29:13Z'}

title: Can only upload 4 photos of something
review: When you online shop you want to SEE WHAT YOURE BUYING. Four photos is NOT enough for detail pics, front and back pics, I mean come on ! Absolutely no reason to be so limited when photos are the only thing we have to base our purchases off of. Please reconsider your limited 4 photo max option.
developerResponse: {'id': 2776182, 'body': 'Hey Anna - thank you for this feedback: we hope to have some updates for you on this feature very soon! Team Depop', 'modified': '2018-03-08T11:05:18Z'}

title: Great App
review: The app is super user-friendly and I’m able to find my absolute favorite style picks. There are rare/vintage items left and right. Very happy with Depop!

title: STAY AWAY FROM APP!!!
review: Offers no buyer protection for items that come defective! You can try messaging the seller but if they don’t want to give you a refund, there’s nothing you can do about it and you have to keep the item. Never had to deal with this on other shopping platforms. Won’t be purchasing anything through here again.

title: Fun but can scam you
review: I have ordered from depop probably around 20 times and 2 of my purchases have been scams , I bought sunglasses for 60$ and a jacket for 12$ neither of them came when I contacted support it was unclear on how to get my money back. And I still don't have my money back . The app is really fun but they should definitely do something about the scammers.

title: less is more
review: ive been using depop for over a year and while i love it they need to slow down with all of these updates. some of them are just cosmetic “updates” and its very extra. i also find the more updates that they do the more the app crashes and or freezes up. it also doesnt show me all of my liked items even after i emailed them and did all the “necessary” steps to fix the problem it still never got resolved and they never responded to me.

title: Picture Failure
review: When I click on a product to view the pictures the seller listed, I won’t allow me to swipe. I’ve tried uninstalling the app from my phone and it still isn’t wrong correctly. Other then that the app has been great!

title: Fees.
review: I love the app, I really do. BUT! they take so many fees from OUR SALES. I understand they need to make money too, but taking basically out whole shipping fee is making us lose money. I’m giving this one star so more people can see. Depop please fix this, those few dollars that you’re taking from some people could really be affecting them.
developerResponse:
{'id': 18385977, 'body': "Hey Samara,

Thanks for the review. Our 10% fee allows us to keep Depop running smoothly. It contributes towards the cost of running the app, creating new features and improving our Community’s experience. 
See our article about fees by going to 'Settings - Need help' and typing in ‘What about fees’.

Team Depop
", 'modified': '2020-10-09T21:42:03Z'}

title: Address issue
review: Every time when I click on a state on domestic shipping it takes me out. Because of that issue I haven’t been able to sell stuff on the app.
developerResponse:
{'id': 18004144, 'body': "Hey, we can imagine how frustrating this is and we’re currently working to resolve this issue. Please get in touch by going to 'Settings - Need help - Technical issues - I've still got an issue' and send us a report leaving your username and details.
 
We’ll take it from here,
Team Depop
", 'modified': '2020-09-21T15:53:24Z'}

title: okay but got worse
review: i like depop and i think it’s a great way to sell things, however the layout on the new update is absolutely hideous and makes it so much harder to find things. the update is a few weeks old and changed the way the items show up when you search something. i also think they should show how much the shipping is without having to bag the item. but this is a great app i just wish these things could be fixed

title: Would recommend
review: Used this multiple times and there was no mistakes whatsoever 🥰❤️

title: Unusable
review: The app closes itself whenever I try to open it which makes it unusable. It’s the only app that does that so it’s definitely not my phone. While it worked it was fine I guess
developerResponse: {'id': 16571206, 'body': "Hey! The good news is we've fixed this bug, if you update to the latest version it should be resolved now. Team Depop", 'modified': '2020-07-12T21:48:41Z'}

title: shipping labels
review: I enjoy the app so far but i can not print the shipping labels for the things i have sold. It says that my card is verified on pay pal but on the actual app it says it’s not and it won’t let my print shipping labels. I have tried to look at the steps by steps but it won’t work and i still can’t print the shipping labels.
developerResponse:
{'id': 15595525, 'body': "Hey, sorry about this.
 
If you can follow this link and submit a request if you're still struggling that would be great. https://depophelp.zendesk.com/hc/en-gb/articles/360046290994-I-can-t-access-my-shipping-label-USPS-MyHermes-
 
Team Depop

", 'modified': '2020-05-27T09:22:56Z'}

title: New bugs?
review: Been loyal with depop for a minute but now the app won’t let you continue where you were scrolling if you look at an item. It takes you all the way back to the top. I’m going to curtsy or Poshmark if it doesn’t get fixed. And depop is one of my main income forms. Bummer
developerResponse:
{'id': 15340534, 'body': "Hey, sorry to hear about this! The good news is we've got a fix for this bug on the way. 

Stay tuned, 
Team Depop
", 'modified': '2020-05-15T12:03:39Z'}

review: i made an account a while ago and deleted the app. I tired to re-download the app again and forgot the password that i used. I clicked on “forgot password” and when i put my email in it said “could not reset password for this user” i have tried three days in a row and haven’t been able to log in yet.

title: please update
review: the app feels outdated and crashes on me all the time. I love depop and will continue to sell on here but I have so many problems please make an app for 2020, we know you have the money, can I just get a better working app. please.

title: Needs Some Work
review: The marketplace and community on Depop is fantastic, but the app could use some major tweaking.  It freezes and crashes a lot.  I’m not an app developer, and I have no clue how to fix it but maybe someone reading this does :)))))))))))))

title: Nice app. Glitches
review: This is a very cool app & I like being able to buy clothes for good prices, but sometimes it will randomly glitch without explanation. On their site, they just offer reloading the app or redownloading it instead of addressing the issue.
developerResponse:
{'id': 10538892, 'body': "Hey there! I can imagine how frustrating this must be - can you please try removing any cached data by going to your phone Settings - Apps - Depop - Storage - Clear Data and then completely delete the app and re-download this again? 

If it's still glitching, get in touch by going to 'settings - support - need help - technical issues - I've still got a problem' and either chat to us or send a report.

Let's get this sorted for you,
Team Depop", 'modified': '2019-09-05T16:48:50Z'}

title: Perfect for first time online shop owners
review: I love this app, I’ve been able to establish my vintage business here and it has helped me boost my self-esteem as a creative seller.
developerResponse: {'id': 5381932, 'body': 'The most beautiful outcome we can ever have is to empower our community. Thank you for the blessings.\n\nLove, Depop', 'modified': '2018-10-06T13:45:13Z'}

title: I just want my money back
review: Depop is hands down one of the worst selling apps out there. I'm not someone to write reviews but I never go my item shipped to me(obviously not there fault) but it has been a nightmare to get a refund!!! They make it so so difficult with automated email responses that don't help at all. Such a disappointment and would not suggest this app to anyone
developerResponse: {'id': 8680241, 'body': "Hi there, we're sorry to hear about this and that it's been a nightmare! Can you let us know your username? We can reach out to the support team and see if we've been able to give you all the support and information you need.\n\nLove, Depop", 'modified': '2019-05-15T09:07:02Z'}

title: Feedback
review: I would say make it possible to delete accounts easier I get you don’t want ppl to delete an account. Sometimes ppl might want to change there usernames but then not be able to. And then try to delete the account and make a new one. It’s just too difficult with this user interface.
developerResponse:
{'id': 5421851, 'body': 'Hi there. You should be able to delete your account by sending us a mail. Was this process not working?

1. Send an email to close@depop.com from the same email address you used to register on Depop.

2. Tell us your email and your username

Love, Depop', 'modified': '2018-10-09T11:24:33Z'}

title: It’s great
review: Love this app, really good way to make some quick cash. Everyone is always pretty open to the prices and accepting on the app. All around love it:))
developerResponse: {'id': 4768880, 'body': 'This means a lot to us - thanks for the 5 stars! Team Depop', 'modified': '2018-08-22T14:08:25Z'}

title: Lovin’ it
review: New to the the Depop platform but loving the app so far - easy to navigate, user friendly and haven’t experienced any glitches yet!

title: I use this brand all the time
review: Honestly This makes fast fashion brands less desirable and I feel better about my net waste

title: help
review: I love depop so much and i was planning to start a store, and it was working completely fine until i opened it up. I tried to look at who was following me and it won’t load. pleas help so i can build my fan base

title: Would give more stars if I could
review: Depop is beyond the best app to sell your items. I’m super happy and excited about my shop:)

title: Better than posh
review: I really like recent update of mail cost that depends on weight now, and overall good app
developerResponse: {'id': 17299206, 'body': 'Thank you so much for your review!\n\nTeam Depop', 'modified': '2020-08-15T22:01:23Z'}

title: Lack of Plus Sizes
review: I love the style of clothes that are offered on the app. what i don’t appreciate is how there are very  few options for people above a size L. if you’re plus sized, i wouldn’t recommend this app unless you’re looking for shoes or accessories.

title: Spam comments are a problem
review: I really don’t understand how this app has been around for as long as it has and still has spam comments every time I post a new listing. It’s ridiculous. Put a block on having people send phone numbers via chat. Other platforms have solved this problem.

title: Scam you on the fees beware
review: I am a depop seller... I recently made a sale and I paid depop the percentage of my earnings which was deducted from my profit. Then on my pay pal I was charged an additional $9 for "depop limited" and one of my friends got an extra fee like this labeled as "depop advertising" Seems suspicious that we both got charged unknown fees. And Customer support was no help on explaining these fees.
developerResponse:
{'id': 16267854, 'body': "Hey, thanks for the review. Our 10% fee allows us to keep Depop running smoothly. It contributes towards the cost of running the app, creating new features and improving our Community’s experience.

Team Depop

title: One issue
review: Wish there was a way to mass delete likes because items from 1 year plus are pesky to unlike one by one.

title: Sold stuff
review: I wish it got rid of the stuff that is already sold when going through the search.
developerResponse: {'id': 12969919, 'body': "Hey. Thanks for the feedback. We love hearing about what we can do to improve Depop for our Community. When you succeed, we succeed. We'll be passing this along to our Product Team.\n\nTeam Depop", 'modified': '2020-01-17T09:58:19Z'}

title: Okay if you don't need help
review: Depop is great to sell your stuff, but if you have any problems, there's no phone number to call for help, and they take too long to get back to you! I emailed them and still no answer?
developerResponse:
{'id': 12425428, 'body': "Hey. We may not have a phone number but you can always find support in-app by going to 'Settings - Need help' and searching for your issue.

We always get back to every email we receive so be sure to also check your junk folder.

We're here if you need us,
Team Depop", 'modified': '2019-12-16T15:57:46Z'}

title: Great platform
review: Fun and easy to use. Great place to start a business doing what you love. Also great to sell a few pieces you don’t need anymore.💗💗💗
developerResponse: {'id': 5904509, 'body': 'Thank you for being part of our amazing community.\n\nLove, Depop', 'modified': '2018-11-12T10:43:48Z'}

title: scammed
review: Sent a $70 pair of shoes through depop, PayPal messes up and the girl won’t pay me back. Even tho the transaction was perfectly in accordance w what depop asked me to do neither depop nor PayPal will fess up and help me.
developerResponse: {'id': 4540420, 'body': 'Hey there! Could you provide a little more context on why PayPal have decided to not give you your money back? Thanks - Team Depop', 'modified': '2018-08-06T11:45:06Z'}

title: Love it!
review: I love this app! It's very helpful to see across the world with a simple easy app like this one. I sell gently used items and cosplay items and it's the safest way!

title: Depop Shipping?!???
review: Ok so I just updated the app today and they no longer offer the option to ship with depop which is one of the major reasons why I stayed on this app!!! I could just print the tag that was automatically paid for and then drop off the package. I’m pretty upset about it honestly
developerResponse: {'id': 4361568, 'body': "Hey there! This feature on the app is most definitely still available, so we'd be interested in understanding what's happened to your Depop app. Please reach out to our Support team (support@depop.com) in order for them to investigate. Thank you - Team Depop", 'modified': '2018-07-23T17:04:23Z'}

title: Shipping prices is horrific
review: Honestly when I first found this app about two years ago I thought it was really great how I can sell any of my items that I no longer want. Unfortunately I think $4.50 for the buyer to pay shipping is absolutely ridiculous and way too much.
developerResponse: {'id': 3877313, 'body': 'Hey there! Please be aware that we charge a flat rate that is the same cost regardless of distance and is not restricted by size - we find this to be in line with many competitors. Thank you, Team Depop', 'modified': '2018-06-18T11:51:27Z'}

title: Add photos in chat
review: Please add photos in chat, my customers like to have extra specific photos of a product and i cant send them in chat, it is quite a pain.
developerResponse: {'id': 2933405, 'body': "Hey there! This is something we're aware many users would like, and whilst it's not set in our roadmap just yet we hope that the use of video listings will help solve some of these problems in the not-so-distant future. Thanks! Team Depop", 'modified': '2018-03-26T11:21:08Z'}

title: Scam
review:
I bought something from a “buyer” who ended up just being a con artist. Depop sends out an automatic email when I send in my report that says I’m protected because of how I purchased the item. I tell them my issue, they disregard it. They send out these automated emails that have nothing to do with my issue.

Response to your response: Correction : pre scripted email
developerResponse: {'id': 2776104, 'body': "Hey there - firstly, we don't send out automated emails! We have a support team here at HQ looking in to each and every issue that comes our way. Whilst we don't know your Depop @username, this sounds like a transaction dispute where we've outlined the steps for you to retrieve your money from the seller via PayPal, where the payment took place. If this isn't the case then please do reach out to us to explain. Thank you, Team Depop", 'modified': '2018-03-08T10:56:38Z'}

title: Good BUT Needs Improvements
review: Depop has been good to me as a seller! I would like for them to add the an OFFER and BUNDLE option for people whose interested in purchasing more than one item from the same store!
developerResponse: {'id': 2746591, 'body': 'Hey there - thanks for leaving this review. Expanding options for our sellers, such as through bundles is definitely something we want to work on as it will make your experience far smoother. Thank you, Team Depop', 'modified': '2018-03-05T13:31:48Z'}

title: Annoying Search
review: So I've noticed that if you search a certain word that is close to another, it will show you results of the similar word as well. This may seem helpful, but if I try to find a moose shirt, all I find are MOUSE shirts.
developerResponse: {'id': 1877342, 'body': "Hey, thanks a lot of this feedback. Our search engine handles typos and it sounds like in this instance it hasn't helped at all. We've made a tweak on the backend so your moose shirt searches shouldn't be returning mouse shirts now. Hopefully it helps. Thanks, Team Depop", 'modified': '2017-11-29T12:45:16Z'}

title: Depop
review: Yea that app is very cool. Just wish I could get more followers. But that’s a building process in itself. But thanks for reaching out and checking on me 😏

title: I love the app, hate the new design
review: I’ve had plenty of smooth transactions and I really love this platform of selling things. But this new design is just too hard on the eyes, please bring back the old design and freshen it up a bit!!

title: I can never log in
review: So I’ve had this app before it is really good but when it uninstalled I can never get back into my account or make a new one???

title: This app went absolutely downhill
review:
The customer service used to be excellent and now they straight out ignore your inquiry if they don’t want to deal with you. Don’t insult me by blaming it on COVID either in your response please. 

This app is frustrating to sell on because all of the people on here are mostly generation Z (or Zoomers if you will) who lowball you or ask to trade or as I have experienced lied to me and said that alllll the buttons just fell off when they touched the shirt they purchased from me. 

As a buyer, I’ve had more zoomers scam me and not ship the item. 

TLDR depop is EBay for a generation of entitled kids who live at home

title: Problems - fix it
review: It won’t let me sign up or login and I’ve tried every way and I’ve even tried to uninstall it and then install it again and I’ve turned my phone off and on and it won’t work.
developerResponse:
{'id': 18200905, 'body': "Hey, sorry to hear about this. If you can submit a request via this link we'll help you get onto Depop ASAP.

https://bit.ly/depopsignup

Team Depop
", 'modified': '2020-09-30T16:11:26Z'}

title: Troubles
review: I've heard that this app is very good for finding cute clothing so I decided to get it, but every time I tried to make an account it would say error, also it showed that I already had an account but sadly I don't remember what email I used for that account so lately I've been having trouble logging in and signing up.
developerResponse:
{'id': 19074604, 'body': "Hey there,

We can imagine how frustrating this must be. Sounds like your phone number is already connected to an account. Refer to this article https://depophelp.zendesk.com/hc/en-gb/articles/360001792427-My-Depop-app-isn-t-working on our Help Centre, and submit a request for support with your phone number and email address. Once we've received your report, one of the team will be back in touch via email as soon as we can and will connect you again from scratch.

We’ve got you,
Team Depop", 'modified': '2020-11-12T21:17:06Z'}

title: So problematic
review: If you have never been scammed than u r so lucky. The customer service is literally the worst customer service I’ve ever had to contact. It’s dollskill level of bad. Unless u want the chance of being stolen from don’t even use Depop they will not help u they don’t care about you. This is coming from a Depop user for over 3 years:)
developerResponse:
{'id': 18549130, 'body': "Hey Kyky,

We’re sorry to hear your experience hasn't gone to plan. We offer Buyer Protection for all items purchased in-app using the ‘BUY’ button. 

Read more in-app about what to do next by going to ‘Settings - Need help’ and typing in ‘Buyer Protection’.

We're here to help you,
Team Depop 
", 'modified': '2020-10-18T18:10:42Z'}

title: They are not good at calculating
review: Their shipping is not cheap and when you try to do your own shipping, they charge you on that too. On top of that, their customer support is non existent.  Finally, they only use PayPal to process payments which I am not a big fan of. Overall, not that good of an app.

title: Very upset
review: This app is fine occasionally for sellers but the fees are absurd, there is always some new glitch, and now they have it set where if you don’t pay very close attention you as a seller could end up paying for shipping without even meaning to. Very sneaky. I lost out on a large amount of money because of this. Beware sellers

title: saving to collections
review: i really wish there was a way to save already liked posts into collections. like a separate button for adding things to collections that doesn't only appear after liking a post. similar to how it works on instagram. i want to save things into collections but i'd have to go unlike and relike everything. thanks.

title: A few changes
review:
Please make it to where sold items move to the bottom of your page on their own! No one needs to see them anyways lol

Make it to where you can type coupon/ discount codes into the new cart feature!

Add a shop rules/ policies/ description tab to each shop.

Add more tab features so you can add sections to a shop such as “art” “clothes” “accessories” “shoes” ect to keep
