review: Love the concept. The overall flea market type aesthetic is exactly what I love, and very friendly sellers overall. A bit of an Instagram clone in the layout but it's familiar. Just have your wits about you as it is hardly moderated, so look out for bootlegs and such. As long as you're wise you can barter your way into some nice deals or rare items.

title: Fabulous!!~
review: This has become my new way to shop. I love scrolling through and finding name brand stuff at half the cost it would be on the original site. There is also vintage and retro goodies I love to shop for as well. So far I have bought three items off of here I have been very pleased with my purchases.

title: Fun/easy but glitchy
review: I really love Depop and have already sold and bought 2 items. The only problem I have with the app is that whenever I receive feedback from a buyer or seller the app keeps the notification and won't go away after I've already clicked and viewed the reviews. It's really annoying seeing that notification ... but that's about it

title: Great, but needs more
review: Honestly love this app! I find my self looking for stuff everyday now, but there are a lot of things that can make the experience better. If you can add a size tab to the filter just to look for a certain size, and not have to look through picture only to be let down that it's not your size. Besides that it is an amazing app!

title: Great items but bad customer service
review: I love this app and have almost 100 reviews from how much I have sold. Unfortunately one unfair review can wreck your rating. I have contacted depop about the unfair review and they still haven't taken it down. If they had really looked into it I know they would have seen that it was a false review.
developerResponse: {'id': 1209053, 'body': 'Hey, thanks for the feedback. Could you please send through your username, and details about the review you feel is unfair, to productfeedback@depop.com so we can take another look into this for you? Thanks, Team Depop', 'modified': '2017-09-07T17:38:15Z'}

title: LocalHipster Depop Strong!
review: I just want to say that this app is on top of their marketing game and site layout! Super easy to navigate around the app and easy to explore cool things. I have used this app for a few months now and I've made tons passive income. Download this hip app and get yourself some cool cameras or vintage clothing! the profile LocalHipster on depop is awesome ! Check it out guys!

title: Fantastic
review: I have SO many things I needed to sell. A ton of clothes and old toys. I sold on eBay but the fees were ridiculous. I started this just to try it out and I've sold over $1000. It's like a job for me now. I have boxes of old stuff from when I was a kid that we kept and I have sold almost everything. I absolutely love this app.

title: Randomly charges your PayPal and awful customer service
review:
There are a lot of great clothes being sold on this site but the company Depop itself is a joke. As other reviewers have mentioned, their customer service is unresponsive and unhelpful. I contacted them because I didn't receive my shipping label after my buyer had paid and never got a respond and my buyer was not pleased either. 
Depop will also charge your PayPal account an arbitrary amount at random with zero explanation. I'm really not pleased with my experience. If you're going to use this app, watch out.

title: The Best App For Selling & Buying
review: Depop is hands down the best App to Sell & buy on. They make it very easy to list items and to communicate with customers, Seems like all the other Selling & Buying Apps are very complicated & Hard to use but depop definitely Designed and made the best one around. Also I've found some hidden gems.

title: One of the best apps for selling online
review:
I search for everything supreme and sometimes other sites don't have what I'm looking for.

This app is easy to use and lets you reorganize pictures easily, update shipping options whenever, and creates a community for people to follow and like each other's posts.

title: Depop
review:
This is an amazing app I really like to see an improvement on. They should really give an update to how the looks like and I really to see a feature that you can get a notification when a seller puts something new in their market that would be lovely. I think depop will work on it soon. 

Hope to see an amazing update soon! 

Yours truly, one of the many who loves your app

title: It's cool
review: Honestly love the app but then again I'm fairly new. But I do have some cool recommendations thus giving it a 4 stars. I totally wish that I could look at items or people depending of the location.  It would make things so much easier for me and I think for several people. Other than that I kinda like the layout and how similar it is to instagram. It feels comfortable!

title: Update hurts my eyes
review:
Edit: Due to the most recent update the app will not open (always crashes) and as a seller this frustrates me VERY much.

The latest update has created too much confusion. The color and text design are hard to understand/focus on. I constantly am told I have a unchecked notification when I DONT, very annoying and confusing.

It's also very annoying that as a seller you're told to purchase tracking, but then there's no place to insert a tracking number?

title: High fees and no customer service
review: Beware of buying, sellers are not held responsible for shipping fast. Most sellers take 4-5 days to ship, which would never happen on eBay or other selling apps. Selling is not the best either. By selling on Depop, you have about a 14% fee (10% from the app and about 4% from PayPal). So essentially the same amount of fees as EBay with none of the same perks. Sellers do not have to "relist" items so you will find items that you are interested in buying but they will no longer be available even though they still show up.

title: Very slow app development
review: The app is still full of UIbugs from many updates ago. Depop is aware of these but doesn't bother to fix them (for instance, if a sale turns it to be fraudulent before feedback is left, the notification to leave feedback never disappears for the buyer and nothing can be done about). When the app came out, it was the Instagram for selling, but now the app feels like the Instagram from 3y ago for selling.

title: love depop but new update has some probs
review:
now when i go to look at a buyer's shipping address to package their item it is 9 times out of 10 an incomplete address on the receipt. please fix this. the state is no longer on the address i find this to be a little annoying. i hate having to message the buyer each time about their address. 
i also prefer being able to see the state that an item is listed in instead of just its city/town...
also there is no way to make the feedback notifications go away, as other reviewers have stated. 
everything looks amazing other than this💞💞💞

title: Great app for selling and buying
review: I have no complaints when it comes to using this app. I love the layout of it, and the explore page is nice to look at too. It's easy to use in my opinion and even though selling can seem a little discouraging at times, it gets easier and it just starts to flow.

title: Great Buying and Selling App
review: Depop really is super awesome and user friendly! You have to be careful about the people you buy off but usually it's all good. Recently they started deactivating items of sellers that have been inactive on Depop which is perfect. But I wish there was more company interaction when things g south. Other than that 10/10!

title: LOVE DEPOP
review: I love this app SO much. It's so easy to sell and buy because it's set up like an app we're all familiar with - Instagram. The people of Depop are so nice and are ALWAYS willing to help and answer your questions. Great app to use if your thinking about cleaning out your closet and making extra money or if you're trying some of the most unique pieces of clothing!

title: I love this app🎀☁️💸
review: This app is super easy to use! I can easily search for brands and sizes! It's fun and I've already made some good money. Ship items or meet in person. You can even swap which is a great way to refresh your wardrobe for cheap. You can even find really nice designer brands. Truly enjoy this app and I use it daily. Highly recommend.

title: A great community!
review: Depop has really become a place for me and my friends to become our own business owners! I've gotten the chance to join a community of buyers and sellers, share info on trends and make some cash all at once. Super convenient way to sell my things since it uses PayPal. I recommend the app to all my friends.

title: Great app!
review: You know how you look at old pictures and think to yourself, "Where did that top go?!" I've done it too many times. Now I can just go on Depop, search for it, find it most of the time and at a fraction of the price. I've only been a buyer but looking forward to selling a few things. A few glitches here and there but nothing too bad.

title: horrible customer service
review: I've been using depop for years and I've never had any problems with it until now. I sold 2 items and I never received the payment for them. The order info said the payment was sent and the buyers confirmed the money left their accounts but nothing showed up in my PayPal, and I have no record of it. I emailed depop and they were no help. I'm so disappointed because I've lost so much money and there's no way to get it because depop isn't offering a solution. I wouldn't recommend this app to anyone.

title: Awesome App
review: I've always enjoyed Depop and the selling process. Recently, however, I'm noticing loading issues with some of the other users profiles. When I try to view someone's page, sometimes it just won't load. My app is currently up to date. Other than that, the search feature is cool, and the explore page is also useful.

title: Such rad items!💖👌
review: This is the only review I have ever done for any app. It is very easy to use and everyone on it is so nice and helpful. I love being able to interact directly with the sellers, as well as being able to narrow down my searches with size, type, etc. I recommend Depop to anyone! Have fun and enjoy your shopping!

title: SERIOUSLY love this app!
review: This app makes it so easy to sell clothes and accessories. The social feature is an amazing aspect that many online market places are missing. As long as you follow all of the Depop selling rules, it is nearly impossible to be scammed. I've never had anybody even try to scam me. The Depop team is amazing and they make selling fun and simple!

title: if you are going to buy online dont buy here
review: ive made more than one purchase and two of them are complete hoaxes. one seller said the money wasnt popping up in her paypal so she couldnt ship. and a week later she deletes her depop account and depop has nothing to show for it. another seller said they sent two weeks ago but it still hasnt come in and they also said there was no tracking number. sellers were also not communicating when you asked what is going on. BUYeR BEWARE!!!! DO NOT DOWNLOAD this app. do not waste your money on items that will never come in

title: Depop is the way to go
review: This app is extremely easy to use and is simply convenient. Its like a combination of instagram and ebay so I have a feel of what it is and I can find what I'm looking for in a quick second. This app is the best and I recommend it to anybody trying to sell or looking to buy or just browse.

title: Horrible app for selling
review: Not a fan at all.  I put items on here to sell but all they get are lots of likes. That is the most ridiculous thing for an app that is suppose to be for selling and buying items.  Why are people even on here scrolling through liking items or not without the intention to purchase?  Are you here to buy stuff or not? If your just on here liking stuff go to Instagram or Facebook. Stop trying to make this a social network.  We're trying to sell our stuff not get likes.  Deleting for sure

title: Great opportunities!!!!
review: I've really enjoyed this app so far and don't have any complaints. I've had a few issues which were resolved instantly once I contact their support team!! Quick to respond and really nice!! It's been really fun and easy to use!! Definitely recommend for buying, trading or selling!!

title: Great app to buy cheap stuff
review:
I have been using this app for over a year now and I love how easy it is to buy stuff on it. I have only bought four things, but they are all wonderful and I love them. 
I would totally recommend giving it a try. 
You'd be surprised as to what you could find in it

title: Unsatisfied
review: Very disappointed with how the app has been continuing! It is much easier for sellers to scam buyers now. I have emailed customer service on multiple occasions, and have received no response regarding my hard earn money which has been STOLEN from me. As a seller I also am not fond of everyone on this app wanting dirt cheap prices, which is NOT realistic. It costs money to ship items and sometimes it can be pricey if the item is heavy... all in all the app use to be different and I still will continue to use. It isn't the same as before.

title: The app never sends me notifications
review: I've used this app for a while now and it's really hard to keep up with sales and everything because it never sends push notifications, it's been a really big issue with some of my customers, and I've sent things out late because of it... I really love this app but I might have to look for another one because it doesn't work properly

title: Great app!
review: Love this app, joined because I saw several established bloggers selling. I've sold and bought and have had all good experiences so far. Everyone says Poshmark is better because they provide shipping labels, but it's really not that hard to do it yourself. The app is very simple to use and you can find some real gems for a reasonable price.

title: Such a great community
review: Completely safe if you do it right. Bought a couple lovely "one-of-a-kind" things from friendly sellers in and out of the U.S. Sold some things as well. This app is great for thrifting whether you are a buyer or seller in the thrifting community, yet as the app gets bigger scammers are becoming more and more  abundant

title: Alright
review: Definitely needs a few bugs worked out. Depop is still a great app with a lot of unique finds that you won't find on other apps. However I recently bought an item and have yet to receive it. I reached out to Depop's customer service and they weren't much of any help. I likely will stop using the app because I can't stand that you HAVE to go through Paypal, whose customer service is also terrible

title: Love it but quick suggestion
review: Love this app it's real easy to use and I've met a lot of super nice people despite the few scammers, but I wish we could edit the position of the items in our shop from the app like you can on the computer. It would make things soooo much easier.

title: BEWARE
review: Ok so if you are trying to sell something and someone comments something about being interested in buying and gives you there email to further discuss...or just gives you an email most likely they are going to tell you some story and A-want to pick it up from you house B- want to pay in check so they will need you address C- ask for your number. They also offer extra so you keep it for them DO NOT SELL TO THEM no matter how good the offer is!

title: Bugs!
review: I like the app and the whole concept behind it. I found trustworthy sellers and have bought from them a few times. The second I tried to list something though the app stopped working. Nothing is loading, and the item fails to list and there is no draft that saves if there is an error, so I have to start over each time. I restarted my phone and even downloaded the upgrade for the app, but it still doesn't work.

title: Great concept, few bugs
review: Really cool idea, easy to use as both a buyer and a seller. My app has a few bugs that are fixed just by force closing and then refreshing a few times but that can get annoying. I wish there was a better way to find more people to follow based on interests or something but I really love this app and I'm on it constantly!

title: Best App out there!!
review: Definitely the best app out there! It's safe and secure. Easy to navigate. People are sweet and kind. Well organized. Highly recommend. The only downfall of the seller fees. It's less than $2 when someone makes a purchase. If they got rid of that (and they sometimes do for holidays and special occasions), it'd be the best app ever!

title: No insurance really?
review: This website is horrible. Unlike Poshmark they don't have insurance straight thru the app. On poshmark they don't release you the money until the person has received the product as described . Which is amazing! Nobody gets ripped off they hold the money for 3 days unless someone reports a problem. I ordered from Depop and still haven't received my item and the person got the money it's been over a month and I have to despute this with PayPal not them. What a joke.

title: FOR THRIFTERS/ODDBALLS!
review: As someone who loves to save every cent they can on products (esp. makeup) and who doesn't mind buying secondhand, this app is phenomenal. Such rare finds and bargains can be found on here that I haven't been able to find anywhere else.I've bought over 10 times and have only been treated wrongly by a seller once. Be cautious and use PayPal just in case for refund purposes and this app is great!

title: Spam City
review:
Aesthetically the app is pretty cool, and that's about as far as it goes. Outrageous spam. I have no idea how they haven't got control of this yet. If I weren't an intelligent seller I would've been scammed several times simply from illegitimate buyers trying to screw me. Customer support is below mediocre. All payment complaints must be handled and managed through PayPal because again, customer service is mediocre. 
I do love their popular page and how they offer advice to sellers on listing items.

title: Love
review: Overall I love this app I so many things and I enjoyed very much but yesterday I logged out of my account so my friend can log into hers and when I try to log back in to mine, it did not let me .my Wi-Fi is very strong so it can't be that .I know my password and my email and it still does not let me.

title: Great app for selling your stuff
review: Been working amazingly for selling my old band merch and clothes that don't fit me anymore. Love the interface and the ease which you can post items. Have been recommending this to friends since I started using it last month. Keep up the good work!

title: Love
review: I adore depop, super easy platform to buy and sell...I am having an issue when trying to sell via my iPad, none of the pictures are showing up til after I select them as one of my four, meaning they are just white squares. I don't know if this is an issue with my iPad, or the app itself.

title: Practically Perfect
review: One sad thing: buying multiple things, like a checkout cart, isn't an option currently so shipping fees get a little high if you're buying many items at a time. However buyers often offer bundles which is nice. This is really the only thing I could find difficult but everything else is quite wonderful. Superb.

title: Great app!!!
review: It's a really good app to buy and sell things, and it's pretty easy to find what you're looking for. The atmosphere is very friendly and it seems to always be completely safe. There are always things to be improved but I've had a wonderful experience so far.

title: My favorite!
review:
I've been buying/selling on Depop for a few months now and I love it for the most part. The Instagram-like layout makes it very fun and easy to use; way better than mercari and/or poshmark.

I only wish the fees weren't so high. Also, the app almost always crashes when I click on an item in the 'sold' tab. Super annoying, please fix!

title: Why
review:
First of all I do like to use this app because 
the selection is good and it's basically like shopping on instagram but honestly for the amount they charge sellers it's garbage. The new logo and font looks awful and it get's buggier with every update. I can't go 15 minutes max without it crashing and that's with minimal activity. Please just fix it already for gods sake so that I can shop in peace, with how much money they make I've never seen something get so steadily worse.

title: Obsessed!
review: This app is basically Instagram but for shopping. Super fun and easy to use! I haven't had any problems with anyone on depop. All the spam messages from fake accounts are pretty annoying, but depop is very quick to response and are always deleting them when reported.

title: No no no
review: Depop is a great app but this update is awful!!! The new app logo that appears on your home screen is ugly, and so is the new font. I especially do not like the new placement of the sold sign on items; it is over to the right and I don't think it is that noticeable when looking at an item. Also I don't like the new layout of the app and where things are, it is completely different making things confusing! Overall I think this update detracts from the experience of selling and buying on the app.

title: I love depop
review: I use depop for most of my shopping needs its a great app that allows you to buy products from sellers such as clothing,makeup,jewelry all kinds of stuff and the depop team is very helpful and if you have any questions regarding your purchase they will email you back right away with a helpful response.

title: Please Make It Possible to Buy On The Web
review: Please make it possible to buy from a computer. Having to order off the app gets tiring. Having a computer purchase option would be wonderful. It would be five stars if it had that, and if it showed you what was sold out of your likes. Thanks Garage and Depop team, please do it!

title: Eh
review: I sell and buy on depop. They are not strict enough with people who rip off others. I bought something that never came and they refused to shut down the persons account even after they had 3 complaints. Yet they come after people (generally ones who make complaints to them) for items they don't approve of. Such as lipstick and perfume or any cosmetics. Don't be fooled into buying their wallet. Use PayPal to be sure to get your money back if someone has a fake account.

title: Best selling app
review: I prefer this app over poshmark and vinted. There are no rules on photographs, you chose your own shipping, and the variety of merchandise is great. Also, they take less selling fees. I just wish more people would be active! I like this one the best but I have the least amount of activity compared to Posh and vinted.

title: SIZE MATTERS
review: Okay for such a nice app, it's literally a more unique and personal experience of ebay; it's missing one of the essential parts to a shopping app.  I appreciate that I can search by key words or types of things like jewelry or shoes, BUT. The size button to allow you to filter by size, DOES NOT WORK. It's there mind you, but will not let you use it. Since a majority of girls are smaller than me- I'm not obese or anything just on the larger scale, for instance I'm about a 10 in shoes- it would be nice to use this feature before getting my hopes up. Please fix.

title: Has potential, needs work....
review: This app is slow ! I've tried using 3 different networks including wifi and cellular data. Also frustrating that you can't filter newly posted items. For example I only want to view men's items..can't do that. You can filter suggestions on who to follow. Mildly helpful if you want to see specific items fitting selected criteria. Want to love it. Make it better !

title: Great App if you Look past the icon
review: I have recently fallen in love with this app. It's much easier and quicker than EBay and also looks similar to Instagram and displays photos great. The only fault is that they still display items that have already been sold in the "explore" area, and it's mostly the same people and items constantly.

title: Posting without price
review: I like the app a lot but I think there needs to be a feature to allow sellers to post without adding a price to it. Say they want to explain their ship policies, they always have to attach an $1,000,000,000 price tag to make sure no one accidentally buys it. I just think there's probably an easy solution to fix that.

title: Sellers are irresponsible.
review: I really liked Depop but so many sellers are irresponsible... I made about 10 purchase and two items hasn't arrived and I'm no longer able to contact sellers (even though I was talking with them before the purchases) I know it's not the problem from Depop company but the refund process is a little hard and it takes time... I really liked this app but had some bad experiences and probably not going to buy things anymore.

title: A few big things to work on...
review: Would rate 5 if only you could save credit/debit card info when purchasing( that's a big one)!! And filter searches by size and commonly used search, please upgrade/advance the searching! Also advanced ways to detect and shut down scammers. Other than that great app, always on it :)

title: The update?!
review: What happened? It's like a total re-do of the app. It was way better before, I'm sorry to say. There is something about this new update that just makes the design seem "bulky" and distracting. It was much cleaner before. The whole point is to make it efficient for everyone, but the entire design/fonts/style that this app was changed to is just awful. Please, please either change it back or come up with a simple Squarespace- like theme.

title: 5/5 stars
review: I have bought about 5 things from others on Depop, and have been completely happy with the items. Not only the other users you buy things from, but the support team is awesome! They totally support and help with anything, and are great. Keep it up!!

title: Love this app. Great for selling.
review:
Love using depop. Love the Depop team and how friendly and supportive everyone is, especially when you need help. I also love that through my items I'm able to express and explore my creativity.
They make selling your items easy and fun.
Much better than Poshmark.

title: Nonexistent customer support
review: I started using this app about eight months ago. I was finding awesome stuff and bought quite a few things. Then I had a problem with a transaction. Luckily it wasn't too much of a loss, but a user refused to refund my purchase when it got lost in the mail and after no less than six messages to customer support over a span of almost two months I have deleted my account. Nothing was ever resolved, but I continued to get promotional emails the whole time- very disappointing.

title: It's a decent app
review: This is a pretty convenient way to sell some of your goods that you no longer need. I know there's a lot of scammers out there, but depop really does try there best to help you out. I want to see a bit more variety on the popular page, not just the same listings that are posted cause I see the same posts on there for weeeeeks! Good app in general

title: Awesome, but def has bugs the developers need to address
review: I wish it would stop showing items that are sold and also I can not sell anything because the location setting does NOT work :/ while I have bought a few things and had great experiences, I really wish I could start selling my stuff too.

title: Not seeing notifications
review: Ive been using for a while has been good so far maybe like 5 days in and im seeing notifications across my home screen teling me that someone has messaged me or commented on my stuff but when i go to the app i cannot see anything or what the person liked or commented on ,this is probably going to cause me to lose sales now i wonder what the issue could be?!?

title: Great app, but still has a lot of tech issues
review: As a seller, unable to leave reviews for buyers. Buyers reporting they are unable to leave a review for me, the seller. This means so currently have no stars and zero reviews, which greatly hinders my ability to sell items on this app. Not to mention the super annoying "item sold" notification that never ever goes away bc of the lack of reviews. Please fix this ASAP

title: The best app marketplace!
review: I've been using this app for about 2 months and it is the most user-friendly marketplace I've yet to find. The staff are friendly and they're quick to reply to any issues. They definitely have your back as both a buyer and a seller!

title: I bought a $300 purse for $75
review: Love this app, many fair deals on here but you're going to have to search for them. Also depends on the sellers. The layout is similar to Instagram so it's very easy to understand. All in all you just have to research the sellers reviews & check for deals through the hashtags.

title: Friendly service and satisfaction
review: I have only used depop recently and I have purchased a few items from different sellers and each time I received my product I was very satisfied. The conversations are legit the people are legit and they really do what they say they are going to do

title: I'm in love.
review: I downloaded this app last night because I wanted to have another selling platform (I was using poshmark as well) and within just 24 hours I've already sold 3 things! So happy! The transaction process is very easy and I love the instagram themed layout! I'm obsessed with this app. 😁💕

title: Pretty Sick, Not Even Lyin Bruh
review: Love it, lots of rules and regulations and tips meant to ensure buyer and seller safety!  Fair prices and easy to manage things I like, want to buy, want to sell, etc. Very chill and easy to use. I have recommended this app to other shop-aholic friends and they love it just as much as I do 😎👉🏻👉🏻. Peace on the streets, I'm out, my dudes!

title: took out the good things..?
review: they took out the activity feed for some good reason that nobody knows. Also they took out the category search so you can't look at (for example) all men's shoes, size 10.5, which is the way where i found most of the things i purchased. also it's just glitchy, and he notifications are broken. and when i asked them why they did this, they emailed me back, "we removed this feature because we're looking towards the long term goals of depop"

title: Great App
review: Great app to sell clothes... only improvement I'd suggest is they add the 5% fee to the buyer's fee like Vinted does and improve the photo upload system. It would be nice to be able to upload pictures from my library without having to crop them, & have 5 photos for items versus only 4. Otherwise, nice selection of clothes!

title: Fix the problem and it's 5 stars
review: Really easy app for me to sell on only problem I've personally had is now whenever I try posting something if the description isn't super short it won't show up at all as if I posted it, get it fixed

title: This App is Super easy but..
review: I would have to say I love this app and rate it a 5 for overall easiness and content but I do wish Depop had a contact number (for US and UK) to call for the sellers and as well as the customers. But overall the rules and instructions are self explanatory. It's a growing community I'm glad I'm with!

title: 2 Problems
review: Great app, but two problems. In the explore category, I want there to be new pictures from new stores! It's annoying how the same pictures even after refreshing so many times I get pictures that I recognize from the other day. Then there's the stores that are scamming people. I want there to be a way to block the stores and remove it or prevent it.

title: Love it
review: This is becoming my primary way of purchasing most accessories. Although I think a lot of people are selling stolen items. Things brand new with tags that cost thousands being posted back to back makes you wonder why they are selling it

title: New update is total garbage
review: Including shipping costs in the displayed price for an item is a terrible idea, as it's confusing and off putting to customers. We've been selling items every day consistently for a while now and today is the first day we haven't sold anything. The font change was stupid and unnecessary. Let's make everything harder to read! I mean aren't the developers losing money as a result of this? No need to change something that's already working fine.

title: New Update
review: I love this app, I really do but the new update is absolutely terrible. It crashed pretty frequently before but, my God, I can't browse for more than 2 mins now before it crashes. If I see an item I like and I click on the seller to view their profile? Crash! Any little thing makes this crash and it's awful. Maybe fix the bugs you had before instead of doing a facelift that frankly no one asked for and is so much less aesthetically appealing than the previous layout.

title: Easy to use
review: Hi love the simplicity of this app!! I can upload a picture write a description in just a few moments and its up for sale. The only problem I do have is with my pictures, I can't seem to understand how to get whole shot instead of cropping. Thumbs up!

title: Awful
review: This app is incredibly awful. I try to comment and message my buyers/sellers but it never lets me. I can't even like things or do anything but observe. I've had so many people ask me questions and I am unable to respond because of this buggy and poorly made platform. Please fix this as soon as possible. This isn't a joke. This is actual money being handled and the fact that you'd seen this issue as trifling is sad. FIX IT. Once I get things resolved with my buyers I will be deleting the app.

title: Great, lots of potential to grow 💕
review: I love the idea of this app, and all experiences I've had so far have been good experiences. I find that people are very easy to communicate with and with common sense it can be a very safe place to buy lightly used goodies. Like a combination of the best parts of Instagram, Etsy, eBay, and Pinterest 💕

title: The best selling app there is!
review: I've tried several selling apps as a seller and buyer and I found Depop to be the best community, style, energy and layout. Like Instagram but you can buy things. People really emphasize great photos and creativity. You'll never shop the old way again!

title: Love depop!
review: Depop is great because it puts sellers and buyers in the same space, unlike etsy and eBay. You can comment, chat, like and buy items through Instagram style interactions. Sometimes it's just fun to browse like any other social media site. So easy to set up a shop and really curate your pieces.

title: Obsessed
review: Love this app! There are still a few bugs they need to work out in their messaging but overall it's a great app, user friendly, and I like simplicity of it. I opened up an account to sell stuff, and I do,  but like any shopaholic I end up buying more things. I love it!

title: Where's the support??
review: I've messaged depop support team numerous times. I even messaged a girl that worked for depop, issues regarding a seller finessing me. They failed to respond to me even though I sent a dozen emails looking for help. The community manager even said she would personally forward it to the support team. Which I doubt she did. I had to resolve the situation through via PayPal. Like does depop even have a support team? Give me a sign of you exist. This app has more potential tbh.

title: lOVE
review: I love this app! Great to sell art and clothes I don't wear! Only reason I'm giving four stars is because I feel like this app should have an age limit or at least only let you if you have a debit card/PayPal. I hate having kids on here trying to just talk to me and not be able to buy anything. But otherwise the depop is my obsession❤️

title: Love love love
review: Great app to find good quality items for cheap. Purchased several items and none have let me down. The people selling their items have style and tlc for what they have up and this app is just so much better than other swapping apps I've tried.

title: I love Depop!
review: I've been using Depop for around a month now, and I love it! It's amazing for so many kinds of people- whether you're cleaning out your closet or trying to start your own business, Depop is perfect. Efficient, easy, safe, and stable, Depop is the best selling/ shopping app I've found yet. Thank you Depop! ❤

title: Cool app
review: I haven't experienced any problems with the app other than people don't buy your stuff as quickly and frequently as they do on some other apps. I've bought so many cool things on this app but after reading some of the reviews on here I may be more careful purchasing from here on out.

title: Best app ever!
review: If you are looking for some vintage and new pieces, look no further! I have purchased over 10 items through Depop and have loved each one! The people are genuine and the app is easy to use. I especially like Depop because all of the pieces I receive are one of a kind!

you know what, this app is amazing. aside from making sales and buying some fun and unique things, it's a community. met some friends and customers come into our brick and mortar store and we've made some great connections that way. AND ON TOP OF THAT! depop is caring, donating all of their fees to a good cause, etc etc. ❤️

title: Yes!
review: I love love love absolutely love this app but the only thing is when you're deep on depop and you go check something else on your phone and go back on depop you loose your spot and you have to find or start all over again. Please please fix this, it's super annoying.

title: App performance has declined
review: I've been selling for over a year and it's a great app but lately it hasn't been running well. Crashes constantly upon startup or when loading certain pages, freezes/lags a lot. Also, the app could use some more features to help sellers organize their stores and be more visible. Aside from having its faults, it's a good selling app.

title: Nice finds
review: The everything I've bought so far was brand new or in great condition, it's like heaven's version of goodwill. You just have to find the right sellers and there's so many people on depop, you're bound to find a page of someone with your same style and interest.

title: Great app
review: I essentially do all of my re-selling of vintage clothing through here. The app is fantastic & everyone is always kind. The communication between buyer & seller is great for the most part & product always comes relatively quickly. I would recommend to any friend

title: good app, but the new update could be better
review: overall the app works well for me. it's quite simple to use and very easy to navigate. personally, i find that the old update looked a bit better, but the app still functions perfectly so I don't find it that bad. the lay out is nice, so i can't complain.

title: Refreshing!
review: Through this app, you can effortlessly dig through items that range from styles from the past to today's trends! I highly recommend this for those items that seem untraceable. it's here more often than not!

title: Edit filter needs work
review: I have things that I like which haven't been sold that do not show up when I use the edit filter. I'm not sure if the update removed them from the search. When I narrow my search for boots or blouse I only get 10 items from the U.S. and before I would get 20 or more.

title: SO much fun
review: I absolutely LOVE Depop. When I first started out, I tried Mercari and Poshmark, but Depop's user interface and overall experience was so clean and, simply put, pretty. Its interface puts more emphasis on each item and people really put time and effort into their shops. I'm a little obsessed with this app.

title: Safe, Quick, Easy to use
review: Superb people behind this app who really care about their customers. The site should do more advertising in the US especially since a new app has been advertising quite a bit on tv more and more.

title: Great app!
review: I love this app over other selling apps. Almost everyone on the app is sweet and understanding but there are those who do try to scam. Update the explore page, the same items are on it constantly and it's nice to see different stores. I'd also like to send pictures over messages. Proof of shipping is cluttering my shop!

title: great concept, great app
review: slow and buggy. for example, I can't upload any photos (it keeps telling me that it failed) and none of my notifications are updating. needs an update. also, it would be nice to send proof of postage in private message so I don't have to worry about users seeing the buyer's info

title: I love depop but..
review: I still can't leave any reviews for sellers that use the in-app shipping. Supposedly the new update was going to fix that and it didn't. Just to clarify, when a seller uses in-app shipping, the buyer cannot leave a review unless the item has been delivered. In my case, the item never was so I therefore cannot leave a review!

title: "All items" search removed
review: I love this app but I'm giving it one star because they removed the option to search "all items". Now you can only search by keyword. The all items search was super useful because it showed every recent item posted without having to look for keywords, and that's how I found most of the things I ended up buying. But now it's gone. Please bring it back, or atleast a way to find every new item posted at once!

title: Mmm...
review: It's a great app! I just don't like how it doesn't update. For example, it says I have 1 unread private message and I check but I don't have any. Also, it says to leave feedback for the things I've already left feedback for. It's a little annoying to have the numbers on the bottom right corner saying I need to leave feedback or have an unread message. PLEASE FIX THAT ):

title: Best selling app EVER!
review: I'm addicted to this app it's so easy to sell on it & also I find lots of lovely things to buy for great prices. Makes me so happy ❤️ it does get annoying sometimes when the app freezes and takes long to load but I still love this app regardless .

title: Nothing but great experiences!!!!!
review: I absolutely LOVE this app!!!!! I've had wonderful experiences on here both as a seller and a buyer. So many great people you get to interact with :) It has a few minor glitches every now and then but those get taken care of right away with updates to the app. Love love love Depop ☺️☺️☺️☺️

title: Radtsstic
review:
Very easy to use. 
Good tutorials. 
Made the explore page quickly boosting my views and hopefully sales. Seams much better the etsy in my opinion. Could use more specific categories I.E. " fine art " " fine art prints" " original art work". Ect but aside from that I'm loving it.

title: Good in Idea, Poor in Practice
review: Loved the idea and the set-up. Found and bookmarked many things I really enjoyed. The people on it were very flexible and worked with me. As I went to make my first purchases though, it denied every credit and debit card I had even though after checking with banks, there is no reason why that should have happened. I am extremely disappointed, and frankly, a bit angry. I had really wanted to buy these things, and now the app will not let me.

title: Love depop
review: Use it all the time, and I feel safe using it. Great experience and customer support/community! Would recommend it over any other app! Get the price you deserve and want rather than have to deal with less from other resale communities!

title: Keeps getting better!
review: I've been on buying and selling on Depop for over 2 years now. The community continues to grow and there are so many great finds from around the world.  Great customer service if you ever have an issue with a transaction.

title: Update's new look is terrible.
review: I'm not one to complain about any aesthetic interface changes because I get used to it but the design is so harsh it hurts my eyes. Can't use it. Also some weird glitches where it doesn't always mark the item as sold once it's bought. Very misleading and bad for business especially when the users here are very sensitive and have low tolerance for disputing any technical errors.

title: Mobile thrifting
review: Feels like a mobile thrift store. Check the reviews on a seller before buying. Some have better reps than others. Ensure it is easy to get a hold of the seller before trusting them with a sale. Most sellers are kind and helpful. The app lets you know if the seller is inactive which can be helpful as well.

title: Great, but lacking.
review: Used to love it. I still like it. Business has been slow and the same users are featured all the time. I would still recommend the app. I think the developers should add features like: 'mark as shipped' and provide a space that such an important part of a transaction.

title: Deleted item saying it "violated" guidelines.
review: I've had a decent experience with depop however this morning they randomly decided that a bodysuit I had listed violated their guidelines. It was unworn, in perfect condition, matched the description and was not a replica of any kind. This is extremely frustrating because once an item is deleted by depop, you can no longer re-post and the effort that goes into the listing is wasted. I emailed depop about the incident, but this has definitely been an irritating situation.

title: I love depop but
review: The issues when you go to buy with a credit card and it says it cant be done right now needs to be fixed. I could try paying for something 100 times and it still wont allow me to pay. It becomes very frustrating

title: Favorite App
review: I really love this app, I have made many sales! The only suggestion would be that a notification sound when you get a message or something(: other than that I recommend everyone to buy this app!!

title: MAKE A LOCATION FILTER!
review: I love using depop to sell and have made quite a lot off it, but me and several other users agree that it's SO frustrating not having a location/currency filter during search or explore. It makes it so much harder to find items that you can easily buy. Please do this and I'd give the app 5 stars. Many people have been requesting this.

title: DISREGARD OTHER COMMENTS PLEASE
review: honestly most of my favorite clothing items as well as the phone im using to leave this review are from depop sellers , ive had nothing but glowingly positive experiences w the site !! its an a1 place for streetwear resell or to find thrifted finds w/o actually getting up ! its literally the hipster ebay and i 20/20 recommend

title: Love it but spam accounts
review: I love this app. Haven't had a bad experience with it. The only thing I have to complain about is spam accounts. Accounts saying to message them because they're interested in my item? If there were a way to reduce this the app would be way more enjoyable

title: Fix this.
review: Well, I've only had this app for a couple of weeks, but I keep getting error messages saying "operation could not be complete" or "oops try again later" I tried restarting my phone, restating the app, and even logged out and deleted it! Now, it won't even let me log back in since all it says is "operation could not be complete try again later" it's honestly very annoying.

title: General Review
review: As with all updates, it'll take some getting used to. I do prefer the previous format though. I would be nice to be able to scroll through a seller's page Instagram style, rather than selecting photo by photo. Love the app

title: Safe , Easy and Friendly
review: Depop is by far the best way to sell items you don't want anymore. The people on this website are friendly and don't scam you like on eBay. The layout of this app is also very organized and I just love this app!

title: I love this app
review: This is a great app I buy and sell a lot on this app and so far it has been very successful to me. I have found everything I have been looking for and selling my items has been made very easy I recommend this app to everyone

title: TERRIBLE customer service
review: I purchased two things off this website and neither items ever came. I tried to reach out to customer service for help since my money was stolen but I received no help. I am absolutely furious. It's been several months and I have never gotten my money back, even after the numerous emails and complaints. So basically there is rampant scammers on this app and be very hesitant before you purchase something. Especially if it's worth a lot of money.

title: dang diddly awesome
review: I've had the best experiences on Depop. Staff is very interactive within the community. Easy to use and reasonable fees; I've been a depoper for a year and can't recommend it enough. Sometimes the private messages are glitchy but it looks like they keep improving. Keep it up Depop!

title: Unique app~
review:
Things sell so quickly on this application~ you will find many unique small businesses and great deals on clothing, home, and random items. This place inspires and excites. I totally dig this app and I recommend it to everyone I talk to. 

Just check it out.

title: Depop user for 2 years now
review: Love this app!!! I have some problems with a few users and some users on this app are a bit rude but I always tend to block and ignore them. But other than that I will keep selling on this app and everyone else is so sweet 💕💕💕

title: Love this app
review: I love this app, but when someone tries to buy from me it says I don't accept immediate payment,I have my PayPal set up and it's not working. I don't know how to fix this problem. I have purchased some beautiful things I just wish there was a way to fix this so I can sell my stuff! Very frustrated!

title: Very sketchy!
review: Well, first of all, depop uses paypal. Paypal is already sketchy by itself. Then, the person you're buyin from gets the money as soon as your purchase your item. So there really isn't a guarantee that you'll even get your item. Depop charged my paypal for insufficient funds, which ended me in the negatives with my bank account. $98 i owed to my bank. really disappointed. mercari is the better choice when it comes to resell apps.

title: Great but help!
review: I love this app so much and it works perfectly, but please fix the recent bug where it doesn't allow you to see your feedback or get rid of the "you have new feedback" in purchased / sold items

title: This site is my attention!!!
review: Wow, I'm so in love with the overall of this site, it allows you to not only get paid the same day of purchase but, allows you to charge your shipping cost as well...truly this is one awesome site to sell and buy on.

title: Loveeeee it
review: I love this app , it's really simple & self explanatory. It's a better way to shop considering what you're looking for will most likely be there. My only complaint is the placement of the options , I end up clicking back just by the placing of my fingers .

title: The only thing I would add..
review: Absolutely LOVE this app. The only thing I would love to see added, is if we could turn on push notifications for our favorite shops to know when they upload something new! That would be amazing :)

title: Love love love 💕
review: As long as you keep in contact with the seller, and don't attempt to meet up or go outside of the app, you have buyers protection so keep that in mind! Selections are fantastic, and your explore page represents your recent likes so it's personalized to you! 10/10 ✨

title: Selling is so much fun!
review: I love 💙 depop for many reasons. Depop is like tumblr except Im able to literally buy or sell anything ! Ive worked with ebay and honestly depop is much more easier and a faster way to sell if you plan on selling things like vintage clothing and shoes😄 depop all the way

title: Problems with New Update
review: Love the app overall! But since I've updated, I'm getting my notifications on new likes/followers on my lockscreen but when I go into my notifications on the app there's nothing there. I've refreshed my notifications and made sure I'm on wifi but nothing is loading, it's stuck on likes/follows from days ago.

❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️
LOVE Depop!  It's so easy to list items to sell.  So many great items available to buy from all over the world!  I am so happy being a seller on Depop, since it's fun to get creative with listings and Depop only takes a small percent on items AFTER they've sold.  ❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️

title: Love Depop!
review: Depop is an easy way to sell clothes, and it's safe. The only down fall is the fee to sell through Depop, and PayPal. Which adds up over time. But it's the price you gotta pay I guess to be safe! Better than having to meet up with someone.

title: Super helpful
review: Favorite selling site. While they take 10%, they do a lot when. It comes to bug support, promotion and community organizing. No fees to keep items listed so you can make as many listings as you want. They allow up to 4 pictures and has my favorite layout of descriptions.

title: Well...
review: I love DEPOP with all of my heart. Believe me. But the app is always crashing on me and I've been having a harder time finding things I'd like now that the search button is gone in the explore tab. I asked a friend to go and like things she'd like for Christmas, but then the app updated and the search button was gone, so she couldn't find anything she liked.

title: It's an okay app
review: It crashes a lot while you're posting pictures of items, sometimes photos don't load, it closes out when you're scrolling through feeds, & people can easily steal your money from you. As far as I can tell depop doesn't really have much security & they haven't really acted on handling scammers. Other than that it's decent.

title: Love it but...
review: I love this app, but it crashes all the time even with the new update. Will freeze my phone too. Also, wish there was a feature to scroll down someone's shop page viewing each piece (like instagram). Other than the issues, amazing.
developerResponse: {'id': 1085459, 'body': "Hey there, thanks so much for your review and feedback. So we can get to the bottom of the crash you're experiencing it would be really helpful to know what you were doing prior to the app crashing, and the device you're using (e.g. iPhone 7) and the iOS version Feel free to get in touch with us at productfeedback@depop.com. Many thanks, Team Depop", 'modified': '2017-08-23T12:15:22Z'}

title: Great!
review: Love this app. Great way to make a little money on the side while getting rid of things that you not might want any more that's taking up space! I just did the update right now so it's a little weird, but I'm sure I'll get used to it.

title: Great!!! But...
review: Depop is a smart and easy way to buy and sell things, but please watch out for scammers! Always check someone's ratings and there quality of there pictures. Other than that I've had great experiences using this app!

title: Inconvenient
review: I have been waiting for a guy to send me a $200 belt for over a week. the day i decide to go request a refund, that app suddenly cannot load any of the items i purchased when i have been buying things through depop for over a year. I reached out to to depop a few days before this and they told me i had to wait a specific day amount. now the day has come and i suddenly cannot access my purchase list to get my refund. FRUSTRATING.

title: big problems
review:
for a professional business app there are too many loopholes around the few regulations they provide. everything that makes this app work has been implemented by its patrons. every sort of proof paypal needs to settle disputes is not provided by depop. they need to: 

1. add an IN APP feature to keep PERMANENT proof of tracking info.
2. you should not be able to delete reviews 
3. sellers should be able to set up their own terms of agreement that buyers have to agree to before buying from them
4. fix the "sold" notif glitch
5. secure the validity of addresses since people can leave out states, zip codes, and cities and it still be sent to the seller
if they are going to take such a high fee their app and customer service should be much more sufficient.

title: Huge bug with sold out items
review: Sold out items are not listed as sold out when searching for items. You have to go to seller page to be able to tell. Super annoying and a huge cocktease. Also 4 pictures is a not nearly enough. There's so much vintage clothes on here that you need at least 8 to see all the flaws. Unless you want people filing claims and making returns because a flaw was not pictured. Fix this and it's a 5 star app.

title: Thrift shopping on Mobile
review: Granted I haven't bought much using the app; the things I have bought have been great! They're in the condition they described and the pictures don't lie(for the most part). It's an amazing app. It's like thrift shopping on your phone!

title: Update Problem
review: I'm having the same issue as Alyssa Godinez. I'm getting notifications off the app of users liking my items and following me, but when I open the app, it shows I have no new notifications. I can't see if anyone has messaged me, and I really need to be able to so that I can make sure my buyer knows what's going on with her package.

title: I love this app!
review: I can hardly put down my phone after finding this app! It has he most diverse style of clothing which is just what I'm looking for, and it's not necessarily used clothing. I hope to open a shop of my own soon, thank you depop.

title: Great app BUT...
review: I love this app it's very addicting and a fun place to sell your things! I had no problem with it until this update because NONE of my items show up when I search the keywords I use in my descriptions?? Please fix this!!!

title: 3.5 with update
review: Have been really in love with the app -- its interface, and how easy it is to navigate but with the current update with the change in font it's very difficult to read. I find the letters to be too spaced out to read and the font is something that take a bit to get use to. I miss the older version font.

title: App Malfunctions
review: Every time I purchase, the notification for the item will not go away. Even if the seller has given me a review and all that jazz. & also i feel like SOLD should be on an item that is sold instead of going to message the seller and it's been sold days ago.

title: Amazing way to buy and sell
review: I absolutely love Depop! It's such an easy way to buy and sell products. It's easy to navigate and super simply to put things up for sale, and even easier to purchase items! ❤️ I am a huge fan!

title: Depop review
review: I think depop is a fantastic app but I wish they would weed out the already purchased items on the explore page. I see so many cute things on there but then I look and they've already been purchased. If that fixed that then I would give the app 5 starts

title: Some fixes needed :)
review: Depop is a great app for buying or selling and i'm lucky to have only dealt with very kind people. there's just some bugs that i'd really liked fixed; most bugs with leaving feedback on some items!! it won't let me leave feedback on some bought items and it's really annoying. otherwise SUCH a great app
developerResponse: {'id': 986419, 'body': "Hi Dhaleyj, thanks for the feedback and review. We're pleased to hear you like the app and feel part of the community! Sorry for the inconvenience you have experienced with some transactions. We are aware of an issue where users in the US cannot leave each other feedback if the USPS shipping label, generated in the app, wasn't used by the seller. We aim to fix this in one of our upcoming app releases so hopefully this won't be an issue for you in the future. Thanks, Team Depop", 'modified': '2017-08-10T12:29:19Z'}

userName: Do do do do do do... DO!!!!!!
title: New Update
review: I LOVE this app! The only things I must complain about now is that it can be confusing to navigate the app but mostly because I was used to the old model. Also, for some reason it does not show the full message if someone sends me one. I recently bought a pair of shorts and the seller sent me "Hi! Just shipped out your shorts. Should be with you soon x ❤️" but I only could see "Hi! Just shipped out your shorts." Please fix this!!!

title: Fab app for sellers and creators 💕
review: I've never really used any other selling app but the format of it is super user friendly ~anyone can easily post something in a matter of minutes. The Depop community is also wonderfully positive and the staff is dedicated to help ya sell your bits and bobs. Love!

title: It was perfect until I updated
review: This app was great until I updated now when I ship out an item I don't know how to leave a review so I can't get a review back it makes me print out a shipping label (which I don't want to do I do that at the post office) then after that it just says awaiting shipping

title: Super addicting shopping site
review: Fairly simple to use and fun to look stuff up and find at reasonable prices. They put up new search filters so you can look up specific items in the size you want.

title: Depop is great ! But...
review: I love the app because I can buy a lot of things for cheap! Just one thing.... Sometimes on private message when u try to send a message to someone the message doesn't work sometimes but other from that the all is perfect I don't get way a lot of people hate it ... I LUV IT

title: Obsessed
review: I love this app. It's so bright and user friendly. I prefer it over Poshmark. I gave 4⭐️ because I think it would be even better if you could tag people or brands in the pictures just like Instagram and have mini videos to upload! I can't wait to see how this APP grows and evolves 💕

title: My favorite app for selling clothes
review: I've tried them all from eBay to Poshmark to Etsy . It's clean & easy to use, artistic, & the community is great. The best app for people with shopping addictions ! I love depop <3 the only negative is that the app does crash quite a bit but it's improving . :)

title: Honest review
review: Great app for selling and buying. As a seller it took awhile to get attraction to my page and buyers but after awhile they start slowly coming in. Never really had much of a problem so far. Great selection with a lot users

title: Absolutely love, but...
review: There needs to be a way to search for items in a specific country. I'm from the US and when I want to find other people in the US while searching for items, it's almost impossible. The near me function is just useless.

title: Really awesome but has lots of scammers
review: I love this app a lot and it's great for buying and selling. It's so easy to navigate everything and the only thing that is slightly annoying is that there are a LOT of scammers on this website trying to scam you.

title: Great selling APP but the scams are annoying
review: I really like selling on Depop, but they really need to do something about the scammers asking to hold the item & offering $50 more & giving an email address to contact them etc .... Getting. Really. Old!

title: Ugly Update - Hard To Navigate Now
review: I had to get on to write my first review of an app ever. Is there a way to go back to the old depop interface? I absolutely HATE the aesthetic and new way the interface uses. I much much MUCH prefer the old one and really wish I hadn't updated to this. Seriously considering closing my shop as I can't get used to the new changes and horrid eyesore of the red buy button, yellow sold, and ugly, blocky text. Bring back the old depop!! It was FINE how it was!
developerResponse: {'id': 1030747, 'body': 'Hello, thanks for your message and feedback. Sorry to hear that you feel this way about the app! Could you send a message to support@depop.com telling us what you think we could improve? Thanks', 'modified': '2017-08-16T15:45:27Z'}

title: Useful and simple
review: It's a very easy app to use. If I'm ever looking for a piece of clothing to finish an outfit I come here. It's simple to use and buys rate sellers based on experience so you know who to buy from. I've never had any trouble with anything. Everyone is very nice

title: White-handed notifications
review: Every time I receive a follower on this app I am greeted with a pair of white hands following my new friend. This is in no way inclusive & is slightly offensive to people of color. I think the skin tones used and promoted should depict the diversity of this app's users.

title: Good app but
review: I love this app so much butttt 2 things. When searching for items, the size filter will never let me use it. Also, I think users would find items easier if there were a page showing items similar to the user's likes.

title: Problems with some sellers
review: I bought 5 items and only two of them were ok. One pair of pants I got came with their zipper shredded and smelling really bad. I talked to the seller who said she knew nothing about it and responded to my review about her in Depop in a impolite manner. Plus, this hat I bought came with a stain right in the front and no notice about it. There was also this shirt that  took so long to be shipped. So, for me Depop is not too reliable.

title: Good
review: Great app, really connects everyone nicely. Has a really homey feel to it which I LOVE . Only flaw is that it crashes sometimes and that sometimes it'll show you that you have notification and messages but then when you go to look at them, they don't show up:/

title: Depop takes part of your profits!
review: Depop seemed cool at first, but it turns out they're hella whack. First off, if they're going to take a percentage of your earnings they should put that in the app's description instead of right when you're about to sell something. Secondly, they also fail to tell you that PayPal takes a portion of your profits too. So I sold a pair of shoes for $67, but ended up only getting $47 out of it. What up with that? I wouldn't recommend this app for selling.
developerResponse: {'id': 1085606, 'body': 'Hey, thanks for the review and feedback. Apologies you haven\'t had the best experience and the fees weren\'t clear to you before selling. Details of the fees are accessible when listing an item by tapping on the link "Learn about getting paid and our fees". Depop take a 10% fee on the total price of items that sell and there is also a PayPal transaction fee, which in the United States is 2.9% + $0.30. For the item you sold at $67 you should have ended up with $58. If you are able to send through your username and details about the transaction to productfeedback@depop.com we will look into it for you. Many thanks, Team Depop', 'modified': '2017-08-23T12:39:15Z'}

title: Good but...
review: Needs a better system of weeding out scammers and making sure people are using their own personal photos of the items. And also to lower that selling fee, no wonder most people try to get their money through PayPal friends &family.

title: Did not receive my item
review: I ordered two different items from two different sellers. One which showed up to my house and was a fake even though the seller "showed me proof" of the item being real. And the second one never showed up. She told me she sent it and that she would send me the tracking number and she never did. Be very careful on this app. You can't relieve a refund if you use PayPal friends and family either. Fair warning 😡🚫

title: Great app
review: Had it for about a month now and sold a few things that I would've got nothing for at my local consignment. I would've gave 5 stars if the app didn't freeze/close on me so often. That's my only issue, but I'm sure they'll fix that bug soon.

title: I love DePop!
review: DePop has amazing deals! It's super easy to navigate everything and search for tags. I've never had any trouble uploading my own things with pictures, sizes, and a description. The app itself runs very smoothly, too.

title: Fees... 👎🏼
review:
One other reviewer says that Depops fees are less than etsy..? I don't see how... 

I mean, correct me if I'm wrong but Depop takes 10% AND then Paypal takes 3.4% per transaction... Etsy only charges 3.4% + .20¢ to list. Even if there is a Paypal charge of 3.4% for Etsy too..it seems like Etsy is still better...? They are at least not taking an entire 10% of my item..idk.

title: Fun and interesting way to shop for cool and interesting clothes from cool and interesting sellers!
review: Like Instagram for shopping, this app is simple and easy to buy items and follow your favorite sellers by the click of a button. Fast, responsive, and simple.

title: Addicting
review: Easily a must have app for thrifters and online shopper. There's a lot of everything you could think of. Really easy to shop and communicate with buyers. I find myself on it so much it's almost dangerous. The app is addicting.

title: Needs more functionality
review: Pretty good and easy to use as far as selling. I'd really love to be able to search for clothes and shoes based on size. Or to find people who are similar in size to follow. The profile options could be expanded to show where people live (city/state/country), size and maybe even some keywords on their style.

title: Great app but can be improved
review: I appreciate that the app is international but there should be a way to make it so that you can only search nearby and international sellers. Yeah there's an around me feature, but it only shows sellers in your state. It should show sellers in your whole country at least

title: Like the app- Sorting by size
review: Love the app and have found a good couple of items through it. Wish you could sort all items by size. Instead, you have to make a specific search and then sort the search by a size.

title: Update
review: The Depop app just recently updated, and myself along with my friends can no longer open the apps on our phones, because it immediately crashes. I haven't used the app on my phone since this update. The friends I have, who can open the app, have their apps crash within the first couple minutes. The app is very buggy and slow.  Even purchases we've tried to make haven't gone through.

title: thank you!!!
review: they fixed the bug where you couldn't delete certain saved items. Love it now thank you!! really great app to shop for things on! I'd recommend it to anyone I know!

title: Depop
review: Depop is an amazing app. I definitely recommend it to anybody. I know online shopping can be kind of risky but not with Depop. People on Depop are so kind and they describe anything and everything about the item so you know if it is for you. I love Depop I hope you do too.

title: Great for sellers
review: The app is easy to use and great for sellers! However, there aren't any buyer protections, so please be careful and look for reputable salespeople. Rule of thumb, don't buy used makeup or anything that could potentially be tainted. Ask for "try ons" when buying clothes so you can see how the item fits and if the seller really owns it.

title: Yaas Depop
review: I personally love depop. It has given me a platform to easily sell and buy. Idk why everyone's complaining about the new design?? Who cares. It looks fine. Period. I haven't had any problems with glitches and the app is still great❗️ 👍🏾

title: Scammers
review: This app is such a great idea but there are lots of scammers and people who lie about what they are selling. This forces you to ask so many questions about the item that you are buying and you may not get the correct answers anyway. When an issue arises, the support team is unwilling to address the issue. Even if a user sells you something and the item is not as described, the support team will do nothing about it. So, use this app at your own risk.

title: Nothing sells!!!
review: I really like this app it's easy to use and the idea is great. But only people who are already internet famous sell stuff I've been on here for a month or two now constantly adding things and I have yet to sell anything. Honestly don't waste your time and go back to eBay, where I sold my first item in a week.

title: Never Got My Money. Don't Use This App.
review: I sold a necklace on this app and according to the instructions, PayPal was the only payment method they deemed safe and took responsibility for. This being said, I used PayPal and never got my money. Only a deduction from the app for using it. I emailed them many times and reported the problem several times on the app and no feedback. THIS APP IS A SCAM, DO NOT DOWNLOAD. Unless you wanna pay to give away your stuff, because that's what I ended up having to do.

title: Love; sometimes buggy
review:
I've sold and purchased a lot of items through this app and have never had any issues. I'm always recommending it to friends! :)
Sometimes the app gets a little buggy but it's never interfered with my transactions.

title: I really love it
review: It's an easy dynamic app, and you can get a lot of inspiration from it. O've been using it for only few months, but I've already sold quite a few items. I really recommend it!

title: You're almost cancelled...
review: Unless you meet a certain aesthetic, aka "terrible fashion" and "vintage", you won't make many sales. You feature the same ppl on the explore page 24/7. There needs to be a better system implemented to ensure that sellers ship within a certain timeframe rather than leaving it upon the buyers to report them and having the sellers get all pissy. So called buyer protection is garbage. Giving you one star is even too much.

title: My liked items
review: I would love to receive notifications when the price of my liked items change.

title: It's great
review: I think there should be an option where you can put notifications on when certain people you follow post new things to their shop!

title: Great place to sell vintage gems!
review: I love Depop! Excellent, easy platform to use. I love selling items, the app makes it so easy to sell and ship out items. Way easier and better than etsy, eBay or the other apps out there.

title: I LOVE YOU DEPOP 💕💕💕💕
review: This app has helped me launch not only a business but a career. I started using this app as a hobby & now can happily say it's my full time job. Depop has an amazing team & is super easy for a newby. I'm in love with this app & I truly don't know what I'd do without it. Thank you Depop 🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥

title: Great and easy app
review: I love this app. I don't feel fleeced by the app's commission and am satisfied with how easy it is to use. I feel once there are a lot more active sellers and buyers this will be the premium option in mobile listing platforms.

title: Deleted my account one day after I made it
review: I wish I could give this zero stars. The terrible staff deleted my account one day after I created it and I had listed nothing for sale at the time.

title: Favorite app ever! 💌
review: Honestly I've bought half of my closet off of this app. It is 100% trustworthy and as long as you communicate well with the seller you have a great new item for a super cheap price. Selling is really easy to do; I just love this app so much! 🌹

title: The Best Community Ever !!! 😃👏🏾
review:
DEPOP is a fun way to shop! Buy, sell, and share one of kind items. It has allowed me to build my own community of buyers. Selling is as easy as making a pie. Everything can be done with a single click!

DEPOP has changed my life is so many ways...I feel a sense of purpose when I am able to give people a piece of wardrobe that carries great memories of my life. It's a great feeling to put a smile on someone else's face 😃! 

DEPOP is in fact the best of all social media worlds ! 

👕👚👖👔👗👙👘💄💋👞👟👢👡👠👒🎒👝👛👜💼👓🕶💍🌂🎮🎨📷📱💻💰📚🎸

title: Heavy user 💉💸
review: I use depop alot to buy and sell its definitely a great and easy to use app for buying or selling when you just want to get rid of something. There are glitches every once in awhile that can be frustrating but over all a good experience.

title: Great app !!
review: It's a very straight forward app, even gives you step by step on how to make sales.. the depop team gets a hold on you to help your business.. would recommend most definitely

title: Good but needs work.
review: Does not refund you if you're scammed. You have to go through PayPal and it'll take several weeks-months. Fees are too high. Lots of users are scammers so be careful. You will sell things eventually but needs more users.  I'll stick with ebay for low! Searching could use more options like categories.

title: Good app but
review: I don't like how they make you connect to PayPal. My paypal account has gotten hacked so many times no matter how many times I change the passwords. I've had so many issues with them so they're just unreliable. Thus, I wish there was another way to securely add a card/bank account without the use of PayPal. Too sketchy.

title: Bad updates
review: I like to use the app but it seems every time there's an update it become more and more awkward to navigate. The fonts get harder to read, the color scheme gets worse and it takes multiple taps to get a button to work a lot of times. It overall functions much slower for any uses every time there's an "update" for my experience.

title: great, but...
review: it's very organized and user-friendly but it always crashes on me when I use the app for more than 10 minutes. I've also been having problems with my depop app not connecting to my wifi recently.

title: I love the app, but the update....
review: Its an amazing app if your interested in selling and buying interesting products! But the update makes the app look not as creative and open as it once was. The new layout and the color scheme is just so unappealing. Because of this, I feel as though items don't look as good as they ought to.

title: Love
review: This is probably my favorite app ever. It's so easy to use and now I can actually do things without having to say I have no money. I've made so much more on this app compared to any other selling app. It's a must have

title: Easy to get scammed
review: I liked depop because of the unique items i found but their system is awful. Ive been scammed twice and all they do is suspend the sellers account. But they dont reimburse you. Which is ridiculous because youd think theyd figure out a safe way to that. Like vinted for example. On vinted you cant withdraw the money until the tracked shipping label has confirmed its been recieved. On depop you send the money and thats that. You either get it or you dont

title: Pretty good, could be better
review: When searching for a specific item, I wish you could scroll between posts instead of having to back out of every single individual sale

title: Love it!
review: Im New to Depop and am practically obsessed. I check it as easily as social media and always fall in love with something new when I do. Everyone is very respectful and I've never had an inconvenience when purchasing or selling. A yes from me!

title: Undecided
