review: Love the seller offerings. So unique and creative. I deleted the app previously because I didn't get the help I needed with a slow to ship item from a seller. Back because of the other great sellers. Giving it another go!

title: Love. Just wish for one thing!
review: I love the app. It's so easy to use and set up with PayPal. I just wish that I could add multiple pictures at once! I love how many filters you can put on it to find exactly what you want!

title: Italian depop team really bad!!!
review:
The italian team block my account "couse i can not have two accounts" but this is not true, it was the only one and i was new (downloaded from 1 week more or less) 
I just bought an used iphone for the first time to use some app like this one, make some good deal and have fun but they block me and they are so rude and ungently.
Please reactive my account, i loved your app and i'll change my review. Account name ginger_cristina

title: Rating Depop
review: Everyone should buy on this app, such an easy and accessible way to interact and sell to customers. There's nothing complicated about it, and I have met amazing people along the way 10/10!!

title: Thumbs up
review: Depop is basically an online easily accessible and stylish thrift shop. Cool current and vintage gems can be found for cheap prices and offers can even be haggled. Entire processes of buying and selling are beyond easy, too.

title: Best app for selling things
review: Depop has a great community of buyers, sellers, and support staff. So far my fav app to use for selling things!! I also like gives you flexibility for shipping so you are not stuck to one or two options. 10/10 🌸🌸

title: I love Depop 💜
review: Depop is probably the best app for buying/selling. The community is great and friendly overall. I would recommend this app to anyone that needs to sell items they no longer need and to anyone that's looking to thrift!

title: best selling/buying app
review: I have made so much money using depop! not to mention I have found some amazing items everywhere from vintage books/records-top brand clothing. I would recommend depop to everyone of all ages/genders.

title: Love this app
review:
Not only have I bought some great stuff, I've been able to easily and safely sell a lot of stuff!! It's easy and you get to
keep more money than you do when you sell to beacons / buffalo exchange!

title: Awesome app
review: I've purchased a plethora of items through here. I actually just bought some lightly used chacos for $45! Always great quality stuff, quick shipping, nice people! I recommend it to all my friends.

title: Amazing and easy!
review: I love this app! I've had no troubles with scammers either. I've bought a few things so far and I received them in a descent time. I'm very happy with this app and I'm going to be using it for a long while!

title: Please allow us to post links to our stores
review: Please correct me if there already is this feature, but I would love to be able to have a link that I can post on Instagram and Facebook that would link to my store. Thanks

title: BEST SELLIN APP
review: I've been using depop for a little over a week and have been able to make $2,000 from selling my old clothes. It's super easy, intuitive it's like IG, eBay, together. No other selling app compares to Depop. It's not gender oriented, or brand based it's open to whomever!

title: Amazing app
review: I would totally recommend this app if you tend to have clothes that you don't wear on a regular basis and you don't necessarily want anymore. Also this app if great if you want a little more change in your pocket:)

title: Favorite App
review: Honestly I scroll through this all day looking at clothes. I've been able to find some of my favorite pieces through here, and I've recommended others to try it!

title: Help Depop!
review: Overall new layout is exceptional! Navigating through the app is fun and I enjoy the app! My ONLY request is fixing the multiple crashes that I've experienced. Whenever I open the app and click on a profile it automatically shuts out. Please help!

title: Whack Update
review: Depop takes a chuck of your profits which makes it almost not worth it. eBay has more foot traffic. The explore page is filled with "famous" sellers sold items and never changes. The hash tags NEVER show up, so it's hard to sell your items. Even if your hashtags are very specific and identify your products perfectly... they really need to clean this app up.

title: Awesome
review: Literally no complaints. I just wish we could add photos into the private messages for bundles or pictures of shipping receipts. And to have the option to post photos in our reviews. That's it really. Love the app!

title: Pretty useful, but could use some help
review: The app could use a "Sort by price" filter. Also, about a week ago, my app stopped functioning completely. I can open the app, but nothing shows up on my home page, can't access my profile, can search, but can't like or buy anything.

title: Great App!
review: I sell and buy on this app all the time! Absolutely love how easy it is to conduct sales and purchases through this app, especially compared to others. Really wish this app had a bigger audience and the explore page was more diverse. Overall great app though.

title: Depop
review: Not a fan of the look of the new update or the fact that I can never get on the homepage anymore :p lol but as for usual I love the concept and design of the app and the creators make it an incredibly safe place to buy from.

title: Cool app
review: Love this app. Definitely would recommend to people looking for cheaper clothes, even though sometimes people sell things for wayyy too much. (Calling something vintage doesn't mean it has to be $50) Just not crazy about the new update.

title: Apple Pay and Explore Feed Algorithm
review:
The feed algorithm often shows things that I'm not really interested in or even close to. Not sure if there's a way to clean that up though.
The real big thing for me is Apple Pay. Once it accepts Apple Pay, 5 stars.

title: Sensational.
review: Easily top 5 selling and buying apps. Can't complain everything is straight forward explained. They also are quick to assist you if you have an issue.

I never cared to review this app, though I do love it. With the new update, my love for the app is much more. I love the fact there's a recommendations beneath clothing I view so I can see a variety of similar items. Thank you! That truly helps.

title: I use this all the time🌸
review: I love this app. I just wish you could rate users who you e swapped with instead of just bought from. Other than that 10/10 recommend!💜

title: I hate that I can't post
review: My only issue (besides the update) is that I can't post any more because I need a credit card to do so. I have the seller pay me through PayPal Family and Friends since I don't have a credit card. Please change this because it is very annoying having to explain why you can't post your item to the seller.

title: The worst resale app on the market
review:
I am a frequent user of resale apps for buying and selling, and I heard so much about depop so I thought I'd give it a chance. The WORST resale app out there.
1) when purchasing you have no protection, they say don't buy something if you think it is to good to be true. So when I spent over 100$ on something and never received it I was out of luck.
2) no organization on the app, honestly if you want to find something it's impossible
3) no requirements for the sellers to ship within a reasonable time frame or to even respond to you. 
4) horrible and confusing payment methods
Basically this app is set up for easy no consequence scamming for people selling "vintage" clothes for insane prices

title: Awful
review: This is the worst online buying website! I had to wait 3 weeks for a product because a girl did not want to give me the product then claimed to not know how to give a refund! I messaged the site took a few days to get a response then when I did they said they will give her time like she didn't already have enough! I will not be using this site! If you do use this site do it with caution!

title: Great except...
review: My thumb always hits the "sell" button at the bottom of the page when trying to scroll through everything else. Make it stop! I have to hit "cancel" 3 times in order to get back to where I was before! OMG

title: Don't Get Your Hopes Up
review:
You Won't Sell Some Of Your Items Right Away, But You Have The Opportunity To Take Amazing Pictures Of Your Items To Increase Your Chances Of Selling Them. 
Good Luck To You All! And Don't Forget To Add Hashtags That Relate To Your Item :)

title: Check out my shop
review: If your not a blogger its hard to sell. The platform itself is pretty need. Not too many bugs but silly rules about brand names. All n all its good. Check out my shop!! Enteratopen

title: Awesome
review: Love this idea, well made! The messaging is screwy no doubt but still works. They do charge 10% of the total price, that includes them taking 10% from the shipping price as well so it's taken me time to learn how to make up for that with the shipping costs. Awesome idea and love it regardless.

title: Good concept, sellers are horrible
review: I've been on depop on and off since May. Half of the purchases I have made, through the app, have ended in shambles. Sellers on this app are unreliable and often advertise their items falsely. Many sellers don't even know how to properly send out a package. You have to beg sellers for tracking numbers. Sellers take their sweet time to respond back. I love the concept but the rude and irresponsible sellers on this app make it really not worth it.

title: Could use another update!
review: I always use this app. It's so amazing and trust worthy and fun! A flaw I found that I've been having for a long time now is every time I try taking a photo through depop to post an item, the app crashes. Fix! Also, I don't see the filter icon that the new update talks about.

title: Depop
review: I love this app, I've sold a few things and have gained a solid following. Only certain items will sell on here though that trend toward younger audiences so for women's brands you really need to still use eBay. I love the instagram-esque vibe of depop and it's fun to take pictures and model your own clothes. Cool Dude.

title: Wish more people knew about it
review: I mostly sell on vinted and mercari just because i get more attention on those sites but i really love this app. The way you get your money right away into your paypal is awesome.

title: Not Useful For the Average User
review:
This app is a great tool for preexisting fashion bloggers  or companies with a following. For every other person, there's pretty much no way to get recognition or acknowledgement without having professional photos and models. 

I would say as an app it functions well, looks clean and is very user friendly, but as a means of selling clothes, it's just not useful at all.

title: So excited I found this!
review: Definitely just get it and try it out. I was pleasantly surprised to find so many things I loved and it's always nice to support some other people out there :)

title: Can't upload
review: I used to be able to upload, but for about 2 weeks, it can't find my location. I've tried deleting the app and restarting my phone. I've even tried typing in other cities to see if it recognized them. Nothing. It can't find anything. So upset that I can't use Depop anymore because I can't upload any new items.

title: Please fix it!
review:
My location services for this app isn't even working and it won't let me type in a location either. So now I can't post items because I can't put my location, I'm getting so frustrated I've tried everything.
I love this app but I just want to be able to use it. :(

title: Nice
review: I'm a new user and I've really liked the app so far but the same users are constantly on the explore page, typically people who don't need much exposure to make sales anyway. Very discouraging for new users trying to get into the swing of things.

title: Not compatible
review: This new update is not compatible with iOS 8 and below. I'm super upset about it because I'm actively selling/buying things to and from people. I'm getting notifications from potential buyers but everytime I open the app- it immediately crashes. Please fix this ASAP!! I'm sure there's people like me out there who doesn't have enough storage to have the latest iOS version compatible for depop now.
developerResponse:
{'id': 298444, 'body': "Hey there,

Sorry to hear about this. The app is supposed to be compatible with iOS 8 and above.

It would be great if you could provide us with some details so we can dig into this issue for you.

Please email us at support@depop.com with your username and any other details about the issue you're experiencing?

Thanks,
Theo", 'modified': '2017-05-10T10:10:17Z'}

title: better than mercari
review: I started using this app because my friend suggested it to me. The process of selling any abandon items you want to get out of your bedroom was so easy. Thank You Depop! keep progressing this magnificent app⭐️

title: Love
review: This app is so much fun! You basically have the ability to create your own shop and model your own catalog, it's way more manageable/simple/easy going than any other app out there!

title: Amazing idea !
review: I love this app. It gives opportunity to see what's up in the world and see who has great style and what amazing things people can find and sell! And the prices, communication, and delivery and guarantee is on 100%

title: My Favorite App 🙌🏼
review: This is app is by far my favorite; you can literally sell anything and at your own prices , basically like a virtual yard sale 💁🏻 it's so fun and and it's an easy/fast way of making some side money 👊🏼

title: It works just fine
review: I love to find cool stuff at affordable prices, sometimes some shops don't reply back to my message I don't know why if they want to sell here you should update the inventory so people don't get confuse either it's available or not.

title: Problems
review: I like this app but it's having too much problems I can't seem to get rid of bookmarks and when Someone messages me I don't get any notifications that I received a message and if I read the message the notification won't go away fix this please!! Other than that great app

title: Not active enough
review: I have nicely photographed, brand new, currently-trendy handbags for less than twenty-five dollars each and it has been a month since I've listed them. No purchases. Seems like the app is full of people trying to sell their stuff and not enough buyers. Really kind of a waste of time

title: Check it out!
review:
Customer service responds quickly via email.
Has a lovely community. I only intended to buy at first, but I ended up selling because it seemed so easy, and it was.

title: More categories
review: I like the app, its easy to use doesn't crash. Yes, the fees are steep 12%?. That's even greater than eBay, plus a PayPal fee. Besides that, I wish the items can also be categories by designer as well. This way it's easier to find what one is looking for.

title: depop
review: I really wish there was a filter by county or something like that because most of the stuff I want is from the UK and when I see something really cute and it's not from the US (where I am), it really bums me! Otherwise it's a pretty good app! Please check out my Depop- pinkseashell

title: Love!!!
review: Super easy and fun to sell, the whole systems is set up rlly nice to browse through stuff to buy, already sold 11 items and bought a bunch of great conditioned items for great prices, also love swapping and negotiating !!!!

title: Update
review: Honestly the update is so unaesthetically pleasing, everything is bulky looking and it doesn't really flow well. Also a lot of the font is in bold now, which almost makes the post look like a screenshot of something from a fake website. I do like the notifications being switched to your profile tab. And the messages having a quick tap on the bottom on the screen.

title: It's nice but they're not fixing my problem
review: It would've been a five-star rating if Depop Team would actually fix the problem where Depop would actually connect to my PayPal account. It's been 2 weeks and still nothing. I really want to sell on there, but for now I have to use Mercari.

title: So far so good!! 👍🏼
review: Love, Depop! Super easy to sell and buy from this app. Just make sure you buy from people who have good ratings. Unfortunately, there are scammers so don't delete any private messages with potential buyers as this could help if you were to get scammed.

title: Amazing App
review: I can't even remember how I found out about this app, but I am so happy I did, I have bought 8 things in a period of a few months and have had no major problems.

title: constantly improving
review: i love depop!! the updates are always so thoughtful! 🐯 this is my go-to app to buy clothing on realistic models who are my size, and to find art/beauty/fashion inspiration. one suggestion i have is to add time stamps to the private messages. 🕒 another is to walk new users through the process of selling their clothing, how to deliver packages 📦 , and all that jazz, so they may be less reluctant to start. in terms of design, the app is very simplistic but perhaps can be more creative.

title: Better than Poshmark
review: This app is perfect for those who are truly looking for cool and unique vintage or modern clothes. It's way better organized than Poshmark or some other ones. I can really find cool things I love on depop!

title: Help!
review: I have used Depop for awhile now and loved it! But currently, it won't let me buy, update, like, or message anyone. I have tried messaging for help but even that feature is NOT WORKING. There is no number or email to contact so I'm totally lost and I'm worried that if someone buys from me I will not get a notification! Need help!

title: Great app
review:
I'm able to sell and buy new and used clothing cheaper than I would pay for retail and you meet people from
All over the world and it can be addicting but in a good way

title: Always crashes
review:
Before this update the interface was easy to use and looked appealing...after I updated it worked fine for the first couple of days and now everytime I open it - it crashes!! Not to mention it looks terrible It's not my
Phone or my connection everything else works I've tried on wifi and off it crashes no matter what very upsetting!!!!!
developerResponse: {'id': 925634, 'body': 'Hey, thanks for the feedback. Really sorry for the inconvenience caused by the crash on app open. We have just submitted a new release, 2.1.1, with fixes to a couple of nasty crashes that should be available to download very soon. In the interim it is possible to overcome the crash on app open by deleting and reinstalling the app. Any other issues please feel free to contact us on support@depop.com. Thanks again, Team Depop', 'modified': '2017-08-02T15:41:59Z'}

title: Absolutely Amazing
review: My life would have never been complete without this app! I live in my local savers and consignment shops and this is just a giant one of thise!! I'm on this more then my regular social media apps and like it more 😂

title: A lot of fun to buy/sell on
review: Have already purchased my first item and am holding a couple more. I love the set up of the app and it's really easy to have pieces I'm interested in recommended to me

title: Awesome but NEEDS AN UPDATE
review:
I enjoy using depop and I like using it as a way to make extra money. However, 75% of the time I sell an item and a customer pays for shipping, the "activate shipping label" button does NOT generate. SO even though the customer pays for shipping
I have to write my own label and pay for shipping myself.  SUPER ANNOYING and hard to use.

title: LOVE IT: but...
review:
would love it even more if 
1) it didn't take me to the top of the explore page every time i leave the app for two seconds when i'm 800 scrolls deep

2) if the explore page told me the items that were sold before i get my hope up, click on the item, and then cry when i see it has been sold 

besides that however, it's honestly the best app out there for cheap, AMAZING, high quality, vintage, stylish clothes, shoes, accessories, etc. 10/10

title: Love the format, hard to sell though.
review: I love the instagram format, however it makes it harder to sell, bc it is based on popularity. but i think its super easy style of selling with some minor hiccups.

title: Non existent customer service
review: You can only use pay pal to buy and receive money so if something goes wrong or even if you just have a question or Inquiry you have to email the depop support team 3-4 times within the span of a week, only to be responded to with a verbatim answer from a FAQ question on their app that does NOT help your specific situation in any way. Needless to say I haven't had a promising experience.

title: Notification idea
review: Love the app, but I think it would be so much better if there were a notification when people you follow post an item!

title: Instagram for selling 🔥
review: Amazing!!! Absolutely obsessed with this app. Not only beautiful clothing to fit all styles, but also incredibly sweet and kind users! So different than any buying/selling platform I've ever experienced! A+++

title: Love it
review: Although y'all should add a feature to enable push notifications for certain users when they put a new item up.

title: Full of scammers
review: I had bought an item and the guy that sold me the sweater said he had "shipped it" which I didn't believe cause usually I would get my items. I asked him about it and didn't even care. So he took my money and never gave it back to me at least. I stated a comment to the app but never got a reply back. I sent over 5 of them and never got a comment back. It's been over 4 months already smh

title: A good app but......
review: This is a good app for selling and buying, but you could get scammed very easily. I swapped with a girl who had 80 reviews all 5 stars. So I swapped with her and then that little dirt bag deleted her account. I don't swap as much as I used to. (@mermaidmya)

title: Great app 👍🏼
review: I love this app so much!! It's so easy to search for anything you're looking for. It's easy to buy and sell! Overall it's really great 😊 I recommend it to anyone looking for some awesome unique clothing at good prices💕

title: Nothing sells
review: Don't bother.  I've done flash sales for $2 with free shipping on rare & dC'd MAC makeup and I get 50 likes in the hour but no buys. I hate Ebay with a passion but I listed two items today that sold tonight for $64 and $80 respectively. I've only had 3 sales EVER on Depop and they were sold at half value or less. I had a giveaway that did quite well of course since it was free.  Total waste of time.

title: Mostly good
review: A lot of the problem is the people that scam others or give others a hard time. But Depop constantly has issues that need to be fixed. Otherwise, it's a pretty good garage sale app where the sellers and buyers are relatively safe.

title: Overall an OK app
review: The feature I really wish it had was being able to select which countries you want to view products from. Also wish it was better at detecting and shutting down scammers as it causes too much drama within the app between users.

title: Cool app, could use some more features
review: Like being able to browse listings close to your location and being able to sort and tag your listed items. Would also be cool if I could edit my images within the app. Otherwise, fun! Recommend it

title: It's okay
review: I would say the app is overall okay but idk if it's just me or what but I've been trying to get these pants and I've tried with two different cards and it still won't let me buy them it keeps saying "come back later" so idk what's up with that but it's really really REALLY ANNOYING

title: Not enough men's fashion!
review: I got this app about a year and a half ago. While it has a lot of women's fashion (btw I'm not someone who is particularly gendered about clothing. I think people should wear what they want), there is a paltry amount of men's clothes. And most of it is like the same kind of style, i.e. Ugly jackets, tees with ugly graphics, flannels. It's all very monotonous. If this isn't your style, it's kind of pointless.

title: Hard to Navigate
review: The old version was great! I loved it. The new one is hard to navigate & not as pleasing to look at. The colors aren't fun & quirky like the app used to be. It changes the experience for me and thus, haven't been using as much unfortunately even though it's a great platform to sale clothes.
developerResponse: {'id': 1094288, 'body': "Hey, thanks for the feedback. Hopefully the new colors will grow on you like they did for us, however keep an eye out for future updates as we constantly look to improve the app based on the feedback we receive. We'd love to know more about the difficulties you've faced with navigation. Please feel free to get in touch at productfeedback@depop.com with more details. Thanks, Team Depop", 'modified': '2017-08-24T11:06:51Z'}

title: Nice look but...
review: The old version made it easier to search for in certain category for a size. I rather have the old version back.

title: A++
review: Not gonna lie, it has is glitchy moments but they are always quick to fix. Super easy APP to use, much better than other sell/buy apps out there!

title: Bad graphic design, Good App
review: Love this app -- its user friendly & is such a great way to buy and sell vintage & secondhand items!  REALLY DISLIKE the design of the latest update with black & red logo.  It's jarring graphics and colors are super unappealing -- please consider some design changes in the very near future!

title: Depop takes a step backward in design
review: I love using the Depop app, but wow this new update is the ugliest thing I've ever seen. It seems like they fired their old designer and hired someone whose only experience was designing promo items for Hot Topic in the 90s. The font is inconsistent and hideous and the red/black color scheme is a complete mess. I don't mind them moving things around, but how did this design pass 2017-level quality control??? Minimalism is key and this is not it.

Love Depop, it is my preferred app for my listings! Depop has a low 10% fee and provides shipping labels. My only complaint I have is how they deduct their fee. The fee is deducted later in paypal, which makes knowing your actual profit confusing. I wish they would deduct the fee in the app!

title: Easy to use, great community
review: The app is very easy to use for buying and selling clothing, accessories, and other little knick knacks. It's also easy to communicate with people and the community is very friendly.

title: D
review: Love Depop &I all it has to offer although maybe the setup could be a little more creative where it says Depop shop etc and new features could be added to get more people on it! There's a good amount of people on it but why not more?

title: Great App❤
review: Great app to sell / buy items!✨ should get bugs fixed though! Other than that, it's awesome & way better than any other app I've used to sell items!

title: My fave!
review: I absolutely love Depop! It's so convenient to be able to sell your items all on your phone! I've thoroughly enjoyed my experience! I will say though, be careful when buying from people! Always check their reviews first!

Super glitchy with the notification. And is overall dope except for some items not being marked sold unless you click on the sellers name. Bummer. And i realllllllllly hope the update where we can add more pictures. 4 PICTURES IS NOT ENOUGH. 
A lot of random bot scammers and regular scammers so be careful and use street smarts. 

Overall 3 stars :)

title: Awesome app
review: Really obsessed with this app! I've sold quite a bit and have had a lot of good experiences buying and selling. Just watch out for the few scammers, like with any thing involving money.

title: Love it!
review: Have always had good experiences buying on this app, would absolutely recommend for others. Have heard there are scammers on the app so would look out for that.

title: Great!
review: I always use depop for selling my items. I prefer it over eBay and every other selling platform. However, I wish the usernames could be changed like you can on eBay and other places. Then I will give 5 stars! There are also MANY scammers on this app. I wish the safety was better!

title: 5 out of 5
review: Perfect service, the sellers are so sweet and understanding. They are truthful to the product I choose to buy and the shipping is so fast! Highly recommend if looking for cheap used/unused items (:

title: The BEST
review: Literally the best app ever! Incredibly user-friendly, navigation is perfect. Whether you're a seller or a buyer it could have not been made efficient. Completely obsessed!!! I tell everybody I know to get on it.

title: So many issues
review: Sold items that didn't go through because of the faulty app . Never got paid on my sold items . Bad communication , report and issue doesn't work because it's forever loading and won't let me report that I need my money . No customer service phone line . Hire some people to resolve issues with Depop. It's 2017 people want to fix problems as they happen .

title: Terrible
review: They scam you when it comes to payments. I tried to accept the payment but the payment was invalid. So the buyer got their item for free. I called PayPal (that's all they work with) five separate times and they said it wasn't the buyers account and my account was fine. Now I'm short money and I just sold an item from my store for free. I will be deleting my account and this app. I don't think it's worth it.

title: Depop
review: Very easy to use. Easy to sell & buy. My favorite part is that I can add whatever price for shipping. The only way to make this better, is add a Place to add a tracking # for both the buyer & seller.

title: Best app for reselling/buying!
review: I have a poshmark but I deleted it and started using depop instead. Amazing deals and smooth transactions. Plus there's so many things you can find! Def recommend.

title: Awesome app!!
review: This app is great for buying and selling second hand items. I have not encountered any scammers throughout the 2 years of using this app. I definitely recommend this to all!

title: Best app for buying and selling
review: I Love to buy and sell from depop! I just wish everyone used it so I could find more goodies. And to sell goodies a bit easier. I love the interface as well :)

title: Great Selling App
review: Love this app! I have been a seller on Poshmark for 2 years & i love Depop! so awesome that you can put free shipping or ship however you want to! Not only that yoh can sell bigger items & put "meet in person" Fantastic!!!

title: Love this app!!
review: I am a thrifter and I always find wayyyy too much stuff! Well now I can easily sell the stuff I purchased and make a profit! It is super easy to use and a great way to earn extra cash.

title: Great idea, needs improvement
review: App needs a lot of improvement on the coding side. Also should be a little more social media oriented now that it has such a big following. Trying to model off instagram is a good idea, as many people are currently reselling there. Other than that great app and good vision.

title: One of my favorites
review: Honestly love the update and the app is easy to use-- no issues for me ever. Ignore all the reviews attacking the new design and font lol they're fine; ppl just don't like change

title: Basically broken
review: I recently sold an item on your app. The payment went through fine and I got the shipping label no problem. However, there wasn't an option to mark as shipped or to access the tracking number. Luckily, my buyer was gracious and understood, but I can assure you that I will never be selling through this app again until this gets fixed.

title: Scummy Sellers and Bad Customer Service
review: I ordered two items with Depop, neither of which I EVER received. I waited 6 weeks for customer service to run me in circles of idiotic automated responses, and finally I just filed claims with PayPal. The sad part is THE SELLERS ARE BOTH STILL ACTIVE. I'm not sure how this is even possible. I've used other apps like this and had zero problem, items have shipped promptly or the buyer can cancel. It's not that hard, Depop. Get it together.

title: Great App!❤️
review: The app should make a section for each country because it's a bit confusing also theirs not many people from US, should have more publicity here!!

title: NEEDS WORK
review: This app needs much work done to it. Only certain shapes of pictures fit. Tags aren't accurate. Sellers are very judgmental and cruel. Depop took off my beats by Dre's saying they are replicas when they were 100% authentic. You can't get sound notifications. Many flakes. And this app just has so many bug issues. Maybe it will be better in a few years, but for now it's just a work in progress.

title: I love it! But...
review: It's really hard to get a refund if the seller is no longer active :( also there should be a way to turn notifications on when a certain person posts stuff

title: Needs some work!
review: I love buying, selling & trading on depop but there are too many bugs that need to be fixed. the app crashes a lot and recently I've noticed that when I open new message notifications, there are no new messages in the conversation. Please fix!

title: Like...But...
review: Nice app but I wish you can filter searches because most people on the app ship only in the uk. Wish the explore didn't have already sold items too

userName: What do u mean by nick name
title: Great
review: I haven't used it long enough to give a honest review I feel like. I haven't gotten the full experience yet. But I just purchased my first clothing item so I hope it goes well

title: Change it up a bit
review: It's cool but the older version was better and it's annoying how it's always the same depop sellers on my explorer page like switch it up once in a while more sizes too

title: such an awesome app!
review: I've been on depop for awhile now and I absolutely love it! I've made a lot of sales on depop and the app is super fun and easy to use! such a great way to sell and buy so many different items.

title: Get this app 🙌
review: I've made $700 in 5 months. This app is so creative, fun, and it gives you something to do. Make sure to read how to do it before you just start selling.

title: Fantastic App- Wanelo but Better- Except...
review: I love this app so much. All of my purchases from it have been spot on; however, I wish there was a scrolling feature for the explore page and for user's shops. Otherwise, no complaints!

title: CRAPPY UPDATE
review: I can't see my sold items what so ever, ever since I updated this morning it just keeps loading the page and won't upload so I can't see what I need to ship 😑 help

title: Nice, but...
review: I like this new look and love Depop for buying/selling, but I want back the feature to look at what the people I follow have recently likes! Also, I still can't leave a review for an item whose shipping label expired...The notification is getting annoying. Fix these issues please ):

title: Haven't had a sell in 3 months
review: This app was ok in the beginning, but its seeming to slowly die. Was selling here and there for a little while, but now I haven't sold jack in over 3 months. No choice but to close shop and delete the app all together, it's not even worth my time anymore. Not to mention the new update is horribly ugly and clunky.

title: Unappealing Update
review: Information is a lot more difficult to process and color scheme does not make sense. The buttons are tacky and look glaringly out of place. Please revert back. Almost every feature looks disorganized and difficult to maneuver. Why red??! No no no no. Seriously, the new layout design is entirely unnecessary and really makes me rethink using it. No longer is it a pleasant and relaxing experience. What a mess. Please REVERT.

title: Easy to use
review: Quicker and easier than poshmark and also better overall look

title: I LOVE DEPOP!!!!
review: I seriously love this app. Hands down the best experience with the Depop community and it's employees/interns. The app is incredibly easy to use and any issues/problems are quickly resolved by the Depop team. Set up almost the same as Instagram! LOVE LOVE LOVE!!!

title: great app!
review: this is my favorite app! I've only run into one scammer for the entirety of the time I've had it! 10/10 recommend you download this app, you most likely won't regret it (-:

title: Great app
review: I love this app and iv been using it for a little over a year now. The layout of it is nice and easy to use for selling and buying. Highly recommended trying it out

title: So easy to buy and sell
review: Can't really go wrong with an IG style and an easy set up for PayPal. Have sold two items and bought one so far with zero issues.

title: Depopular
review: I love depop. My one biggest complaint is that I can't reorder my listings. It's frustrating that editing a listing makes it jump to the top of my shop. I'd like to edit a listing and have it remain where it was in the order I listed it.

title: Tell if your liked items are sold
review: Love this app but I wish it would tell you in your liked and bookmarked items if they are sold or not :(

title: Brilliant!! But,
review: I have to say this app is amazing in so many ways👌🏼👌🏼 made me a lot of extra cash and keeps me busy! However, PLEASE FIX THE REVIEWS PAGE, I NEED TO SEE WHAT MY REVIEWS ARE SAYING!!!! I cannot stress that enough from a sellers perspective 🙏🏼🙏🏼🙏🏼 would be much appreciated!! xo

title: Easy to use!
review: Such a great app to make some side cash, I love it's Instagram format. Very easy to list items. However it is a bit buggy, I feel as if it works best on LTE & not WiFi.

title: Nice
review: It's amazing to see what kind of products people from all over the world have to offer. A great way to up cycle clothes to make sure they don't go to waste. I haven't bought anything yet, but I hope to soon!

title: Yeah
review: Best selling app I've used so far. The fees just a little too much though 10% like really??? But way better than mercaci- depop has way better protection. Mercaci had none- you'll get scammed wether you're a buyer or seller it's trashy and sketchy so depop is the way to go!

title: Up and coming
review: It'd be nice if Depop had a low flat rate shipping cost for everything but I love this app. It is incredibly easy to use, and it isn't cluttered with really used crap like other sell or barter apps. I would recommend anyone try it (:

title: Need some work
review: Really needs a "refined search" feature to help you find things more efficiently. I hate not being able to separate US sellers from UK sellers, or at least have a currency converter. Other then that the quality of everything has been really nice.

title: five stars, hands down
review: I have been using this app for over a year now and i love it more than ever. WAAAYYY better than selling on mercari and the depop staff really does and tries their best to make the app a great environment.

title: So tired of alerts
review: Hate the new look.  Also since I updated I keep having a notification that seems to only be for the sold items.  All those transactions are done!  There needs to be a way to unmarked them once they are done.  Debating deleting the app cause that notification is really bugging me.
developerResponse: {'id': 1140777, 'body': "Hey, thanks for the review and feedback. If you are seeing notifications related to transactions it could be due to the fact you have received feedback from another user and haven't viewed the feedback. You need to tap into the receipt and tap on the star rating to view the review. This should then remove the notification in app. If this doesn't help please feel free to contact us at productfeedback@depop.com with more details and any relevant screenshots so we can get this issue fixed. Many thanks, Team Depop", 'modified': '2017-08-30T10:22:41Z'}

title: Great app
review:
Love it an it's been very helpful 
An has saved me an overall love the creativity involved!! So long Platos closet an buffalo exchange an crossroads taking my money! Recycle your clothes!  xoxoxo
Advice tip: don't take it so seriously and be patient

title: Horrible design and communication
review: Since they updated this app I'd say the overall Aesthetic and design concept has been a failure. The new logos and interface has made it harder to navigate and communicate to people what exactly certain buttons do. Besides that people tend to only like your clothes and not end up buying them. So basically it instagram for showing off clothes

title: Ok...
review: Depop was amazing at 1st, but they started to delete my items because "they seemed to be unauthentic" when i had proof posted with the item. Great app but unsatisfied that they get 10% of the money I make & don't seem to care about their users

title: do not update!!
review: if i could give 0 stars i would this update is seriously so ugly i didn't even want to open the app. please don't update if you haven't yet. i might even delete my account and the app even though i have a decent number of sales, it's that bad. the interface is harsh on the eyes and the layout is a little confusing now. the layout isn't as bad as the design though, the entire logo/branding change is so terrible even an amateur could do better. i'm sure it will turn people away too. it looks so choppy, the complete opposite of the previous clean and organized design. please change it back or think of a better one.

title: Not trust worthy!
review: My daughter told me about this app and to be honest is full of freaks.  I bought something and never received it.  One of the members emailed me and introduce himself and told me he would help me if I had any questions.  Well,  when I put in my complaint he was short and not even concerned when I told him I had been scammed.  I'm deleting as soon as I get my money reimbursed.  I was left traumatized by this app.

title: Easy to use!
review: The community on Depop is so friendly, and buying things is as easy as one tap! Contacting sellers is also almost too simple. What's the catch to this app??

title: Awesome thrifting app
review: If you're looking for a place to grab some fly gear at a fraction of the cost this is the place to be. Plus you can make some change, or even a career if you're persistent!

title: Depop rocks
review: I hope to see more users in this app in the future. Hopefully the fees don't change because eBay takes too much. Don't want another eBay.

title: Will change review once it gets fixed
review: I love this app so much but the recent update will not let me open the app. It crashes every time I click on the app. I've tried reinstalling it and even that didn't work. I am not sure if I'm the only one having this problem or not, but once it's fixed I'll rate it 5 stars. X

title: Great app but not so great sellers
review: I've used this app and after buying just one item I can say customer support is nonexistent. I've complained multiple times about an item not being received that I've paid a lot for and I'm very disappointed. Be careful who you buy from!!😐

title: Good App to sell
review: I've sold a lot of items in this app. Personally I love selling here, you can link it to your PayPal and transfer your money to your bank. I like it better than Mercari tbh.

title: add tracking!!
review: i love this app, but i was forced to cancel an order due to not hearing back from the seller at all and not knowing wether the item shipped or not. If a tracking feature was added i would feel alot more comfortable buying things on this app. keep up the good work!

title: Notifications
review:
I had to delete this app because the badge notifications would never go away. You have to refresh your notifications in the app for a straight minute for the badge notification to disappear. 

Also, unless you're a youtuber people only like and comment on items they never buy your stuff. 

Not worth it.

title: Ugly Update
review: I work really hard to make my shop look nice and follow a certain aesthetic. The new update ruins that with the big ugly yellow "sold" over the pictures and the bright red stars. It doesn't make sense to make the "buy" button red!! I hate the new look. It looks big and bulky while the old version was smooth and sleek, like Instagram.

title: Love this app!
review: This app is just as addicting as Instagram!  Its fun to look at all the accounts and different fashion flavors people adore, would recommend this app to everyone that likes fun pictures and some good ol' fashion

title: It's pretty lit. TBH
review: You can find some pretty sick stuff. Most sellers are pretty reliable and its very easy to use. They make it even easier by using the paypal option. Best kinda thrift shopping

title: Buggy
review: Buying and selling is a breeze, with a good customer service system. The app itself could be more reliable in terms of starting up and less crashes. The app now crashes on start up and I can't actually get on it.

title: Like online thrifting
review: I've bought tons of stuff and I've received all of them on time ❤️❤️ I love this app. It's like thrifting but without searching for far away thrift stores

title: Love DePop!
review: I am new to this and have just purchased my second item. Browsing is easy and clear. Purchasing is simple. No bad experiences yet. Happy with customer service too. I love DePop so far! ❤️

title: Download ASAP!
review: Great app for selling & buying. Would recommend for anyone that likes high priced items with low income. You never know what you may find & for what price.   Kudos to the creator.

title: Great app :D
review: Super easy to use! Allows comments and messages. I have found lots of cute really unique items and sold lots of my own clothes too! I recommend this app

title: Lots of likes but few sales
review: Seems like a very young crowd with no disposable income.  One commenter posted  "I can't wait until I save the money to buy this!!" on a $3 item.  $3? Is she homeless?   I've gotten hundreds of likes and 1000+ followers and hours of wasted time.  It's a Friendly crowd but no money to be made in collectible clothing, jewelry, makeup or housewares.  No matter how cheaply priced.

title: Better the Steal your money-bay
review: Love the communication, shopping and selling simplicity!  People are friendly and I don't have to worry about people who bid and win and never pay!

title: easily my favorite place to shop!
review: so nicely designed and so easy to use! I've always been into thrifting but this is so much better!

title: Love it 💜💜💜
review: So far super easy to use its just let Instagram 💕 but way easier to buy stuff you want or sell everything you want too get rid of!!!

title: LOVE
review: I absolutely love this app! Amazing community filled with amazing things :) I do wish it was more like the Samsung version where ur profile is just one tap away! It's still 5 star worthy tho <3

title: Takes 10%
review: They take 10% for the cost which is understandable, however if you refund your buyer at any point YOU will have to come out of pocket to refund the 10% THEY took initially. After contacting Depop support they were not helpful and refused to give back the 10% because according to them "it's non refundable". I will be filing a dispute against them on PayPal in hopes of getting this resolved.

title: great except no search
review: love this app and the idea. I absolutely love all of the vintage stuff but it NEEDS a search function so badly. I've been trying to get a Polaroid camera but have ended up scrolling for an hour to find a few instead of easily searching for it. PLEASE ADD A SEARCH BUTTON

title: Love it!!
review: It's such a great app. It's easy for a buyer/seller and there's tons of rare/cool items in different stores. I've had such a wonderful experience so far and I definitely recommend it!

title: Love Depop!
review: I love using Depop. I sell all sorts of product to a great community. Everyone has been really nice. I like the scroll format product feed, makes it very to browse and connect with other sellers.

title: New Update Doesn't Load
review: The new update doesn't load properly. When I go to the app I keep getting an error message for every screen "Oops. I couldn't get the data at this time." It's been happening all morning. I just want my store to work properly. Please help.

title: I love this app.
review: I like the interface. Super intuitive. Easy to buy and sell. The prices are negotiable and already super low for amazing pieces. This is the app I spend the most time on.

title: LOVE THIS
review: Adore this app I have bought so many crucial items in my closet here for amazingly low prices and everyone I have bought from has been so helpful and nice

title: Terrible update
review: I've been using Depop since it's launch and as of late it has been going down hill. It seems as though it gets worse throughout the new updates, especially with this recent one. Those stretched letters have to go.

title: Not a fan...
review: I use Poshmark, Mercari, eBay, and Vinted so I thought adding this app into the mix would be an excellent way to grow my business network.  Basically the ONLY people that express interest in "buying" are scammers.  I have yet to interact with a single person not trying to rip people off.  The listing process is tedious and inefficient, and it's kind of a huge waste of time.  Use Mercari or Poshmark instead.

title: Best app to sell on
review: Quick to post what your selling, easy to buy and especially the format of the app. It is amazing I have nothing bad to say about it✔️

title: Okie
review: Its format is great,but still fails to load, and sometimes depop gives you big charges for no reason, when its only suppose to be 10%, and customer service, well lets just say they email you saying sorry but dont fix the prblem

title: Everyone should use this app
review: It's so easy to sell and make money on this site! If you have any clothes or anything that you can sell, sell it on here!!! It's great

title: Great app
review: If you need to make some extra cash, sell some stuff on here or if you have extra cash just buy things on here.

title: eBay meet Instagram
review: App works well. I have made several good purchases. If old and sold items could be removed quickly that would be an improvement.

title: Legit app!
review: A very effective tool to get old or new items out of your closet for whatever price you decide! reasonable prices on a few gems it just requires looking!

title: Awesome.
review: This app is great to buy rare items but my advice is to only purchase through DEPOP app itself to avoid getting scammed. Also, don't trust non 5 stars on a big purchase.

title: Depop.
review: Super great app to shop for vintage things. From mom jeans, to 90's windbreakers, to old school lamps. This app has everything and the payments are super easy. My favorite app, although the it's very addicting.

userName: I fight for what is right
title: Wish it created shipping labels
review: Great app to post stuff to sell and to buy stuff from. Only think I don't like is that it doesn't create the shipping labels for you like other buying apps. Other than that it's great!

title: Great app!
review: More or less my friend described this as an Instagram marketplace and that's been true so far; so many unique items to fit multiple styles, loving the variety!

title: Love this App! Wayyy better than eBay
review: I use this app as a seller and I love the ease and simplicity of Depop. Also unlike eBay there's no minimum 10% fee or limit to how much you may list! Keep it up guys!

title: Second Hand Shopping!
review: I love this app! It's super easy to use and it's almost like going to a second hand store. Everyone is really nice and helpful as well!

title: Shop by size???
review: As far as I know, there is no way to shop by size when you are looking for clothing or shoes. I wish they would make something that lets you filter out the right size or make it more obvious if they already have that.

title: So annoyed
review: I don't know what the heck is going on but I deleted this app because it keeps crashing and it says I still have it downloaded to my phone and now it's just taking up space and it won't let me remove it. PLEASE FIX THIS I'm so irritated. I like the app outside of this but OMG FIX UR ISSUES

title: great app, BUT
review: the notification of a review being left for you never goes away and also most of the people who sell on here are 16 year old girls who are rude, lie about when they're going to the post office, and just make this lovely app an overall negative experience

title: Minimal yet effective
review: Such a great app to use when you have things you don't use laying around. The fee is low and it's so simple to use. My favorite selling app!

title: Cutest app !
review: I love how the sellers are on this app ! Super nice and understanding so far !! I have yet to have an item sell so I can't say how selling on my part is , but I deff recommend it to sell and to buy on !
So far I like the app, people are easy to work with most of the time. Just a couple bugs here and there that should b fixed

title: Super easy to use
review: I really like this App. I find that I am able to connect to a different market which is great for sales for my business!

title: Nope
review:
The idea is great but the items being sold are very over priced for what they are. You either find decent things for a over-the-top-high-price or you find decent prices on garbage. ("Vintage")
Pretty much anything sold is "vintage" just because it's used?!
Ridiculous.

The idea of the app is great, but people just don't work like that.

title: Good app, but...
review: Easy to upload and sell items but once you post an item you can not go back and edit it which can be very frustrating. Would love to see that change in the next update.

title: Move the filter
review: I love this app with a passion, but the filter should be pushed off to the side or something. It's so annoying scrolling throw things and having the word filter in the way the whole time

title: Horrible app
review: They deleted my account when I reached 4,000 followers just because I had made a account over 1 year ago I wasn't even aware of because you can't have more than once account  and didn't think to contact me first to ask if I was aware. Ridiculous . Ask before deleting our accounts. They are just loosing themselves business

title: Video would be nice
review: The app already mimics Instagram and it would be nice if we are able to add videos as well. That would be so cool but I just downloaded it and just started selling so far, I love it. Visit my shop . Victoria Turay..shop name is stylish aim. Thanks

title: Amazing
review: Love this app you can almost sell anything and it doesn't crash on me like other people have been saying

title: honk
review: At first I didn't think buying and selling clothes and other things could be this easy. But it is and this app made it possible. Very impressed and in love with this concept. Keep up the good work ✌🏾

title: better than most
review: you know those stores you go to even when it's not payday just to window shop ?? yea.. Depop is that store but an app.

title: LaFlameVintage

title: Great for selling and buying

title: Great App!
review: Love this app so far! Nice design and easy to use! But I think we should be able to edit reviews we've made just incase something occurs even after we receive and review our purchase.

title: outstanding couldn't of asked for better

title: Great app
review: This is my favorite app! Easy to use and a very fun community. I just wish it's easier to scroll through each sellers item by category.

title: Pretty awesome

title: Not the best but not the worst
review: One of the best apps for selling pre-owned goods but it still has its flaws. Not many ppl on depop intend to buy, & are often sellers. Hard to make actual $ on this app without investing a lot of time building a reputation, taking good quality pictures, and writing descriptions.

title: So cool
review: I am using the app every day. Comparing with other second hand mobile apps, this is very social and easy to navigate. Highly recommend!

title: Great! Except..
review: I was thinking maybe you should include an option where even if there were bookmarks you could make multiple lists, such as one for shirts, accessories, etc.

title: Fun app, could use a few options
review: I love browsing this app! I would like to search by size. I would also like the option to restrict my feed to just my favorite sellers sometimes.

title: Best App Ever
review: I definitely love this app. Very easy to use and understandable. It legit and everyone on this app are communicative. Would recommend this app if you are selling your items.

title: Selling is nice but if any issues occur they never get back to you
review: Had an issue with a sold item only for cs to never return my emails

title: Dope app, kinda buggy
review:
My new go-to app for buying clothes. I'm definitely hooked.

That being said, I wish you could browse by category, recommendations based on your likes would be really cool. And the app crashes quite a bit. Other than that, it's pretty rad.

title: Great app for artist
review: If you are an artist and is looking to sell or find art, hand made crafts, and vintage items... then this is the place! Depop sure has helped me sell many of my handmade crafts! Thanks Depop 😘💋❤🎨

title: Really Great App
review: It's really great app! But be wary of scammers they leave emails to contact them and then a "deposit" to hold the item. Other than that people are really friendly

title: just like instagram
review: This would be a good 5 star app if the people you followed posts were actually in order!!!!! it's just like instagram now, where the old posts that get the most attention are at the top and the lesser ones are at the bottom. i don't care if a post that was posted 16 hours ago got a lot of attention. i want to see the most recent posts!!

title: Great
review: Great app, sold something the first day I got it. Great way to sell clothing without having to use consignment shops or eBay. AND there's a ton of awesome vintage clothes you can't find anywhere else

title: LOVE IT
review: depop is kind of like thrift shopping, which i love to do, but you find some really nice pieces, some things you can't even find in thrift stores, glad i found this app 😊

title: Won't load
review: Good app overall, but I every time I look something up on it, it won't load. It has me press the retry button over and over again. It's really irritating.

title: Needs a lot of work
review: 1) give users the option to edit/ look at photos after you choose them 2) fix the glitch where you show which liked items are sold 3) don't change the placement of listings after they're edited 4) give users the option to send and receive photos 5) shipping labels are a must

title: Great App!
review: Love this app! I buy a lot from it and sell a little too. I wish the search feature had a few more options, but I'm on it daily. So that tells you something!

title: Depop is great
review: I love depop you find great stuff and deals you can also sell things quickly ! But newer versions keep crashing :/ but other than i would recommed it ! Check it out

title: New update wont load sold items
review: Ive been attempting to get to my profile and sold items ever since the update and it refuses to load, very aggravating that i cant message people about the products and leave feedback

title: Shipping?!
review:
We now can't use Depop assisted shipping where they print out the label and we ship it we now can only arrange our own shipping? Why

Update: thanks for fixing it
developerResponse: {'id': 1012541, 'body': "Hey, thanks for the feedback. Sorry to hear about the issue you have been experiencing with USPS shipping. I have just retested this flow and the USPS shipping option appears to be showing in version 2.2. I suggest deleting and reinstalling the app. Then check that under settings your profile country is set to US and your currency is set to USD under preferences. Then when listing you need to make sure the location is set to a US location. If that doesn't help please send through your depop username and device details (e.g. iphone 6s, iOS 10.3.2) to support@depop.com and we can dig into it further. Thanks, Team Depop", 'modified': '2017-08-14T17:33:53Z'}

title: Only one complaint....

review: Yeah, the new design/font/function is awful. Just please go back. Part of the reason why I preferred Depop to other clothes reselling apps, was the ease and functioning the previous design. Please, please please Depop listen to your user base, both sellers and buyers are giving you the feedback you asked for. Please fix the issues and roll out another update soon :/

title: No Customer Support
review: The app itself is okay, but whoever owns/runs it takes NO responsibility for bad sellers and scammers. I tried reporting a seller who had scammed me and was basically told "we can't do anything, try going through paypal instead". It totally put me off, so I wouldn't recommend this app simply because if you have even a slight problem, Depop will not help you.

title: Not a fan

My old account got suspended then deleted without telling me why I got suspended in the first place, then I gave it a second chance and I made a new account and the NEXT day SUSPENDED, I HAD ONLY 1 ITEM FOR SALE SO FAR AND I WAS ALREADY SUSPENDED?? I don't recommend this app. Don't only take my advice read the other reviews about this app, most of them are pretty bad. UPDATE: THIER CUSTOMER SERVICE IS HORRIBLE!!

title: waste of time
review: depop was great at first. selling was easy enough and people were friendly, but the app has a lot of problems that a few updates can't fix. lots of scammers, repeated glitching, and the managers seem to have a knack for deleting accounts and sellers for minor or irrelevant reasons. they could issue a warning before they suspend you out of the blue, because lots of sellers on there spend a lot of time and energy into building up their account. contacting them about your problems is essentially useless. depop was a waste of my time, there are a lot of better selling and shopping apps out there

review: Depop is great, I just wish I could keep scrolling the explore page continuously like Instagram without having to go in and out of posts.

title: DO NOT UPDATE
review: the new update is TERRIBLE! they separated the sold notifications from likes and comments which makes it harder to respond to notifications. also, its a lot clunkier and not pleasing on the eyes at all, depop lets me down with every update. they're taking 10% of our sales and they can't design a decent layout for the app? sad...

title: Update
review: In my opinion the new update is very uneasy on the eyes. Text being smaller makes it harder to read, default photo overlying item on post is very tacky. Wish I didn't update at this point. Hopefully this will change sooner rather than later.

title: Stupid
review: I am still going to keep using the app to buy stuff but it's really stupid that you force your sellers to have a paypal account in order to sell. I have heard too many horror stories of people having a paypal and getting screw over because of it. No thanks.

title: for those thrift/fashion goods and more
review: Legit have never left an app review in my 3+ years of owning an iPhone but Depop changed that. Super easy to find clothes/grails, dope storefronts and great experience so far 🙏

title: Love it
review: I really enjoy this app, people seem to sell stuff cheaper here :) also you can find anything!!!

title: Almost perfect
review: Take sold items out of the featured page please! And make search filters like size and type of clothing!!

title: A+ app !!!! i love depop
review: excellent app! i just wish you could add more than 4 pictures when listing an item for sale :-)

title: What more could a geek ask for?
review: Great app and great marketplace to rival eBay and the rest. Love it more than letgo. Great for new sellers and people who want to sell their personal items.

title: Great app
review: I use this app constantly, I love the format, and Depop gave me great customer service when I was having difficulty with a transaction.

title: Awesome!
review: Simple, user friendly, searching items is fun because it's like Instagram. Better than eBay!

title: Terrible
review: Awful app to sell with. Get lots of followers and likes, but little commitment. This app is easy to scam with because sellers aren't required to provide tracking info. States to buy within the app, but I've spoken with buyers who got scammed by the same sellers as me and DePop took forever to get back to them. Some scammers still have their stores up.

title: My first order.
review: I give 4 stars due to the payment fact. I typed it in 10 times, and it kept saying it was invalid. Get PayPal if you want this to work well.

title: Love this app
review: I make a whole lot more money on depop then ebay, I really like the interface and have gotten some super cute stuff ~

title: Sold items disappearing
review: Items in the sold list are disappearing
Really useful to buy things from and the things are usually pretty cheap 😎

title: SELL IT ALL
review: actually very easy and fun to use, thou I do wish the notifications and messaging were a bit more fluid

title: Amazing!
review: I absolutely adore this app! Other than scammers, everyone is extremely nice and it's so easy to sell or buy things!

title: Love it
review: Need anything ? Well Depop has it , don't think twice and look for what you need 👌🏻,  💯% would recommend

title: Depop Rocks!
review: I love this app so much! I've bought many things from this app and plan to buy many more. Sadly there are some scammers on here, but I've never dealt with one. But overall, amazing app!!

title: AMAZING
review: this is app is amazing u can find anything and everything. it's almost a high end thrift shop with out the prices

title: Great app
review: I have no complaints . Maybe an upgrade on the search engine but that's about it

title: I love this app
review: I only shop on this app I love the layout it's great ❤️ I recommend it to all my friends! Great way to sell things too!!

title: Thumbs down.
review: Every time you update the app something goes wrong. Right now I'm having trouble with notifications. Specifically message ones where it shows I have a message and after I've checked that message the notification doesn't go away. It's really annoying.
developerResponse: {'id': 1035937, 'body': "Hey, sorry to hear about the issue you've been experiencing. So that we can make sure this gets fixed it would be great if you could send some more details of the issue to productfeedback@depop.com. If you attach a screenshot it would be really helpful to help us narrow down if this is an issue with the app icon badging or the notifications on the tab bar / message itself. Thanks for flagging the issue to us. Team Depop", 'modified': '2017-08-17T08:27:13Z'}

title: new update
review: the app was fine before but now it just keeps crashing whenever i try to click on a seller shop? I literally can't look at shops bc it immediately crashes unless i look at them from my following.

title: Good
review: The only thing I would add is that it should tell you the exact amount of money you're going to make. Other than that it's perfect 😃

title: Awesome place to make money!
review: It's super easy to start selling and it all connects to paypal! The community is super nice and I haven't had one bad experience yet.

title: Favorite online consignment store !
review: Love depop (: it's easier to see the outfits because of the Instagram friendly display

title: AMAZING👏🏽👏🏽
review: Such an amazing app!! I use it all the time and it has AMAZING prices!! I make quick cash and buy clothes that come in so fast!! Highly recommend!!

title: Pros and cons
review:
Pros: I have make hundreds of dollars off this app, it is quick and easy to buy and/or sell. 

Cons: Depop takes 10% (or more?) of each and every transaction.

title: $ickest app
review: Love everything about this. Easy to use, beautiful, and 100% the future of shopping (+ of finding amazing art!)
Probably my favorite app now! The sellers are very friendly and it's a trustworthy app! The prices are great too! Definitely recommend it!

title: Bug issues!!
review: I love this app, but it has too many bugs and makes it hard to use! The app keeps crashing, won't load messages, I keep getting notifications for messages I've already opened etc. please fix these!

title: Cool idea!
review: In the process of buying my first item and it's going smoothly. I just wish there were more filtering options like size, color, etc.

title: International Plus size model
review: Love using depop to sell my fab clothing from my closet. Setting up my shop on depop was very easy to setup and navigate.  Just wish this app worked on all phone platforms. Not only IPHONES ,IPADS AND MACS.

title: Love it, but....
review: Can you please make it so in private messaging, I could send pictures? So we can can proof postage without listing

title: Best app ever!
review: I absolutely LOVE depop. It's one of the easiest and fastest way in selling items to people all over the world! Definitely recommend using this app :)

title: Size options
review: Great app so far.… however, I think there should be a size option when searching.
Good app, helps to get rid of clothes you no longer wear and other belongings you don't use :-) process is simple.

title: Good but needs fixing
review: It's such a great app to sell and buy, buts it's constantly crashing and it doesn't upload correctly. Before it would now it's slow. I've had a notification that won't go away for a few days now, it's irritating.

title: Keeps crashing
review: Still crashes, I thought the update fixed this. 😅

title: Good app but new UI is unintuitive
review: I enjoy Depop and have had good experiences using it but the new update has made it more difficult and confusing for me (I have vision tracking problems) so it gets a couple stars knocked off.

title: new design? trash
review: i used to love selling and buying on depop. but now the app is so bulky, hard to navigate, and being honest i HATE the design. everyone i know and all of my friends used to love the old crisp, clean design of depop and selling on it. it's the only app i used to sell and purchase on. but now i dread even opening it. please fix it. please. - a former depop fanatic

title: Depop is awesome
review: I love this app so much! The amount of awesome items I've purchased on here is amazing! I totally would recommend to others :)

title: Very good app
review: It's easy to search items and easy to buy items! A lot of great finds!

title: On the redesign...
review: Depop, please listen to your users. You were a 5 star app before this update. The new redesign is atrocious. No one wants to spend time shopping on an app that is so unwelcoming. I loved selling on Depop but since the update all sales have stopped. I only say this as a fan. I bragged about Depop so much in the past - I’d love to be able to do that again.

title: The new design looks like kids app
review:
This new design is garish and hard to navigate. The fonts and colors now look like some sort of toddler app and are headache inducing.

I loved this app and was a 60+ item seller and now I can hardly use the thing. This has been nothing but a huge step backwards in design and functionality. Avoid!!

title: Best app for selling!
review: Great app! Seller/buyer protection, review system, not too difficult to find what you're looking for! It's great. Poshmark and mercari are crap especially compared to Depop!

title: Update
review: Everything changed and while change takes getting used to, the increased loading times makes it impossible.

title: Pretty Cool...
review: Nice to find an app that you can shop from that's legit, at times, lol. I get sick of eBay with scammers and though there are some on here too it's not as bad.

title: Amazing app!
review: I do all of my shopping here now! Filled with friendly sellers who are professional and serious about their shops.

title: My favorite app 💕
review: I love love love this app so much! 💕 I'm a seller on here and I've sold over 100 things, I've had no issues and I love what I do! Thank you guys 🎀

title: Lower the rate you take from us
review: 10% Rate you take away from us is way to high to sell stuff on here cause no one wants to pay for shipping lol lower it please

title: STAY AWAY FROM DEPOP
review: Depop is the worst app i have ever used to for selling my unwanted items. People are rude and do everything they can to stir up drama. They over price everything to make a profit. Recently I saw one girl put up an item for $30 OVER the retail price of an item that was IN STOCK. This app causes you to loose money rather than make it and it is FULL of scammers. DO NOT USE THIS APP EVER.

title: Love
review: I love this app. It's like an online thrift store. You'll be able to find a big variety of items at reasonable prices.  💜💚

title: Honestly
review: Think I'm getting a notification to write a review on my sold page? Anyway, I use this app all the time for the extra money and it's great.

title: One issue
review: Great app, but deleted items still show up in likes and bookmarks and can't be removed meaning I have a bunch of dead listings littering my likes and bookmarks :/

Great app if your looking to make extra money or find really unique items. Nice design, safe, 
easy to use!

title: Not yet
review: Unfortunate, I like the people on here and the stuff is really cool (thanks to the community). The sad part is their newness puts them so far behind macari and vinted. No prepaid shipping labels yet, meaning they encourage their sellers to tack on $5/item or more (and that's per item). I'd like to see where this goes, but for now it's not for me

title: It's a pretty smart idea
review: This app is a very social way to sell things but more people need to use it all there is is people from Italy lol

title: Quick easy cash
review: Great way to down size my collection and save some cash!! Thanks!

title: Eyesore
review: The app is fine but I'll probably delete it because I'm sick of looking at the ugly red logo standing out against normal apps on my home screen, not to mention the notifications that are impossible to clear.
developerResponse: {'id': 1140643, 'body': "Hey, thanks for the review and feedback. Sorry to hear you're having issues with notifications in the app. If you're able to send us more details about the exact issue to productfeedback@depop.com we will take a look into it for you. Thanks, Team Depop", 'modified': '2017-08-30T09:59:14Z'}

title: Waste of time
review: I can't connect my PayPal account it won't work to connect to my account I tried everything and it ended up purchasing my own item and my money is gone I've tried contacting them idk why this is so messed up but they aren't replying to me. Customer service is terrible so I just lost money
developerResponse: {'id': 1084210, 'body': "Hey, Thanks for your review! If you haven't received a reply from us please ensure that you're checking the spam and junk mailboxes of the email address connected to your Depop account. \n\nTeam Depop", 'modified': '2017-08-23T09:44:41Z'}

title: Love.. BUT
review: Good deals & easy way to sell things that are just sitting in my closet! BUT i hate that we have to crop our pictures. 5 stars once that's fixed!

title: No sales at all
review: So I downloaded Depop, Mercari, Poshmark & Letgo & Vinted....by far i made sales on all other apps except depop. I don't know how the algorithms work for depop, but I didn't sell a single item on this app, and I only saw the same profiles get featured over and over and over again I never saw anything new. Over all I deleted the app it's a waste of time.

title: Needs a shipping update
review: I like how it lets you know when you have a sale but it needs a button that alerts the buyer when their item has sold.

title: Positive experiences all around
review: This app runs very smoothly and has been great for all my online thriftily needs!

title: What's going on
review: I've enjoyed this app but now when I list items they don't show on my home page or when you search them. I've even put the location and hashtags. Depop hasn't done anything to resolve the issues despite my emails.

title: Positive experiences all around
review: This app runs very smoothly and has been great for all my online thriftily needs!

title: Great Find
review: This is an excellent app if you are looking to sell some of your pieces from your collection or closet. Clean and easy to use. Genius!

title: Great but 1 issue
review: I love Depop, but after updating it, I no longer get notifications (a message/a follow/a sold piece) within the app.

title: Super great
review: This app is really awesome, you can get rid of old stuff , ... For money . As well as purchase from others stuff .

title: Love it
review: Depop is such a good way to sell your clothes and buy clothes! The selection is so great because it's so unique and at such great prices too!

title: Horrible Customer Service & Sketchy Seller
review: The customer service is actually terrible, and as soon as I bought an item, the seller ghosted and I have yet to receive the item nor hear back from customer service despite multiple complaints. Completely disappointed.
developerResponse: {'id': 1140755, 'body': "Hey, thanks for the review and feedback. Sorry to hear you haven't had a great experience.
